Aaron hook up wit Elisheba an marreez her.  She dottir uv Amminadab, and they can has sunz Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar (nawt in 1 litter LOL).

Korah can has sunz Assir, Elkanah an Abiasaph.

Eleazar iz sun uv Aaron.  He get HARBL GOES WHERE? wif dottir of Putiel, and she birff sun Phinehas.

OK jus mak shure.  The saim Moses an Aaron in fambli lizst abuv is saim as wunz hoo Ceiling Cat sai to dem "Get Israelites owt uv Egypt" (OK test on fambly lizst tomrrow.  Study tonite. LOL chust joke)

Moses an Aaron k? - doan forgett.

Itz so nise, da Bible say it twise: Ceiling Cat sez 2 Moses

"I can iz H4XOR. talk Pharaoh wif newz I tells U".

Then Ceiling Cat sez to Moses, "U iz like Ceiling Cat 2 Pharaoh, an Aaron iz ur prophit.

U sez what I tells u, and Aaron will do stufs too. When Aaron tells Pharaoh to let ur d00dz go

I maik Pharaoh all meen an say no,

and then I be in Pharaoh's Egypt judgin' his Egypt d00dz,

and Pharaoh will know I gotz ninja powerz den."

Moses and Aaron did what they wuz told.

Moses wuz 80 An Aaron was 83 when they talkeded to Pharaoh.

Ceiling Cat sez to Moses and Aaron,

When Pharaoh sayz 'do cool stufs wif powerz,' frow ur stick onna ground, An it will b a snaek.

So Moses and Aaron went to seez Pharaoh. Aaron frew his stick onna ground, and wtf it's a snaek!

Pharaoh got sum sorsors to do fancy stufs.

Pharaoh's sorsors also made sum snaekz, but Aarons snaek eated dem.

But Pharaoh sez, "so whut?"

Then Ceiling Cat sez, "Pharaoh is no fun, and is keepin ur d00dz.

Go see Pharaoh tomarow when he iz on da Nile. Don' ferget ur stick.

Den u say, 'Let mah d00dz go!'

And den u put ur stick inna water, and OMGWTF it b blud and stinky (kittehs no like water,but blud iz wurs),

and Egypt d00dz no can has fish. An no can has drinkz An no can has baffs either, ksept in blud, wich is stinkful.

Ceiling Cat also sez "U tell Aaron he gots to put his hands onna waters in Egypt and OMG dem is blud too, even in da bukkets!"

So Moses and Aaron did what they wuz told.

And BLARG the fish r ded. An teh kittehs wuz all sad cuz no can heas fishz An has to eatz meeses evry day An htey sed BOOOOOORRRRRRING!!!!!!

But Pharaoh's sorsors who wuz liek majik d00ds in WoW An thot dey wuz teh kewl An stufs made blood too, and Pharaoh sez "So whut?"

Then Pharaoh went in his howse.

And the Egypt d00dz maded holes inna ground for water.

undefined

Ceiling cat sez to Moses, "Tell Pharaoh 'Ceiling Cat sez let mah d00dz go, so they can wership me.

If u sez no, I maek frogeez all over ur whole country.

Teh Nile can has frogz. Frogz will be in ur base, and in ur bed, and in ur d00dz howses, and in ur kitchens.

Teh frogz will be all on ur peeplz. An dey will b in ur bukkitz makin ur tadpolez. An tehr wont b ne french d00dz 2 eatz tehm cuz french d00ds wuznt inventd yet. so tehre."

Then Ceiling Cat sez to Moses, "Tell Aaron to hold his stik onna waters, and maek sum frogz come out."

So Aaron held his stik out over teh water, and frogz was all over Pharaoh's base, jumpin on his d00dz.

But the sorsors also maed sum frogz.

Pharaoh sez, "ok, u win, u pray to Ceiling Cat to take away teh frogz, and I let ur d00dz go."

Moses sez to Pharaoh, "U tells me when to pray."

Pharaoh sez, "ok, tomarow, kthx." Moses sez, "works for me."

Teh frogz will leave ur base, and stop jumpin on ur d00dz, and go back to teh Nile."

After Moses and Aaron left Pharaoh's base, Moses yeld to Ceiling Cat about teh frogz.

And Ceiling Cat hurd him, and BLARG teh frogz r ded.

Big piles of ded frogz were maed, and it wuz stinky.

But when Pharaoh saw teh frogpilez, his heart wuz hard, An he wuz like "I no can hear Moses and Aaron."

So Ceiling cat sez to Moses, "Tell Aaron to hit teh ground wif his stik, and all over Egypt teh dust will become nats."

They did, and nats was all in Pharaoh's Egypt.

An dis tiem, teh sorsors could not maek no nats.

Teh sorsors sed to Pharaoh, "I fink Ceiling Cat is fo realz." But Pharaoh's heart wuz still hard (dey cood melt it in ovin, but den pharo wood dai).

So Ceiling Cat sez to Moses, "Waek up rly and say to Pharaoh, 'Ceiling cat sez: let mah d00dz go.'

If u don, I will send flais on u and ur d00dz and ur pplz.

But I will leave Goshen alone, cuz is teh Israelites base. And u will know that I, Ceiling Cat, am in Goshen protectin' mah d00dz.

I will maek mah d00dz and ur d00dz different. U sees it tomarow!"

And Ceiling Cat shows it the nxt day. Bunches of flais flewed into Pharaoh's base and into his d00dz howses. An sum ov teh gypshunz sed wish der wuz stil sum frogz 2 eatz all htese flyz but sum othr gypshunz sed stfu so dey sed k An shutted up.

Then Pharaoh asks Moses and Aaron, "Kill stufs for Ceiling Cat here in Egypt."

But Moses sez, "Do not want. Egypt d00dz wud b gr0ssed out, and hit us wif roks.

We hazta go away 4 free days to give Ceiling Cat ded stufs. Is orders."

Pharaoh sez, "OK, but u better not go far. Now, u prey for me."

Moses sez, "I pray after I go. Tomarow teh flais will leev ur base. But no mor triks, Pharaoh - u hasta let mah d00dz go offer sacurfices."

Then Moses praid to Ceiling Cat.

An Ceiling Cat was cool and maed all teh flais go home.

Den da Ceiling Cat sed to Moses "Go sey to Pharaoh 'Thus seys Ceiling Cat, tha God ov da Hebrewz, "Let meh d00dz go yah?"

Srsly,

So Ceiling Cat set a time, "2moro at 5ish!"

So da next day Ceiling Cat did it an all da animals ov da gypshuns gots run ova by Monorail Cat but not Ceiling Cat's peeps animulz.

Pharaoah was like "WOAH".  He sent owt boorucrats to chek an tehy saw Israel animables wer okey-dokey,  but he stil didnt let Ceiling Cat's peeps go.

Ceiling Cat sez 2 Moses n Aaron:

nao is time u can nomz sheepz.  (use kung fu to killz dem.)

I haz a recipe.  Eech fambly howze maik wun sheepz fore din-dins.

If teh fambly iz littel, den shaer a sheepz wif anodder fambli.  Doan forgit: Taik al U want, but eet wat U take.  Save rest 4 latr in frij kthx ... o wait no sry frij no invented yet ... forget i sed that!

Da sheepz U cuk muss B da best EVAR no bad sheepz k

Off dem all on da saim dai, at de saim hour, on da 14th ov da munth.

B4 U cook, put sheepz blood on ur door fraims.  Dun ask wai, trust me k?

Den follow recipe, an eet sheepz dat niet.  It haz a flavur cookd wif vegtbls.  Bred yes but da yeest DO NOT WANT!

Cuk all sheepz in fryin panz lik h00mans, no yummy raw meet 2nite.

Lik I sez: Taik al U want, but eet all U taik.  No leff-overs! srsly

Oh, an 1 moar thing.  Eet faszt, werring all ur invisible cloze.  Sounz weerd? Trst mee.

Oh btw, dat nite, I Ceiling Cat go an pwn all Egyptians #1 sunz, uv ppl an animables.  Even piggz #1 sunz.

U Israelites sit in yr howsez w sheepz bluud on da doors, I no get U.  U all liv.

Dis event iz nao holly dai!  I kalls it Passover.

Evry yr, U eet bred wid no yeest, or I pwnz U.

an U meet up to sai "Oh hai Ceiling Cat, u rulz - srsly."  Nobody wurk thos dayz k, unless U in da kitchen LOL.

Sum ov U muss B stoopid, coz I repeet 2 U.

Eeach yr, seben dayz, no yeest in Ur bred.  Is called matza it gud nom nom k.

If U hav yeest in ur bred, den I'm in yur howze, pwning U.

No gettin owt uv it.  No scyooses.  Rools be rools, k?

Moses he sez nao iz tyme for sheepz feest.

Doan forgit to smeer sheepz bluud on yr doorfraimz.  Vry impotent. An stay in.  U is howse kittehs  tonite.  Lok yr catflap shutt.

U stay in an Ceiling Cat keepz U safe, k?

Moses sez "U do all dis, not jist tonite

but also aftr we get to teh promisd litter box.

Then ur kittens goinna axskx U Y kittehs hav dese roolz.

U tellz teh kittens uv yr litterz itz Passover!" Den Moses STFU an teh Israelite kittehs prayzz Ceiling Cat.

Israel kittehs folloz da roolz.

Itz midnitez an all hell braiks loos!  All teh #1 sunz of Ejipp go "Blargh I am ded".

All uv Ejipp cry'n'cry.

Dat nite, Pharaoh sez 2 Moses n Aaron "All Israel GTFO uv Ejipp nao  srsly.

Taikx ur animables 2 in dair flox.  An say Hi to Ceiling Cat for me, k?"

Egyptians say 2 Isaelites "OMFG! go 'fore we all goz 'Blargh' ".

So Israelites grab dair bred an karri it wif dem.

An Israel kats asxkx Egyptians "btw we can has yr bling?"

Dey get goald an silber bling frum Egyptians.  Ceiling Cat fixd it guud.

Da Isaelitez GTFO from Rameseseseseses to Succoth (dat mean BOOTHS) bout 600,000 d00dz on foot, not counting lil kittehs.

N a Meow Mix bunch o peepz GTFO wit dem 2, n lots o moocows n sheeples n goatse n stuff, flocks n herds.

N dey maked nasty matzoh bred wif no yeest frum the no-yeest dough dey tookened outta Ejipp cuz de wuz told to GTFO uf Ejipp (but u knewz dat, rite?) n cood not delay; n dey can haz no provisions cuz Ceiling Cat no told Mosez n Aaron to tell dem to get ready but ya think dey wudda got a cloo n dun it demselves afta the 5th plague ya kno? O well.

Da Israelitz wuz in Ejipp 430 yearz;

at da end uf doze 430 yearz like to the nanosecond cuz da Ceiling Cat iz superanal dat way, all da ranks uf Ceiling Cat GTFO uf Ejipp's sandbox.

N 4 Ceiling Cat it wuz nite of watchinz; dat same nite iz Ceiling Catz, a nite to stay up n no sleepz 4 all kittehs uf Israelz.

K n Ceiling Cat sez 2 Moses n Aaron: Dis is law uf passovah treatsies: No furriner can has cheezburger wit choo.

But ne slavez u bot can has cheezburger wit choo after u cut off hiz 4skin YEOWTCH!

No contracturz n no day laborerz n nobuddy who say WILL WORK 4 FOOD can haz cheezburger wit choo.

U can haz cheezburger in 1 house only, no to-go orders plz. No breakingz itz bonz eithur.

All U peepz uf Israel shall has cheezburger.

If n a furriner who livz wit choo DO WANT cheezburger wit Ceiling Cat, all uf his d00dz must cut off dere 4skinz; den he can has cheezburger; he get citizenshipz. But no d00dz wit da 4skinz can has cheezburger.

But dere iz 1 law 4 da citizenz n da peepz wit da green kards 2.

N all da Israelites did dat; as Ceiling Cat commanded Moses n Aaron, dey did dat. If dat still not kleer go back n read it gain K?

K so Ceiling Cat still yakkin at Moses n he sez 2 him he sez

"I wantz all ur 1stborn, d00dz n beasties, da 1st thingz dat cum outta gurl-hole iz mine, kthxbai."

N Moses sez to his peepz,
"Blog dis day dat u GTFO uf Ejipp, dat nasty sandbox nobuddy ever scoopened; how Ceiling Cat helped u GTFO wif mighty paw: no yeesty bred u can haz.

U GTFO on dis day in munth uf Abib.

So when Ceiling Cat has brunged u into sandbox uf Canaanites, Hitties, Amorites, Hivites n Jebusites, which He sez 2 ur daddiez dat u can haz, land flowing wit milk n hunny n cheezburgerz U shall do dis:

7 daze u can has only nasty icky matzoh bred n on 7th day u can haz partie 4 Ceiling Cat.

Jus so U unnerstanz cuz I no u peepz like loopholz: 4 all 7 daze nasty unleavened matzoh u can haz; yeesty normal bred u no can eetz; no can haz regular bred wif choo n no can has it on ur landz

N U shall splain 2 ur sonz on dat day "Itz cuz Ceiling Cat did all dis stuff 4 me when I GTFO uf Egypt, dat's worth a week uf eatzin nuttin but matzoh what make u constipatined."

N dis will be like a note writenz on ur paw n on ur 4head--so dat de lessinz uf Ceiling Cat be in ur mouf--dat wif mightee paw Ceiling Cat let u GTFO Ejipp.

U will do diz evvy year OR ELSE!

But wait, derez more! N when Ceiling Cat brungz u into sandbox uf Canaanites, n he will cuz he promissed u n ur daddiez, n sez U can haz it,

u setz apart for Ceiling Cat da first isshoo uf every womb: every boy firstborn dat ur moocowz drop is Celing Cat's.

But evvy first-born donkee u haf to give me a sheep 2 get it back or u haf 2 breaks its neck till itz ded. N u haf 2 redeem ur 1stborn boy kittehs 2.

N when ur boy kittehs growz up n sez "Why U do dat?" u say "Cuz Ceiling Cat helped us GTFO Ejipp, the sandbox nobuddy scooped.

When Pharoah said Uh-uh u no can goez Ceiling Cat pwned evvy 1stborn in Egypt's sandbox, 1stborn uf both d00dz n beesties. So I gif 2 Ceiling Cat evvy first boy of bomb, but redeemz evvy oldest of my boy kittehs. Wake up! I'm still talking to you!

N so it'll be lilke a big note written in red Sharpies on ur hand n on ur 4head dat wif mighty paw Ceiling Cat sez GTFO Ejipp."

K so when da Pharoah letz da peepz go, Ceiling cat said don go to Philistine land, tho that's closer cuz Ceiling Cat said, "Dem peepz might shit dere pantz if dey sees war n go back 2 Ejipp."

So Ceiling Cat took peeps on scenic root thru Sea of Reeds. The Israelites wuz packin heat out of Ejipp.

N Moses brunged bonez uf Joseph (remember him?) who made kittehs uf Israel do dat, cuz he said "Ceiling Cat will notice if u bringz mah bonz up with choo."

Dey GTFO Succoth (Booths), n camped out at Etham, near da big wildernez.

Celing Cat went in front uf dem in a cloud in day, so dey don get lost, n as  pillar uf fier at nite so dey can seez where dey goin, so dey cood travel all day n nite.

Ohai agen. So tehn Ceiling Cat sez 2 mozis:

"Ohai Mozis. Tel evrybdy that caem from Isreil that tehy shud go chilout o'er taht way, by teh red see, srsly.

An farro wil b liek, wtf? R tehy stuk in teh sandbocks?

An I say farro is stubrn liek donkei. he gon chayse u but i pwnz farro An farros armei. An teh gypshuns kno I is Ceiling Cat." An teh izrelites did wut Ceiling Cat sez.


So farro was liek, "OMG wher did tehy go?!?!?!" Cuz theey all lefted alreddy. An he An his peepz change der mynds abowt lettin em go. teh gypshuns were sad cuz der slayvs all left.

An den farro gott in hiz farro cheryot and was leik, "C'mon giez lets go get thoes slaves bak!!"

Farro wentt afterr teh Isralights wit leik 600 ov hiz bestest armei d00ds, srsly.

So stubrn farro chaysd dem An Israel was all, "Bai, srry."

But Farro An hiz cheryots chaysd dem more An he cachd up wid teh Izrelites at teh red see.

Tehn teh Irsaaiels sawd Egipshins and wer all, "OMFG@!!!"

So teh Isrealights were ril madd @ Mosis b/c tehy didint want 2 dei! tehy all "wy we hafta dei heer?!?! we wooda deid in egypp anywai."

Tehy wud rathur do evrything 4 the egipshins then dei!!! Right??

An cuz teh gypshuns, tehy stubrn, tehy chayse u. but I wil pwnz dem all.

An aftur pwnzing, teh gypshuns kno I is Ceiling Cat."


So teh big clowd taht wuz Ceiling Cat wuz in frunt but it movd 2 teh bak. it movd

so it wer btween teh gypshuns An teh Izrelites. An teh clowd wuz dark scarei clowd fur teh gypshuns, but wuz nyse hapei clowd fur teh Izrel d00ds. An teh armeis no can see cuz it wer dark (cept 4 kitties cuz dey cn C in dark).

Moses put his han ovur teh see, An Ceiling Cat mayk big wind that blowd see all nite till see wuz drei lan so kitties no get wet. teh waterz wer dvided.

Teh izrelites crosd see on drei urth an no get wet. but tehr wuz walls o water on teh sieds.

But teh gypshuns An teh charyots chaysd tehm OMG!!


Tehn, rite be4 sun caym up, Ceiling Cat lookd at teh gypshuns An he pwnzd dem so dey freekd ouwt.

An teh weelz ov teh charyots wuz stuk an not moov gud. teh gypshuns sed "Ceiling Cat fites 4 justis 4 teh izrelites, An he no leik us. we shud skedaddlz, leik srsly."

Ceiling Cat sed 2 moses: "hold ur han ovur teh see, An teh waterz, tehy cum bak An coverz teh gypshuns."

so moses hold hiz han ovur teh see, An teh waterz go bak 2 normul. teh gypshuns treid 2 run awai, but Ceiling Cat frew dem in2 teh see.

Teh waterz coverd teh charyots An all teh gypshun armei d00ds. leik srsly. not evun 1 gypshun cud excayp teh waterz.

But teh izrelites, tehy crosd see on drei urth an no get wet An tehr wuz walls o water on teh sides 4 dem.


So Ceiling Cat savd teh izrel peepz taht dey. An teh izrelites seed teh gypshuns all wetz an puffey on teh beech.

Moses An teh izrelites singa song to Ceiling Cat An it go lyk this: 
"I sing to teh Ceiling Cat cuz he ttly pwnd ar enmees An is ful of win; 
he frew teh charyots An teh gypshons in2 teh see. 

Ceiling Cat fites 4 justis; he sav me frum teh bad gaiz. 
he is Ceiling Cat, An I mak him cookies, 
he was Ceiling Cat for my dad too An i singa song for him. 

Ceiling Cat fite for us An his name be Ceiling Cat. 

"Ceiling Cat frew teh gypshons An teh charyots in2 teh see; 
An teh bestest armei d00ds was drownded in teh red see. 

An tehy was covrd by teh waterz; An tehy go 2 botom ov see like relly beeg roks. 

"Ceiling Cat, ur rite paw is reel awsm for teh pwnzing; 
An it mak enmies teeny tiny peeses. 

Yoo r ful of gud An win to pwn teh enmees; 
an if u gets mad teh enmees burn up wit fyre an look kool. 

Yoo blowd on teh see An teh waterz was walls; 
teh botom of teh see was teh grownd. 

Teh enmees sayd 'Iz gonna chayse tehm An Iz gonna cach tehm; 
Iz gonna takes there money An wif my sord I takes there stuf.' 

But yor brefs, Ceiling Cat, makes teh gypshuns drownded; 
tehy fell to botom even tho tehy DO NOT WANT!! 

"Ceiling Cat, is ther other cats in ceiling like yoo? NO!
Is ther a cat as ful of gud an win lyk yoo? NO! 
Can other cat give many cheezburgers? NO! 

Yoo strech yur rite paw, 
An teh urth gulp enmees. 

Yoo not brake yur promiss, yoo rescood teh peeps; 
An yoo strong An yoo bring tehm to teh good litterbocks. 

Teh othr nashuns, tehy heer yur strong, An tehy scard of yoo! 
Teh Philistines cant moov dey so scard! 

Teh Edom lidors r ful of lose; 
teh strong mans from Moab shakes in der boots 
teh peeps frum Canaan r lyk teh cowardly lion (cept he not inventd yet). 

Tehy ful of scard An lose. 
dey no yoo r strong, Ceiling Cat, dey no moov frum scard til yur peeps go by- 
teh peeps yoo savd frum slavree. 

U bringz dem An puts tehm on teh mowntin, 
teh playse u choosd 4 teh home, Ceiling Cat, 
teh holy bocks u bildeded. 

Ceiling Cat, yoo r king forever." 
Moses lyks 2 repeet hisself alot. 

Miriam Singa Song 2



Teh izrelites went throo teh see on teh grownd An not get wet, lyk I sayd befor. An teh gypshons An teh charyots An stuf went in2 teh see, Ceiling Cat coverd tehm wif teh waterz, also lyk I sayd befor. 

Miriam, sis of Aaron An Moses, took teh tambreen, An teh laydeez go aftur her. Teh laydeez had tambreens too An tehy dansd.

An Miriam sanga song to tehm lyk this: 
"Singa song to Ceiling Cat, cuz he wins teh day; 
he frew teh gypshuns in2 teh see." 
Miriam singa short song. 

Teh Water has a flavr



Tehn Moses brang teh izrelites away from teh red see in2 teh sandbocks calld Shur. Tehy walkd threw teh sandbocks for three dayz, but dey finds no waterz.

Then tehy caym to playse calld Marah, An ther was waterz. Teh waterz had a flavr, An teh flavr was bad. An tahts wy playse calld Marah, cuz Marah meens "has a bad flavr."

Teh ppls whynd to Moses An sayd, "Whut we drinks now??"

Moses prayd to Ceiling Cat, An Ceiling Cat showd him sum wood. Moses frew teh wood in teh waterz, An teh waterz had a flavr, An teh flavr wuz gud. 
Ceiling Cat gave teh peepls laws, An he testd teh peepls.

he sayd, "if yoo dos wutevr I say to doo An doo wut I says is good, yoo not cach teh gypshun sicknessis. I is Ceiling Cat, I makes u feel bettr." 

undefined

Teh hole j00 crew lef Elim n cumz 2 teh Desert o Sin, taht is between Elim n Sinai, on teh fifteenth day o teh 2nd munf after tehy had cum out o Egypt.

In teh desert teh hole cr00 startid flame war gainst Moses n Aaron.

Teh j00s sez 2 tehm, "t00 bad CEILING CAT din pwn us 2 deth in Egypt! Haz cheezburgrz in Egypt, but u bringed us wher no haz cheezburgrz.  We is dyin 2 haz cheezburgr." 

Tehn CEILING CAT sez 2 Moses, "Hakkkkh hakkkhh hakkk hhhhaqqqqqqq blehhhhh", for CEILING CAT did much gruming, and expelt furz and cheezburgrz frum hiz belly.  He then sez "I throwz exter cheezburgrz 2 u frum ceiling."  An' Moses sez, "gross--want nu cheezburgrz."  An' CEILING CAT sez, "OK--Teh ppl are 2 go out each day n gather enuf Nu cheezburgrz 4 taht day. Iz test 2 c if tehy suck."

On teh 6th day tehy are 2 nuke teh cheezburgrz, n taht is 2 b twice as much as tehy scarf up on teh other days." 

So Moses n Aaron sez 2 all teh j00s, "Tonite u wil no taht it were CEILING CAT who brung u out o Egypt,

n in teh morning u wil see teh awsomness o CEILING CAT, cuz him chekd out ur flame war gainst him. Who are we, taht u should flame us?"

Moses also sez, "U wil no taht it were CEILING CAT when him gives u beef paties n cheez 2 eat in teh evening n all teh bunz u want in teh morning, cuz him has chekd ur flame gainst him. Who are we? U are not flamin us, but CEILING CAT." 

Tehn Moses tol Aaron, "Say 2 teh entire j00 cr00, 'Cum b4 CEILING CAT, 4 him red ur flam war n him not hapy kitteh.'"

While Aaron were talkin 2 teh hole j00 cr00, tehy lukd @ teh desert, n there waz teh awsomnes o CEILING CAT in a clowd.  Wuz shapd like kitteh, srsly.

CEILING CAT was laik Moses,

"I herd teh flamin o teh j00s. Tell em, 'At twilight u can haz cheezburgr, n in teh morning u can haz bunz. Tehn u wil no taht I am CEILING CAT.'" 

taht nite cheezburgrz covered teh camp, n in teh morning was a layer o dew in teh camp.

When teh dew were gon, lil flaks like frost on teh groun is on teh sand.

undefined

awl teh izrelites left teh sandbocks of bad, An tehy moovd arownd wehn Ceiling Cat say so. tehy mayd camp at Rephidim, but tehr no were water.

so teh peepls complaned too Moses An say "gives us waters!!!" 
Moses say, "why y00 complane? is y00 giv Ceiling Cat pop quiz?" 

but teh peepls wus reely therstee An tehy keeped complanes to Moses. tehy say "why u taked us owt of egypp? y00 wanna kill us An ar baybees An ar moocows from therstee?" 

so Moses prayd to Ceiling Cat An say "wut i d00 wif teh peepls? tehy gonna frow roks at me soon!" 

Ceiling Cat say to Moses "tayk sum izrelite leedrs An go in front of peepls. dont furget yor stik!

Iz gonna stan in frunt o y00 on a rok at Mount Sinai. hit teh rok wif teh stik, An waters come owt." So Moses did taht wehn teh izrelite leedrs wachd. 

tehn taht playse wer calld Massah An Meribah cuz the izrelites complaned An gayv Ceiling Cat pop kwiz an akxed "is Ceiling Cat tehre?" 
 Go too War wif Amalekites!!1! 


Amalekites caym An attakk izrelites at Rephidim!!1! teh Amalekites r not reely kites. tehy danjrus.

Moses say to Joshua "pik owt sum warryurs An armei d00ds to fite teh Amalekites tmorow. Iz gonna stan on teh hill ovr tehre wif my stik."

Joshua doed wut Moses say An he went to fite teh Amalekites. Moses An Aaron An Hur went to top of teh hill.

wehn Moses holded his arms up teh izrelites winned An wehn he put his arms down teh Amalekites winned.

Moseses arms gotted tired. so Aaron An Hur gayv him a big rok to sit on An tehy standed nex to him An holded up his arms til sun goed down.

so Joshua ttly winned over Amalekites. 

tehn Ceiling Cat say to Moses, "write teh storei of teh win, so teh peepls rememer it frever. An say to Josh taht iz gonna destroy Amalekites."

Moses builded a altar An it had name "Ceiling Cat is my flag."

undefined

Den Jethro, preest of Midian and tom-in-law of Moses, heerd eveything Ceiling Cat dun for Moses An for his kittehs uv Isrel, An how teh Ceiling Cat had brot Israel out ov da kitteh litters dat nevr got changed. Srsly.

After Moses sed DO NOT WANT to his wyf Zipporah, his tom-in-law Jethro gots her,

An her two boy kittehs. One kitteh was named Gershom, for Moses sayd, "I is become a alien in a foreign littr box";

An teh othr wus named Eliezer, he sayd, "My father's Ceiling Cat was my d00d; he save me from teh soard of Faroe."

Jethro, Moseses Tom-in-law, together wit Moses' boy kittehs An wyf, came to he in the sandbox, where he wuz curled up near teh mountain of Ceiling Cat.

Jethro had sent werd to him, "Iz, your Tom-in-law Jethro, iz coming to u wif ur wyf An her two boy kittehs."

So Moses went out to meet his tom-in-law and rolled on teh sidewak and licked him. They rubbed on each others and den went onto da sofa.

Moses told his tom-in-law about alls teh Ceiling Cat had dun to Faroe and teh Gypshuns for Isreel's sayk and about all teh hardships dey met long teh way and how teh Ceiling Cat had saveded dem.

Jethro purrd when he heer about all teh good things Ceiling Cat had dun for Isreel in pwning teh Gypshuns.

He sayd, "Praise be to Ceiling Cat, who pwned all teh Gypshuns An Faroe, and who maded the Gypshuns leave da kittehs alones.

Now I no that Ceiling Cat is greater than all other cats ov ceiling, cuz he pwned those who thot they pwned teh Isreel kittehs."

An den Jethro, Moses' tom-in-law, gived a cheezburgr An Pokemans to Ceiling Cat, An Aaron came with all the old kittehs of Isreel to eat cheezburgr buns wif Moses' tom-in-law and Ceiling Cat. Nom nom nom.
 Apointmint ov Judges 


Teh next day Moses took his seat to serve as judge for teh kittehs, An they stood around him teh hole day and nite.

When his tom-in-law saw all that Moses was doing for teh kittehs, he said, "What is this you are doing for the kittehs? Why y00 sit as judge by yurself, while all these peepls stand around you teh hole day and nite?" Srsly?

Moses anserd him, "cause the peepls come to me to no wut Ceiling Cat want.

When dey has a awgooment, it is brot to me, An I decide between teh kittehs and tellz them of Ceiling Cat's rulez."

Jethro say "yor doin it wrong.

y00 gonna mayk urself tird An teh peepls get tire to. is too much fr just wun persn.

take my avyse An Ceiling Cat be wif yoo. is gud for to hav juhjes An bring prolems to Ceiling Cat.

is gud yoo teech teh peepls wut Ceiling Cat say An tells tehm how to liv An do.

but y00 shud chooz sum gud kittehs to be leedrs of teh peepls: leedrs for lots An lots of peepls. tehy shud be fraid o Ceiling Cat An can be trustd An no tayks cheezburgr bribes.

tehy be judges fr teh peepl frever. tehy cn bring teh reely hard argments to yoo, but tehy can figur owt teh small wuns. tahts eezyur fr u.

if u  doo tihs lyk Ceiling Cat say, yoo not gonna be tire An teh peepls all go home hapee." 

Moses do wut Jethro say

An he choosd gud mens frum teh Izrelites. he mayd tehm leedrs of lots An lots o peepls.

tehy wuz judges fr teh peepl frever, An tehy brang teh hard argments to Moses but figgurd owt teh smal wuns bai tehmselfs.

Then Ceiling Cat spoked all them werds:

I iz Ceiling Cat An I iz Top Cat, An I broughted u out of hawt litturbawx wit no cheezbrgrs for hard mousin at all

No can has other ceiling cat!! U gotz other Ceiling Cat, I shoot yous wit mah lollazer eyes. Srsly.

If u try be Ceiling Cat of any of mai creayshunz up in floaty skai, down in erth or in watr or I shoot yous wit mah lollazer eyes.

If u think faek Ceiling Cat iz Ceiling Cat, I mek u ded An ur kittenz ded An if yur kittenz have kittenz, dey be ded too, for being stupid and stuffs.

If not I wuv u An all ur lotz uf kittenz!

U sez Ceiling Cat bad, I shoot yous wit mah lollazer eyes, cuz I dun liek it. Srsly.

Remembur Caturday An keep holy.

U ketch mousies 6 dais An finish ketchin, K?

Caturday, u no ketchin mousies. U An all ur peepz go wrship me. And, if yu beez gudd, I maks it so yu can stays home and do alla stuffs yu wanted tu doos.

I maded heavenz An erth An see An the stuff that does teh funney hoppey stuffz in An on it - so I make it holy cuz I no ketch mousies.

Bez u good to papa kitteh An mama kitteh so u has long nine liefs.

U no maek peepz ded with teh malice! Srsly!

U no maek sexxes wit other gurlz or menz than urs (that mi jobz!).

U no taek cheezburgerz for free if not getz for free.

U no tell bad stuff ov ur neibor.

U no wantz neibor cheezburgerz! No wief, no gurlz, no menz, no abimalz, NO BUKKITZ! DEY NOT UR BUKKITZ, K? dey da LOLrus' bukkits.

When peepz see mai great orkestr wit thundr An all cool speshul effects thei wur scairdey wimps

Thei sed to Mozus 'U goez speek to uz An we will listen; but Ceiling Cat will shoot us wit His lazer eyes!'

Mozus LOL'd lotz, An a bit moar, for thei wuz such scairdies, An sed 'Ceiling Cat no maek u ded; he just wantz to hav fun wit u gais An maek u scairdey cats so u obei him.'

But peepz wur still scairdies An let Mozus go ther to Ceiling Cat.

Ceiling Cat sez "Tellz them scairdies: 'U see I meowed to u from big ceilingz.

U no mek me of silvar or goldz.

U mek me altar of kitteh-litturz An gif me pwnz0rzed animulz ther An I gif u cheezburgr.

But u no maek me altar of bjutiful stonez. DO NOT WANT!

Lissen up my peeps, theez r how u bee judjn ahn them.

If yu bye Heeb servint, six yrs yu getz servd: an in teh sebbenth he iz holla'n, 'freedum!'

If he bee on hiz ohn, he leaf ahn hiz ohn: if he wuz maryd, hiz wyf go wif him.

If hiz mastah haz givn wyf too him, an if she haz kitnz thankz to slayv; wyf an kitnz iz pwn3d by mastah, an slayv betta gowai. O, SNAPZ!

An if servint sez, O noes! I luv mastah, wyf an kitnz; kin ai haz fambly?

Hiz mastah shall bringz him to judgz; he shall alsoh bringz him to doar, or doar post; an mastah shall jam icepik thru eer; an mastah getz servd 4evah by slayv, so noes talkn back biatch.

An if cat selz hiz doter 2 b maydservint, she shall not goez out az teh menservintz duhz.

If she sez 'iz it in yet???' to mastah, who iz maryd too her, then he shall letz her bee redeemd: noez sellin' her to strayng nashun jus cuz he cain't git it up.

An if he iz maryn her to hiz sun, he shall deal wif her lik if she wuz a doter.

If he take anotha wyf; her Meow Mix, her furz, an her duty to PENIS GOEZ WHERE???, shall he nawt diminsh.

If mastah doez nawt gif 'er dese three tings, she goez free, bit wid no moneey$.

U hitz a kitteh an he goes "Blargh I am ded!" then yooz too dyze.

But if U not meenz too killz him, then U must scamper off 2 hide unnner porch I desingates.

But if yooz planz and offs anodder kitteh, den yooz muss B takn frum mah altar and offed yurslf, srsly.  No jokes.

Ani kitteh hoo attacxkx dair ma ur pa moss dye. An I doan meen Kate Moss.

Iff yoooz kidsnap anodder kitteh and sellz dat kitteh, den itz EndCat tiem fur yooz, not huggz tiem.

Even iff yuuz disses yur mommacat ur poppacat, you dyez.  Tuff rools, eh?

If yooz can haz fite an injurs annoder kitteh, an dat kitteh haids awai to lick hizzelf bettr,

Den de wun hoo did teh bitin' n scratchin' woant be blamd, butt haz gotta pay 4 foodz n catsnip 4 teh injurd kitt.

Iff U hitz yr slaev wid a stik, and teh slaiv gtz hurt, U muss B haxxored,

butt no prolbem, if slaev okai lader.  Itz yr slaev, lol!

If yooz fites and hurtz femail preggerz kittah, an da kittnz goez 4th, butt no harmz iz cawzed, den uuuuz muss pay monies dat judgez demanzz.

Butt iff youz maik ouchy, you takes lief 4 lief,

ai 4 ai, toof 4 toof, paw 4 paw

scrach 4 scrach, biet 4 byte, tael 4 tale.

If a ketteh hittz a survunt in de eye, an teh survunt goez bline in deh eye, den teh kitteh muss letz survunt goez free.

An iff hee nox owt a toof, de survunt goez free.

If a man-moo-cow stix hiz hoarn ina kitteh so hardd it dyz, de man-moo-cow getz offed.  No bull!      ! Teh man-moo-cow muss be kilt wid stoanz huckd at it, an U cannod eet teh meetz.  Butt teh kitteh hoo  pwnd teh moocow iz not blaimd.

Bud iff teh moocow can has hobby uv stikin hoarnz in, an teh oaner wuz warnd, an teh moocow killz, den teh moocow AN oanr muss dy.  2 badd!

Butt oanr can pay shekels orr odder munnys an liff insted.

Saim goz if moocow stix hoarn in sun oar dotter kittenz.

If moocow kilz slaev, pay 30 shekelz an huck stoanz at moocow until ded. (Moocowz R trubble, buy sheepz insted. Piggz nott allowd).

Iff kitteh diggz hoal inna grownd, an teh animable (e.g. awks r dawnkee) sumwun els oanz falz in, goez "Blargh" an dyz,

teh kitteh hoo oanz teh hoal muss pay 4 teh ded critter.  EZ rool too rembembur.

Iff mail moocows fite an wun dies, sell teh winner and splitt teh shekels, chop upp loozer an boath ownrz eet.  Nom nom nom.

If u take my cow or sheep and kil it or sell it, can i has 5 cow heads r 4 sheep? thx.

If u brake in my house and i killz u, i is no error,

unless its morning. Then i is error. U must pay me bak, unless u haz no cookiez, then i sell u.

If u still haz my animal, u be giv me 2.

If ur cowz eat my grass, can i haz more grass?

If u start a fire, giv me cookies.

If i lend my frend cookies, the n00b who stealz mah cookies will pay back double.

If i no find teh n00b, i check if my frehnd didn't eat mah cookies.

If we both be say "these be mah cookies," teh almighteh judges decide.

If mah cookies magicly disapeer after i gives them 2 u,

then u must sware to Ceiling Cat that u no ate them.

But if u DID ate them, can i has more cookies?

If a wild animalz ate mah cookies, proof it.

If mah cookies i lent u die when i isnt looking, gimme more cookies.

If i is there, then u no pay. If u hire mah cookies, then wut u paid makes meh happy.

But ifz her dadz leik NO WAI, d00d gotta giev him cheezeburgerz enuff dat dey be ekwalz to teh cost dat verginz has.  Or him can giev dad monies.  But cheezburgerz betterz.

mah angr will be arousd, an im gonna kill u wif teh sword; ur wivez will become widows an ur children fatherles.

If u lend money 2 wan ov mah peeps among u hoo iz needy, do not be liek moneylendr; charge him no interest.

if u taek ur neighbors cloak as pledge, return it 2 him by sunset,

cuz his cloak iz teh only coverin he has 4 his body. wut else will he sleep in? when he criez out 2 me, im gonna hear, 4 im compashunate.

Do teh same wif ur kattle an ur sheep. let them stay wif their mothers 4 7 dais, but giv them 2 me on teh eighth dai.

den he sed 2 mosez, "come up 2 teh lord, u an aaron, nadab an abihu, an seventy ov teh elders ov israel. u r 2 worship at distance,

but mosez alone iz 2 approach teh lord; teh others must not come near. an teh peeps cud not come up wif him."

when mosez went an told teh peeps all teh lordz werdz an laws, they respondd wif wan voice, "evrythin teh lord has sed we will do."

mosez den wrote down evrythin teh lord had sed.  He got up early teh next mornin an built an altar at teh foot ov teh mountain an set up twelve stone pillars representin teh twelve tribez ov israel.

den he sent young israelite doodz, an they offerd burnt offerings an sacrificd young bulls as fellowship offerings [a] 2 teh lord.

mosez took half ov teh blood an put it in bowls, an teh othr half he sprinkld on teh altar.

den he took teh book ov teh covenant an read it 2 teh peeps. they respondd, "we will do evrythin teh lord has sed; we will obey."

mosez den took teh blood, sprinkld it on teh peeps an sed, "dis ar teh teh blood ov teh covenant dat teh lord has made wif u in accordance wif all thees werdz."

mosez an aaron, nadab an abihu, an teh seventy elders ov israel went up

an saw teh ceilin cat ov israel. undr his feet wuz somethin liek pavement made ov sapfire, clear as teh sky itself.

but ceilin cat did not raize his hand against thees leaders ov teh israelitez; they saw ceilin cat, an they eatd an drank.

teh lord sed 2 mosez, "come up 2 me on teh mountain an stay her, an im gonna giv u teh tablets ov stone, wif teh law an commandz i has written 4 their instrucshun."

den mosez set out wif joshua his aide, an mosez went up on teh mountain ov ceilin cat.

he sed 2 teh elders, "wait her 4 us til we come bak 2 u. aaron an hur r wif u, an anyone involvd in dispute can go 2 them."

when mosez went up on teh mountain, teh cloud coverd it,

an teh glory ov teh lord settld on mount sinai. 4 6 dais teh cloud coverd teh mountain, an on teh seventh dai teh lord calld 2 mosez frum within teh cloud.

2 teh israelitez teh glory ov teh lord lookd liek consumin fire on top ov teh mountain.

now maikz ringz for poelz soz u can carrie it. (iz sure not gonna do it)

overlay it wif pure gold an mak gold moldin around it.

also mak around it rim handbreadth wide an put gold moldin on teh rim.

mak 4 gold rings 4 da table an fasten them 2 teh 4 corners, wer teh 4 legs r.

teh rings r 2 be close 2 teh rim 2 hold teh polez usd in carryin teh table.

mak teh polez ov acacia wood, overlay them wif gold an carry teh table wif them.

an mak itz platez an dishez ov pure gold, as well as itz pitchers an bowls 4 da pourin out ov offerings.

put teh bread ov teh presence on dis table 2 be before me at all tiems.

mak lampstand ov pure gold. hammr out itz base an shaft, an mak itz flowerlike cups, budz an blosoms ov wan piece wif them.

6 branchez r 2 extend frum teh sidez ov teh lampstand—3 on wan side an 3 on teh othr.

3 cups shapd liek almond flowers wif budz an blosoms r 2 be on wan branch, 3 on teh next branch, an teh same 4 all 6 branchez extendin frum teh lampstand.

an on teh lampstand thar r 2 be 4 cups shapd liek almond flowers wif budz an blosoms.

wan bud shall be undr teh furst pair ov branchez extendin frum teh lampstand, second bud undr teh second pair, an third bud undr teh third pair—6 branchez in all.

teh budz an branchez shall all be ov wan piece wif teh lampstand, hammerd out ov pure gold.

"den mak itz 7 lamps an set them up on it so dat they light teh space in frunt ov it.

itz wick trimmers an trays r 2 be ov pure gold.

talent ov pure gold iz 2 be usd 4 da lampstand an all thees accesoriez.

undefined

"mak teh tabernacle wif 10 curtains ov finely twistd linen an blu, purple an scarlet yarn, wif cherubim werkd into them by skilld hanz.

all teh curtains r 2 be teh same size—twenty-8 cubits long an 4 cubits wide. [a]

join 5 ov teh curtains togethr, an do teh same wif teh othr 5.

mak loops ov blu material along teh edge ov teh end curtain in wan set, an do teh same wif teh end curtain in da othr set.

mak fifty loops on wan curtain an fifty loops on teh end curtain ov teh othr set, wif teh loops opposiet each othr.

den mak fifty gold clasps an use them 2 fasten teh curtains togethr so dat teh tabernacle iz unit.

"mak curtains ov goat hair 4 da tent ovar teh tabernacle—eleven altogethr.

all eleven curtains r 2 be teh same size—thirty cubits long an 4 cubits wide. [b]

join 5 ov teh curtains togethr into wan set an teh othr 6 into anothr set. fold teh sixth curtain double at teh frunt ov teh tent.

mak fifty loops along teh edge ov teh end curtain in wan set an also along teh edge ov teh end curtain in da othr set.

den mak fifty bronze clasps an put them in da loops 2 fasten teh tent togethr as unit.

as 4 da addishunal length ov teh tent curtains, teh half curtain dat iz left ovar iz 2 hang down at teh rear ov teh tabernacle.

teh tent curtains will be cubit [c] longr on both sidez; wut iz left will hang ovar teh sidez ov teh tabernacle so as 2 covr it.

mak 4 da tent coverin ov ram skins dyd red, an ovar dat coverin ov teh othr durable leathr. [d]

"mak upright framez ov acacia wood 4 da tabernacle.

each frame iz 2 be 10 cubits long an cubit an half wide, [e]

wif 2 projecshuns set parallel 2 each othr. mak all teh framez ov teh tabernacle in dis wai.

mak twenty framez 4 da south side ov teh tabernacle

an mak forty silvr basez 2 go undr them—2 basez 4 each frame, wan undr each projecshun.

4 da othr side, teh north side ov teh tabernacle, mak twenty framez

an forty silvr basez—2 undr each frame.

mak 6 framez 4 da far end, dat iz, teh west end ov teh tabernacle,

an mak 2 framez 4 da corners at teh far end.

at thees 2 corners they must be double frum teh bottom all teh wai 2 teh top an fittd into single ring; both shall be liek dat.

so thar will be 8 framez an sixteen silvr basez—2 undr each frame.

"also mak crosbars ov acacia wood: 5 4 da framez on wan side ov teh tabernacle,

5 4 dose on teh othr side, an 5 4 da framez on teh west, at teh far end ov teh tabernacle.

teh sentr crosbar iz 2 extend frum end 2 end at teh middle ov teh framez.

overlay teh framez wif gold an mak gold rings 2 hold teh crosbars. also overlay teh crosbars wif gold.

"set up teh tabernacle accordin 2 teh plan shown u on teh mountain.

"mak curtain ov blu, purple an scarlet yarn an finely twistd linen, wif cherubim werkd into it by skilld hanz.

hang it wif gold hookz on 4 posts ov acacia wood overlaid wif gold an standin on 4 silvr basez.

hang teh curtain frum teh clasps an place teh ark ov teh covenant law behind teh curtain. teh curtain will separate teh holy place frum teh most holy place.

put teh atonement covr on teh ark ov teh covenant law in da most holy place.

place teh table outside teh curtain on teh north side ov teh tabernacle an put teh lampstand opposiet it on teh south side.

"4 da entrance 2 teh tent mak curtain ov blu, purple an scarlet yarn an finely twistd linen—teh werk ov an embroiderr.

"Build sumin square, mebbe an acacia wod alter, idk just a sugestion. It haz to be three cubitz hi, five cubitz long, fiev cubitz wide. DO IT NAO.

Nd make an horns at ech of teh four cornerz, so taht teh hornz an teh altr r one hole ting, u dig? Put sum bronz on it, i liek bronz. Shiney.

Make sum utensils, bronz to. Liek i sed, bronz is gud. U mite wanna maek an pot, shuvel, bouls, meat forcs (to eat teh cheezburgers, duh) an firepanz. Idk just a sugestion. But u kno u haf to do it, right?

Then make sum gratingz, a bronze interweb, and four bronze (u kno i liek teh bronz) rings at teh four corners of teh interwebz.

Put it undernethe teh ledg of teh altr so itz up teh altr jst halfway. U kno, fifty percent. Not teh fourty nine percentz, fifti. Ima check if u did it rite, if u dint i wil unleshe mi firey rath up on u. U wont hav no mor cheezburgers after that, u wont.

Put sum bronz on teh acasia to. I LIEK BRONZ, K.

Maek it so that teh long sticks r gona go into teh rings, they'll be on too sidez of teh alter when ur slavez r carryin it up teh mountainz. Ur to lazy to do it so u'll probbly axk somone else to do it. Iv been watchn u, i kno how u is. U dun deserv no cheezburgers.

MAKED IT HOLOW.

Then u might wana maek a cortyard for teh tabernuhcle, or liek tent thingeh. I tlk weird, dunt I lol. Teh side over in teh south'll be liek a hunderd cubitz long lol and hav teh linen curtans. Linen iz soft. Ceiling Cat lieks teh linens.

An yu want liek twenty posts nd twenty BRONZ basses wit silvr huks! Liek Captain Huk lol arrr matey.

Teh northz side shuld be a hunderd cubitz long wid mo' curtans wit teh bronz baeses again. An teh huks. An teh bandz.

Fi'ty cubitz shuld be teh west side, kays.

Saem for teh east end towrds teh sunrize taht looks liek a ranebow cheezburger.

Curtans fifteen cubitz long shold be at teh entrance, wit three posts and baeses

and curtans fifteen cubitz long on teh other sied. Wit three posts an three basses. Lol u tink this is so much instrucsions, but its not rly. I'm lieing but w/e man.

Lulz kay. For teh entranse to teh cortyard of majicks, provied a curtan agen lol. Wear ar u gonna get all these curtans? Anywaiz, teh curtin shuld be liek twenty cubitz long nd it shuld hav all these colorz! Liek blu, purpel, scarlt. Colrfull. Moar posts nd basses too, lulz.

All teh posts around teh cortyard shuld get sum bands nd huks nd basses.

Thee cortyard shal be a hunderd cubitz long nd fifty cubitz wied wit curtans of linen fiev cubitz hi wit bronz (so many bronz) basez.

Lulz an hear's teh gud part. Lisen up. LISEN UP. I COMAND U. All of teh stuf used in teh tabernuhcle shuld be BRONZ. LOL BRONZ. Gud stuf.

So liek tell teh Isrelitez to get u sum olive oil. Its not for cuking, dun worry, i kno u cuk rly bad.
