"has aaron ur brothr brought 2 u frum among teh israelitez, along wif his sons nadab an abihu, eleazar an ithamar, so they cud serve me as priests.

mak sacrd garments 4 ur brothr aaron 2 giv him dignity an honor.

tell all teh skilld werkers 2 whom i has given wisdom in such matters dat they r 2 mak garments 4 aaron, 4 his consecrashun, so he cud serve me as priest.

thees r teh garments they r 2 mak: boobpiece, an efod, robe, woven tunic, turban an sash. they r 2 mak thees sacrd garments 4 ur brothr aaron an his sons, so they cud serve me as priests.

has them use gold, an blu, purple an scarlet yarn, an fine linen.

"mak teh efod ov gold, an ov blu, purple an scarlet yarn, an ov finely twistd linen—teh werk ov skilld hanz.

it 2 has 2 shouldr piecez attachd 2 2 ov itz corners, so it can be fastend.

itz skillfully woven waistband iz 2 be liek it—ov wan piece wif teh efod an made wif gold, an wif blu, purple an scarlet yarn, an wif finely twistd linen.

"taek 2 onyx stonez an engrave on them teh namez ov teh sons ov israel

in da ordr ov their birf—6 namez on wan stone an teh remainin 6 on teh othr.

engrave teh namez ov teh sons ov israel on teh 2 stonez teh wai gem cuttr engravez seal. den mount teh stonez in gold filigree settings

an fasten them on teh shouldr piecez ov teh efod as memorial stonez 4 da sons ov israel. aaron iz 2 bear teh namez on his shoulders as memorial before teh lord.

mak gold filigree settings 14 an 2 braidd chains ov pure gold, liek rope, an attach teh chains 2 teh settings.

undefined

"fashion boobpiece 4 makin decishuns—teh werk ov skilld hanz. mak it liek teh efod: ov gold, an ov blu, purple an scarlet yarn, an ov finely twistd linen.

it 2 be square—a span [a] long an span wide—an foldd double.

den mount 4 rows ov preshus stonez on it. teh furst row shall be carnelian, chrysolite an beryl;

teh second row shall be turquoize, lapis lazuli an emerald;

teh third row shall be jacinth, agate an amethyst;

teh fourth row shall be topaz, onyx an jaspr. [b] mount them in gold filigree settings.

thar r 2 be twelve stonez, wan 4 each ov teh namez ov teh sons ov israel, each engravd liek seal wif teh naym ov wan ov teh twelve tribez.

"4 da boobpiece mak braidd chains ov pure gold, liek rope.

mak 2 gold rings 4 it an fasten them 2 2 corners ov teh boobpiece.

fasten teh 2 gold chains 2 teh rings at teh corners ov teh boobpiece,

an teh othr endz ov teh chains 2 teh 2 settings, attachin them 2 teh shouldr piecez ov teh efod at teh frunt.

mak 2 gold rings an attach them 2 teh othr 2 corners ov teh boobpiece on teh inside edge next 2 teh efod.

mak 2 moar gold rings an attach them 2 teh bottom ov teh shouldr piecez on teh frunt ov teh efod, close 2 teh seam jus aboov teh waistband ov teh efod.

teh rings ov teh boobpiece r 2 be tid 2 teh rings ov teh efod wif blu cord, connectin it 2 teh waistband, so dat teh boobpiece will not swin out frum teh efod.

"whenevr aaron enters teh holy place, he will bear teh namez ov teh sons ov israel ovar his hart on teh boobpiece ov decishun as continuin memorial before teh lord.

also put teh urim an teh thummim in da boobpiece, so they cud be ovar aarons hart whenevr he enters teh presence ov teh lord. thus aaron will always bear teh meanz ov makin decishuns 4 da israelitez ovar his hart before teh lord.

"mak teh robe ov teh efod entirely ov blu cloth,

wif an openin 4 da head in itz sentr. thar shall be woven edge liek collar [c] around dis openin, so dat it will not tear.

mak pomegranatez ov blu, purple an scarlet yarn around teh hem ov teh robe, wif gold bells tween them.

teh gold bells an teh pomegranatez r 2 alternate around teh hem ov teh robe.

aaron must wear it when he ministers. teh sound ov teh bells will be herd when he enters teh holy place before teh lord an when he comez out, so dat he will not dye.

"mak plate ov pure gold an engrave on it as on seal: holy 2 teh lord.

fasten blu cord 2 it 2 attach it 2 teh turban; it 2 be on teh frunt ov teh turban.

it will be on aarons forehead, an he will bear teh guilt involvd in da sacrd gifts teh israelitez consecrate, whatevr their gifts cud be. it will be on aarons forehead continually so dat they will be acceptable 2 teh lord.

"weave teh tunic ov fine linen an mak teh turban ov fine linen. teh sash iz 2 be teh werk ov an embroiderr.

mak tunics, sashez an caps 4 aarons sons 2 giv them dignity an honor.

aftr u put thees clothez on ur brothr aaron an his sons, anoint an ordain them. consecrate them so they cud serve me as priests.

undefined

"dis ar teh wut u r 2 do 2 consecrate them, so they cud serve me as priests: taek young bull an 2 rams without defect.

an frum teh finest wheat flour mak round loavez without yeast, thick loavez without yeast an wif oliv oil mixd in, an thin loavez without yeast an brushd wif oliv oil.

put them in basket an present them in it—along wif teh bull an teh 2 rams.

den brin aaron an his sons 2 teh entrance 2 teh tent ov meetin an wash them wif watr.

taek teh garments an dres aaron wif teh tunic, teh robe ov teh efod, teh efod itself an teh boobpiece. fasten teh efod on him by itz skillfully woven waistband.

put teh turban on his head an attach teh sacrd emblem 2 teh turban.

taek teh anointin oil an anoint him by pourin it on his head.

brin his sons an dres them in tunics

an fasten caps on them. den tie sashez on aaron an his sons. [a] teh priesthood iz theirs by lastin ordinance. den u shall ordain aaron an his sons.

"brin teh bull 2 teh frunt ov teh tent ov meetin, an aaron an his sons shall lay their hanz on itz head.

slaughtr it in da lordz presence at teh entrance 2 teh tent ov meetin.

taek sum ov teh bulls blood an put it on teh horns ov teh altar wif ur fingr, an pour out teh rest ov it at teh base ov teh altar.

den taek all teh fat on teh internal organz, teh coverin ov teh livr, an both kidneys wif teh fat on them, an burn them on teh altar.

but burn teh bulls flesh an itz hide an itz intestinez outside teh camp. it be sin offerin. [b]

"taek wan ov teh rams, an aaron an his sons shall lay their hanz on itz head.

slaughtr it an taek teh blood an splash it against teh sidez ov teh altar.

cut teh ram into piecez an wash teh internal organz an teh legs, puttin them wif teh head an teh othr piecez.

den burn teh entire ram on teh altar. it be burnt offerin 2 teh lord, pleasin aroma, fud offerin presentd 2 teh lord.

"taek teh othr ram, an aaron an his sons shall lay their hanz on itz head.

slaughtr it, taek sum ov itz blood an put it on teh lobez ov teh rite ears ov aaron an his sons, on teh thumbs ov their rite hanz, an on teh hooj toez ov their rite feet. den splash blood against teh sidez ov teh altar.

an taek sum ov teh blood on teh altar an sum ov teh anointin oil an sprinkle it on aaron an his garments an on his sons an their garments. den he an his sons an their garments will be consecratd.

"taek frum dis ram teh fat, teh fat tail, teh fat on teh internal organz, teh coverin ov teh livr, both kidneys wif teh fat on them, an teh rite thigh. (dis ar teh teh ram 4 da ordinashun.)

frum teh basket ov bread made without yeast, which iz before teh lord, taek wan round loaf, wan thick loaf wif oliv oil mixd in, an wan thin loaf.

put all thees in da hanz ov aaron an his sons an has them wave them before teh lord as wave offerin.

den taek them frum their hanz an burn them on teh altar along wif teh burnt offerin 4 pleasin aroma 2 teh lord, fud offerin presentd 2 teh lord.

aftr u taek teh boob ov teh ram 4 aarons ordinashun, wave it before teh lord as wave offerin, an it will be ur share.

"consecrate dose parts ov teh ordinashun ram dat belong 2 aaron an his sons: teh boob dat wuz wavd an teh thigh dat wuz presentd.

dis ar teh always 2 be teh regular share frum teh israelitez 4 aaron an his sons. it teh contribushun teh israelitez r 2 mak 2 teh lord frum their fellowship offerings.

"aarons sacrd garments will belong 2 his descendants so dat they can be anointd an ordaind in them.

teh son hoo succeedz him as priest an comez 2 teh tent ov meetin 2 ministr in da holy place iz 2 wear them 7 dais.

"taek teh ram 4 da ordinashun an cook teh meat in sacrd place.

at teh entrance 2 teh tent ov meetin, aaron an his sons r 2 eat teh meat ov teh ram an teh bread dat iz in da basket.

they r 2 eat thees offerings by which atonement wuz made 4 their ordinashun an consecrashun. but no wan else cud eat them, cuz they r sacrd.

an if any ov teh meat ov teh ordinashun ram or any bread iz left ovar till mornin, burn it up. it must not be eaten, cuz it sacrd.

"do 4 aaron an his sons evrythin i has commandd u, takin 7 dais 2 ordain them.

sacrifice bull each dai as sin offerin 2 mak atonement. purify teh altar by makin atonement 4 it, an anoint it 2 consecrate it.

4 7 dais mak atonement 4 da altar an consecrate it. den teh altar will be most holy, an whatevr touchez it will be holy.

"dis ar teh wut u r 2 offr on teh altar regularly each dai: 2 lambs yer old.

offr wan in da mornin an teh othr at twilight.

wif teh furst lamb offr tenth ov an efah [c] ov teh finest flour mixd wif quartr ov hin [d] ov oil frum presd olivez, an quartr ov hin ov wine as drink offerin.

sacrifice teh othr lamb at twilight wif teh same grain offerin an itz drink offerin as in da mornin—a pleasin aroma, fud offerin presentd 2 teh lord.

"4 da generashuns 2 come dis burnt offerin iz 2 be made regularly at teh entrance 2 teh tent ov meetin before teh lord. thar im gonna meet u an speek 2 u;

thar also im gonna meet wif teh israelitez, an teh place will be consecratd by mah glory.

"so im gonna consecrate teh tent ov meetin an teh altar an will consecrate aaron an his sons 2 serve me as priests.

den im gonna dwell among teh israelitez an be their ceilin cat.

undefined

"mak an altar ov acacia wood 4 burnin incense.

it 2 be square, cubit long an cubit wide, an 2 cubits high [a]—itz horns ov wan piece wif it.

overlay teh top an all teh sidez an teh horns wif pure gold, an mak gold moldin around it.

mak 2 gold rings 4 da altar below teh moldin—2 on each ov teh opposiet sidez—2 hold teh polez usd 2 carry it.

mak teh polez ov acacia wood an overlay them wif gold.

put teh altar in frunt ov teh curtain dat shieldz teh ark ov teh covenant law—before teh atonement covr dat iz ovar teh tablets ov teh covenant law—wer im gonna meet wif u.

"aaron must burn fragrant incense on teh altar evry mornin when he tendz teh lamps.

he must burn incense again when he litez teh lamps at twilight so incense will burn regularly before teh lord 4 da generashuns 2 come.

do not offr on dis altar any othr incense or any burnt offerin or grain offerin, an do not pour drink offerin on it.

once yer aaron shall mak atonement on itz horns. dis annual atonement must be made wif teh blood ov teh atonin sin offerin [b] 4 da generashuns 2 come. it most holy 2 teh lord."

den teh lord sed 2 mosez,

"when u taek census ov teh israelitez 2 count them, each wan must pai teh lord ranzom 4 his life at teh tiem he iz countd. den no plague will come on them when u numbr them.

each wan hoo crosez ovar 2 dose already countd iz 2 giv half shekel, [c] accordin 2 teh sanctuary shekel, which weighs twenty gerahs. dis half shekel iz an offerin 2 teh lord.

all hoo cros ovar, dose twenty yeers old or moar, r 2 giv an offerin 2 teh lord.

teh rich r not 2 giv moar than half shekel an teh poor r not 2 giv les when u mak teh offerin 2 teh lord 2 atone 4 ur livez.

receiv teh atonement money frum teh israelitez an use it 4 da service ov teh tent ov meetin. it will be memorial 4 da israelitez before teh lord, makin atonement 4 ur livez."

den teh lord sed 2 mosez,

"mak bronze basin, wif itz bronze stand, 4 washin. place it tween teh tent ov meetin an teh altar, an put watr in it.

aaron an his sons r 2 wash their hanz an feet wif watr frum it.

whenevr they entr teh tent ov meetin, they shall wash wif watr so dat they will not dye. also, when they approach teh altar 2 ministr by presentin fud offerin 2 teh lord,

they shall wash their hanz an feet so dat they will not dye. dis ar teh 2 be lastin ordinance 4 aaron an his descendants 4 da generashuns 2 come."

den teh lord sed 2 mosez,

"taek teh followin fine spicez: 500 shekels [d] ov liquid myrrh, half as mutch (dat iz, 250 shekels) ov fragrant cinnamon, 250 shekels [e] ov fragrant calamus,

500 shekels ov casia—all accordin 2 teh sanctuary shekel—an hin [f] ov oliv oil.

mak thees into sacrd anointin oil, fragrant blend, teh werk ov perfumr. it will be teh sacrd anointin oil.

den use it 2 anoint teh tent ov meetin, teh ark ov teh covenant law,

teh table an all itz articlez, teh lampstand an itz accesoriez, teh altar ov incense,

teh altar ov burnt offerin an all itz utensils, an teh basin wif itz stand.

u shall consecrate them so they will be most holy, an whatevr touchez them will be holy.

"anoint aaron an his sons an consecrate them so they cud serve me as priests.

say 2 teh israelitez, dis ar teh 2 be mah sacrd anointin oil 4 da generashuns 2 come.

do not pour it on anyone elsez body an do not mak any othr oil usin teh same formula. it sacrd, an u r 2 considr it sacrd.

whoevr makez perfume liek it an puts it on anyone othr than priest must be cut off frum their peeps. "

den teh lord sed 2 mosez, "taek fragrant spicez—gum resin, onycha an galbanum—an pure frankincense, all in equal amounts,

an mak fragrant blend ov incense, teh werk ov perfumr. it 2 be saltd an pure an sacrd.

grind sum ov it 2 powdr an place it in frunt ov teh ark ov teh covenant law in da tent ov meetin, wer im gonna meet wif u. it shall be most holy 2 u.

do not mak any incense wif dis formula 4 yourselvez; considr it holy 2 teh lord.

undefined

Ceiling Cat sayed to Moses

"Lookz, I dun sayed to Bezalel, son uv Uri, son uv Hur of teh tribe uv Judah, "O hai!"

an I putz invisible ceiling cat in him, an smartz to do all stuff

laik playin' with teh shinies

an with teh rox and teh ded trees

an he an Elihav teh son uv Achisamach will do tings I laiks

an dey will makes teh mtg tent an teh box uv teh lawz an its cuverin an all its baskits

an teh tabul an its baskits, an teh pur lamp an its baskits, an teh lolcatnip tabul

an teh tabul for givin cheezburgrz to Ceiling Cat

an plus teh clotheses, Aaron's priest stuff and his kidz clotheses when tehy act lik priests,

an teh catnip and air feshnerz for the mtg tent. Tehy hav to do it lik i tol u."

Plus Ceiling Cat also sayed to Moses,

"Tell tehm Israelites, 'O hai gaiz! U gotz 2 watch out 4 teh Caturday. Iz mai way of reminding u an ur kidz who iz bosscat.

" 'No srsly, watch out 4 teh Caturday, iz importen. NE1 what uses it lik litter box gotta be pwned 2 deth; just nap tehn or get put out teh house.

Play with shinies 4 siks daze, but teh sebbenth is Caturday, importen to Ceiling Cat. Nap or get pwned 2 deth, lik I just sayed.

U an ur kidz gonna keep this Caturday rule from now on.

Tellin U agin, iz mai way of remindin u who iz bosscat, cuz i made teh ceiling and teh house in siks days, but then i napped.' "

undefined

when teh peeps saw dat mosez wuz so long in comin down frum teh mountain, they gatherd around aaron an sed, "come, mak us godz [a] hoo will go before us. as 4 dis fellow mosez hoo brought us up out ov egypt, we doan knoe wut has happend 2 him."

aaron anzwerd them, "taek off da gold earrings dat ur wivez, ur sons an ur daughters r wearin, an brin them 2 me."

so all teh peeps took off their earrings an brought them 2 aaron.

he took wut they handd him an made it into an idol cast in da shape ov calf, dat bebeh moocow, fashionin it wif tool. den they sed, "thees r ur godz, [b] israel, hoo brought u up out ov egypt."

when aaron seed dis, he builted an altar in frunt ov teh calf an announcd, "2morrow thar will be festival 2 teh lord."

so teh next dai teh peeps rose early an sacrificd burnded offerinz an presentd fellowship offerings. den they sat down 2 eat an drink an got up 2 indulge in revelry.

den teh lord sed 2 mosez, "go down, cuz ur peeps, whom u brought up out ov egypt, has become corrupt.

they has been quick 2 turn away frum wut i commandd them an has made themselvez an idle cast in da shape ov calf. they has bowd down 2 it an sacrificd 2 it an has sed, thees r ur godz, israel, hoo brought u up out ov egypt.

"i has seen thees peeps," teh lord sed 2 mosez, "an they r stiff-neckd peeps.

nao leef me alone so dat mah angr cud burn against them an dat i cud pwn them. den im gonna mak u into great nashun."

but mosez sought teh favor ov teh lord his ceilin cat. "lord," he sed, "y shud ur angr burn against ur peeps, whom u brung out ov egypt wif great powr an mighty hand?

y shud teh egyptianz say, it wuz wif evil intent dat he brought them out, 2 kill them in da mountains an 2 wipe them off da face ov teh earth? turn frum ur fierce angr; relent an do not brin disastr on ur peeps.

remembr ur servants abraham, isaac an israel, 2 whom u swore by ur own self: im gonna mak ur descendants as numerous as teh stars in da sky an im gonna giv ur descendants all dis land i promisd them, an it will be their inheritance furevr."

den teh lord relentd an did not brin on his peeps teh disastr he had threatend.

mosez turnd an went down teh mountain wif teh 2 tablets ov teh covenant law in his hanz. they wuz inscribd on both sidez, frunt an bak.

teh tablets wuz teh werk ov ceilin cat; teh writin wuz teh writin ov ceilin cat, engravd on teh tablets.

when joshua herd teh noize ov teh peeps shoutin, he sed 2 mosez, "thar iz teh sound ov war in da camp."

mosez replid:  "it not teh sound ov victory, it not teh sound ov defeat; it teh sound ov singin dat i hear."

when mosez approachd teh camp an saw teh calf an teh dancin, he wuz liek OMFG! WTF!??! an he threw teh tablets out ov his hanz, breakin them 2 piecez at teh foot ov teh mountain.

an he took teh calf they had made an Pwnd it in da fire; den he ground it 2 powdr, scatterd it on teh watr an made teh israelitez drink it.

he sed 2 aaron, "wut wrong wit u? Wut teh peepz do so u do liek dis an be all soopr bad nstuff?"

"dun be mad, moe!" aaron anzwerd. "u knoe how stooped thez peeps cn b wif teh eevl n stuff.

they sed 2 me, mak us fake ceiling catz hoo will go before us. as 4 dis guy mosez hoo brought us up out ov egypt, we doan knoe wut happend 2 him or wer he wen.

so i was liek, gimme ur goald blingz! den they gaev me teh goald, an i threw it into teh fire, an POOF! out came dis moocow! WOA!!"

mosez saw dat teh peeps wuz all crazei cuz aaron didn care wut they did n they maid teh baddies go ROFLCOPTER!

so he stood at teh entrance 2 teh camp an sed, "EVERY1 dat's wif teh Ceiling Cat, cummere wit me! Srsly." an all teh levitez goaded 2 him.

den he sed 2 them, "dis ar teh wut teh lord, teh ceilin cat ov israel, sez: all u guyz wif me cum and get ur lazer eyes an pwn all teh peeps hoo r doin all dis badness. DUN MISS NE1!! SRSLY! NOT COOL!!1!"

teh levitez did as mosez commandd, an dat dai bout 3 thousand peeps dyde frum teh lazors.

den mosez sed, "u has been set apart 2 teh lord todai, 4 u wuz against ur own sons an brothers, an he has cheezbrgrd u dis dai."

teh next dai mosez sed 2 teh peeps, "u has committd super epic failz. but nao im gonna go up 2 teh lord; mebbeh i cn sai sorrey so for 2 maek him not so mad an no kill evry1."

so mosez went bak 2 teh lord an sed, "OMFG, deez peeps so stoopid! they has made themselvez godz ov gold.

but nao, plz forgiv their sin—but if not, den blot me out ov teh book u has written."

teh ceiling cat replid 2 mosez, "evr1 hu dun stuped no iz gun be in mai book no moar.

nao go, lead teh peeps 2 teh place i spoke ov, an mah angelcat will go before u. howevr, when teh tiem comez 4 me 2 punish, im gonna punish them 4 their sin."

undefined

An teh Ceiling Cat sez unto Moses, Shoo! an skat, yo an yo budz hu came from hiz Hood, unto the hood wat I handz to Abe, Zak and Jakey-boi sai – ur base r belong to u an tehy.

An I iz gun sendin Angels an stuf b4 urselfs; an I is shooin Cataanites, teh Amorites an such. All of tehy ebil fules.

To a land flowin wiv milk an Cheezburgr an stuf: I wunt put teh Cat amung teh pidgins; coz uz all aholes: I mite p0wn thous all by like teh axident.

An wen teh peeps heered teh ebilness, tehy did catterwall: an no Cat did bling hisself up.

An Ceiling Cat dun sez at Moses, sai to ur peeps, ur all aholes: Iz gunna pop caps in yo azzez, an eat ur cheezburgrs an stuf: unbling urselfs, so I can no ur fates.

An teh peeps did unbling tehyselfs on a hill or such.

An moses taked teh tabbynacle, an did erect (lulz) it awai from teh peeps an did call tehy all unto it or stuf.  An all tehy lukin 4 teh Ceiling Cat went at teh Big Tent thingy.

an whenevr mosez went out 2 teh tent, all teh peeps rose an stood at teh entrancez 2 their tents, watchin mosez til he enterd teh tent.

as mosez went into teh tent, teh pillar ov cloud wud come down an stay at teh entrance, while teh lord spoke wif mosez.

whenevr teh peeps saw teh pillar ov cloud standin at teh entrance 2 teh tent, they all stood an worshipd at teh entrancez 2 their tents.

teh lord wud speek 2 mosez face 2 face, as wan speakz 2 frend. den mosez wud return 2 teh camp, but his young aide joshua son ov nun did not leef teh tent.

mosez sed 2 teh lord, "u has been tellin me, lead thees peeps, but u has not let me knoe whom u will send wif me. u has sed, i knoe u by naym an u has findz favor wif me.

if u r pleezd wif me, teach me ur ways so i cud knoe u an continue 2 find favor wif u. remembr dat dis nashun iz ur peeps."

teh lord replid, "mah presence will go wif u, an im gonna giv u rest."

den mosez sed 2 him, "if ur presence doez not go wif us, do not send us up frum her.

how will anyone knoe dat u r pleezd wif me an wif ur peeps unles u go wif us? wut else will distinguish me an ur peeps frum all teh othr peeps on teh face ov teh earth?"

an teh lord sed 2 mosez, "im gonna do teh vry ting u has askd, cuz im pleezd wif u an i knoe u by naym."

den mosez sed, "nao show me ur glory."

an teh lord sed, "im gonna cause all mah goodnes 2 pas in frunt ov u, an im gonna proclaim mah naym, teh lord, in ur presence. im gonna has mercy on whom im gonna has mercy, an im gonna has compashun on whom im gonna has compashun.

but," he sed, "u cant c mah face, 4 no wan cud c me an liv."

den teh lord sed, "thar iz place near me wer u cud stand on rawk.

when mah glory pasez by, im gonna put u in cleft in da rawk an covr u wif mah hand til i has pasd by.

undefined

An Ceiling Cat say 'Mosus, I be too lazyz to be rytin on stownz so yooz hamerz my wordz on da stownz'.

In morningz prezentz yourselfz to Ceiling Cat on topz the litter mount. But if I asleepz den juss keep prezenting.

An let nonez be coming along tu, an no flockz or herdz can eatz befor Ceiling Cat eatsez.

Mosus cut stownz an brung dem in hiz pawz in da morningz up da litter mount.

Ceiling Cat got dere ina clowd and meowed hiz own name reel lowd.

He floated in fronta Mosus meowin, "Ceiling Cat is nice, slow ta growl, gives lotsa cheezburgerz,

chillz out and duzzint sweat da bad stuff. But, he gives da lazer eye to bad peeps kittenz, litter after litter. Watch yer bak!

Mosez bowd 2 teh ground at once an worshipd.

"lord," he sed, "if i has findz favor in ur eyez, den let teh lord go wif us. although dis ar teh stiff-neckd peeps, forgiv r wickednes an r sin, an taek us as ur inheritance."

Den teh lord sed: "im makin covenant wif u. before all ur peeps im gonna do wonders nevr before dun in any nashun in all teh wurld. teh peeps u liv among will c how awsum iz teh werk dat i, teh lord, will do 4 u.

obey wut i command u todai. im gonna driv out before u teh amoritez, canaanitez, hittitez, perizzitez, hivitez an jebusiets.

be careful not 2 mak treaty wif dose hoo liv in da land wer u r goin, or dey will be snare among u.

brek down der altrs, smash der sacrd stonez an cut down der asherah polez. [a]

do nt worship aneh othr ceilin cat, 4 da lord, whose naym iz jealous, iz jealous ceilin cat.

"Be carful not 2 mak treateh wif dose hoo liv in da land; 4 when dey prostitute themselvez 2 der godz an sacrifice 2 dem, they will invite u an u will eat their sacrificez.

an when u choose sum ov their daughters as wivez 4 ur sons an dose daughters prostitute themselvez 2 their godz, they will lead ur sons 2 do teh same.

"Do not mak any idols.

"Selabraet teh festivul ov unlevnd bread. 4 7 dais eat bread made without yeast, as i commandd u. do dis at teh appointd tiem in da month ov aviv, 4 in dat month u came out ov egypt.

"Teh furst offsprin ov evry womb belongs 2 me, includin all teh firstborn malez ov ur livestock, whethr frum herd or flock.

redeem teh firstborn donkey wif lamb, but if u do not redeem it, break itz neck. redeem all ur firstborn sons. no wan iz 2 appear before me empty-handd.

"Siks dais u shall labor, but on teh sevnth dai u shall rest; even durin teh plowin season an harvest u must rest.

"Selabraet teh festivul ov weekz wif teh firstfruits ov teh wheat harvest, an teh festival ov ingatherin at teh turn ov teh yer. [b]

3 tiems yer all ur doodz r 2 appear before teh sovereign lord, teh ceilin cat ov israel.

im gonna driv out nashuns before u an enlarge ur territory, an no wan will covet ur land when u go up 3 tiems each yer 2 appear before teh lord ur ceilin cat.

"Do not offr teh blood ov sacrifice 2 me along wif anythin containin yeast, an do not let any ov teh sacrifice frum teh pasovr festival remain til mornin.

"Brin teh best ov teh firstfruits ov ur soil 2 teh houz ov teh lord ur ceilin cat. do not cook young goat in itz mommys milk."

Den teh lord sed 2 mosez, "rite down thees werdz, 4 in accordance wif thees werdz i has made covenant wif u an wif israel."

mosez wuz thar wif teh lord forty dais an forty nitez without eatin bread or drinkin watr. an he wrote on teh tablets teh werdz ov teh covenant—teh 10 commandments.

When mosez came down from teh mounten with teh bof roks dat he writed teh law on, he din knoa dat his fais wz all shiniey and WHOA! cuz he ben hangin' wit teh Ceilin Cat.

so wen aaron an all teh peeps saw mosus, his face was all supa glowey! an they wer liek, WTF?? DO NOT WANT!!1 for 2 b close to Mo.

But moesz wuz liek "O Hai!"; so aaron n all teh bosscats came back to him, and he talkd to dem.

after dat all teh izreelites cumed close to him, and he gived them all teh roolz n stuff teh Ceilingcat had given him on mownt syniey.

aftr mosus wuz dun, he hid insied paper bag for to hied his shiney face.

But whenever he hung wit teh ceiling cat an to speak with him, he removed teh bag until he came out. And when he came out and told the Israelites what he had been commanded,

undefined

mosez assembld teh whole israelite community an sed 2 them, "thees r teh things teh lord has commandd u 2 do:

4 6 dais, werk iz 2 be dun, but teh seventh dai shall be ur holy dai, dai ov sabbath rest 2 teh lord. whoevr doez any werk on it 2 be put 2 death.

do not light fire in any ov ur dwellings on teh sabbath dai."

mosez sed 2 teh whole israelite community, "dis ar teh wut teh lord has commandd:

frum wut u has, taek an offerin 4 da lord. evryone hoo iz willin iz 2 brin 2 teh lord an offerin ov gold, silvr an bronze;

blu, purple an scarlet yarn an fine linen; goat hair;

ram skins dyd red an anothr durable leathr [a]; acacia wood;

oliv oil 4 da light; spicez 4 da anointin oil an 4 da fragrant incense;

an onyx stonez an othr gems 2 be mountd on teh efod an boobpiece.

all hoo r skilld among u r 2 come an mak evrythin teh lord has commandd:

teh tabernacle wif itz tent an itz coverin, clasps, framez, crosbars, posts an basez;

teh ark wif itz polez an teh atonement covr an teh curtain dat shieldz it;

teh table wif itz polez an all itz articlez an teh bread ov teh presence;

teh lampstand dat iz 4 light wif itz accesoriez, lamps an oil 4 da light;

teh altar ov incense wif itz polez, teh anointin oil an teh fragrant incense; teh curtain 4 da doorway at teh entrance 2 teh tabernacle;

teh altar ov burnt offerin wif itz bronze gratin, itz polez an all itz utensils; teh bronze basin wif itz stand;

teh curtains ov teh courtyard wif itz posts an basez, an teh curtain 4 da entrance 2 teh courtyard;

teh tent pegs 4 da tabernacle an 4 da courtyard, an their ropez;

teh woven garments worn 4 ministerin in da sanctuary—both teh sacrd garments 4 aaron teh priest an teh garments 4 his sons when they serve as priests."

den teh whole israelite community withdrew frum mosez presence,

an evryone hoo wuz willin an whose hart movd them came an brought an offerin 2 teh lord 4 da werk on teh tent ov meetin, 4 all itz service, an 4 da sacrd garments.

all hoo wuz willin, doodz an women alike, came an brought gold jewelry ov all kindz: broochez, earrings, rings an ornaments. they all presentd their gold as wave offerin 2 teh lord.

evryone hoo had blu, purple or scarlet yarn or fine linen, or goat hair, ram skins dyd red or teh othr durable leathr brought them.

dose presentin an offerin ov silvr or bronze brought it as an offerin 2 teh lord, an evryone hoo had acacia wood 4 any part ov teh werk brought it.

evry skilld woman spun wif her hanz an brought wut she had spun—blu, purple or scarlet yarn or fine linen.

an all teh women hoo wuz willin an had teh skill spun teh goat hair.

teh leaders brought onyx stonez an othr gems 2 be mountd on teh efod an boobpiece.

they also brought spicez an oliv oil 4 da light an 4 da anointin oil an 4 da fragrant incense.

all teh israelite doodz an women hoo wuz willin brought 2 teh lord freewill offerings 4 all teh werk teh lord thru mosez had commandd them 2 do.

den mosez sed 2 teh israelitez, "c, teh lord has chosen bezalel son ov uri, teh son ov hur, ov teh tribe ov judah,

an he has filld him wif teh spirit ov ceilin cat, wif wisdom, wif understandin, wif knowledge an wif all kindz ov skills—

2 mak artistic designs 4 werk in gold, silvr an bronze,

2 cut an set stonez, 2 werk in wood an 2 engage in all kindz ov artistic crafts.

an he has given both him an oholiab son ov ahisamak, ov teh tribe ov dan, teh ability 2 teach others.

undefined

So bezalel, oholiab an evry skilld person 2 whom teh lord has giaven skill an ability 2 knoe how 2 carry out all teh werk ov constructin teh sanctuary r 2 do teh werk jus as teh lord has commandd."

den mosez summond bezalel an oholiab an evry skilld person 2 whom teh lord had given ability an hoo wuz willin 2 come an do teh werk.

they receivd frum mosez all teh offerings teh israelitez had brought 2 carry out teh werk ov constructin teh sanctuary. an teh peeps continud 2 brin freewill offerings mornin aftr mornin.

so all teh skilld werkers hoo wuz doin all teh werk on teh sanctuary left wut they wuz doin

an sed 2 mosez, "teh peeps r bringin moar than enough 4 doin teh werk teh lord commandd 2 be dun."

den mosez gaev an ordr an they sent dis werd throughout teh camp: "no man or woman iz 2 mak anythin else as an offerin 4 da sanctuary." an so teh peeps wuz restraind frum bringin moar,

cuz wut they already had wuz moar than enough 2 do all teh werk.

all dose hoo wuz skilld among teh werkers made teh tabernacle wif 10 curtains ov finely twistd linen an blu, purple an scarlet yarn, wif cherubim werkd into them by expert hanz.

all teh curtains wuz teh same size—twenty-8 cubits long an 4 cubits wide. [a]

they joind 5 ov teh curtains togethr an did teh same wif teh othr 5.

den they made loops ov blu material along teh edge ov teh end curtain in wan set, an teh same wuz dun wif teh end curtain in da othr set.

they also made fifty loops on wan curtain an fifty loops on teh end curtain ov teh othr set, wif teh loops opposiet each othr.

den they made fifty gold clasps an usd them 2 fasten teh 2 sets ov curtains togethr so dat teh tabernacle wuz unit.

they made curtains ov goat hair 4 da tent ovar teh tabernacle—eleven altogethr.

all eleven curtains wuz teh same size—thirty cubits long an 4 cubits wide. [b]

they joind 5 ov teh curtains into wan set an teh othr 6 into anothr set.

den they made fifty loops along teh edge ov teh end curtain in wan set an also along teh edge ov teh end curtain in da othr set.

they made fifty bronze clasps 2 fasten teh tent togethr as unit.

den they made 4 da tent coverin ov ram skins dyd red, an ovar dat coverin ov teh othr durable leathr. [c]

they made upright framez ov acacia wood 4 da tabernacle.

each frame wuz 10 cubits long an cubit an half wide, [d]

wif 2 projecshuns set parallel 2 each othr. they made all teh framez ov teh tabernacle in dis wai.

they made twenty framez 4 da south side ov teh tabernacle

an made forty silvr basez 2 go undr them—2 basez 4 each frame, wan undr each projecshun.

4 da othr side, teh north side ov teh tabernacle, they made twenty framez

an forty silvr basez—2 undr each frame.

they made 6 framez 4 da far end, dat iz, teh west end ov teh tabernacle,

an 2 framez wuz made 4 da corners ov teh tabernacle at teh far end.

at thees 2 corners teh framez wuz double frum teh bottom all teh wai 2 teh top an fittd into single ring; both wuz made alike.

so thar wuz 8 framez an sixteen silvr basez—2 undr each frame.

they also made crosbars ov acacia wood: 5 4 da framez on wan side ov teh tabernacle,

5 4 dose on teh othr side, an 5 4 da framez on teh west, at teh far end ov teh tabernacle.

they made teh sentr crosbar so dat it extendd frum end 2 end at teh middle ov teh framez.

they overlaid teh framez wif gold an made gold rings 2 hold teh crosbars. they also overlaid teh crosbars wif gold.

they made teh curtain ov blu, purple an scarlet yarn an finely twistd linen, wif cherubim werkd into it by expert hanz.

they made 4 posts ov acacia wood 4 it an overlaid them wif gold. they made gold hookz 4 them an cast their 4 silvr basez.

4 da entrance 2 teh tent they made curtain ov blu, purple an scarlet yarn an finely twistd linen—teh werk ov an embroiderr;

undefined

Bezalel maded speshul woodbox dis big

an covrd it wif gold

an maded rings onit

an stix covrd wif gold

sos dey can cary da box wifout touchin it.

He maeked covr wif gold.

Den he maeked tu statoos ov anjels owt ov gold on teh covr.

He maeked teh anjels on teh ends; an dey wer part ov teh covr.

Dey had der wings spred ovr teh covr. Dey wer fasin eech uddr, lookin at teh covr.

Dey maeked teh tabel owt ov wood.

Den dey put gold on it.

Dey also maeked a rim. It wuz gold tu.

Dey put foar gold rings on teh tabel at teh cornrz, wer teh legz wuz.

Dey wuz close tu teh rim for teh poals fr carreein teh tabel.

Teh poals wuz maekd ov wood an gold.

An den dey maeke plaets an stufs owt ov gold tu. LOLZ. Wai dey liek gold so much? Prolly 4 teh shineyz!

Dey maeked teh litestand owt ov gold tu, an it wuz wun pees.

Der wuz six branchs coeming frum teh siedz.

Tree cups liek flowrz wer on eech branch.

An der wuz foar ov dem wif budz on teh litestand.

Teh budz wuz undr eech paer ov branchs.

Dey wuz gold tu. Srsly.

Dey maekd teh lites owt ov gold tu.

An evryfing wuz gold.

Dey maekd teh altr owt ov wood. It wuz scwar, an teh hornz wer in teh saem pees ov wood.

Den dey put gold on it.

Dey maekd tu gold ringz tu hold teh poalz fr carreeing.

Dey maekd teh poalz owt ov wood. Den dey put gold on dem.

undefined

Tehy maed teh alturz wif woodz, an it wuz tree cyoobitz up, an fiev cyoobitz longz, an fiev cyoobitz wied.  (O, btw, wutz a cyoobit?!)

An at teh cornurz dey maed hornz, an dey putz brons on teh alturz.

An all teh stuffz wuz maed of brons.  Teh potz an teh shovulz an teh bowlz an teh forkz an teh nivez an teh spoonz an teh sporkz wuz brons.

An dey maed gratingz foar sied of teh alturz.

An dey maed brons ringz foar holding teh poelz foar teh gratingz.

An teh poalz wuz woodz, liek teh alturz, an dere wuz brons on dem.

An dey putz teh poalz in teh ringz foar caryingz teh alturz.  An teh alturz wuz hollo.

An dey maed teh bowlz foar teh washinz owt of brons.

Den tehy biltz teh cortyardz.  Teh souf wuz a hunnerd cyoobitz an hadz curtinz,

An dere wuz postz an dey wuz awsum.

An teh norf wuz a hunnerd cyoobitz too, but dere wuznt curtinz.

Teh westz wuz fifti cyoobitz an hadz curtinz an awsum postz.

An teh estz wuz fifti cyoobitz too.

On teh leftz of teh dor dere wuz curtinz an dey wuz fiftin cyoobitz an dere wuz tre awsum postz,

An on teh ritz of teh dor dere wuz curtinz an dey wuz fiftin cyoobitz an dere wuz tre awsum postz.

An all teh curtinz wuz maed frum linenz.

An teh postz wuz maed frum brons an silvurz.

An teh curtinz foar teh dor wuz blu yarnz an purpl yarnz an red yarnz an linunz an wuz twenny cyoobitz long an wuz fiev cyoobitz up,

An dere wuz foar potz liek teh restz.

An all teh nalz wuz brons.

Teh tabernaculz wuz maed wif dis stuff.  O, an der wuz Testimoneez in teh Taburnacul, an teh Levitz rote dem cuz Moses sed so.  An Ithamar teh sunz of Aaron helpd.  An Aaron iz teh preest.\

O, btw, dis Bezul gai maed all teh stuff Ceilin Cat telld Moses to maek

An Oholib wuz dere an he wuz awsum sewer gai.

Newai, teh goldz dey uzd wuz liek wun tunz of goldz.

An teh silvurz tehy uzd wuz liek foar tunz of silvurz,

bcuz everwun gaev dem a littul bitz.

Dey uzd mostz of teh silvurz foar teh basez foar teh postz an teh curtinz,

An dey uzd liek fifti powndz foar teh hukz foar teh postz.

An teh brons tehy uzd wuz liek fiev thowzund powndz of brons.

Tehy uzd it to maek basz foar teh Meetingz Cowch an teh alturz an teh gratingz an teh altur stuff,

undefined

Frum teh bloo, poorpel n' red yarn dey maded weavd clothez fer dems to ware wehn deys talkin bout ceiling cat in teh sanctooary. Dey  maded dems fer Aaron to, cuz ceiling cat sez so to Moses.

Dey maded teh effod frums gold, an teh samez yarn as teh weavd clothez, an teh effods has twistd linenz to.

Dey hamerd teh gold sheetz an cut it so teh effods can has teh gold workd into it — Lulz, teh werk iz hard; Givez dem moar cheezburger, srsly.

Dey maded shudlr peeses for teh effod, dey wuz atachd to two of itz cornerz, so deyz cud fassen it.

itz skillfully woven waistband wuz liek it—ov wan piece wif teh efod an made wif gold, an wif blu, purple an scarlet yarn, an wif finely twistd linen, as teh lord commandd mosez.

they mountd teh onyx stonez in gold filigree settings an engravd them liek seal wif teh namez ov teh sons ov israel.

den they fastend them on teh shouldr piecez ov teh efod as memorial stonez 4 da sons ov israel, as teh lord commandd mosez.

they fashiond teh boobpiece—teh werk ov skilld craftsman. they made it liek teh efod: ov gold, an ov blu, purple an scarlet yarn, an ov finely twistd linen.

it wuz square—a span [b] long an span wide—an foldd double.

den they mountd 4 rows ov preshus stonez on it. teh furst row wuz carnelian, chrysolite an beryl;

teh second row wuz turquoize, lapis lazuli an emerald;

teh third row wuz jacinth, agate an amethyst;

teh fourth row wuz topaz, onyx an jaspr. [c] they wuz mountd in gold filigree settings.

thar wuz twelve stonez, wan 4 each ov teh namez ov teh sons ov israel, each engravd liek seal wif teh naym ov wan ov teh twelve tribez.

4 da boobpiece they made braidd chains ov pure gold, liek rope.

they made 2 gold filigree settings an 2 gold rings, an fastend teh rings 2 2 ov teh corners ov teh boobpiece.

they fastend teh 2 gold chains 2 teh rings at teh corners ov teh boobpiece,

an teh othr endz ov teh chains 2 teh 2 settings, attachin them 2 teh shouldr piecez ov teh efod at teh frunt.

they made 2 gold rings an attachd them 2 teh othr 2 corners ov teh boobpiece on teh inside edge next 2 teh efod.

den they made 2 moar gold rings an attachd them 2 teh bottom ov teh shouldr piecez on teh frunt ov teh efod, close 2 teh seam jus aboov teh waistband ov teh efod.

they tid teh rings ov teh boobpiece 2 teh rings ov teh efod wif blu cord, connectin it 2 teh waistband so dat teh boobpiece wud not swin out frum teh efod—as teh lord commandd mosez.

they made teh robe ov teh efod entirely ov blu cloth—teh werk ov weavr—

wif an openin in da sentr ov teh robe liek teh openin ov collar, [d] an band around dis openin, so dat it wud not tear.

they made pomegranatez ov blu, purple an scarlet yarn an finely twistd linen around teh hem ov teh robe.

an they made bells ov pure gold an attachd them around teh hem tween teh pomegranatez.

teh bells an pomegranatez alternatd around teh hem ov teh robe 2 be worn 4 ministerin, as teh lord commandd mosez.

4 aaron an his sons, they made tunics ov fine linen—teh werk ov weavr—

an teh turban ov fine linen, teh linen caps an teh undergarments ov finely twistd linen.

teh sash wuz ov finely twistd linen an blu, purple an scarlet yarn—teh werk ov an embroiderr—as teh lord commandd mosez.

they made teh plate, teh sacrd emblem, out ov pure gold an engravd on it, liek an inscripshun on seal: holy 2 teh lord.

den they fastend blu cord 2 it 2 attach it 2 teh turban, as teh lord commandd mosez.

so all teh werk on teh tabernacle, teh tent ov meetin, wuz completd. teh israelitez did evrythin jus as teh lord commandd mosez.

33 den they brought teh tabernacle 2 mosez: teh tent an all itz furnishings, itz clasps, framez, crosbars, posts an basez;

teh coverin ov ram skins dyd red an teh coverin ov anothr durable leathr [e] an teh shieldin curtain;

teh ark ov teh covenant law wif itz polez an teh atonement covr;

teh table wif all itz articlez an teh bread ov teh presence;

teh pure gold lampstand wif itz row ov lamps an all itz accesoriez, an teh oil 4 da light;

teh gold altar, teh anointin oil, teh fragrant incense, an teh curtain 4 da entrance 2 teh tent;

teh bronze altar wif itz bronze gratin, itz polez an all itz utensils; teh basin wif itz stand;

teh curtains ov teh courtyard wif itz posts an basez, an teh curtain 4 da entrance 2 teh courtyard; teh ropez an tent pegs 4 da courtyard; all teh furnishings 4 da tabernacle, teh tent ov meetin;

an teh woven garments worn 4 ministerin in da sanctuary, both teh sacrd garments 4 aaron teh priest an teh garments 4 his sons when servin as priests.

teh israelitez had dun all teh werk jus as teh lord had commandd mosez.

And teh Ceiling Cat came to Moses an sez

Teh firrst month, teh firrst day of teh month, you make a tabernacle of teh testimony kthankx

Put water in betweens for mi pet crocodiles

Den yew hang more stuff. Ceiling Cat is hard to pleaz

Den add oil! Ceiling Cat loves teh oilz

Oilz make shit holy, put sum on teh altars feet kthanx.

Then givez them clothes coz no-one wants yew to look at their nekkidness. Then they be priests!

when mosez set up teh tabernacle, he put teh basez in place, erectd teh framez, insertd teh crosbars an set up teh posts.

den he spread teh tent ovar teh tabernacle an put teh coverin ovar teh tent, as teh lord commandd him.

he took teh tablets ov teh covenant law an placd them in da ark, attachd teh polez 2 teh ark an put teh atonement covr ovar it.

den he brought teh ark into teh tabernacle an hung teh shieldin curtain an shieldd teh ark ov teh covenant law, as teh lord commandd him.

mosez placd teh table in da tent ov meetin on teh north side ov teh tabernacle outside teh curtain

an set out teh bread on it before teh lord, as teh lord commandd him.

he placd teh lampstand in da tent ov meetin opposiet teh table on teh south side ov teh tabernacle

an set up teh lamps before teh lord, as teh lord commandd him.

mosez placd teh gold altar in da tent ov meetin in frunt ov teh curtain

an burnd fragrant incense on it, as teh lord commandd him.

den he put up teh curtain at teh entrance 2 teh tabernacle.

he set teh altar ov burnt offerin near teh entrance 2 teh tabernacle, teh tent ov meetin, an offerd on it burnt offerings an grain offerings, as teh lord commandd him.

he placd teh basin tween teh tent ov meetin an teh altar an put watr in it 4 washin,

an mosez an aaron an his sons usd it 2 wash their hanz an feet.

they washd whenevr they enterd teh tent ov meetin or approachd teh altar, as teh lord commandd mosez.

den mosez set up teh courtyard around teh tabernacle an altar an put up teh curtain at teh entrance 2 teh courtyard. an so mosez finishd teh werk.

den teh cloud coverd teh tent ov meetin, an teh glory ov teh lord filld teh tabernacle.

mosez cud not entr teh tent ov meetin cuz teh cloud had settld on it, an teh glory ov teh lord filld teh tabernacle.

in all teh travels ov teh israelitez, whenevr teh cloud liftd frum aboov teh tabernacle, they wud set out;

but if teh cloud did not lift, they did not set out—til teh dai it liftd.

+ teh Filibusters aks teh ppl what petz teh ceiling cat + teh vets + theyr all liek "ceiling cats holi litrbox DO NOT WANT!!!! tel us wt 2 do w/it pls, n we do that."

The're all "make it gowai, but send sum gif w/it 2 say sry, n yu no has itchybutts no more, n yu no y ceiling cat makes diz happenz."

+ theyr all "wt we giv 4 gif 2 sai sry?" n they say "maek sum arsegrapez fm gold, n sum meecez as wel, same numbrz as numberz of bosses of teh Filibusters, 4 dis happendz to teh bosses n evrybdy else 2.

So if yu maek teh arsegrapez n teh meecez 2 respect ceiling cat, mbe ceiling cat not stepz down so hard. we just say dat. k, we sed it agen.

y 4 yu put out yr clawz like teh boss f teh Eejits? Did not Ceiling Cat not let m go after he plai w/them?

so get new truck n getz 2 moocows 2 drive itz, but keep teh baby moocows.

+ put teh litrbox in a box, n put teh box in teh truck w/teh gifs 2 say sry, + letm go.

+ if it goez to Beth-Shemesh in Ceiling Cat country we no iz Ceiling Cat what is doez dis 2 us. But if it goez sumplace else, we no iz not ceiling cat n we got itchybutts just coz."

so dey do dat, n put teh moocows in teh truck, n keepz teh baby moocows.

+ tehy put teh holi litrbox in teh truck, n teh box wif teh golden meecez n teh golden arsegrapes. We sai dis already. Get on w/it.

+ teh moocws drive truck strate to Beth-Shemesh, goin moo all teh tiem. Liek they spose 2 go meow r smthn????? w/e. + dey no go left r rite, n teh Filibusters bosses folowz dem 2 just b4 ceiling cat country.

+teh ppeps in Beth-Shemesh mowin teh lawn, + teyh see teh litrbox in teh truck, n tehyz happyz.

n teh moocwos crash teh truck into a big rock in Josh's garden, teh peeps blow up teh truck n set moocows on fier becz they think that maek celiling cat happy fr sum rsn. ??

n teh levites (tey be teh gaiz fm teh jeans ads? i duno) got teh litrbox n teh gifs 4 say sry n put dem on teh big rock in Josh's garden, + teh ppl giv ceiling cat cheezbrgrs but dey burnded dem fr sum rsn.

n wen teh 5 Filibusters bosses sawed it, theyr liek WTF??? n dey goez back to deyr house.

Luk at dese gold arsegrapes wot Filibusters made 2 say sry 2 ceiling cat! arnt tehy prity? 1 4 Asdod, 1 4 Gazza, 1 4 Askelon, 1 4 Gath, 1 4 Ekron

+ luk at teh gold meecez 2! 1 4 evry Filibuster house n catbed n garden n everythng. N luk at teh big rock in Josh's garden wer dey put ceiling cats litrbox 2 remembr what happendz 2day.

N Ceiling Cat PWNZ sum peeps coz tehy looked in his litrbox, liek 70 f dem! Spose Ceiling Cat has hiz dignity. U want ppl lukin at yr poop?  But othr ppl full of sad bcz they frenz all ded.

+ teh ppl of Beth-Shemesh are all liek, ceiling cat DO NOT WANT!!!!! Gowai!!!!!

an so teh doodz ov kiriath jearim came an took up teh Ark ov Ceiling Cat. dems took it to abinadabs houz on teh hill an consecratd Eleazar his son to gard teh Ark ov Ceiling Cat. srsly.

it wuz long tiem, twenty yeers, an teh Ark stayd at kiriath jearim, an all teh peeps ov israel mournd an sought aftr Ceiling Cat. srsly.

an Samuel sed to teh whole houz ov israel: "if u r returnin to Ceiling Cat wif all ur hearts, den rid yourselvez ov teh foreign godz an teh ashtoreths an evryting an commit yourselvez to Ceiling Cat an serve him only an he will delivr u out ov teh hand ov teh filistinez"

an so teh israelitez put away teihr baals an ashtoreths, an servd only Ceiling Cat.

an so Samuel sed, "get all israel at mizpah an iz gon talk wif Ceiling Cat for u."

an tehy got all togethr at mizpah, an drew watr an pourd it out before Ceiling Cat, an fastd an confesd "has envisibel err0rrrd gainst Ceiling Cat" an Samuel wuz leadr [a] ov all israel at mizpah.

wehn teh filistinez herd dat israel had assembld at mizpah, teh rulers ov teh filistinez caem to pwnz0r dems. an wehn teh israelitez herd, they wuz afraid ov teh filistinez.

an they sed to Samuel, "do not stop cryin out to Ceilin Cat cuz He can has rescue us frum teh filistinez, srsly."

den samuel took sucklin lamb an burnded it as offrin to Ceiling Cat an has a creid to Ceiling Cat for israel, an Ceiling Cat anzw0rd him, srsly.

an while Samuel wuz sacrificin teh burnt offerin, teh filistinez got close to pwn israel. but Ceiling Cat thunderd wif loud thundr gainst teh filistinez an threw dems into panic an dems wuz ttly stund before teh israelitez, srsly.

teh doodz ov israel rushd out ov mizpah an pursud teh filistinez, PWNZ0rrr them to point below beth car.

an samuel took stone an set it up tween mizpah an shen. an namd it ebenezr, [b] sayin "thus far did Ceiling Cat halp us."

an so teh filistinez wuz subdud an did not invade israelite territory again. an so in Samuels leifteim, teh paw ov Ceiling Cat wuz against teh filistinez.

teh towns frum ekron to gath dat teh filistinez had capturd frum israel wuz restord to israel, an israel pwnd teh neighborin territory frum teh pwnage ov teh filistinez. an thar wuz peace tween israel an teh amoritez.

Samuel continud as judge ovar israel all teh dais ov his life.

frum yeer to yeer he went frum bethel to gilgal to mizpah, judgin israel in all dose placez.

Wen Samuel growd uld, he maek for hiz sunz be judgz of Izrael.

Teh first one hiz sunz namz Joel n teh second calld Abijah n dey servz at Beersheba.

But dey not to walk in the feetmarks of thar daddyz. they want instead for to get cheezburger. for to get cheezburger of others. for to get cheezburger wrong.

teh peoplez of Israel cum to Samuel n r like

“d00d, ur liek rly old n ur sunz iz bad. Srsly. give kingz to us for to make us like teh uther peoplez.”

wen teh peoplez say “giv kingz for us” Samuel waz like “oh noes!” n sad he go to pray to Ceiling Cat.

n Ceiling Cat say “srsly. listen ta wut dey sez. iz not u dey no liek. iz Ceiling Cat dey not want.

Haz dun this seence Egypt. dey liek cheezburgr. liek uthers not Ceiling Cat. now dey wantz king. Srsly. not ur problm. iz me.

give king but tell dem wut kingz gunna do to dem.”

n samuel taek Ceiling Cat’s wurdz n sez

“thiz wut king do: king takes ur sunz n make dem to ride invisible bike in frunt of da king in battle, in frunt of hiz bike.

he make dem to lead other peoplez into fight n for uthers to grow for him foodz n mor for maek swordz for to fightz.

n king taeks ur doters n maeks dem to maek him cookie but dem not to eat it.

taekz best foodz n landz for to give to hiz buddiez.

he taekz bst evrythng. srsly.

peoplez, teh cowz, teh donkeyz for hiz

n sheepz n u too, btw.

srsly. u will sez to Ceiling Cat 'S’no good! DO NOT WANT king!' n Ceiling Cat not do nothin. cuz u wntd teh king, lol."

but teh peoplez sez ta samuel, “srsly. stfu. DO WANT king.

DO WANT for ta be like teh uthers. want king for to leed teh battelz.”

samuel hearz teh peoplez. still not liek. he repeetz wut dey sez for Ceiling Cat.

So, thar wuz dis Benjamite, Kish,

an him had son namd Saul, hoo mayde all teh othr Israelitez look liek total n00bs, SRSLY.  Hee wuz so biig he cuold see ovr teh heds uv odder kittehs wiffowt jumpin.

Nao Kish's dawnkeys wuz lost, an Kish sed 2 Saul, "Taek wan ov teh servunts wif U an go an look 4 da donkiis, or else U go 2 bed wiffowt din-dins."

So him lookd all ovar, usin GPS, Google Israel, an they even stoppd at dat gros Gas Stashun near teh Arbys, but they did not find them.

When they reachd teh district ov Zuph, Saul became HOOJ n00b an sed 2 teh servant, "Come, let's go bak before Daddy starz gettin worrid."

But teh servant sed, "Look, U n00b, in dis town thar iz dis wan d00d, an evrythin he sez comez true cuz he tawks 2 Ceiling Cat. Lets go ask him wer they r, or iz dat 2 scary 4 U?"

Saul den jus moand an whind abowt haffin nuffin 2 giv 2 teh kitteh hoo tawks to Ceiling Cat, til teh servant slapped him acros teh face.

Teh servant apologizd an did anythin 2 stop teh whiny brat fum cryin. "Look," him sed, "I has shiny quartr. Im gonna giv it 2 teh man of Ceilin Cat so dat he will tell us wut wai 2 taek."

(A man ov Ceilin Cat iz calld Seer in da olden tiems)

"RLY?" Saul sed 2 him servunt. "RLY RLY!" sed teh servunt, so dey set owt 4 da town wer teh man ov Ceilin Cat wuz.

As they wuz skippin merrily 2 teh town, they met sum HAWT babez comin out 2 draw watr, an they askd them, "Iz teh Seer heer?, an R U bizzy later?"

"Him iz," they anzwerd. "Him ahead ov U. Hurreh nao; him has jus come 2 r town todai, 4 da kittehs has sacerfice at teh high place.

As soon as U entr teh town, U will find him before he goez up 2 teh high place 2 eat. Teh peeps will nawt beegin eatin til he comez, cuz he must bles teh sacerfice; Afterwurd, dose hoo R invitd will eat. Go nao; U shud find him bout dis tiem, an SRSLY, weer srsly bizzy later so doan cum bak."

So Saul an teh servunt kitteh wen in2 taown, an tehy foun Samuel dere.

Flashbak!: Teh day B4 Ceiling Cat meowed to Samuel "Sammy me boy, tomorra U'll meet a kitteh frum  Benjamin.

Taht kitteh iz noo bosskat kyng uv Israel.  Fling oil at himm in mai naem.  Teh kittehs uv Israel prey 2 mee real guud an I send em boss-kat so tehy can has defeet uv Philistines."  End flashbak.

So wen Samuel seez Saul, Ceiling Cat 2 Samuel sez "Psst!  Its him, its him.  Teh noo kyng.  Goan tok 2 him, K!"

Saul sez to Samuel "Oh Hai!  Hoo is seer heer?  Iz this teh rite howse?

Samuel meows "Dats mee! Cum an eetz fuud an blessd cookies wif us.  Nom nom nom!  Tomorry yooz leeves for hoam.  Ize gots lots 2 tellz yooz.

An Hey!  We foun yr dawnkiis.  Srsly!  Frum nao on, ure fambli will B teh most impotant in Israel."

Saul meowed "No wai.  I no can beleef taht.  Mah traib, teh Benjamites, iz smalles in Israel."

Tehn Samuel can haz Saul an iz servunt in hiz dining ruum 4 nom-noms.  Ther wuz manni odder kittehs ther, at leest 30.

Samuel meowed to teh kook "Oh Hai! We can haz naice tastee meet you hid awai 4 uz?

So teh kook hawld out teh meet and set it afore Samuel. Samuel sed to Saul "This iz delishus meet.  We must eet it."  So Saul chowed daown srsly!

So tehn Saul went hoam wif Samuel an sat on teh ruuf uv hiz howse, and tawkd all nite abowt Ceiling Cat an teh Israelite hockee Leeg an stuf.

Teh nex dae, Samuel sez "We haz nais vizit.  Taim 4 U 2 goez nao."

So Sam getz bottle of cooking oyl and washded his hair wif it, and like smoochded him n sed "teh Ceiling Cat not has washded yous hair n maded you teh boss of Izreel? N you be boss of all teh Ceiling Cat's kittehs, n savedz dem from gettn chasd by dogz n stuf? Rly. N this showz ppl teh Ceiling Cat washded yous hair n maked you teh boss of all hz kittehs.

Yu go way n hang wif 2 d00dz nr wer dey beryd Rachl in shubox in Ben n Zelzah's garden, n dey say "yr pops finded teh dunkeys wot yu l00kn fr, n he cd care less bout teh dunkeys nao, n iz waitn up fr yu. He sez, 'what 2 do bout mi kitteh?'

Then yu clime up teh tree of Tabor n hang wiv 3 d00dz goin 2 hang wif teh Ceiling Cat in Bethl, n 1 d00d got 3 kittehs, n othr d00d got 3 cheezburgrs, n othr 1 got teh booze.

N dey say oh hai n gif yu 2 cheezbrgerz n yu say thnx d00dz, l8r.

N den wen yu getz daon fm teh tree yu go to place wiv rly stupid name, callded Gib'eathelohim. Srsly. Place must hav big sign or smthn. Bunch of filibusters tehre. Wen u getz tehre yu meetz a bunch of happy-clappiez comin frm place up hai wif gitarz n tambureenz n stufz, singin n bein all happy-clappy n stufz.

N den yu be full of Ceiling Cat stuf, n yu be happy-clappy liek tehm n be like sum uthr cat ntirely, like teh incredibl hulk or sumthn. Srsly.

Wen all dese things happenz, let ur handz do whtevr yr handz liek 2 do, liek rub teh Celing Cat's belly n scrach hiz earses, coz teh Ceiling Cat be dere wiv yu. 4 rl.

N den yu go 2 Gilgal b4 I getz dere, n wen I getz dere i giv Ceiling Cat cheezburgrs n cookiez n stufs so Ceiling Cat doez not eated us. Yu b tehre a weeek b4 i getz dere n tel yu wat 2 do netx."

So he goez way fm Sam, n Ceiling Cat rubz hiz belly, n all teh things Sam sed happended.

Tehy go to Gibeah, n luk! a bunch f happy-clappiez show up, n he getz ful of Ceiling Cat stuf n goes all happy-clappy liek tehm.

N all hiz homeys saw him goin all happy-clappy n sez "luk at Kish's kitteh! Iz Saul a happy-clappy now?"

N sum d00d frm tehre sez "who's teh daddy?" N it gets printed on tshrts n mousemats n stuf, n evrybdyz sayin it.

N wen he had enuf happy-clappy stuf he clims a tree.

Wen Saul n his servnt getz back his uncle's like "were yu been? You treet dis place liek hotel etc." N Saul sez "we been lukin fr teh dunkeys, but we cd not finded dem, n den we saw Sam."

N Saul's uncle was like "oh yeh? N what Sam did telld yu?"

N Saul's like "he sez pops founded teh dunkeys." But Saul not did sed nothing bout bein boss, liek what Sam tolded him. He keepz his mouth zipped.

So Sam getz all teh kittehs to hang at Mizpah,

n he's like "Ceiling Cat giv me messg 2 giv 2 youz gaiz. Ceiling Cat sez, rmembr how I gave yu ride back frm Eejit, n saved youz frm gettn chased by teh Eejit dogz n teh other dogz n stuf?

So wy for yu no talk to Ceiling Cat no more? Ceiling Cat iz gud 2 yu, n givs yu cheezbrgrs n cookies n stufs, but yu say we no want Ceiling Cat, we want a boss! So evrybdy line up in frnt ov me by yr breeds.

So Sam gets all teh breeds ov kittehs of Izreel, n putz all tehir namez in a hat n pix 1, n its Ben.

N he puts all teh namez of teh litterz ov Ben kittehs in teh hat n pix 1, n its teh litter ov teh Matrites. N den he putz all teh names of teh Matrites in teh hat n pix 1, n its Saul. Srsly. N dey luk for Saul, but dey cd not finded him.

N dey aks teh Ceiling Cat, "wherz he haydn?" n teh Ceiling Cat's liek "he'z over tehre, luk!"

N dey chasd him n catchded him, n dey put him netx to teh other kitteh's, n he's liek so much bigger than tehj othrs, liek the'yre only up to here and he's away up tehre.

N Sam's all "Luk! Ceiling Cat pickded him! Ceiling Cat is so cool." N all teh kitteh's say "you teh boss! way 2 go d00d!"

N Sam telz evrybdy what teh boss is sposd 2 do, n he rites it all down in a buk like this thick, n Ceiling Cat happy. D den Sam's all "evry1 go home now, it's bedtime."

N Saul goez home too 2 Gibeah were hiz house iz, n bunch ov c00l d00dz who got tehir bellies rubbed by teh Ceiling Cat goez home wiv him.

So Nahash whooz a ammonite or a trilobite or a tribble or smthn, goez n does a seej at sum place callded Jabesh-Gilead, n de ppl of Jabesh-Gilead are all liek "if you go way, we giv u cheezbrgers n rub yr belly".

But Nahash the tribble sez "i only go way if I cn poke out all your rite aiz, n maek yu luk stupid n frunt ov Izreel."

N teh grown-ups of Jabesh-Gilead sez "give us a week 2 send fr our frenz to kick yur as. If theyz no cm n save us, yu cn poke out our aiz n evrythng."

N ther messingrs come to Gibeah wer Saul livz, n tell evrybody, n the'yre all like OMFG!!!!!!!

N Saul getz full of Ceiling Cat stuf, n hez pissed. Srsly.

He taeks teh moocows n minces m up into hambrgers, but he did not eated dem, he sendz ppl wif teh hambrgers to all teh kittehs in Izreel, n sez 2 tell m if dey don't come w/Saul n Sam he'l mince up dey're moocows in2 hmbergurs 2. teh kittehs all scaerd of Ceiling Cat, so dey all cum out.

he bringz m all 2 Bezek, loadz n loadz of dem. 1/2 fm Izreel n 1/2 fm Jooda, even tho the'yre teh same thing at tihs point in teh Baibl. I duno. i not rite dis.

N dey say to messingrs, "moro, b4 lunchtaim wen iz taim 2 get out f bed, we savez yu." N teh messingers told teh ppl in Jabesh-Gilead, n tehyz happy.

So dey say "tmoro yu can do wat yu liekz wv us. onest."

N netx dai Saul maeks 3 gangz f all teh kittehs, n tehy goez 2 teh tribbles baskets n PWNZ dem! coz dey still sleepz coz iz not lunchtaim yetz. N dey all run away n not never see none f dem agen.

N teh ppl sez 2 Sam "so iz Saul teh boss f us? Getz teh tribbles, coz we wantz 2 killz dem!"

n Sam sez 2 teh peeps, "Parteh at Gilgal!!!!!!! Letz make Saul boss agen."

an so Samuel sed to all israel,
"ai has listend to evrythin u sed to me an has set king ovar u.

nao u has king as ur leadr. an nao ai iz old an gray, an mah sons r her wif u. an ai has been ur leadr frum youfs til nao.

her i stand. testefei against me in da presence ov Ceiling Cat an his anointd. whos ox has ai taken? whos donkee has ai taken? whom has ai cheatd? whom has ai oppresd? frum whose paw has i acceptd bribe an shut mah eyez? if i has dun any ov thees, iz gon mak it rite, srsly."

"u has not cheatd or oppresd us, srsly." they replid. "u has not taken anythin frum anyonez paw."

an Samuel sed "Celing Cat iz witnes against u, an also his anointd iz witnes, dat u has not findz anythin in mah paw." "he iz witnes, srsly" they sed.

den Samuel sed "it Ceiling Cat hoo appointd Moses an Aaron an brought ur foredads up out ov egypt.

nao den, stand her, cuz ai iz gon to confront u wif evidence befor Ceiling Cat as to all teh reitchuss acts performd by Ceiling Cat for u doods an ur dads.

"aftr Jacob enterd egypt, they crid to Ceiling for halp, an Ceiling Cat sent Mosez an Aaron, hoo brought ur foredads out ov egypt an settld them in dis place.

"but they forgot Ceilin Cat; so he sold them into teh paw ov Sisera, teh commandr ov teh army ov hazor, an into teh hanz ov teh filistinez an teh king ov moab, hoo fought against them.

they crid out to Ceiling Cat an sed we has sinnd! we has forsaken Celing Cat an servd teh baals an teh ashtoreths! but nao delivr us frum teh hanz ov r enemiez, an we will serve u, srsly.

den Ceiling Cat sent Jerub-Baal, [a] Barak, [b] Jefthah an Samuel, [c] an he deliverd u frum teh pawz ov ur enemiez on evry side, so dat u livd securely.

"but when u saw dat Nahash king ov teh ammonitez wuz movin against u, u sed to me, no, we wants king to rule ovar us - even though Ceilin Cat wuz ur king.

nao her iz teh king u has chosen, teh wan u askd for; c, Ceiling Cat has set king ovar u, k?

if u fear Ceiling Cat an serve an obei him an do not rebel against his commandz, an if both u an teh king hoo reigns ovar u follow Ceilin Cat - gud! srsly!

but if u do not obei Ceiling Cat, an if u rebel against his commandz, his paw will be against u, as it wuz against ur dads.

"nao den, stand still an c wut Ceiling Cat iz bout to do befor ur eyez!

iz not wheat harvest nao? iz gon call upon Ceiling Cat to send thundr an rane. an u will realize wut invisibel err0r u did in da eyez ov Ceiling Cat when u askd for king."

den Samuel calld upon Ceiling Cat, an dat same dai teh lord sent thundr an rane an so all teh peeps stood in awe ov Ceiling Cat an ov Samuel. srsly.

teh peeps all sed to Samuel, "pray to Ceilin Cat for ur servants so dat we will not dye, for we has addd to all r othr invisible err0r teh evil ov askin for king."

"dont has feerd," Samuel replid. "u has dun all envisllbel err0r; yet do not turn away frum Ceiling Cat, but serve Ceiling Cat wif all ur hart.

do not turn away aftr useles idols. dems can do u no gud, nor can they rescue u, cuz dem r useles. srsly.

for da saek ov his great naym Ceiling Cat will not reject his peeps, cuz has pleezd to mak u his own.

as for meh, i wont envisibel err0r gainst Ceiling Cat by not prayin for yous. an iz gon teach u teh wai dat iz gud an rite, srsly.

but be sure to fear Ceiling Cat! an serve him faithfully wif all ur hart! considr wut great things he has dun for u.

undefined

Saul wuz thirty[a] yeers old wehn he became king, him reignd ovar israel forty-[b]too yeers.

Saul [c] chose three-thousand doodz frum israel; two-thousand wuz wif him at micmash an in da hill country ov bethel, an thousand wuz wif Jonathan at gibeah in benjamin. rest ov doodz he sent bak to dems homes.

Jonathan attackd teh filistine outpost at geba an teh filistinez herd bout it. den Saul had teh trumpet blown throughout teh land an sed, "let teh hebrews hear, k!"

so all israel herd teh news: "Saul has attackd teh filistine outpost, an nao israel has become stench to teh filistinez." an teh peeps wuz summond to join Saul at gilgal.

teh filistinez assembld to fight israel wif three-thousand [d] chariots,

when israel doodz saw dis, they hid in cavez an thickets an among teh rockz an in pits an holez.

sum hebrews even crosd teh jordan to teh land ov gad an gilead. Saul remaind at gilgal, an all teh troops wif him wuz quakin wif fear, srsly.

he waitd seben dais, eht tiem set by Samuel, but Samuel did not come to gilgal, srsly, an Sauls doodz began to scattr.

so he sed, "brin me teh burnt offerin an teh fellowship offrings. [e] " an Saul offerd up teh burnt offerin.

jus as he finishd makin teh offerin, Samuel arrivd, an Saul went out to greet him.

"dood wtf has u dun?" askd Samuel. an Saul sed "when i saw dat doods wuz scatterin, an dat u did not come at teh set teim, an dat teh filistinez wuz assemblin at micmash,

ai thot: nao teh filistinez will come down against me at gilgal, an ai has not sought Ceiling Cats favor, an i felt compelld to offr teh burnt offerin, srsly."

"u actd teh stoopids," samuel sed. "u has not kept teh command Ceilin Cat gaev u; if u had, he wud has establishd ur kingdom ovar israel for all tiem.

but nao ur kingdom will FAIL; Ceiling Cat has sought out man aftr his own hart an appointd him leadr ov his peeps, cuz u has not kept Ceiling Cats command, srsly dood."

den Samuel left gilgal [f] an went up to gibeah in benjamin, an Saul countd teh doodz hoo wuz wif him. They numberd bout six hundrd.

Saul an his son Jonathan an teh doodz wif them wuz stayin in gibeah [g] in benjamin, while teh filistinez campd at micmash.

raidin partiez went out frum teh filistine camp in three groups. wan turnd toward ofrah nere shual,

anothr toward beth horon, an teh third toward teh borderland overlookin teh valley ov zeboim facin teh desert.

not blacksmith cud be findz in all ov israel, cuz teh filistinez had sed, "udderwize teh hebrews will mak forkes or neivs!"

so all israel went down to teh filistinez to has their metall stuffs [h] sharpend (wtf?).

preis wuz too-thirdz shekel [i] for sharpenin some weppens an third ov shekel [j] for sharpenin otehr wehpens.

an on dai ov teh battle no souldyir wif Saul an Jonathan can has weponz in dems pawz; only Saul an his son Jonathan can has. srsly.

undefined

Wun dai, Jonathon sunuv Saul sez 2 hiz servunt "Oh Hai!  We can haz vizit wit teh Philistine foart ovah yondah." Butt Jonathon no tel hiz PapaKat wot ee doez.

Saul wuz campin owt at Gibeah, an sleepin unner a palm of granite tree (vry hevvy froot).  He hadz 600 kittehz withim,

wun of hoom wuz Ahija.  Ahija wor an "ephod", witch wuz a preests cloak.  Y Bible mentn dis?  I dunno.  Ahija's daddykat and granddaddykats wer importunt, so Ahija muss B impotent 2.  No kitteh new Jonathon can had scampered orf wit hiz servunt.

Jonathon gnew hiz path 2 teh Philistine foart an teh naimz uv teh hillz neerby, so U can vizit ther 2.  Teh clifs wer cald Bozez an Seneh, butt tehy doan cum wen yu call tehm!  Bein clifs an all.

Teh servunt, who carreed Jonathon'z weponz an armur, sez "K! Im wit yoo 110%!"

If tehy sai 'Stai put, weer cummin 2 U' tehn we stai put.

Bud iff tehy sai 'Cumon ovah an vizit us' wee goe 2 tehm cos Ceiling Cat is wit uz."
