so jonathan calld david an told him teh whole conversashun. He brought him 2 saul, an david wuz wif saul as before.

once moar war broke out, an david went out an fought teh filistinez. He struck them wif such force dat they fld before him.

but an evil [a] spirit frum teh lord came upon saul as he wuz sittin in his houz wif his spear in his hand. While david wuz playin teh harp,

saul trid 2 pin him 2 teh wall wif his spear, but david eludd him as saul droov teh spear into teh wall. Dat nite david made gud his escape.

saul sent doodz 2 davidz houz 2 watch it an 2 kill him in da mornin. But michal, davidz wife, warnd him, "if u doan run 4 ur life tonite, 2morrow ull be killd."

so michal let david down thru window, an he fld an escapd.

den michal took an idol [b] an laid it on teh bed, coverin it wif garment an puttin sum goats hair at teh head.

when saul sent teh doodz 2 capchur david, michal sed, "he iz ill."

den saul sent teh doodz bak 2 c david an told them, "brin him up 2 me in his bed so dat i cud kill him."

but when teh doodz enterd, thar wuz teh idol in da bed, an at teh head wuz sum goats hair.

saul sed 2 michal, "y u deceiv me liek dis an send mah enemy away so dat he escapd?" Michal told him, "he sed 2 me, let me git away. Y shud i kill u? "

when david had fld an made his escape, he went 2 samuel at ramah an told him all dat saul had dun 2 him. Den he an samuel went 2 naioth an stayd thar.

werd came 2 saul: "david iz in naioth at ramah";

so he sent doodz 2 capchur him. But when they saw group ov profets profesyin, wif samuel standin thar as their leadr, teh spirit ov ceilin cat came upon sauls doodz an they also profesid.

saul wuz told bout it, an he sent moar doodz, an they profesid 2. Saul sent doodz third tiem, an they also profesid.

finally, he him left 4 ramah an went 2 teh great cistern at secu. An he askd, "wer r samuel an david?" "ovar in naioth at ramah," they sed.

so saul went 2 naioth at ramah. But teh spirit ov ceilin cat came even upon him, an he walkd along profesyin til he came 2 naioth.

undefined

den david fld frum naioth at ramah an went 2 jonathan an askd, "wut has i dun? Wut iz mah crime? How has i wrongd ur fathr, dat he iz tryin 2 taek mah life?"

"nevr!" jonathan replid. "u r not goin 2 dye! Look, mah fathr doesnt do anythin, great or small, without confidin in me. Y wud he hide dis frum me? Iz not so!"

but david took an oath an sed, "ur fathr knows vry well dat i has findz favor in ur eyez, an he has sed 2 him, jonathan must not knoe dis or he will be grievd. Yet as surely as teh lord livez an as u liv, thar iz only step tween me an death."

jonathan sed 2 david, "whatevr u wants me 2 do, ill do 4 u."

so david sed, "look, 2morrow iz teh new moon festival, an im supposd 2 dine wif teh king; but let me go an hide in da field til teh evenin ov teh dai aftr 2morrow.

if ur fathr misez me at all, tell him, david earnestly askd mah permishun 2 hurreh 2 bethlehem, his hometown, cuz an annual sacrifice iz bean made thar 4 his whole clan.

if he sez, vry well, den ur servant iz safe. But if he losez his tempr, u can be sure dat he iz determind 2 harm me.

as 4 u, show kindnes 2 ur servant, 4 u has brought him into covenant wif u before teh lord. If im guilty, den kill me yourself! Y hand me ovar 2 ur fathr?"

"nevr!" jonathan sed. "if i had teh least inklin dat mah fathr wuz determind 2 harm u, wouldnt i tell u?"

david askd, "hoo will tell me if ur fathr anzwers u harshly?"

"come," jonathan sed, "lets go out into teh field." so they went thar togethr.

den jonathan sed 2 david: "by teh lord, teh ceilin cat ov israel, im gonna surely sound out mah fathr by dis tiem teh dai aftr 2morrow! If he iz favorably disposd toward u, will i not send u werd an let u knoe?

but if mah fathr iz inclind 2 harm u, cud teh lord deal wif me, be it evr so severely, if i no let u knoe an send u away safely. Cud teh lord be wif u as he has been wif mah fathr.

but show me unfailin kindnes liek dat ov teh lord as long as i liv, so dat i cud not be killd,

an do not evr cut off ur kindnes frum mah ppl not even when teh lord has cut off evry wan ov davidz enemiez frum teh face ov teh earth."

so jonathan made covenant wif teh houz ov david, sayin, "cud teh lord call davidz enemiez 2 akownt."

an jonathan had david reaffirm his oath out ov luv 4 him, cuz he lovd him as he lovd him.

den jonathan sed 2 david: "2morrow iz teh new moon festival. U will be misd, cuz ur seat will be empty.

teh dai aftr 2morrow, toward evenin, go 2 teh place wer u hid when dis trouble began, an wait by teh stone ezel.

im gonna shoot 3 arrows 2 teh side ov it, as though i wuz shootin at target.

den im gonna send boi an say, go, find teh arrows. If i say 2 him, look, teh arrows r on dis side ov u; brin them her, den come, cuz, as surely as teh lord livez, u r safe; thar iz no dangr.

but if i say 2 teh boi, look, teh arrows r beyond u, den u must go, cuz teh lord has sent u away.

an bout teh mattr u an i discusdâ€”remembr, teh lord iz witnes tween u an me forevr."

so david hid in da field, an when teh new moon festival came, teh king sat down 2 eat.

he sat in his customary place by teh wall, opposiet jonathan, [a] an abnr sat next 2 saul, but davidz place wuz empty.

saul sed nothin dat dai, 4 he thot, "somethin must has happend 2 david 2 mak him ceremonially uncleanâ€”surely he iz unclean."

but teh next dai, teh second dai ov teh month, davidz place wuz empty again. Den saul sed 2 his son jonathan, "y hasnt teh son ov jese come 2 teh meal, eithr yesturdai or todai?"

jonathan anzwerd, "david earnestly askd me 4 permishun 2 go 2 bethlehem.

he sed, let me go, cuz r pplz iz observin sacrifice in da town an mah brothr has orderd me 2 be thar. If i has findz favor in ur eyez, let me git away 2 c mah brothers. Dat iz y he has not come 2 teh kings table."

sauls angr flard up at jonathan an he sed 2 him, "u son ov perverse an rebellious woman! Doan i knoe dat u has sidd wif teh son ov jese 2 ur own shame an 2 teh shame ov teh mommy hoo bore u?

as long as teh son ov jese livez on dis earth, neithr u nor ur kingdom will be establishd. Nao send an brin him 2 me, 4 he must dye!"

"y shud he be put 2 death? Wut has he dun?" jonathan askd his fathr.

but saul hurld his spear at him 2 kill him. Den jonathan knew dat his fathr intendd 2 kill david.

jonathan got up frum teh table in fierce angr; on dat second dai ov teh month he did not eat, cuz he wuz grievd at his fathers shameful treatment ov david.

in da mornin jonathan went out 2 teh field 4 his meetin wif david. He had small boi wif him,

an he sed 2 teh boi, "run an find teh arrows i shoot." as teh boi ran, he shot an arrow beyond him.

when teh boi came 2 teh place wer jonathanz arrow had fallen, jonathan calld out aftr him, "isnt teh arrow beyond u?"

den he shoutd, "hurreh! Go quickly! Doan stop!" teh boi pickd up teh arrow an returnd 2 his mastah.

(teh boi knew nothin ov all dis; only jonathan an david knew.)

den jonathan gaev his weapons 2 teh boi an sed, "go, carry them bak 2 town."

aftr teh boi had gone, david got up frum teh south side ov teh stone an bowd down before jonathan 3 tiems, wif his face 2 teh ground. Den they kisd each othr an wept togethrâ€”but david wept teh most.

undefined

david went 2 nob, 2 ahimelech teh priest. Ahimelech trembld when he met him, an askd, "y r u alone? Y iz no wan wif u?"

david anzwerd ahimelech teh priest, "teh king chargd me wif certain mattr an sed 2 me, no wan iz 2 knoe anythin bout ur mishun an ur instrucshuns. As 4 mah doodz, i has told them 2 meet me at certain place.

nao den, wut do u has on hand? Gimie 5 loavez ov bread, or whatevr u can find."

but teh priest anzwerd david, "i doan has any ordinary bread on hand; howevr, thar iz sum consecratd bread herâ€”providd teh doodz has kept themselvez frum women."

david replid, "inded women has been kept frum us, as usual whenevr [a] i set out. Teh doodzs things [b] r holy even on mishuns dat r not holy. How mutch moar so todai!"

so teh priest gaev him teh consecratd bread, since thar wuz no bread thar except teh bread ov teh presence dat had been removd frum before teh lord an replacd by hawt bread on teh dai it wuz taken away.

nao wan ov sauls servants wuz thar dat dai, detaind before teh lord; he wuz doeg teh edomite, sauls head sheferd.

david askd ahimelech, "doan u has spear or sword her? I havent brought mah sword or any othr wepon, cuz teh kings busines wuz urgent."

teh priest replid, "teh sword ov goliath teh filistine, whom u killd in da valley ov elah, iz her; it wrappd in cloth behind teh efod. If u wants it, taek it; thar iz no sword her but dat wan." 
David sed, "thar iz none liek it; giv it 2 me."

dat dai david fld frum saul an went 2 achish king ov gath.

but teh servants ov achish sed 2 him, "isnt dis david, teh king ov teh land? Isnt he teh wan they sing bout in their dancez: 
" saul has slain his thousandz, 
An david his tens ov thousandz?"

david took thees werdz 2 hart an wuz vry mutch afraid ov achish king ov gath.

so he pretendd 2 be insane in their presence; an while he wuz in their hanz he actd liek madman, makin markz on teh doors ov teh gate an lettin saliva run down his beard.

undefined

david left gath an escapd 2 teh cave ov adullam. When his brothers an his fathers haushold herd bout it, they went down 2 him thar.

all dose hoo wuz in distres or in debt or discontentd gatherd around him, an he became their leadr. Bout 4 hundrd doodz wuz wif him.

frum thar david went 2 mizpah in moab an sed 2 teh king ov moab, "wud u let mah fathr an mommy come an stay wif u til i lern wut ceilin cat will do 4 me?"

so he left them wif teh king ov moab, an they stayd wif him as long as david wuz in da stronghold.

but teh profet gad sed 2 david, "do not stay in da stronghold. Go into teh land ov judah." so david left an went 2 teh forest ov hereth.

nao saul herd dat david an his doodz had been discoverd. An saul, spear in hand, wuz seatd undr teh tamarisk tree on teh hill at gibeah, wif all his officials standin around him.

saul sed 2 them, "listen, doodz ov benjamin! Will teh son ov jese giv all ov u fieldz an vineyardz? Will he mak all ov u commanders ov thousandz an commanders ov hundredz?

iz dat y u has all conspird against me? No wan tells me when mah son makez covenant wif teh son ov jese. None ov u iz concernd bout me or tells me dat mah son has incitd mah servant 2 lie in wait 4 me, as he doez todai."

but doeg teh edomite, hoo wuz standin wif sauls officials, sed, "i saw teh son ov jese come 2 ahimelech son ov ahitub at nob.

ahimelech inquird ov teh lord 4 him; he also gaev him provishuns an teh sword ov goliath teh filistine."

den teh king sent 4 da priest ahimelech son ov ahitub an his fathers whole pplz, hoo wuz teh priests at nob, an they all came 2 teh king.

saul sed, "listen nao, son ov ahitub." "yez, mah lord," he anzwerd.

saul sed 2 him, "y has u conspird against me, u an teh son ov jese, givin him bread an sword an inquirin ov ceilin cat 4 him, so dat he has rebelld against me an liez in wait 4 me, as he doez todai?"

ahimelech anzwerd teh king, "hoo ov all ur servants iz as loyal as david, teh kings son-in-law, captain ov ur bodyguard an highly respectd in ur haushold?

wuz dat dai teh furst tiem i inquird ov ceilin cat 4 him? Ov course not! Let not teh king accuse ur servant or any ov his fathers pplz, 4 ur servant knows nothin at all bout dis whole affair."

but teh king sed, "u will surely dye, ahimelech, u an ur fathers whole pplz."

den teh king orderd teh guardz at his side: "turn an kill teh priests ov teh lord, cuz they 2 has sidd wif david. They knew he wuz fleein, yet they did not tell me." 
But teh kings officials wuz not willin 2 raize hand 2 strike teh priests ov teh lord.

teh king den orderd doeg, "u turn an strike down teh priests." so doeg teh edomite turnd an struck them down. Dat dai he killd eighty-5 doodz hoo wore teh linen efod.

he also put 2 teh sword nob, teh town ov teh priests, wif itz doodz an women, itz children an infants, an itz kattle, donkeys an sheep.

but abiathar, son ov ahimelech son ov ahitub, escapd an fld 2 join david.

he told david dat saul had killd teh priests ov teh lord.

den david sed 2 abiathar: "dat dai, when doeg teh edomite wuz thar, i knew he wud be sure 2 tell saul. Im responsible 4 da death ov ur fathers whole pplz.

undefined

when david wuz told, "look, teh filistinez r fightin against keilah an r lootin teh threshin floors,"

he inquird ov teh lord, sayin, "shall i go an attack thees filistinez?" 
Teh lord anzwerd him, "go, attack teh filistinez an save keilah."

but davidz doodz sed 2 him, "her in judah we r afraid. How mutch moar, den, if we go 2 keilah against teh filistine forcez!"

once again david inquird ov teh lord, an teh lord anzwerd him, "go down 2 keilah, 4 im goin 2 giv teh filistinez into ur hand."

So david an his doodz went 2 keilah, fought teh filistinez an carrid off their livestock. He inflictd heavy losez on teh filistinez an savd teh peeps ov keilah.

(nao abiathar son ov ahimelech had brought teh efod down wif him when he fld 2 david at keilah.)

saul wuz told dat david had gone 2 keilah, an he sed, "ceilin cat has handd him ovar 2 me, 4 david has imprisond him by enterin town wif gatez an bars."

an saul calld up all his forcez 4 battle, 2 go down 2 keilah 2 besiege david an his doodz.

when david lernd dat saul wuz plottin against him, he sed 2 abiathar teh priest, "brin teh efod."

david sed, "o lord, ceilin cat ov israel, ur servant has herd definitely dat saul planz 2 come 2 keilah an destroy teh town on akownt ov me.

will teh citizens ov keilah surrendr me 2 him? Will saul come down, as ur servant has herd? O lord, ceilin cat ov israel, tell ur servant." An teh lord sed, "he will."

again david askd, "will teh citizens ov keilah surrendr me an mah doodz 2 saul?" An teh lord sed, "they will."

so david an his doodz, bout 6 hundrd in numbr, left keilah an kept movin frum place 2 place. When saul wuz told dat david had escapd frum keilah, he did not go thar.

david stayd in da desert strongholdz an in da hills ov teh desert ov zif. Dai aftr dai saul searchd 4 him, but ceilin cat did not giv david into his hanz.

while david wuz at horesh in da desert ov zif, he lernd dat saul had come out 2 taek his life.

an sauls son jonathan went 2 david at horesh an helpd him find strength in ceilin cat.

"doan be afraid," he sed. "mah fathr saul will not lay hand on u. U will be king ovar israel, an im gonna be second 2 u. Even mah fathr saul knows dis."

teh 2 ov them made covenant before teh lord. Den jonathan went home, but david remaind at horesh.

teh zifitez went up 2 saul at gibeah an sed, "iz not david hidin among us in da strongholdz at horesh, on teh hill ov hakilah, south ov jeshimon?

nao, o king, come down whenevr it pleasez u 2 do so, an we will be responsible 4 handin him ovar 2 teh king."

saul replid, "teh lord bles u 4 ur concern 4 me.

go an mak furthr preparashun. Find out wer david usually goez an hoo has seen him thar. They tell me he iz vry crafty.

find out bout all teh hidin placez he usez an come bak 2 me wif definite informashun. [a] den im gonna go wif u; if he iz in da area, im gonna track him down among all teh clanz ov judah."

so they set out an went 2 zif ahead ov saul. Nao david an his doodz wuz in da desert ov maon, in da arabah south ov jeshimon.

saul an his doodz began teh search, an when david wuz told bout it, he went down 2 teh rawk an stayd in da desert ov maon. When saul herd dis, he went into teh desert ov maon in pursuit ov david.

saul wuz goin along wan side ov teh mountain, an david an his doodz wuz on teh othr side, hurryin 2 git away frum saul. As saul an his forcez wuz closin in on david an his doodz 2 capchur them,

mesengr came 2 saul, sayin, "come quickly! Teh filistinez r raidin teh land."

den saul broke off his pursuit ov david an went 2 meet teh filistinez. Dat iz y they call dis place sela hammahlekoth. [b]

undefined

Wen Saul coemed hoem frum chasin dem Philistines, he got told, "David iz in teh Desert ov En Gedi. Srsly"

So Saul thinks, "Iz go to get dis kitteh," an him taked 3000 peeps frum Israel an goed to find David at teh Crags ov teh Wild Goats.

Him goed to teh sheep hows; an he finds a caev, so Saul goed to teh caev an he wuz liek "Iz in ur caev, releevin meselfs". David wuz wif hiz peeps at teh bac ov teh cave.

Teh peeps wuz liek, "Dis iz teh day teh Ceiling Cat sed to yu, 'I gives yu ur enemy to yu fr yu to, liek do wut yu wants.'" So David goed all sneeky liek an taked wun cornr ov Saul's robe.

But den, David wuz liek, "Iz no do gud thin," cuz him cut off teh cornr ov teh robe.

So he sayed to hiz peeps, "Teh Ceiling Cat not let Iz do dat to my mastr, hoo teh Ceiling Cat anoynted, or do anytin; cuz teh Ceiling Cat anuynted him.

Wif dat, David scolded hiz peeps, an him not let dem fight Saul. An den Saul wuz liek, "Kthxbye," an he goid owt ov teh caev.

An den Daved goed owt ov teh caev too, an he sayed, "My TopCat, teh kin!" Wen Saul looks, David bows an den lies down, wif his faec on teh grownd.

Den he sayed to Saul, "Y do yu lissen wen kittehs say, 'David wunts to hrt yu'?

Dis dai, yu see wif yuz ais dat teh Ceiling Cat gived yu to me in teh caev. Teh peeps told me to kill yu, but Iz not, bad, iz gud, sos I did not; Iz sayed, 'I not bad kitteh, sos I no hurts my master, cuz him wuz anoynted by teh Ceiling Cat.'

Yu see, my fadr, yu looks at dis pees ov yu'z robe! I cuts it off, but I no kills yu. I NOT BAD KITTEH! WAI YU WUNT ME? WUT I DO???

Let teh Ceiling Cat tell hoo iz gud an hoo iz bad. An, let teh Ceiling Cat get bac at teh kittehs hoo hrts me, but Iz no tuch yu.

Liek dat owd sayin, 'Frum teh bad kittehs coems teh ad tings,' so Iz no tuches yu.

"Wai duz yu coem owt? Hoo yu wunt? A ded dog? A flea?

Let teh Ceiling Cat tell hoo iz gud an hoo iz bad, an let him say weder Iz do gud or bad; let him put me owtside cuz I not hrt yu."

Wen David wuz doen, Saul sayed, "Iz dat srsly yu, David?" An det him cryed.

"Yu r bettr den me," he sayed. "Yu not hrt me, but Iz hrt yu lots.

Yu wer just liek, Iz rly gud cuz I not hrt yu; teh Ceiling Cat gived me to yu, an yu not kill me.

Wen a kitteh gets hiz enemy, he nevr let him leev wifowt hrting him. Let teh Ceiling Cat give yu lots ov cheezburgrz fr dis.

I nos dat yu be TopCat now, an dat teh big howze ov Israel wil be gud wif yu.

Den Saul maked David promis dat he not get rid ov Saul'z future peeps.

undefined

Now Samuel wuz ded, an all teh kittehs ov Israel wer sad; an dey put him undr teh grownd at hiz hows in Ramah. Den David went to liv in teh Desert ov Maon [a].

Wun kitteh in Man, hoo had sum land der at Carmel, had, liek, a bazillion cheezburgurz. An also, he had lots ov animalz, liek dem goats an teh sheep.

Hiz naem wuz Nabal, an hiz wief'z naem wuz Abigail. She wuz rly smart an rly pritty, but her huzbnd wuz a Calebite, so he wuz liek a total n00b, an he wuz rly mean.

Wen David wuz sleepin, he heers Nabal sheerin sum sheepi.

So, he sended 10 yung kittehs and sayed to dem, "Yuz go up to Nabal at Carmel an say hai to him fr me.

Say to him: 'Oh hai! Many cheezburgrz fr yu an ur peeps! An gud helth to all ur stuf!

" 'Now I heerz it iz teh tiem to sheer teh seep. Wen ur sheprds wer wif us, we not hr dem at all, an teh hoel tiem dey wer at Carmel nufing ov ders wuz goen.

Go asks ur servnts, dey tellz yu. So be niec fr my yung kttehs, cuz we heer at gud tiem. Plees give ur peeps an ur sun David any cheezburgrz yu can find.' "

Wen teh kittehs gots der, dey gives Nabal teh wurdz fr David. Den dey wayts.

Nabal sayed to teh servnts, "Ho iz dis n00b David? Hoo iz dis sun ov Jesse? Lots ov servnts r leeving der mastrs deez days.

Wai Iz takes my cheezburgrz an gives it to deez weerd kittehs frum weerd plases?"

So teh kittehs went bac. Wen dey got der, dey told David everyfing.

David wuz liek, "WAI HE SAY DEEZ FINGS?" an he sayd to hiz peeps, "Put on ur claws!" An dey put on der claws, an David put on hiz claw. Den he taked 400 kittehs wif him, an 200 stayed to wach teh stuf.

Wun ov dem servnts ov Nabal telled Abigail: "David sent deez peeps frum teh desrt to say hai to teh mastr, but he not gud kitteh, an he insults dem.

WAI HE DO DIS? WTF? Dey wer rly niec to us. Dey not hrt us, an dey not takes anyfing eether.

Nite an day dey maked a wall fr us wen we wuz herdin dem sheeps neer dem.

Now fink abowt it an do sumfin, cuz der iz bad fings fr teh mastr an all hiz peeps. He iz such bad kitteh, no uddrs talks to him."

abigail lost no tiem. She took 2 hundrd loavez ov bread, 2 skins ov wine, 5 dresd sheep, 5 seahs [b] ov roastd grain, hundrd cakez ov raisins an 2 hundrd cakez ov presd figs, an loadd them on donkeys.

den she told her servants, "go on ahead; ill follow u." but she did not tell her husband nabal.

as she came ridin her donkey into mountain ravine, thar wuz david an his doodz descendin toward her, an she met them.

David had jus sed, "iz been uselesâ€”all mah watchin ovar dis fellows property in da desert so dat nothin ov his wuz misin. He has paid me bak evil 4 gud.

cud ceilin cat deal wif david, [c] be it evr so severely, if by mornin i leef aliv wan male ov all hoo belong 2 him!"

when abigail saw david, she quickly got off her donkey an bowd down before david wif her face 2 teh ground.

she fell at his feet an sed: "mah lord, let teh blame be on me alone. Plz let ur servant speek 2 u; hear wut ur servant has 2 say.

cud mah lord pai no attenshun 2 dat wickd man nabal. He iz jus liek his naymâ€”his naym iz fool, an folly goez wif him. But as 4 me, ur servant, i did not c teh doodz mah mastah sent.

"nao since teh lord has kept u, mah mastah, frum bloodshd an frum avengin yourself wif ur own hanz, as surely as teh lord livez an as u liv, cud ur enemiez an all hoo intend 2 harm mah mastah be liek nabal.

an let dis gift, which ur servant has brought 2 mah mastah, be given 2 teh doodz hoo follow u.

plz forgiv ur servants offense, 4 da lord will certainly mak lastin dynasty 4 mah mastah, cuz he fights teh lordz battlez. Let no wrongdoin be findz in u as long as u liv.

even though someone iz pursuin u 2 taek ur life, teh life ov mah mastah will be bound securely in da bundle ov teh livin by teh lord ur ceilin cat. But teh livez ov ur enemiez he will hurl away as frum teh pocket ov slin.

when teh lord has dun 4 mah mastah evry gud ting he promisd concernin him an has appointd him leadr ovar israel,

mah mastah will not has on his conscience teh staggerin burden ov needles bloodshd or ov havin avengd him. An when teh lord has brought mah mastah succes, remembr ur servant."

david sed 2 abigail, "praize be 2 teh lord, teh ceilin cat ov israel, hoo has sent u todai 2 meet me.

cud u be blesd 4 ur gud judgment an 4 keepin me frum bloodshd dis dai an frum avengin myself wif mah own hanz.

otherwize, as surely as teh lord, teh ceilin cat ov israel, livez, hoo has kept me frum harmin u, if u had not come quickly 2 meet me, not wan male belongin 2 nabal wud has been left aliv by daibreak."

den david acceptd frum her hand wut she had brought him an sed, "go home in peace. I has herd ur werdz an grantd ur request."

when abigail went 2 nabal, he wuz in da houz holdin banquet liek dat ov king. He wuz in high spirits an vry drunk. So she told him nothin til daibreak.

den in da mornin, when nabal wuz sobr, his wife told him all thees things, an his hart faild him an he became liek stone.

bout 10 dais latr, teh lord struck nabal an he did.

when david herd dat nabal wuz ded, he sed, "praize be 2 teh lord, hoo has ufeld mah cause against nabal 4 treatin me wif contempt. He has kept his servant frum doin wrong an has brought nabals wrongdoin down on his own head." Den david sent werd 2 abigail, askin her 2 become his wife.

his servants went 2 carmel an sed 2 abigail, "david has sent us 2 u 2 taek u 2 become his wife."

she bowd down wif her face 2 teh ground an sed, "her iz ur maidservant, ready 2 serve u an wash teh feet ov mah mastahs servants."

abigail quickly got on donkey an, attendd by her 5 maidz, went wif davidz mesengers an became his wife.

teh zifitez went 2 saul at gibeah an sed, "iz not david hidin on teh hill ov hakilah, which facez jeshimon?"

so saul went down 2 teh desert ov zif, wif his 3 thousand chosen doodz ov israel, 2 search thar 4 david.

saul made his camp beside teh road on teh hill ov hakilah facin jeshimon, but david stayd in da desert. When he saw dat saul had followd him thar,

he sent out scouts an lernd dat saul had definitely arrivd. [a]

den david set out an went 2 teh place wer saul had campd. He saw wer saul an abnr son ov ner, teh commandr ov teh army, had lain down. Saul wuz lyin inside teh camp, wif teh army encampd around him.

david den askd ahimelech teh hittite an abishai son ov zeruiah, joabs brothr, "hoo will go down into teh camp wif me 2 saul?"

but david sed 2 abishai, "doan destroy him! Hoo can lay hand on teh lordz anointd an be guiltles?

ut teh lord forbid dat i shud lay hand on teh lordz anointd. Nao git teh spear an watr jug dat r near his head, an lets go."

so david took teh spear an watr jug near sauls head, an they left. No wan saw or knew bout it, nor did anyone waek up. They wuz all sleepin, cuz teh lord had put them into deep sleep.

den david crosd ovar 2 teh othr side an stood on top ov teh hill sum distance away; thar wuz wide space tween them.

wut u has dun iz not gud. As surely as teh lord livez, u an ur doodz deserve 2 dye, cuz u did not guard ur mastah, teh lordz anointd. Look around u. Wer r teh kings spear an watr jug dat wuz near his head?"

an he addd, "y iz mah lord pursuin his servant? Wut has i dun, an wut wrong iz i guilty ov?

nao let mah lord teh king listen 2 his servants werdz. If teh lord has incitd u against me, den cud he accept an offerin. If, howevr, doodz has dun it, cud they be cursd before teh lord! They has nao driven me frum mah share in da lordz inheritance an has sed, go, serve othr godz.

In dose dais teh filistinez gatherd their forcez 2 fight against israel. Achish sed 2 david, "u must understand dat u an ur doodz will accompany me in da army."

david sed, "den u will c 4 yourself wut ur servant can do." Achish replid, "vry well, im gonna mak u mah bodyguard 4 life."

nao samuel wuz ded, an all israel had mournd 4 him an burid him in his own town ov ramah. Saul had expelld teh mediums an spiritists frum teh land.

teh filistinez assembld an came an set up camp at shunem, while saul gatherd all teh israelitez an set up camp at gilboa.

when saul saw teh filistine army, he wuz afraid; terror filld his hart.

he inquird ov teh lord, but teh lord did not anzwr him by dreams or urim or profets.

saul den sed 2 his attendants, "find me woman hoo iz medium, so i cud go an inquire ov her." "thar iz wan in endor," they sed.

so saul disguisd him, puttin on othr clothez, an at nite he an 2 doodz went 2 teh woman. "consult spirit 4 me," he sed, "an brin up 4 me teh wan i naym."

but teh woman sed 2 him, "surely u knoe wut saul has dun. He has cut off da mediums an spiritists frum teh land. Y has u set trap 4 mah life 2 brin bout mah death?"

saul swore 2 her by teh lord, "as surely as teh lord livez, u will not be punishd 4 dis."

den teh woman askd, "whom shall i brin up 4 u?" "brin up samuel," he sed.

when teh woman saw samuel, she crid out at teh top ov her voice an sed 2 saul, "y has u deceivd me? U r saul!"

teh king sed 2 her, "doan be afraid. Wut do u c?" Teh woman sed, "i c spirit [a] comin up out ov teh ground."

"wut doez he look liek?" he askd. "an old man wearin robe iz comin up," she sed. Den saul knew it wuz samuel, an he bowd down an prostratd him wif his face 2 teh ground.

samuel sed 2 saul, "y has u disturbd me by bringin me up?" "im in great distres," saul sed. "teh filistinez r fightin against me, an ceilin cat has turnd away frum me. He no longr anzwers me, eithr by profets or by dreams. So i has calld on u 2 tell me wut 2 do."

samuel sed, "y do u consult me, nao dat teh lord has turnd away frum u an become ur enemy?

teh lord will hand ovar both israel an u 2 teh filistinez, an 2morrow u an ur sons will be wif me. Teh lord will also hand ovar teh army ov israel 2 teh filistinez."

immediately saul fell full length on teh ground, filld wif fear cuz ov samuels werdz. His strength wuz gone, 4 he had eaten nothin all dat dai an nite.

when teh woman came 2 saul an saw dat he wuz greatly shaken, she sed, "look, ur maidservant has obeyd u. I took mah life in mah hanz an did wut u told me 2 do. 22 nao plz listen 2 ur servant an let me giv u sum fud so u cud eat an has teh strength 2 go on ur wai."

Teh filistinez gatherd all their forcez at afek, an israel campd by teh sprin in jezreel.

as teh filistine rulers marchd wif their units ov hundredz an thousandz, david an his doodz wuz marchin at teh rear wif achish.

teh commanders ov teh filistinez askd, "wut bout thees hebrews?" Achish replid, "iz dis not david, hoo wuz an officr ov saul king ov israel? He has already been wif me 4ovar yer, an frum teh dai he left saul til nao, i has findz no fault in him."

but teh filistine commanders wuz angry wif him an sed, "send teh man bak, dat he cud return 2 teh place u assignd him. He must not go wif us into battle, or he will turn against us durin teh fightin. How bettr cud he regain his mastahs favor than by takin teh headz ov r own doodz?

isnt dis teh david they sang bout in their dancez: " saul has slain his thousandz, An david his tens ov thousandz?"

so achish calld david an sed 2 him, "as surely as teh lord livez, u has been reliable, an i wud be pleezd 2 has u serve wif me in da army. Frum teh dai u came 2 me til nao, i has findz no fault in u, but teh rulers doan approov ov u.

nao git up early, along wif ur mastahs servants hoo has come wif u, an leef in da mornin as soon as it light."

david an his doodz reachd ziklag on teh third dai. Nao teh amalekitez had raidd teh negev an ziklag. They had attackd ziklag an burnd it,

an had taken captiv teh women an all hoo wuz in it, both young an old. They killd none ov them, but carrid them off as they went on their wai.

when david an his doodz came 2 ziklag, they findz it destroyd by fire an their wivez an sons an daughters taken captiv.

we raidd teh negev ov teh kerethitez an teh territory belongin 2 judah an teh negev ov caleb. An we burnd ziklag."

david fought them frum dusk til teh evenin ov teh next dai, an none ov them got away, except 4 hundrd young doodz hoo rode off on camels an fld.

david recoverd evrythin teh amalekitez had taken, includin his 2 wivez.

nothin wuz misin: young or old, boi or gurl, plundr or anythin else they had taken. David brought evrythin bak.

he took all teh flockz an herdz, an his doodz droov them ahead ov teh othr livestock, sayin, "dis ar teh davidz plundr."

den david came 2 teh 2 hundrd doodz hoo had been 2 exhaustd 2 follow him an hoo wuz left behind at teh besor ravine. They came out 2 meet david an teh peeps wif him. As david an his doodz approachd, he greetd them.

but all teh evil doodz an troublemakers among davidz followers sed, "cuz they did not go out wif us, we will not share wif them teh plundr we recoverd. Howevr, each man cud taek his wife an children an go."

david replid, "no, mah brothers, u must not do dat wif wut teh lord has given us. He has protectd us an handd ovar 2 us teh forcez dat came against us.

hoo will listen 2 wut u say? Teh share ov teh man hoo stayd wif teh suppliez iz 2 be teh same as dat ov him hoo went down 2 teh battle. All will share alike."

teh war tween teh houz ov saul an teh houz ov david lastd long tiem. David grew strongr an strongr, while teh houz ov saul grew weakr an weakr.

sons wuz born 2 david in hebron: His firstborn wuz amnon teh son ov ahinoam ov jezreel;

his second, kileab teh son ov abigail teh widow ov nabal ov carmel; Teh third, absalom teh son ov maacah daughtr ov talmai king ov geshur;

teh fourth, adonijah teh son ov haggith; Teh fifth, shefatiah teh son ov abital;

an teh sixth, ithream teh son ov davidz wife eglah. Thees wuz born 2 david in hebron.

durin teh war tween teh houz ov saul an teh houz ov david, abnr had been strengthenin his own posishun in da houz ov saul.

nao saul had had concubine namd rizpah daughtr ov aiah. An ish-bosheth sed 2 abnr, "y u sleep wif mah fathers concubine?"

abnr wuz vry angry cuz ov wut ish-bosheth sed an he anzwerd, "iz i dawgs head on judahs side? Dis vry dai im loyal 2 teh houz ov ur fathr saul an 2 his pplz an frenz. I havent handd u ovar 2 david. Yet nao u accuse me ov an offense involvin dis woman!

an tranzfr teh kingdom frum teh houz ov saul an establish davidz throne ovar israel an judah frum dan 2 beersheba."

ish-bosheth did not dare 2 say anothr werd 2 abnr, cuz he wuz afraid ov him.

den abnr sent mesengers on his behalf 2 say 2 david, "whose land iz? Mak an agreement wif me, an im gonna halp u brin all israel ovar 2 u."

"gud," sed david. "im gonna mak an agreement wif u. But i demand wan ting ov u: do not come into mah presence unles u brin michal daughtr ov saul when u come 2 c me."

den david sent mesengers 2 ish-bosheth son ov saul, demandin, "gimie mah wife michal, whom i betrothd 2 myself 4 da price ov hundrd filistine foreskins."

so ish-bosheth gaev orders an had her taken away frum her husband paltiel son ov laish.

her husband, howevr, went wif her, weepin behind her all teh wai 2 bahurim. Den abnr sed 2 him, "go bak home!" so he went bak.

abnr conferrd wif teh elders ov israel an sed, "4 sum tiem u has wantd 2 mak david ur king.

nao do it! 4 da lord promisd david, by mah servant david im gonna rescue mah peeps israel frum teh hand ov teh filistinez an frum teh hand ov all their enemiez. "

abnr also spoke 2 teh benjamitez in person. Den he went 2 hebron 2 tell david evrythin dat israel an teh whole houz ov benjamin wantd 2 do.

when abnr, hoo had twenty doodz wif him, came 2 david at hebron, david prepard feast 4 him an his doodz.

den abnr sed 2 david, "let me go at once an assemble all israel 4 mah lord teh king, so dat they cud mak compact wif u, an dat u cud rule ovar all dat ur hart desirez." so david sent abnr away, an he went in peace.

jus den davidz doodz an joab returnd frum raid an brought wif them great deal ov plundr. But abnr wuz no longr wif david in hebron, cuz david had sent him away, an he had gone in peace.

when joab an all teh soldiers wif him arrivd, he wuz told dat abnr son ov ner had come 2 teh king an dat teh king had sent him away an dat he had gone in peace.

so joab went 2 teh king an sed, "wut has u dun? Look, abnr came 2 u. Y u let him go? Nao he iz gone!

u knoe abnr son ov ner; he came 2 deceiv u an observe ur movements an find out evrythin u r doin."

joab den left david an sent mesengers aftr abnr, an they brought him bak frum teh well ov sirah. But david did not knoe it.

nao when abnr returnd 2 hebron, joab took him aside into teh gateway, as though 2 speek wif him privately. An thar, 2 avenge teh blood ov his brothr asahel, joab stabbd him in da stumuk, an he did.

latr, when david herd bout dis, he sed, "i an mah kingdom r forevr innosent before teh lord concernin teh blood ov abnr son ov ner.

cud his blood fall upon teh head ov joab an upon all his fathers houz! Cud joabs houz nevr be without someone hoo has runnin sore or leprosy [a] or hoo leanz on crutch or hoo falls by teh lightsaber or hoo lackz fud."

(joab an his brothr abishai murderd abnr cuz he had killd their brothr asahel in da battle at gibeon.)

den david sed 2 joab an all teh peeps wif him, "tear ur clothez an put on sackcloth an walk in mournin in frunt ov abnr." king david him walkd behind teh bir.

they burid abnr in hebron, an teh king wept aloud at abners tomb. All teh peeps wept also.

teh king sang dis lament 4 abnr: "shud abnr has did as teh lawles dye?

ur hanz wuz not bound, 
Ur feet wuz not fetterd. 
U fell as wan falls before wickd doodz." 
An all teh peeps wept ovar him again.

den they all came an urgd david 2 eat somethin while it wuz still dai; but david took an oath, sayin, "cud ceilin cat deal wif me, be it evr so severely, if i taste bread or anythin else before teh sun sets!"

all teh peeps took nowt an wuz pleezd; inded, evrythin teh king did pleezd them.

so on dat dai all teh peeps an all israel knew dat teh king had no part in da murdr ov abnr son ov ner.

den teh king sed 2 his doodz, "do u not realize dat prince an great man has fallen in israel dis dai?

Teh king an his doodz marchd 2 jerusalem 2 attack teh jebusiets, hoo livd thar. Teh jebusiets sed 2 david, "u will not git in her; even teh blind an teh lame can ward u off." they thot, "david cant git in her."

nevertheles, david capturd teh fortres ov zion, teh city ov david.

on dat dai, david sed, "anyone hoo conquers teh jebusiets will has 2 use teh watr shaft [a] 2 reach dose lame an blind hoo r davidz enemiez. [b] " dat iz y they say, "teh blind an lame will not entr teh palace."

david den took up residence in da fortres an calld it teh city ov david. He built up teh area around it, frum teh supportin terracez [c] inward.

an he became moar an moar powerful, cuz teh lord ceilin cat almighty wuz wif him.

nao hiram king ov tyre sent mesengers 2 david, along wif cedar logs an carpenters an stonemasons, an they built palace 4 david.

an david knew dat teh lord had establishd him as king ovar israel an had exaltd his kingdom 4 da saek ov his peeps israel.

aftr he left hebron, david took moar concubinez an wivez in jerusalem, an moar sons an daughters wuz born 2 him.

thees r teh namez ov teh children born 2 him thar: shammua, shobab, nathan, solomon,

ibhar, elishua, nefeg, jafia, 16 elishama, eliada an elifelet.

when teh filistinez herd dat david had been anointd king ovar israel, they went up in full force 2 search 4 him, but david herd bout it an went down 2 teh stronghold.

nao teh filistinez had come an spread out in da valley ov refaim;

so david inquird ov teh lord, "shall i go an attack teh filistinez? Will u hand them ovar 2 me?" Teh lord anzwerd him, "go, 4 im gonna surely hand teh filistinez ovar 2 u."

so david went 2 baal perazim, an thar he defeatd them. He sed, "as waters break out, teh lord has brokd out against mah enemiez before me." so dat place wuz calld baal perazim. [d]

teh filistinez abandond their idols thar, an david an his doodz carrid them off.

david again brought togethr out ov israel chosen doodz, thirty thousand in all.

he an all his doodz set out frum baalah ov judah [a] 2 brin up frum thar teh ark ov ceilin cat, which iz calld by teh naym, [b] teh naym ov teh lord almighty, hoo iz enthrond tween teh cherubim dat r on teh ark.

they set teh ark ov ceilin cat on new cart an brought it frum teh houz ov abinadab, which wuz on teh hill. Uzzah an ahio, sons ov abinadab, wuz guidin teh new cart

wif teh ark ov ceilin cat on it, [c] an ahio wuz walkin in frunt ov it.

david an teh whole houz ov israel wuz celebratin wif all their mite before teh lord, wif songs [d] an wif harps, lyrez, tambourinez, sistrums an cymbals.

when they came 2 teh threshin floor ov nacon, uzzah reachd out an took hold ov teh ark ov ceilin cat, cuz teh oxen stumbld.

teh lordz angr burnd against uzzah cuz ov his irreverent act; therefore ceilin cat struck him down an he did thar beside teh ark ov ceilin cat.

den david wuz angry cuz teh lordz wrath had brokd out against uzzah, an 2 dis dai dat place iz calld perez uzzah. [e]

david wuz afraid ov teh lord dat dai an sed, "how can teh ark ov teh lord evr come 2 me?"

he wuz not willin 2 taek teh ark ov teh lord 2 be wif him in da city ov david. Instead, he took it aside 2 teh houz ov obd-edom teh gittite.

teh ark ov teh lord remaind in da houz ov obd-edom teh gittite 4 3 months, an teh lord blesd him an his entire haushold.

nao king david wuz told, "teh lord has blesd teh haushold ov obd-edom an evrythin he has, cuz ov teh ark ov ceilin cat." so david went down an brought up teh ark ov ceilin cat frum teh houz ov obd-edom 2 teh city ov david wif rejoicin.

when dose hoo wuz carryin teh ark ov teh lord had taken 6 steps, he sacrificd bull an fattend calf.

david, wearin linen efod, dancd before teh lord wif all his mite,

while he an teh entire houz ov israel brought up teh ark ov teh lord wif shouts an teh sound ov trumpets.

as teh ark ov teh lord wuz enterin teh city ov david, michal daughtr ov saul watchd frum window. An when she saw king david leapin an dancin before teh lord, she despisd him in her hart.

they brought teh ark ov teh lord an set it in itz place inside teh tent dat david had pitchd 4 it, an david sacrificd burnt offerings an fellowship offerings [f] before teh lord.

aftr he had finishd sacrificin teh burnt offerings an fellowship offerings, he blesd teh peeps in da naym ov teh lord almighty.

den he gaev loaf ov bread, caek ov datez an caek ov raisins 2 each person in da whole crowd ov israelitez, both doodz an women. An all teh peeps went 2 their homez.

when david returnd home 2 bles his haushold, michal daughtr ov saul came out 2 meet him an sed, "how teh king ov israel has distinguishd him todai, disrobin in da sight ov teh slave gurls ov his servants as any vulgar fellow wud!"

david sed 2 michal, "it wuz before teh lord, hoo chose me rathr than ur fathr or anyone frum his houz when he appointd me rulr ovar teh lordz peeps israelâ€”im gonna celebrate before teh lord.

im gonna become even moar undignifid than dis, an im gonna be humiliatd in mah own eyez. But by thees slave gurls u spoke ov, im gonna be held in honor."

aftr teh king wuz settld in his palace an teh lord had given him rest frum all his enemiez around him,

he sed 2 nathan teh profet, "her im, livin in palace ov cedar, while teh ark ov ceilin cat remains in tent."

nathan replid 2 teh king, "whatevr u has in mind, go ahead an do it, 4 da lord iz wif u."

dat nite teh werd ov teh lord came 2 nathan, sayin:

"go an tell mah servant david, dis ar teh wut teh lord sez: r u teh wan 2 build me houz 2 dwell in?

i has not dwelt in houz frum teh dai i brought teh israelitez up out ov egypt 2 dis dai. I has been movin frum place 2 place wif tent as mah dwellin.

wherevr i has movd wif all teh israelitez, did i evr say 2 any ov their rulers whom i commandd 2 sheferd mah peeps israel, "y has u not built me houz ov cedar?"

"nao den, tell mah servant david, dis ar teh wut teh lord almighty sez: i took u frum teh paschur an frum followin teh flock 2 be rulr ovar mah peeps israel.

i has been wif u wherevr u has gone, an i has cut off all ur enemiez frum before u. Nao im gonna mak ur naym great, liek teh namez ov teh greatest doodz ov teh earth.

an im gonna provide place 4 mah peeps israel an will plant them so dat they can has home ov their own an no longr be disturbd. Wickd peeps will not oppres them nomore, as they did at teh beginnin

an has dun evr since teh tiem i appointd leaders [a] ovar mah peeps israel. Im gonna also giv u rest frum all ur enemiez. " teh lord declarez 2 u dat teh lord him will establish houz 4 u:

when ur dais r ovar an u rest wif ur fathers, im gonna raize up ur offsprin 2 succed u, hoo will come frum ur own body, an im gonna establish his kingdom.

he iz teh wan hoo will build houz 4 mah naym, an im gonna establish teh throne ov his kingdom forevr.

im gonna be his fathr, an he will be mah son. When he doez wrong, im gonna punish him wif teh rod ov doodz, wif floggings inflictd by doodz.

but mah luv will nevr be taken away frum him, as i took it away frum saul, whom i removd frum before u.

ur houz an ur kingdom will endure forevr before me [b] ; ur throne will be establishd forevr. "

nathan reportd 2 david all teh werdz ov dis entire revelashun.

den king david went in an sat before teh lord, an he sed: "hoo iz i, o sovereign lord, an wut iz mah pplz, dat u has brought me dis far?

an as if dis wuz not enough in ur sight, o sovereign lord, u has also spoken bout teh fuchur ov teh houz ov ur servant. Iz dis ur usual wai ov dealin wif man, o sovereign lord ?

"wut moar can david say 2 u? 4 u knoe ur servant, o sovereign lord.

4 da saek ov ur werd an accordin 2 ur will, u has dun dis great ting an made it known 2 ur servant.

"how great u r, o sovereign lord! Thar iz no wan liek u, an thar iz no ceilin cat but u, as we has herd wif r own ears.

an hoo iz liek ur peeps israelâ€”teh wan nashun on earth dat ceilin cat went out 2 redeem as peeps 4 him, an 2 mak naym 4 him, an 2 perform great an awsum wonders by drivin out nashuns an their godz frum before ur peeps, whom u redeemd frum egypt? [c]

u has establishd ur peeps israel as ur vry own forevr, an u, o lord, has become their ceilin cat.

"an nao, lord ceilin cat, keep forevr teh promize u has made concernin ur servant an his houz. Do as u promisd,

so dat ur naym will be great forevr. Den doodz will say, teh lord almighty iz ceilin cat ovar israel! An teh houz ov ur servant david will be establishd before u.

"o lord almighty, ceilin cat ov israel, u has reveald dis 2 ur servant, sayin, im gonna build houz 4 u. So ur servant has findz courage 2 offr u dis prayr.

o sovereign lord, u r ceilin cat! Ur werdz r trustworthy, an u has promisd thees gud things 2 ur servant.

In teh corze uf tiem, Devid srsly pwned the crazy jews nd ttlly mde dem n00bz, nd he tk Metheg Ammah frm teh base of teh Philistines, geting all der baes nd maeking it hiz. Srsly.

Devid kan haz nd alwaiz wll pwn teh Moar-bitez. He mde dem liez downz on teh fuzzy carptez nd licekd dem off wif a piec of hurt. Erry two bitz of dem was shotz, and teh dird bitz wuz let live lung. Zo teh Moar-bitez

becommed zubjected too Devid nd brunged cheezeburgerz. Moreovr, david fought hadadezr son ov rehob, king ov zobah, when he went 2 restore his control along teh eufratez rivr.

david capturd thousand ov his chariots, 7 thousand charioteers [a] an twenty thousand foot soldiers. He hamstrung all but hundrd ov teh chariot horsez.

when teh arameanz ov damascus came 2 halp hadadezr king ov zobah, david struck down twenty-2 thousand ov them.

he put garrisons in da aramean kingdom ov damascus, an teh arameanz became subject 2 him an brought tribute. Teh lord gaev david victory wherevr he went.

david took teh gold shieldz dat belongd 2 teh officers ov hadadezr an brought them 2 jerusalem.

frum tebah [b] an berothai, towns dat belongd 2 hadadezr, king david took great quantity ov bronze.

when tou [c] king ov hamath herd dat david had defeatd teh entire army ov hadadezr,

he sent his son joram [d] 2 king david 2 greet him an congratulate him on his victory in battle ovar hadadezr, hoo had been at war wif tou. Joram brought wif him articlez ov silvr an gold an bronze.

king david dedicatd thees articlez 2 teh lord, as he had dun wif teh silvr an gold frum all teh nashuns he had subdud:

edom [e] an moab, teh ammonitez an teh filistinez, an amalek. He also dedicatd teh plundr taken frum hadadezr son ov rehob, king ov zobah.

an david became famous aftr he returnd frum strikin down eighteen thousand edomitez [f] in da valley ov salt.

he put garrisons throughout edom, an all teh edomitez became subject 2 david. Teh lord gaev david victory wherevr he went.

david reignd ovar all israel, doin wut wuz jus an rite 4 all his peeps.

joab son ov zeruiah wuz ovar teh army; jehoshafat son ov ahilud wuz recordr;

zadok son ov ahitub an ahimelech son ov abiathar wuz priests; seraiah wuz secretary;

Devid sed "Hannen can has cheezburger becuz Ammen gev me cheezburger. so Devid sended his hoomin servents 2 Hannen, so Hannen can has comfert.

but Hannens servents sed "Devid wants 2 spyzorz on you mah kitteh! hes a nastee kat!"

so Hannen shavud all of Devids servents so dat one half were furry an teh udder not. o noes!

but when Ammens kittehs hurd dat Devid wuz sad, dey sent out loadsa trupes, turty tree tousand.

when david wuz told ov dis, he gatherd all israel, crosd teh jordan an went 2 helam. Teh arameanz formd their battle linez 2 meet david an fought against him.

but they fld before israel, an david killd 7 hundrd ov their charioteers an forty thousand ov their foot soldiers. [b] he also struck down shobach teh commandr ov their army, an he did thar.

in da sprin, at teh tiem when kings go off 2 war, david sent joab out wif teh kings doodz an teh whole israelite army. They destroyd teh ammonitez an besiegd rabbah. But david remaind in jerusalem.

wan evenin david got up frum his bed an walkd around on teh roof ov teh palace. Frum teh roof he saw woman bafin. Teh woman wuz vry beautiful,

an david sent someone 2 find out bout her. Teh man sed, "isnt dis bafsheba, teh daughtr ov eliam an teh wife ov uriah teh hittite?"

den david sent mesengers 2 git her. She came 2 him, an he slept wif her. (she had purifid herself frum her uncleannes.) den [a] she went bak home.

teh woman conceivd an sent werd 2 david, sayin, "im pregnant."

so david sent dis werd 2 joab: "send me uriah teh hittite." an joab sent him 2 david.

when uriah came 2 him, david askd him how joab wuz, how teh soldiers wuz an how teh war wuz goin.

den david sed 2 uriah, "go down 2 ur houz an wash ur feet." so uriah left teh palace, an gift frum teh king wuz sent aftr him.

but uriah slept at teh entrance 2 teh palace wif all his mastahs servants an did not go down 2 his houz.

when david wuz told, "uriah did not go home," he askd him, "havent u jus come frum distance? Y didnt u go home?"

uriah sed 2 david, "teh ark an israel an judah r stayin in tents, an mah mastah joab an mah lordz doodz r campd in da open fieldz. How cud i go 2 mah houz 2 eat an drink an lie wif mah wife? As surely as u liv, im gonna not do such ting!"

den david sed 2 him, "stay her wan moar dai, an 2morrow im gonna send u bak." so uriah remaind in jerusalem dat dai an teh next.

at davidz invitashun, he eatd an drank wif him, an david made him drunk. But in da evenin uriah went out 2 sleep on his mat among his mastahs servants; he did not go home.

in da mornin david wrote lettr 2 joab an sent it wif uriah.

in it he wrote, "put uriah in da frunt line wer teh fightin iz fiercest. Den withdraw frum him so he will be struck down an dye."

so while joab had teh city undr siege, he put uriah at place wer he knew teh strongest defenders wuz.

when teh doodz ov teh city came out an fought against joab, sum ov teh doodz in davidz army fell; moreovr, uriah teh hittite did.

joab sent david full akownt ov teh battle.

he instructd teh mesengr: "when u has finishd givin teh king dis akownt ov teh battle,

teh kings angr cud flare up, an he cud ask u, y u git so close 2 teh city 2 fight? Didnt u knoe they wud shoot arrows frum teh wall?

hoo killd abimelech son ov jerub-besheth [b] ? Didnt woman throw an uppr millstone on him frum teh wall, so dat he did in thebez? Y u git so close 2 teh wall? If he askz u dis, den say 2 him, also, ur servant uriah teh hittite iz ded. "

teh mesengr set out, an when he arrivd he told david evrythin joab had sent him 2 say.

teh mesengr sed 2 david, "teh doodz overpowerd us an came out against us in da open, but we droov them bak 2 teh entrance 2 teh city gate.

den teh archers shot arrows at ur servants frum teh wall, an sum ov teh kings doodz did. Moreovr, ur servant uriah teh hittite iz ded."

david told teh mesengr, "say dis 2 joab: doan let dis upset u; teh lightsaber devours wan as well as anothr. Pres teh attack against teh city an destroy it. Say dis 2 encourage joab."

when uriahs wife herd dat her husband wuz ded, she mournd 4 him.

undefined

teh lord sent nathan 2 david. When he came 2 him, he sed, "thar wuz 2 doodz in certain town, wan rich an teh othr poor.

teh rich man had vry large numbr ov sheep an kattle,

but teh poor man had nothin except wan lil ewe lamb he had buyd. He raisd it, an it grew up wif him an his children. It shard his fud, drank frum his cup an even slept in his arms. It wuz liek daughtr 2 him.

"nao travelr came 2 teh rich man, but teh rich man refraind frum takin wan ov his own sheep or kattle 2 prepare meal 4 da travelr hoo had come 2 him. Instead, he took teh ewe lamb dat belongd 2 teh poor man an prepard it 4 da wan hoo had come 2 him."

david burnd wif angr against teh man an sed 2 nathan, "as surely as teh lord livez, teh man hoo did dis deservez 2 dye!

he must pai 4 dat lamb 4 tiems ovar, cuz he did such ting an had no pity."

den nathan sed 2 david, "u r teh man! Dis ar teh wut teh lord, teh ceilin cat ov israel, sez: i anointd u king ovar israel, an i deliverd u frum teh hand ov saul.

i gaev ur mastahs houz 2 u, an ur mastahs wivez into ur arms. I gaev u teh houz ov israel an judah. An if all dis had been 2 lil, i wud has given u even moar.

y u despize teh werd ov teh lord by doin wut iz evil in his eyez? U struck down uriah teh hittite wif teh sword an took his wife 2 be ur own. U killd him wif teh sword ov teh ammonitez.

nao, therefore, teh sword will nevr depart frum ur houz, cuz u despisd me an took teh wife ov uriah teh hittite 2 be ur own.

"dis ar teh wut teh lord sez: out ov ur own haushold im goin 2 brin calamity upon u. Before ur vry eyez im gonna taek ur wivez an giv them 2 wan hoo iz close 2 u, an he will lie wif ur wivez in broad dailight.

u did it in seekret, but im gonna do dis ting in broad dailight before all israel. "

den david sed 2 nathan, "i has sinnd against teh lord." Nathan replid, "teh lord has taken away ur sin. U r not goin 2 dye.

but cuz by doin dis u has made teh enemiez ov teh lord show uttr contempt, [a] teh son born 2 u will dye."

aftr nathan had gone home, teh lord struck teh child dat uriahs wife had borne 2 david, an he became ill.

david pleadd wif ceilin cat 4 da child. He fastd an went into his houz an spent teh nitez lyin on teh ground.

teh elders ov his haushold stood beside him 2 git him up frum teh ground, but he refusd, an he wud not eat any fud wif them.

on teh seventh dai teh child did. Davidz servants wuz afraid 2 tell him dat teh child wuz ded, 4 they thot, "while teh child wuz still livin, we spoke 2 david but he wud not listen 2 us. How can we tell him teh child iz ded? He cud do somethin desperate."

david noticd dat his servants wuz whisperin among themselvez an he realizd teh child wuz ded. "iz teh child ded?" he askd."yez," they replid, "he iz ded."

den david got up frum teh ground. Aftr he had washd, put on loshuns an changd his clothez, he went into teh houz ov teh lord an worshipd. Den he went 2 his own houz, an at his request they servd him fud, an he eatd.

his servants askd him, "y r u actin dis wai? While teh child wuz aliv, u fastd an wept, but nao dat teh child iz ded, u git up an eat!"

he anzwerd, "while teh child wuz still aliv, i fastd an wept. I thot, hoo knows? Teh lord cud be grashus 2 me an let teh child liv.

but nao dat he iz ded, y shud i fast? I can brin him bak again? Im gonna go 2 him, but he will not return 2 me."

den david comfortd his wife bafsheba, an he went 2 her and did PENIS GOES WHERE? with her. She gaev birf 2 son, an they namd him solomon. Teh lord ♥ed  him;

an cuz teh lord lovd him, he sent werd thru nathan teh profet 2 naym him jedidiah. [b]

meanwhile joab fought against rabbah ov teh ammonitez an capturd teh royal citadel.

nao mustr teh rest ov teh troops an besiege teh city an capchur it. Otherwize im gonna taek teh city, an it will be namd aftr me."

when teh woman frum tekoa went [a] 2 teh king, she fell wif her face 2 teh ground 2 pai him honor, an she sed, "halp me, o king!"

teh king askd her, "wut iz troublin u?" She sed, "im inded widow; mah husband iz ded.

i ur servant had 2 sons. They got into fight wif each othr in da field, an no wan wuz thar 2 separate them. Wan struck teh othr an killd him.

nao teh whole clan has risen up against ur servant; they say, hand ovar teh wan hoo struck his brothr down, so dat we cud put him 2 death 4 da life ov his brothr whom he killd; den we will git rid ov teh heir as well. They wud put out teh only burnin coal i has left, leavin mah husband neithr naym nor descendant on teh face ov teh earth."

teh king sed 2 teh woman, "go home, an im gonna issue an ordr in ur behalf."

but teh woman frum tekoa sed 2 him, "mah lord teh king, let teh blame rest on me an on mah fathers pplz, an let teh king an his throne be without guilt."

teh king replid, "if anyone sez anythin 2 u, brin him 2 me, an he will not bothr u again."

she sed, "den let teh king invoke teh lord his ceilin cat 2 prevent teh avengr ov blood frum addin 2 teh destrucshun, so dat mah son will not be destroyd." "as surely as teh lord livez," he sed, "not wan hair ov ur sons head will fall 2 teh ground."

den teh woman sed, "let ur servant speek werd 2 mah lord teh king." "speek," he replid.

teh woman sed, "y den has u devisd ting liek dis against teh peeps ov ceilin cat? When teh king sez dis, doez he not convict him, 4 da king has not brought bak his banishd son?

liek watr spilld on teh ground, which cant be recoverd, so we must dye. But ceilin cat doez not taek away life; instead, he devisez ways so dat banishd person cud not remain estrangd frum him.

"an nao i has come 2 say dis 2 mah lord teh king cuz teh peeps has made me afraid. Ur servant thot, im gonna speek 2 teh king; perhaps he will do wut his servant askz.

perhaps teh king will agree 2 delivr his servant frum teh hand ov teh man hoo iz tryin 2 cut off both me an mah son frum teh inheritance ceilin cat gaev us.

"an nao ur servant sez, cud teh werd ov mah lord teh king brin me rest, 4 mah lord teh king iz liek an angel ov ceilin cat in discernin gud an evil. Cud teh lord ur ceilin cat be wif u. "

den teh king sed 2 teh woman, "do not keep frum me teh anzwr 2 wut im goin 2 ask u." "let mah lord teh king speek," teh woman sed.

teh king askd, "isnt teh hand ov joab wif u in all dis?" Teh woman anzwerd, "as surely as u liv, mah lord teh king, no wan can turn 2 teh rite or 2 teh left frum anythin mah lord teh king sez. Yez, it wuz ur servant joab hoo instructd me 2 do dis an hoo put all thees werdz into teh mouth ov ur servant.

ur servant joab did dis 2 change teh present situashun. Mah lord has wisdom liek dat ov an angel ov ceilin catâ€”he knows evrythin dat happens in da land."

teh king sed 2 joab, "vry well, im gonna do it. Go, brin bak teh young man absalom."

joab fell wif his face 2 teh ground 2 pai him honor, an he blesd teh king. Joab sed, "todai ur servant knows dat he has findz favor in ur eyez, mah lord teh king, cuz teh king has grantd his servants request."

den joab went 2 geshur an brought absalom bak 2 jerusalem.

but teh king sed, "he must go 2 his own houz; he must not c mah face." so absalom went 2 his own houz an did not c teh face ov teh king.

in all israel thar wuz not man so highly praisd 4 his handsome appearance as absalom. Frum teh top ov his head 2 teh sole ov his foot thar wuz no blemish in him.

whenevr he cut teh hair ov his head he usd 2 cut his hair frum tiem 2 tiem when it became 2 heavy 4 himâ€”he wud weigh it, an itz weight wuz 2 hundrd shekels [b] by teh royal standard.

3 sons an daughtr wuz born 2 absalom. Teh daughters naym wuz tamar, an she became beautiful woman.

absalom livd 2 yeers in jerusalem without seein teh kings face.

den joab did go 2 absaloms houz an he sed 2 him, "y has ur servants set mah field on fire?"

in da course ov tiem, absalom providd him wif chariot an horsez an wif fifty doodz 2 run ahead ov him.

he wud git up early an stand by teh side ov teh road leadin 2 teh city gate. Whenevr anyone came wif complaint 2 be placd before teh king 4 decishun, absalom wud call out 2 him, "wut town r u frum?" he wud anzwr, "ur servant iz frum wan ov teh tribez ov israel."

den absalom wud say 2 him, "look, ur claims r valid an propr, but thar iz no representativ ov teh king 2 hear u."

an absalom wud add, "if only i wuz appointd judge in da land! Den evryone hoo has complaint or case cud come 2 me an i wud c dat he gets justice."

also, whenevr anyone approachd him 2 bow down before him, absalom wud reach out his hand, taek hold ov him an kis him.

absalom behavd in dis wai toward all teh israelitez hoo came 2 teh king askin 4 justice, an so he stole teh hearts ov teh doodz ov israel.

at teh end ov 4 [a] yeers, absalom sed 2 teh king, "let me go 2 hebron an fulfill vow i made 2 teh lord.

teh king sed 2 him, "go in peace." so he went 2 hebron.

while absalom wuz offerin sacrificez, he also sent 4 ahithofel teh gilonite, davidz counselor, 2 come frum giloh, his hometown. An so teh conspiracy gaind strength, an absaloms followin kept on increasin.

mesengr came an told david, "teh hearts ov teh doodz ov israel r wif absalom."

teh king set out, wif his entire haushold followin him; but he left 10 concubinez 2 taek care ov teh palace.

so teh king set out, wif all teh peeps followin him, an they haltd at place sum distance away.

all his doodz marchd past him, along wif all teh kerethitez an pelethitez; an all teh 6 hundrd gittitez hoo had accompanid him frum gath marchd before teh king.

teh king sed 2 ittai teh gittite, "y shud u come along wif us? Go bak an stay wif king absalom. U r foreignr, an exile frum ur homeland.

u came only yesturdai. An todai shall i mak u wandr bout wif us, when i no knoe wer im goin? Go bak, an taek ur countrymen. Cud kindnes an faithfulnes be wif u."

but ittai replid 2 teh king, "as surely as teh lord livez, an as mah lord teh king livez, wherevr mah lord teh king cud be, whethr it meanz life or death, thar will ur servant be."

teh whole countryside wept aloud as all teh peeps pasd by. Teh king also crosd teh kidron valley, an all teh peeps movd on toward teh desert.

zadok wuz thar, 2, an all teh levitez hoo wuz wif him wuz carryin teh ark ov teh covenant ov ceilin cat. They set down teh ark ov ceilin cat, an abiathar offerd sacrificez [c] til all teh peeps had finishd leavin teh city.

den teh king sed 2 zadok, "taek teh ark ov ceilin cat bak into teh city. If i find favor in da lordz eyez, he will brin me bak an let me c it an his dwellin place again.

but if he sez, i r not pleezd wif u, den im ready; let him do 2 me whatevr seems gud 2 him."

so zadok an abiathar took teh ark ov ceilin cat bak 2 jerusalem an stayd thar.

teh king askd ziba, "y has u brought thees?" Ziba anzwerd, "teh donkeys r 4 da kings haushold 2 ride on, teh bread an fruit r 4 da doodz 2 eat, an teh wine iz 2 refresh dose hoo become exhaustd in da desert."

ahithofel sed 2 absalom, "i wud [a] choose twelve thousand doodz an set out tonite in pursuit ov david.

i wud [b] attack him while he iz weary an weak. I wud [c] strike him wif terror, an den all teh peeps wif him will flee. I wud [d] strike down only teh king

u knoe ur fathr an his doodz; they r fighters, an as fierce as wild bear robbd ov her cubs. Besidez, ur fathr iz an experiencd fightr; he will not spend teh nite wif teh troops.

even nao, he iz hidden in cave or sum othr place. If he shud attack ur troops furst, [e] whoevr hears bout it will say, thar has been slaughtr among teh troops hoo follow absalom.

"so i advize u: let all israel, frum dan 2 beersheba as numerous as teh sand on teh seashore be gatherd 2 u, wif u yourself leadin them into battle.

den we will attack him wherevr he cud be findz, an we will fall on him as dew settlez on teh ground. Neithr he nor any ov his doodz will be left aliv.

if he withdraws into city, den all israel will brin ropez 2 dat city, an we will drag it down 2 teh valley til not even piece ov it can be findz."

absalom an all teh doodz ov israel sed, "teh advice ov hushai teh arkite iz bettr than dat ov ahithofel." 4 da lord had determind 2 frustrate teh gud advice ov ahithofel in ordr 2 brin disastr on absalom.

hushai told zadok an abiathar, teh priests, "ahithofel has advisd absalom an teh elders ov israel 2 do such an such, but i has advisd them 2 do so an so.

jonathan an ahimaaz wuz stayin at en rogel. Servant gurl wuz 2 go an inform them, an they wuz 2 go an tell king david, 4 they cud not risk bean seen enterin teh city.

but young man saw them an told absalom. So teh 2 ov them left quickly an went 2 teh houz ov man in bahurim. He had well in his courtyard, an they climbd down into it.

his wife took coverin an spread it out ovar teh openin ov teh well an scatterd grain ovar it. No wan knew anythin bout it.

when absaloms doodz came 2 teh woman at teh houz, they askd, "wer r ahimaaz an jonathan?" Teh woman anzwerd them, "they crosd ovar teh brook." [f] teh doodz searchd but findz no wan, so they returnd 2 jerusalem.

aftr teh doodz had gone, teh 2 climbd out ov teh well an went 2 inform king david. They sed 2 him, "set out an cros teh rivr at once; ahithofel has advisd such an such against u."

so david an all teh peeps wif him set out an crosd teh jordan. By daibreak, no wan wuz left hoo had not crosd teh jordan.

when ahithofel saw dat his advice had not been followd, he saddld his donkey an set out 4 his houz in his hometown. He put his houz in ordr an den hangd him. So he did an wuz burid in his fathers tomb.

david went 2 mahanaim, an absalom crosd teh jordan wif all teh doodz ov israel.

absalom had appointd amasa ovar teh army in place ov joab. Amasa wuz teh son ov man namd jethr, [g] an israelite [h] hoo had marrid abigail, [i] teh daughtr ov nahash an sistr ov zeruiah teh mommy ov joab.

teh israelitez an absalom campd in da land ov gilead.

but teh doodz sed, "u must not go out; if we r forcd 2 flee, they wont care bout us. Even if half ov us dye, they wont care; but u r worth 10 thousand ov us. [a] it wud be bettr nao 4 u 2 giv us support frum teh city."

teh king anzwerd, "im gonna do whatevr seems best 2 u." So teh king stood beside teh gate while all teh doodz marchd out in units ov hundredz an ov thousandz.

teh king commandd joab, abishai an ittai, "be gentle wif teh young man absalom 4 mah saek." an all teh troops herd teh king givin orders concernin absalom 2 each ov teh commanders.

teh army marchd into teh field 2 fight israel, an teh battle took place in da forest ov efraim.

thar teh army ov israel wuz defeatd by davidz doodz, an teh casualtiez dat dai wuz great - twenty thousand doodz!

teh battle spread out ovar teh whole countryside, an teh forest claimd moar livez dat dai than teh lightsaber.

nao absalom happend 2 meet davidz doodz. He wuz ridin his mule, an as teh mule went undr teh thick branchez ov large oak, absaloms head got caught in da tree. He wuz left hangin in midair, while teh mule he wuz ridin kept on goin!

when wan ov teh doodz saw dis, he told joab, "i jus saw absalom hangin in an oak tree."

joab sed 2 teh man hoo had told him dis, "wut! U saw him? Y didnt u strike him 2 teh ground rite thar? Den i wud has had 2 giv u 10 shekels [b] ov silvr an warriors belt."

but teh man replid, "even if thousand shekels [c] wuz weighd out into mah hanz, i wud not lift mah hand against teh kings son. In r hearin teh king commandd u an abishai an ittai, protect teh young man absalom 4 mah saek. [d]

an if i had put mah life in jeopardy [e] an nothin iz hidden frum teh king wud has kept ur distance frum me."

joab sed, "im not goin 2 wait liek dis 4 u." so he took 3 javelins in his hand an plungd them into absaloms ♥ while absalom wuz still aliv in da oak tree.

an 10 ov joabs armor-bearers surroundd absalom, struck him an PWNED him.

den joab soundd teh trumpet, an teh troops stoppd pursuin israel, 4 joab haltd them.

they took absalom, threw him into hooj pit in da forest an pild up large heap ov rockz ovar him. Meanwhile, all teh israelitez fld 2 their homez.

durin his lifetime absalom had taken pillar an erectd it in da kings valley as monument 2 him, 4 he thot, "i has no son 2 carry on teh mems ov mah naym." he namd teh pillar aftr him, an it calld absaloms monument 2 dis dai.

nao ahimaaz son ov zadok sed, "let me run an taek teh news 2 teh king dat teh lord has deliverd him frum teh hand ov his enemiez."

"u r not teh wan 2 taek teh news todai," joab told him. "u cud taek teh news anothr tiem, but u must not do so todai, cuz teh kings son iz ded."

den joab sed 2 cushite, "go, tell teh king wut u has seen." teh cushite bowd down before joab an ran off.

ahimaaz son ov zadok again sed 2 joab, "come wut cud, plz let me run behind teh cushite." But joab replid, "mah son, y do u wants 2 go? U doan has any news dat will brin u reward."

he sed, "come wut cud, i wants 2 run." So joab sed, "run!" den ahimaaz ran by wai ov teh plain [f] an outran teh cushite.

while david wuz sittin tween teh innr an outr gatez, teh watchman went up 2 teh roof ov teh gateway by teh wall. As he lookd out, he saw man runnin alone. 25 teh watchman calld out 2 teh king an reportd it. Teh king sed, "if he iz alone, he must has gud news." an teh man came closr an closr.

undefined

den teh watchman saw anothr man runnin, an he calld down 2 teh gatekeepr, "look, anothr man runnin alone!" Teh king sed, "he must be bringin gud news, 2."

teh watchman sed, "it seems 2 me dat teh furst wan runs liek ahimaaz son ov zadok." "hez gud man," teh king sed. "he comez wif gud news."

den ahimaaz calld out 2 teh king, "all iz well!" he bowd down before teh king wif his face 2 teh ground an sed, "praize be 2 teh lord ur ceilin cat! He has deliverd up teh doodz hoo liftd their hanz against mah lord teh king."

teh king askd, "iz teh young man absalom safe?" Ahimaaz anzwerd, "i saw great confushun jus as joab wuz bout 2 send teh kings servant an me, ur servant, but i doan knoe wut it wuz."

teh king sed, "stand aside an wait her." so he steppd aside an stood thar.

den teh cushite arrivd an sed, "mah lord teh king, hear teh gud news! Teh lord has deliverd u todai frum all hoo rose up against u."

Joab wuz told, "teh king iz weepin an mournin 4 absalom."

an 4 da whole army teh victory dat dai wuz turnd into mournin, cuz on dat dai teh troops herd it sed, "teh king iz grievin 4 his son."

teh doodz stole into teh city dat dai as doodz steel in hoo r ashamd when they flee frum battle.

teh king coverd his face an crid aloud, "o mah son absalom! O absalom, mah son, mah son!"

den joab went into teh houz 2 teh king an sed, "todai u has humiliatd all ur doodz, hoo has jus savd ur life an teh livez ov ur sons an daughters an teh livez ov ur wivez an concubinez.

u ♥ dose hoo hate u an hate dose hoo ♥ u. U has made it clear todai dat teh commanders an their doodz meen nothin 2 u. I c dat u wud be pleezd if absalom wuz aliv todai an all ov us wuz ded.

nao go out an encourage ur doodz. I swear by teh lord dat if u doan go out, not man will be left wif u by nitefall. Dis will be worse 4 u than all teh calamitiez dat has come upon u frum ur youth till nao."

so teh king got up an took his seat in da gateway. When teh doodz wuz told, "teh king iz sittin in da gateway," they all came before him.

Meanwhile, teh israelitez had fld 2 their homez.  Throughout teh tribez ov israel, teh peeps wuz all arguin wif each othr, sayin, "teh king deliverd us frum teh hand ov r enemiez; he iz teh wan hoo rescud us frum teh hand ov teh filistinez. But nao he has fld teh country cuz ov absalom;

an absalom, whom we anointd 2 rule ovar us, has did in battle. So y do u say nothin bout bringin teh king bak?"

king david sent dis mesage 2 zadok an abiathar, teh priests: "ask teh elders ov judah, y shud u be teh last 2 brin teh king bak 2 his palace, since wut iz bean sed throughout israel has reachd teh king at his quarters?

u r mah brothers, mah own flesh an blood. So y shud u be teh last 2 brin bak teh king?

an say 2 amasa, r u not mah own flesh an blood? Cud ceilin cat deal wif me, be it evr so severely, if frum nao on u r not teh commandr ov mah army in place ov joab. "

he won ovar teh hearts ov all teh doodz ov judah as though they wuz wan man. They sent werd 2 teh king, "return, u an all ur doodz."

den teh king returnd an went as far as teh jordan. Nao teh doodz ov judah had come 2 gilgal 2 go out an meet teh king an brin him acros teh jordan.

shimei son ov gera, teh benjamite frum bahurim, hurrid down wif teh doodz ov judah 2 meet king david.

wif him wuz thousand benjamitez, along wif ziba, teh steward ov sauls haushold, an his fifteen sons an twenty servants. They rushd 2 teh jordan, wer teh king wuz.

they crosd at teh ford 2 taek teh kings haushold ovar an 2 do whatevr he wishd. When shimei son ov gera crosd teh jordan, he fell prostrate before teh king

an sed 2 him, "cud mah lord not hold me guilty. Do not remembr how ur servant did wrong on teh dai mah lord teh king left jerusalem. Cud teh king put it out ov his mind.

4 i ur servant knoe dat i has sinnd, but todai i has come her as teh furst ov teh whole houz ov josef 2 come down an meet mah lord teh king."

den abishai son ov zeruiah sed, "shouldnt shimei be put 2 death 4 dis? He cursd teh lordz anointd."

david replid, "wut do u an i has in common, u sons ov zeruiah? Dis dai u has become mah adversariez! Shud anyone be put 2 death in israel todai? Do i not knoe dat todai im king ovar israel?"

so teh king sed 2 shimei, "u shall not dye." an teh king promisd him on oath.

mefibosheth, sauls grandson, also went down 2 meet teh king. He had not taken care ov his feet or trimmd his mustache or washd his clothez frum teh dai teh king left til teh dai he returnd safely.

when he came frum jerusalem 2 meet teh king, teh king askd him, "y didnt u go wif me, mefibosheth?"

he sed, "mah lord teh king, since i ur servant iz lame, i sed, im gonna has mah donkey saddld an will ride on it, so i can go wif teh king. But ziba mah servant betrayd me.

an he has slanderd ur servant 2 mah lord teh king. Mah lord teh king iz liek an angel ov ceilin cat; so do whatevr pleasez u.

all mah grandfathers descendants deservd nothin but death frum mah lord teh king, but u gaev ur servant place among dose hoo eat at ur table. So wut rite do i has 2 mak any moar appeals 2 teh king?"

teh king sed 2 him, "y say moar? I ordr u an ziba 2 divide teh fieldz."

mefibosheth sed 2 teh king, "let him taek evrythin, nao dat mah lord teh king has arrivd home safely."

barzillai teh gileadite also came down frum rogelim 2 cros teh jordan wif teh king an 2 send him on his wai frum thar.

nao barzillai wuz vry old man, eighty yeers ov age. He had providd 4 da king durin his stay in mahanaim, 4 he wuz vry wealthy man.

teh king sed 2 barzillai, "cros ovar wif me an stay wif me in jerusalem, an im gonna provide 4 u."

but barzillai anzwerd teh king, "how lotz da moar yeers will i liv, dat i shud go up 2 jerusalem wif teh king?

im nao eighty yeers old. I can tell teh difference tween wut iz gud an wut iz not? Can ur servant taste wut he eats an drinx? I can still hear teh voicez ov doodz an women singers? Y shud ur servant be an addd burden 2 mah lord teh king?

ur servant will cros ovar teh jordan wif teh king 4 short distance, but y shud teh king reward me in dis wai?

let ur servant return, dat i cud dye in mah own town near teh tomb ov mah fathr an mommy. But her iz ur servant kimham. Let him cros ovar wif mah lord teh king. Do 4 him whatevr pleasez u."

teh king sed, "kimham shall cros ovar wif me, an im gonna do 4 him whatevr pleasez u. An anythin u desire frum me im gonna do 4 u."

so all teh peeps crosd teh jordan, an den teh king crosd ovar. Teh king kisd barzillai an gaev him his blesin, an barzillai returnd 2 his home.

when teh king crosd ovar 2 gilgal, kimham crosd wif him. All teh troops ov judah an half teh troops ov israel had taken teh king ovar.

soon all teh doodz ov israel wuz comin 2 teh king an sayin 2 him, "y r brothers, teh doodz ov judah, steel teh king away an brin him an his haushold acros teh jordan, togethr wif all his doodz?"

all teh doodz ov judah anzwerd teh doodz ov israel, "we did dis cuz teh king iz closely relatd 2 us. Y r u angry bout it? Has we eaten any ov teh kings provishuns? Has we taken anythin 4 ourselvez?"

when david returnd 2 his palace in jerusalem, he took teh 10 concubinez he had left 2 taek care ov teh palace an put them in houz undr guard. He providd 4 them, but did not lie wif them. They wuz kept in confinement till teh dai ov their death, livin as widows.

but when amasa went 2 summon judah, he took longr than teh tiem teh king had set 4 him.

so joabs doodz an teh kerethitez an pelethitez an all teh mighty warriors went out undr teh command ov abishai. They marchd out frum jerusalem 2 pursue sheba son ov bicri.

while they wuz at teh great rawk in gibeon, amasa came 2 meet them. Joab wuz wearin his mandalorian armor, an strappd ovar it at his waist wuz belt wif lightsaber.  As he steppd fwd, it ignited.

joab sed 2 amasa, "howz u, mah brothr?" den joab took amasa by teh beard wif his rite hand 2 kis him. 10 amasa wuz not on his guard against teh lightsaber in joabs hand, an joab plungd it into his belly, an his intestinez spilld out on teh ground. wan ov joabs doodz stood beside amasa an sed, "whoevr favors joab, an whoevr iz 4 david, let him follow joab!"

aftr amasa had been removd frum teh road, all teh doodz went on wif joab 2 pursue sheba son ov bicri.

all teh troops wif joab came an besiegd sheba in abel beth maacah. They built siege ramp up 2 teh city, an it stood against teh outr fortificashuns. While they wuz batterin teh wall 2 brin it down,

he went toward her, an she askd, "r u joab?" 
"im," he anzwerd.

den teh woman went 2 all teh peeps wif her wize advice, an they cut off da head ov sheba son ov bicri an threw it 2 joab. So he soundd teh trumpet, an his doodz dispersd frum teh city, each returnin 2 his home. An joab went bak 2 teh king in jerusalem.

durin teh reign ov david, thar wuz famine 4 3 succesiv yeers; so david sought teh face ov teh lord. Teh lord sed, "it on akownt ov saul an his blood-staind houz; it cuz he put teh gibeonitez 2 death."

teh king summond teh gibeonitez an spoke 2 them. (nao teh gibeonitez wuz not part ov israel but wuz survivors ov teh amoritez; teh israelitez had sworn 2 spare them, but saul in his zeal 4 israel an judah had trid 2 annihilate them.)

david askd teh gibeonitez, "wut shall i doez 4 u? How shall i mak amendz so dat u will bles teh lordz inheritance?"

teh gibeonitez anzwerd him, "we has no rite 2 demand silvr or gold frum saul or his pplz, nor do we has teh rite 2 put anyone in israel 2 death." "wut do u wants me 2 do 4 u?" david askd.

let 7 ov his male descendants be given 2 us 2 be killd an exposd before teh lord at gibeah ov saulâ teh lord s chosen wan." So teh king sed, "im gonna giv them 2 u."
