When da kween of Sheeba (No Riba?) herded about teh fame of Solomon and his relayshun to teh name of the Ceiling Cat, she wanted to tested him with kwestchuns that were teh hardzors.

She camed to Jerusalem with lots of purdy camels and spices and gold and catnips and other purty things srsly. She wanted to talk to Solomon about what was on her mindz.

Solomon was teh smartz and answerded all her kwestchuns, cuz he was ~*King*~ and nothing was too harded for him

Sheeba saw all of his Wisdomz and the kitteh palace he built

And his foodz and teh offishul kittehs, and their robez and and burnt offeringsz at the temple to the Ceiling Cat

She sayded to King "Oh dang, wut I heard about you was truesies!"

"But I couldn't believe teh awesomez 'till I sawded it wif mah own eyez. But srsly, this is more awesomez than wut my peoples telld me!"

"You must be vair happy! And all those kittehs before you must be teh happeh too!"

"Praise be to the Celing Cat, who maded you awesomez and put you in charge hur."

She gave the King man 4 1/2 tons of catnip, sum spices, an maybe some stones. Never did anyone outdo her gifts.

(Soem d00d naemd Hiram has shipz, n dey bring goldz n moar 1337 stufz)

Solomon uses the gifts. He uses woodz to make support for temple to Ceiling Cat. He makes harps and kitty lyres for to make jamz.

King Solomon Kitteh gave this Sheeba all the cheezburgers she wanted, and then she went home.

Solomon was the favorite, so he got lots and lots of gold and stuffz yearly.

This was not even inclooding monies that he gotted from merchants and other peoples.

King Solomon Kitteh maded sum gold shieldz, a hoal lotta gold put in evry one.

He maded two free hunert itty-bitty shieldz. Den he putted dem in da Palace of da Forest of Lebanon.

Den he had maded a big King kitteh-bed wit gold on da outside.

Da kitteh-bed had sickz climber-up thingies and wuz rounded on da top. On bof sidez wuz pawrestz wit a giant lion-kitteh sittin next to dem.

Twelv giant lion-kittehs satted on da sickz climber-up thingies wit two on each thingie. No udder King Kitteh eber had one likez it befor.

All da King Solomon Kittehs drinkin bowlz were maeda gold an all da stuffz in da Palace of Lebanon were gold. Dere wuz no silber stuff cuz back den silber was not want.

Da king had bunchez of big boatz dat got stuffs along wit Hiram dudes boatz. Every tree yearz dey cum bak bringin gold, silber, big teeth and little an big monkies, srsly.

King Solomon Kitteh had moar stuffz and smartz dan da udder king kittehs.

Evrybodee wanted ta heer wut he sed so dey came around lotz.

Wen dey came dey brot stuffs liek silber, gold, dresses, pew-pew wepunz and catnipz, horsies and mulesies.

Solomon gotz alotta charyots and horsiez, rly a hole bunch an dey had dere own citee, plus sumz he had in Jerryslam.

Da king maded silber commun like fleaz, an cedar tree stuf liek hairballz.

Solomonz horsiez caim frum Egypt an Kue.

undefined

But King Solomon luvved many foriegn women, as well as teh daughetr uv teh Pharaoh: women uv teh Moabites, Ammonites, Edomites, Dionians, an Hittites--

frum teh natshuns dat Ceiling Cat sed to teh kittehs uv Israel, "Yu no can has marree wif dem, nor dem wif yu. 'Caues dey will maek yu turn yur haerts away afetr dere godz. Srsly." Solomon lurved him wifez tho liek kittehs loev cheezburgerz.

An him had 700 wifez, princessz, an tree hundred concubinz; an him wifez turneded away him haert.

Fer it wuz so, wen Solomon wuz old, dat him wifes turneded him haert afetr uder godz; an him haert wuz not loyalz tew Ceiling Cat, unliek how him daddeh David wuz.

Fer Solomon wen afetr Ashtoreth teh goddess uv teh Sidonians, an afetr Milcom teh abominachun uv teh Ammonites.

Solomon didz ebil in teh site uv Ceiling Cat, an no giev Ceiling Cat any Pokemans, as didz him daddeh David.

Den Solomon can builded a hi plaec fer Chemosh teh abominachun uv Moab, on teh hill dat is east uv Jerusalem, an fer Molech teh abominachun uv teh peeps uv Ammon.

An him did liekwiz fer all him foriegn wifes, who burnd catnipz an sacrifizd to dere gods.

So Ceiling Cat gotz pissed off at Solomon, becaues him haert had turneded awaiz frum Ceiling Cat, who can had appeerd to him twice,

an had comandeded him consurnin dis ting, dat him shud no goez afetr uthr godz; but him no keptz wut Ceiling Cat toldz him to doez.

Derefur Ceiling Cat sed to Solomon, "WTF?! Since yu no can fullo instructchuns liek Ai toldz yu tew, ai can has stealeded yur kingdum frum yu an giev it tew yur servunt.

But fer teh saek uv yur daddeh David, Ai can has wait until teh dayz uv yur son to do dat.

Oh wiat. Ai no can has stealed teh hoel kingdum frum yer son; him can has one trieb fur teh sake of Mai servunt David, an fer teh saek uv Jerusalem wich I can has chozn. LOL yea dat be abot rite."

Nao Ceiling Cat raised up a advursareh agants Solomon, Hadad teh Edomite; him wuz a decendunt uv teh king in Edom.

Fer it happend, wen David wuz in Edom, an Joab teh commandah uv teh armeh wen to burai teh ded ppl afetr him can has pwnd all teh maels in Edom

(becaues fer six munths Joab stayd dere wif all Israel, until him pwnd all teh d00ds in Edom)

dat Hadad ran awai to Egypt, him an certina Edomites uv him daddeh's servunts wif him. Hadad wuz still a littel d00d. Srsly.

Den dey arised frum Midian an caem to Paran; an dey tuk d00ds wif dem frum Paran an caem to Egypt, to Pharaoh king uv Egypt, who gived him a houes, fud, an ladn.

An Hadad becaem BFFs wif Pharaoh, an gived him Pokemons, so dat Pharaoh gived him teh sitser uv him own wief fer a wief--teh sitser uv Queen Tahpenes.

Den teh sitser uv Tahpenes waend in Pharaoh's houes. An Genubath wuz in Pharaoh's houeshodl amung teh sons uv Pharaoh.

So wen Hadad haerd in Egypt dat David maek incestous sleep wif him daddehs, an dat Joab teh commandah wuz ded, Hadad sed to Pharaoh, "Oh hai. I can has go hoem to mai countrai?"

Den Pharaoh sed to him, "WTF? Yu no can beez happee herez but wantz to goez hoem?" An he sed, "Iz happee here, but let meh goez hoem anywai."

An Ceiling Cat raizd up anuther advursareh against him, Rezon teh son uv Eliadah, who ran frum him lord, Hadadezer king uv Zobah.

So him gathurd men to him an becaem capitan ovah a band of raidahs (uv teh Lost Ark? OMG!) wen David killd dose uv Zobah. An dey wen to Damascus an stayd dere, an reignd in Damascus.

Him wuz an advursareh uv Israel all teh dais uv Solomon (besieds all teh trubl dat Hadad cauesd); an him no liekd Israel, and rueld ovah Syria.

Den Solomon's servunt, Jeroboam teh son uv Nebat, an Ephraiamite frum Zereda, whoz mommeh's naem was Zeruah, a widow, also rebled aganst teh king.

An dis is wat cauesd him to rebel aganst teh king: solomon can had bilt teh Millo an repiard teh damagez uv teh Citeh uv David him daddeh.

Teh d00d Jeroboam wuz a mighteh d00d uv valur; an Solomon seez dat teh yung d00d wuz endustreeus an maeks him teh officah ovah all teh laybur focre uv teh houes uv Joseph.

Nao it happund at teh tiem, wen Jeroboam went out uv Jerusalem, dat teh proffet Ahijah teh Shilonite met him on teh way; an he wuz wearin a nu Caturday roeb, an teh two were aloen in teh feidl.

Den Ahijah toer him nu Caturday roeb into twelf peicez. (An Jeroboam wuz all liek, "OMG! I can seez ur hrbl! Srsly.")

An him sed to Jeroboam, "Oh hai. Yu can has ten peicez, fer Ceiling Cat sez: 'Behold, Ai will stealed teh kingdom frum teh hand uv Solomon, an yu can has ten triebz

(but him can has one trieb fer teh saek uv Mai peep David, an fer teh saek uv Jerusalem, wich Ai can has choesn out uv all teh triebz uv Israel),

becaues dey has forsaekn Meh, an wurshippd Ashtoreth teh goddess uv teh Sidonians, Chemosh teh god uv teh Moabites, an Milcom teh god uv teh peeps uv Ammon, an dey no can has do wut Ai tellz dem iz rite to do, not liek Mai BFF David did.

Howevr I will no stealed teh kingdum rite nao becaues I can has maed him rulr fur lief fer teh saek of Mai BFF David, whom Ai choes becaues he no didz ebil.

But I will stealed teh kingdum frum him son an giev yu ten triebz.

An Solomon's son can has one trieb, dat Mai peep David can has lite on fer Meh in Jerusalem (kinda liek Motel Six), teh citeh Ai has choesn fer Meh to put Mai naem to.

So I willz taek yu, an yu can has ruel ovah all yur haert desiurs, an yu can has ruel ovah Israel as king.

Den, if yu does wut Ai sez to do an no do ebil jsut liek David did, den Iz wif yu an bild fer yu endurin houes, liek wut I maed fer David, an yu can has Israel.

An Ai willz afflickt teh descendunts uv David becaues uv dis, but not forevah.'"

Solomon wuz all liek "OMGWTF?!?!1" abot eet an did want Jeroboam ded. Srsly. But Jeroboam ranz off to Shishak teh king uv Egypt, an wuz in Egypt til Solomon wuz ded. Srsly.

Nao teh rest uv teh acts uv Solomon, all dat him did, an him wisdum, dey can has been writen in teh buk uv teh acts uv Solomon? Kthnx.

An teh periud dat Solomon rueld in Jerusalem ovah all uv Israel wuz forteh yars.

undefined

An Rehoboam wen to Shechem, fer all uv Israel wen to Shechem to maek him king.

So eet happend dat Jeroboam teh son uv Nebat herd abot eet (him was still in Egypt becaues him wuz hidin frum Solomon dere)

dat dey sen taxicab fer him to coem bak. Den Jeroboam an teh hole assembleh uv Israel caem an spoek to Rehoboam an sed,

"Yur daddeh maed ar yoek hevy; nao, liten teh burdensum service uv yur daddeh, an him hevy yoek dat him put on us, an we will servez yu."

So him sed to dem, "Go awai fer tree days, den coem bak to meh." An teh ppl left.

Den King Rehoboam axed teh old ppl who stood befoer him daddeh Solomon befoer he wuz ded, "Oh hai. I can has gud answer fer dese peeps?"

An dey sed, "If yu can has ruel uv dese peeps, yu msut be a servunt to dem, an answer dem, an sai gud werds to dem, den dey willz be yur servunts ferevah."

But him rejcetd teh advice dat teh old peeps gaev him, and axed him childhud peeps,

"Wut adviec do yu giev? Wut do ai tell dem peeps who sai, 'Liten teh yoek yur daddeh put on us?'"

Him childhud peeps sed, "You can has tellz dem, 'Mai littel fingah can has be thickr dan mai daddeh's waist!

An mai daddeh put a hevy yoek on yu, ai will addz to yur yoek; mai daddeh hit yu wif whips, I be hittin yu wif scougres!"

So Jeroboam an all teh ppl caem to Rehoboam teh tird dai, as teh king told dem, "Yu can coem bak on teh tird day."

Den teh king answer dem ruffly, an rejeckted teh adviec uv teh old peeps dat sevrd him daddeh;

an him spoek to dem liek him childhud peeps can toldz him to, "An mai daddeh put a hevy yoek on yu, ai will addz to yur yoek; mai daddeh hit yu wif whips, I be hittin yu wif scougres!"

So teh king no lissen to teh peeps; fer teh turn uv evetnz was frum Ceiling Cat, dat Ceiling Cat mite keep Him werd, wich Ceiling Cat sed thru Ahijah teh Shilonite to Jeroboam teh son uv Nebat.

Nao wen all Israel saw dat teh king no lissen to dem, dey sed to teh king:
"WTF? Where our shaer uv cookies frum David? We no can has inheritunce in teh son uv Jesse. To yur tents, O Israel! Nao, see to yur own houes, O David!" So Israel wen bak hoem to dere sofaz.

But Rehoboam rueled ovah teh chidlrn uv Israel who lievd in teh citehz uv Judah.

Den King Rehoboam sent Adoram teh taxman to collect tacksez, but all Israel pwnd him wif der handguns, an he wuz ded. Srsly. Derefoer King Rehoboam hopped in him car an droev rael fast to Jerusalem.

So Israel can has been in rebelyun aganst teh houes uv David to dis dai.

Nao it caem to pass wen all uv Israel herd dat Jeroboam had coem bak, dey sent taxi to brign him to teh congregatchun, an maed him king uv all uv Israel. Dere wuz noen who followd teh houes uv David, but teh trieb uv Judah onleh.

An wen Rehoboam caem to Jerusalem, him gahterd all teh houes uv Judah wif teh trieb uv Benjamin,   one hundred an eighteh thousand choesn d00ds who were warriurs, to fite aganst teh houes uv Israel, dat him mite restoer teh kingdum to Rehoboam teh son uv Solomon.

But teh word uv Ceiling Cat caem to Shemaiah teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat, and sed,

"Oh hai! Yu can tellz Rehoboam teh son uv Solomon, teh king uv Judah, to all teh houes uv Judah an Benjamin, an to teh rest uv teh peeps, sezin,

'Thus sez Ceiling Cat: "Yu no can fites yur own peeps, kthnx. Go awai to yur hoems, becaues dis is Mai doing. Srsly."'" Derefoer dey lissened to teh werd uv Ceiling Cat an went hoem like Ceiling Cat sed to do.

Den Jeroboam bilt Shechem in teh mountuns uv Ephraim, an lievd dere. Also him wen out frum dere an bilt Penuel.

An Jeroboam sed in him haert, "Nao teh kingdum mai go bak to teh houes uv David:

If dese peeps go to offah catnipz in teh houes uv Ceiling Cat at Jerusalem, den teh haert uv dis peeps will turn bak to dere lord, Rehoboam king uv Judah, an dey will pwn me an go bak to him. DO NOT WANT!!!"

Derefoer teh king axed adviec, maed two babee moo-cowz uv gold, an sed to teh ppl, "Iz too much to axe yu to driev to Jerusalem. Here iz yur gods, O Israel, dat droev yu frum Egypt!"

An him set up one in Bethel, an teh othur in Dan.

Nao dis ting becaem an invisible error, fer teh ppl wen to worship teh babee moo-cowz as far as Dan.

He maed shirnez on teh hi-spotz, an maed priestz frum evereh class uv ppl, who were no sons uv Levi.

Jeroboam calleded fer a feast on teh fifteenth dai uv teh eighth munth, liek teh feast dat wuz in Judah, an offurd cheezburgerz on teh altar. Him did dis at Bethel, maeking cheezburgerz fer teh babee moo-cowz dat he maed.

undefined

An behuld, a d00d uv Ceiling Cat wen frum Judah to Bethel on teh Monorail Cat by teh werd uv Ceiling Cat, an Jeroboam stud bai teh altar to burnz catnipz.

Den him cried out aganst teh altar by teh werd uv Ceiling Cat, an sed, "O altar, altar! Dus sez Ceiling Cat: 'Behuld, a kiddeh, Josiah bai naem, shall be born to teh houes uv David; an on yu him shall pwn teh priests uv teh hi-spots who burnz catnipz on yu, an d00dz' boenz shall be burndz on yu.'"

An him gaev a sign teh saem dai, an sez, "Dis is teh sign dat Ceiling Cat can has spoekn: Shureleh teh altar can has splittd apart, an teh ashz on eet will pourz out."

So wen King Jeroboam herd wut teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat sed, him was rlly pissed off. Srsly. An him strecthd out him hadn an sed, "Arrest him!" Den him outstrecthd hadn withurd an him culdn't pull it bak to himsefl.

Teh altar wuz also splittd apart, an teh ashz pourzd out, jsut liek teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat sed.

Den teh king wuz liek, "Oh hai d00d uv Ceiling Cat. Yu can has axe Ceiling Cat to heal mai hadn, kthnx?" So teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat axed Ceiling Cat, an sinec Him is BFFs wif teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat, teh king's hadn wuz heald.

An den teh king sed to teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat, "Thnx! Yu can coem hoem wif meh an we can has cheezburgrz togethur? Ai will giev yu soem Pokemans."

But teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat sed to teh king, "DO NOT WANT, evun if yu gaev meh haf yur houes. I no can goez wif yu, or eated or drinked anyting here.

Becaues Ceiling Cat sed to meh, "Yu no get nom noms or waetr in dis plaec, nor taek teh saem Monorail Cat rouet bak."

So him taek differunt rouet an no tuk teh Monorail Cat rouet bak thru Bethel.

Nao an old proffet lievd in Bethel, an him sons caem an told him wut teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat sed to teh king an wut happnd in Bethel.

An dem daddeh sed, "Wich wai did him go, George, wich wai did him go?" Fer him sons sawz wich wai teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat wen who caem frum Judah.

Den him sed to him sonz, "Gimmeh mai car keyz, kthnx." So dey gaev him teh car keyz an him droev off

to luk fer teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat, an found him sittin undah an oak. Den he pulld ovah an sed, "Yu iz teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat who caem frum Judah?" An teh d00d sed, "Iz."

Den him sed to teh d00d, "Coem hoem wif meh an we can has cheezburgrz, kthnx."

An him sed, "DO NOT WANT. I can no goez bak wif yuz, I can no has cheezburgrz or waetr here.

Fer Ceiling Cat toldz meh, 'Yu no can has fud or waetr dere, an you no can retunr teh wai yu caem.'"

Him sed to teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat, "Iz proffet tew, an a angel sed to meh by werd uv Ceiling Cat an sed, "Oh hai. Taek teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat bak wif yu to yur houes, dat him can has cheezburgrs and get waetr.'" (But him was no tellin truf.)

An teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat wuz all liek, "Kthnx" an hoppd into teh utha proffet's car an dey heded bak, an had cheezburgrs an drakn waetr at teh proffet's houes.

As dey sat at teh tabel, teh werd uv Ceiling Cat caem to teh proffet dat brot teh utha d00d bak;

an him cried out to teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat who caem frum Judah, and sed to him, "Thus sez Ceiling Cat: 'WTF? Why yu no lissen to Meh?

Becaues yu no lissen to Meh an eated fud an drinked waetr in dis plaec tho Ai told yu "yu no can has fud or waetr here, kthnx", yur ded bodee will no haev incestous rest wif yur daddehs in der toom.'"

So afetr him had eated cheezburgrs an drinked waetr, teh proffet offahd to giev teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat a ried bak to Judah, but teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat sed "no thnx", so teh proffet giev him a bicycel to ried bak.

Wen him wuz goen, a lion met him on teh road an pwnd him, an him wuz ded. An teh lion thru teh ded bodee on teh road by teh still-uprite bicyel. Teh lion also stud bai teh ded bodee.

An dere, tree men passd bai an sawz teh ded bodee on teh road, an sawz teh lion bai teh ded bodee, an dey were all liek, "OMG a lion! WTF?!" Den dey ran off an told teh ppl uv teh citeh where teh old proffet lievd.

Nao wen teh proffet who had brot teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat bak frum teh wai herd teh news, him sed, "Iz teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat who no lissen to Ceiling Cat's instructchuns. So Ceiling Cat let teh lion pwn him on teh road, jsut liek Ceiling Cat sed wuld happn."

An him sed to him sonz, "I can has car keyz? Kthnx." So dey gaev him teh car keyz.

Den him droev an foudn teh ded bodee thrown on teh road, an teh bicyel an teh lion standin bai teh ded bodee. Teh lion did not eated teh ded bodee an did not stealed teh bicyel.

An teh proffet put teh ded bodee in teh back seat uv teh car, an teh bicyel in teh trunk, an brot it all bak to teh city to bureh teh ded bodee, an be all sad.

Den him laid teh ded bodee in him own toom; an dey was sad ovha him an sed, "Alas, mai bruther!" (But it wuz teh proffet's fault teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat wuz ded; him no toldz teh truff.)

So afetr dey bureed teh d00d uv Ceiling Cat, teh proffet sed to him sonz, "When iz ded, den buree meh in dat toom dat we jsut put dat d00d in; lai mai bonz bai him bonz.

For wut him sed bai teh werd uv Ceiling Cat aganst teh altar at Bethel an aganst teh shirnz on teh hi-spotz in teh citehz uv Samaria, will shurleh happen."

Afetr dis event Jeroboam no do rite, but agan maed preistz frum evereh class uv ppl fer teh hi-spotz; whoevah did want, he maed dem "holeh", an he becaem one uv teh preistz uv teh hi-spotz.

undefined

At dat tiem Abijah teh son uv Jeroboam becaem sik an stuff.

An Jeroboam sed to him wief, "Getz up, plz, an put on yur faek glassez an stuff, dat dey no recogniez yu as mai wief, an go to Shiloh. Indeed, Ahijah teh proffet iz dere, who tol meh dat ai wud be king ovah deez peepz.

Also taek wif yu ten loafz, soem caekz, an a jar uv honee, an go to him; him will tell yu wat will beoem uv teh kiddeh."

An Jeroboam's wief did so; her arised an wen to Shiloh, an caem to teh houes uv Ahijah. But Ahijah no had eyesite, for him was old an stuff. Srsly.

Nao Ceiling Cat sed to Ahijah, "Oh hai. Here iz teh wief uv Jeroboam, comin to ask yu abot her son, for him is sik an stuff. Dus an dus yu shall sez to her; for it will be, wen her coemz in, her will preten to be soem uthr woman."

An so it wuz, wen Ahijah herd teh sound uv her futstepz as her caem thru teh door, him sed, "Oh hai. Coem in, wief uv Jeroboam. Niec try, but yu no foolz meh. I can has bad newz fer yu.

Go, tell Jeroboam, 'Thus sez Ceiling Cat uv Israel: "Becaues Ai exhalted yu from among teh peeps, an maed yu rulr ovah Mai ppl Israel,

an toer teh kingdum awai frum teh houes uv David, an gaev it to yu; an yet yu no haev been liek Mai servunt David, who kept Mai commandmuntz an who follod Meh wif all him hart, to do onlee wut wuz rite in Mai eyez;

but yu has dun moar ebil dan all who was befor yu, for yu has goed and maed for yurself uthr godz and molded imagez to maek Meh mad, and haev cast Meh behind yur bak--

therfor behold! I will bring disastur on teh hous uv Jeroboam, an will cut off frum Jeroboam evury mael in Israel, bond and free;I will taek away wut's left uv teh hous uv Jeroboam, as one taeks out teh trash until iz all goen.

Teh loldogz will eated whoevur belongz to Jeroboam and iz ded in teh citeh, an teh lolbirdz uv teh air will eated whoevur iz ded in teh field, for Ceiling Cat has speaked!"'

Ariz, den, and go to yur hous. When yur feetz entur teh citeh, teh kiddeh will be ded. Srsly.

And all uv Israel will be sad and stuff for him, and bureh him, for him iz teh only one uv Jeroboam who will coem to teh grave, because him iz teh only one in teh hous of Jeroboam dat Ceiling Cat lieks.

"Moarovar Ceiling Cat will raise up for Hisself a king ovar Israel who will cutz off teh hous of Jeroboam; dis is teh dai. Lolwut? Even nao!

For Ceiling Cat will striek Israel, as salt onto friez. Him will taek Israel frum dis gud land which Him gaev der daddehz, an will scattr dem beyond teh Euphrates, becaus dey haev maked der wuden imagez, maeking Ceiling Cat very angreh.

And Him will giev Israel up becaus Jeroboam committed teh Invisible Error an maed Israel commit Invisible Errorz."

Den Jeroboam's wief left, and caem bak to Tirzah. Wen her caem to teh door uv teh hous, teh kiddeh wuz ded.

An dey bureed him; an all Israel wuz sad, just liek wut Ceiling Cat sed thru Him peep Ahijah teh proffet.

Nao teh rest uv teh actz uv Jeroboam, how him maed war and how him reignd, iz writed in teh buk uv teh chroniclez uv teh kingz uv Israel.

Teh tiem dat Jeroboam ruld wuz twenty-two yearz. So him rested wif him daddehs. Den Nadab him son tuk him plaec.

And Rehoboam teh son uv Solomon ruled in Judah. Rehoboam wuz forty-oen yearz old whn him becaem king. Him ruled fer seventeen yearz in Jerusalem, teh citeh which Ceiling Cat choosed out uv all teh triebz uv Israel, to put Him naem dere. Rehoboam's mommeh's naem wuz Naamah, an Ammonitess.

Nao Judah did ebil in teh site uv Ceiling Cat, an dey maed Ceiling Cat mad with all der Invisible Errorz, moar dan der daddehz had doen.

For dem also maed for demselfz hi plaecz, sacrd pillarz, an wuden imaegz on evury hi hill an under evury green tree.

An dere were also nasty ppl in teh land. Dey did just liek teh teh ppl who lievd in Israel befur teh Israelitez did.

It happend in teh fifth yaer uv King Rehoboam dat Shishak king uv Egypt caem up against Jerusalem.

And him tuk all teh treasurz uv Ceiling Cat's hous and out uv teh king's hous; him tuk evuryting. Him also tuk teh gold shields dat Solomon had maed.

Den King Rehoboam maed bronez sheildz in der plaec, an maed teh capitanz uv teh guard who guarded teh door to him hous, carree dem.

An whenevur teh king enterd Ceiling Cat's hous, teh guards carreed dem, den brot dem bak into teh guardrum.

Nao teh rest uv teh actz uv Rehoboam, and all dat him did, iz writtn in teh buk uv teh chroniclez uv teh kingz uv Judah.

And der wuz war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam all der daiz.

undefined

In teh eighteenth yar uv King Jeroboam teh son uv Nebat, Abijam becaem king uv Judah.

Him ruld tree yars in Jerusalem. Him mommeh's naem wuz Maachah teh granddaughtr uv Abishalom.

An him wuz just as ebil as him daddeh; him wuz not peeps wif Ceiling Cat liek him daddeh David wuz.

But fer David's saek Celing Cat gaev him a lamp in Jerusalem, by setting up him son after him and by maeking Jerusalem;

becaus David did wat wuz rite in teh eyez uv Ceiling Cat except fer when him had Uriah teh Hittite pwnd to get to him wief.

An der wuz war between Judah and Israel all teh daiz uv him lief.

Nao teh rest uv teh actz uv Abijam, and all him did, iz wroted in teh buk uv teh chroniclez uv teh kingz uv Judah. And all teh war in him daiz tew.

So Abijam slept wif him daddehs, and dey bureed him in teh Citeh uv David. Den him son Asa tuk him plaec.

In teh twentieth yar uv Jeroboam teh king uv Israel, Asa becaem king uv Judah.

And him ruld forty-oen yars in Jerusalem. Him grandmommeh's naem wuz Maachah teh granddaughter uv Abishalom.

Asa did wut wuz rite in teh eyez uv Ceiling Cat, liek him daddeh David.

And him maed teh pervertz uv teh land go awai, and tuk out all teh idulz him daddeh maed.

Also him removd Maachah him grandmommeh frum being queen mommeh becaue her maed a dirteh imaeg uv Asherah. And him cut down her dirteh imaeg an burnd it by teh Brook Kidron.

But teh hi plaecs were not remoevd. But Asa's hart wuz loyal to Ceiling Cat all him daiz.

Him also brot into teh hous uv Ceiling Cat teh tingz dat him daddeh had dedicatd, and teh tingz dat him hisself had dedicatd: silvr and gold and utensilz.

Nao dere wuz war between Asa and Bassha king uv Israel all der dayz.

An Baasha king uv Israel caem up aganst Judah, and bilt Ramah, dat him mite let anyone in or out to Asa teh king uv Judah.

Den Asa tuk all teh silver an gold dat wuz left in teh treashuriez uv teh king'z houes, an had him servantz taek it awai. An King Asa sent dem to Ben-Hadad teh son uv Tabrimmon, teh son uv Hezion, king uv Syria, who livd in Dmascus, and sed,

"Oh hai. We can haz treatiez between yu an meh, liek our daddehz did, kthnx? See, I haev sen presentz of silvr an gold so yu can has bling-bling. Coem an braek yur treatee wif Baasha teh king uv Israel, so him will go awai frum me."

So Ben-Hadad did liek Asa askd, an sent teh captainz uv him armiez aganst teh citehs uv Israel. Him attackd Ijon, Dan, Abel Beth Maachah, an all Chinneroth, wif all teh land of Naphtali.

Nao it happned, wen Bassha herd it, dat him stopped bildin Ramah, an remaind in Tirzah.

Den King Asa maed a proclaimachun thruout all Judah; none waz expemtd. An dey tuk all teh stoenz an timbr uv Ramah, wich Baasha had used fer bilding; and wif dem King Asah bilt Geba of Benjamin, and Mizpah.

Teh rest uv teh acts uv Asa, all him mite, all dat him did, an teh citehs wich him bilt, dey can be written in teh buk uv teh chronicelz uv teh kingz uv Judah? Kthnx. But in teh tiem uv him old age him had fut problemz. Srsly.

So Asa maed sleep wif him daddehs, an wuz bureed wif him daddehz in teh Citeh uv David him daddeh. Den Jehoshaphat him son tuk him plaec.

Nao Nadab teh son uv Jeroboam becaem king oveh Israel in teh second yar uv Asa king uv Judah, an him ruld oveh Israel two yars.

An him did ebil in teh site uv Ceiling Cat, an walked in teh wai uv him daddeh, an in him invisible errorz bai wich him maed Israel commit invisible errorz.

Den Baasha, teh son uv Ahijah, uv teh houes uv Issachar, maed planz aganst him. An Baasha pwnd him at Gibbethon, wich belongd to teh Philistines, while Nadab an all Israel layd siege to Gibbethon.

Baasha pwnd him in teh tird yar uv Asa king uv Judah, an rueld in him plaec.

An it waz so, wen him becaem king, dat him killd all teh houes uv Jeroboam. He did not leaev to Jeroboam anyone dat tuk breathz, til him had pwnd him, accordin to teh werd uv Ceiling Cat wich Him had sed bai Him servant Ahijah teh Shilonite,

becaues uv teh invisible errorz uv Jeroboam, wich him had maed invisible errorz an bai wich him maed Israel commit invisible errorz, becaues uv him pissing Ceiling Cat uv Israel off.

Nao teh rest uv teh acts uv Nadab, an all dat him did, dey can be ritten in teh buk uv teh chroniclez uv teh kingz uv Israel? Kthnx.

And dere wuz war between Asa an Baasha king uv Israel all dere dayz.

In teh tird yar uv Asa king uv Judah, Baasha teh son uv Ahijah becaem king oveh all uv Israel in Tirzah, an rueld twenty-four yars.

undefined

Den Ceiling Cat speke was hurd by Jehu son of Baasha, and he sez:

I taked yuz from teh carpets and maked yuz Big Kitteh of Israel, and yuz wuz liek Jeroboam, bein all bad an stuff makin dem bad kittehs, an so yuz makin me mad.

So nowz Iz gonna make Baasha an his sofa get noes noms, an also yuz sofa gonna be liek Jeroboams (it has no noms).

If you go to Ceiling Cat on Baashas sofa, yuz get eeted by dogz, an if yuz die on carpet, yuz et eeted by burds.
verse

Iz end of Baasha.

Hez get put in Tirzah, and he gots a son Elah who gets to be nex Big Kitteh.
verse

Jehu herd Ceiling Cat speke bad fings abowt his dad an his sofa becuz of his Invisible Errors an makin him angry an him bein liek Jeroboam, hoo did bad fings, an becuz he gots killd.
verse

Big Kitteh Asa of Judah been Big Kitteh 26 yrs wen Elah becums big kitteh of Israel.
verse

Zimri, Elahs weely-cart kitteh, cheetd him big-time wen he wuz drunk wif too much lickers.

Zimri killz Elah next yr an becums Big Kitteh.
verse

Zimri first kills evry1 on Baashas sofa, an evry1 who liekd Baasha, an evun peepul hoo pisst on Baashas carpet.

Zimri kills dem awl.

He kills dem becuz dey all make Invisible Errors an did bad fings and maked Ceiling Cat angry.
verse

An dis all we say bout Elah. Srsly.
verse

Nowz Zimri been big kitteh 7 daiz, an peepul wuz livin too close to Gibbethon, wich bilong to teh Philistines.

Whan Israelites heer Zimri kill Big Kitteh, dey iz makin Omri, Big Fitin Kitteh, into regular Big Kitteh.

Omri an herds of Israelites go fitin.

Zimri sets palace on fire.

An now Zimri dies becuz of his Invisible Error an bein too much liek Jeroboam.
verse

Dis all we sez abowt Zimri. Teh endz0rs.
verse

Den Israel wuz in too roomz: sum want Tibni for Big Kitteh, an sum want Omri.

Omni can has bigger army wif sharper claws? Omri iz Big Kitteh.
verse

Omni rulez for twelf yeers.

Omri can has sofa of Samaria? Yup, he bais and bilds big pillow city. 
verse

Den Omri make Invisible Error, big time.

D00dz, he does all teh bad fings Jeroboam did, prain to iduls an makin Ceiling Cat angry.
verse

Dis all we sai about Omri. endz0rs.

Teh son of Omri is name Ahab, and he becumz Big Kitteh.
verse

Dis in year 38 of Asa bein Big Kitteh of Judah. Omri is Big Kitteh 22 yeers.

Ahab make even biggr Invisible Error.

He did all the Errors dat Jeroboam did, an also marryin Jezebel and prain to Baal.

He makes big cheezburger grill to Baal in his new sofa citee an prais to it.

Dis make Ceiling Cat reeeelleeee angry. 
verse

undefined

An Elikhat him clan wif Tishkite, lives in Gilyad, seid to Ahab teh bad big kitteh, "Ceiling Cat nof hapee wif yu an kittehz. him meyk no spreenkol an giv thirst in dis yeer!"

An Ceiling Cat seid toh Elikhat:

Flee meh slave-kitteh, go kitteh toh east an hyd neer bai teh small stream wotr.

Un dat pleyz yu drink in small stream wotr, an ai hav told dem rabeens toh giv yu fud.

Gud kitteh Elikhat obei an went der.

Dem rabeens giv cookies in sunryz an cookies in sunset. Teh pur gud kitteh sip teh wotr on small stream wotr.

Den teh small stream wotr now haf drie. no spreenkol in teh land.

Ceiling Cat whisperd to Elikhat:

Him catwalk to Zarephath of Sidon an der yu stay. Ai aksd a widoe slave-kitteh toh giv yu cookies.

Him gud kitteh catwalks to Zarephath an met teh widoe slave-kitteh. Den kitteh aproach teh widoe an aksd for sip ov wotr.

Teh widoe giv wotr, also cookies her giv gud kitteh.

Widoe kitteh sed toh gud kitteh, wut evr yu sed com from Ceiling Cat, ai wil obei but ai an meh onlei kitten hav flour. dem few nof enuf gud for tow ov us. meh an kitten mey starv toh deth an famin.

Elikhat sed toh widoe,pur kitteh, be nof afreid. Catwalk toh yuz kitteh basket. but meyk a tayne cookie toh meh tooh.

Becoz teh Ceiling Cat sed toh meh, dem hav famin an sufer, yuz flour wil beh enuf toh yu an yuz kitten, yu wil nof starve toh deth til teh famin wil ovr.

Teh pur kitteh went toh her kitteh basket an meyk a cookie an teh flour was nof used up. Dem has cookie toh Elikhat teh widoe an her kitten.

Teh was stil der, an dat teh word ov teh Ceiling Cat was fulfild.

One dey, teh widoe's onlei kitten got ill an died.

Pur widoe kitteh sed toh Elikhat, "Meh had done samting nof ryt toh yu Good Kitteh? did yu catwalk hir toh remynd meh ov myne invisible error an tuk meh onlei kitten?"

Giv meh yu kitten, Elikhat sed. Gud kitteh climb toh a tree an him wif teh kitten.

Him shout out to teh Ceiling Cat an sed, famin to tis land an sufer, wai tuk teh pur kitten an meyk sad teh widoe?

Elikhat leyd teh kitten on teh branch ov tree an shouted from one toh three, "Ceiling Cat wake kitten up! mercy beh!"

Ceiling Cat herd gud kittehs plea, an teh kitten wok up.

Den, Elikhat an teh kitten climb down teh tree an catwalk to teh widoe.

undefined

An it caem to pass afetr manee dais dat teh werd uv Ceiling Cat caem to Elikhat, in teh tird yar, sezing, "Oh hai. Go present yurself to Ahab, an Ai can sen rain down on teh urth. Srsly."

So Elikhat wen to present hisself to Ahab; an dere wuz a seveer famin in Samaria.

An Ahab had calld Obadiah, who wuz in chareg uv him houes. (Nao Obadiah pheard Ceiling Cat grately.

Wen Jezebel pwnd teh proffetz uv Ceiling Cat, him tuk one hundred proffetz an hid dem, fiftee to a caev, an fed dem wif bred an watur.)

An Ahab sed to Obadiah, "Go into teh land to all teh springs uv watur an to all teh brookz; perhaps we mai find grass fer teh horsez and muelz to eated, so we no haev to pwnz any uv dem."

So dey divideded teh land between dem to exploer it; Ahab wen one wai by hisself, an Obadiah wen anothur way bai hisself.

Nao as Obadiah wuz on him wai, suddenlee Elikhat met him; an him recognized him, an fell on him faec, an sed, "Meow! Iz yu, Elikhat?!"

An him sed, "Iz. Go, tell yur mastur, 'Elikhat iz here.' Kthnx."

So him sed, "D00d, wat did Ai do to desurev to be delivurd into teh hand uv Ahab to be pwnd?

As Ceiling Cat lievz, der iz no natchun or kingdum where mai mastur no has sen someoen to hunt fer yu; an wen dey sed, 'Him iz no here, sorree,' him tuk an oath frum teh natchun or kingdum dat dey cud no find yu.

An nao yu sez, 'Go, tell yur mastur, "Elikhat iz here."'!

An Ai know dat wen Iz goen frum yu, Hover Cat will taek yu to invisible plaec; so wen ai go tellz Ahab, an him no can find yu, him will pwnz meh. But ai yur servunt haev pheard Ceiling Cat since ai wuz kiddeh.

Wuz wut Ai did wen Jezebel pwnd teh proffetz uv Ceiling Cat, wen ai hid one hundred men uv Ceiling Cat'z proffetz, fifty to a caev an fed dem bread an watur, wuz dat liek invisible report?

An nao yu sez, 'Go, tell yur mastur, "Elikhat iz here."' Him will pwnz me, d00d! Srsly!"

Den Elikhat sed, "As Ceiling Cat lievz, befur whom ai stand, ai can has meetz wif him todai."

So Obadiah wen to meet Ahab, an told him, an Ahab wen to meet Elikhat.

Wen Ahab saw Elikhat, him sed, "Iz yu, trubler uv Israel?"

An him answerd, "Ai no haev maed trubl to Israel, but yu an yer daddeh's houes haev, in dat yu forsaekn teh commandmentz uv Ceiling Cat an haev followd teh Baals uv Twine.

Nao derefor, sen an gathr all Israel to meh on Mount Carmel, teh four hundrd an fifteh proffetz uv Baal uv Twine, an teh four hundrd proffetz uv Asherah, who eat at Jezebel's tabel. Kthnxbai."

So Ahab sen fer all teh kiddehs uv Israel, an gathurd teh proffetz togethur on Mount Carmel.

An Elikhat caem to all teh ppl, an sed, "How long will yuz falturz between two opinyunz? If Ceiling Cat is God, den follo Him, but if Baal uv Twine is, follo him." But teh ppl gaev no sed anyting.

Den Elikhat sed, "Iz bai maiself as proffet uv Ceiling Cat, but dere be four hundrd an fifty d00dz uv Baal uv Twine.

Derfor let dem giev us tew bullz; an let dem chooz tew bullz fer demselvz, maek hamburgr pattiez uv it, an lai it on teh wud, but put no fier under eet; an ai will turn teh uthr bull intew hamburgr pattiez, an lai it on teh wood, but put no fief under eet.

Den yu will call on teh naem uv yur godz, an ai will call on Ceiling Cat; an teh One who answrs bai fier is God." So all teh ppl sed in respons, "Dat's fair."

Nao Elikhat sed to teh proffetz uv Baal uv Twine, "Chooz oen bull fer yurselfz an maek hamburgr pattiez uv it first, fer yu iz manee; an call on teh naem uv yur god, but no put fier under eet."

So dey tuk teh bull dat dey were gievn, an maed hamburgr pattiez uv it, an calld on teh naem uv Baal uv Twine from mornin evun til noon, sezing, "Baal can has cheeseburgr?" But Baal uv Twine wuz liek Invisible Deity; him no sen fier. Den dey lept abot teh altur dey maed.

An so eet wuz, at noon, dat Elikhat mockd dem an sed, "LMAO Either yur god iz liek Invisible Deity, or yur jsut doin it wrong! Mabee him is asleep, even. Mabee yu need moar noiz."

So dey cried out, an cut demselvz liek emos, as wuz dere custum, wif knievz an lanecs, until teh blud gushd out on dem.

An wen middai wuz past, dey proffezizd until teh tiem uv teh evenin sacrifiec. But Baal uv Twine wuz still liek Invisible Deity. Srsly.

Den Elikhat told teh ppl, "C'mere." So all teh ppl caem to him. An him fixd teh altar uv Ceiling Cat dat wuz brokn down.

An Elikhat tuk twelv stoenz, oen fer each trieb uv Israel.

Den wif teh stoenz him bilt an altar in teh naem uv Ceiling Cat; an him maed a trench aroun teh altar big enuff to hold tew sheahz uv seed.

An him put teh wud in ordr, maed teh bull into hamburgr pattiez, an laid it on teh wud, an sed, "Fill four waturpotz wif watur, an pour eet on teh hamburgrz an on teh wud."

Den him had dem do eet tree moar tiems.

So teh watur ran all aroun teh altar; an him also filld teh trench wif wautr.

An it caem to pass, at teh tiem uv teh evenin sacrifiec, dat Elikhat teh proffet caem near an sed, "Ceiling Cat uv Abraham, Isaac, an Israel, let it be known dis dai dat Yu is teh One in Israel an Iz Yur servunt, an dat ai has doen all dese tings at Yur word.

Hear meh, Ceiling Cat, turn on yur hearing aid if yu must, so dat dese ppl know yu iz Ceiling Cat, an dat Yu haev turnd dere hartz bak tew Yu agan."

Den teh fier uv Ceiling Cat caem down an eated teh hamburgrz NOM NOM NOM, an burned up teh wud an stoenz an teh dust, an drinkd teh watur dat wuz in teh trench.

Nao wen teh ppl saw dis, dey fell on dere faecz, and were all liek, "Meow!!! Ceiling Cat pwnz all!"

An Elikhat sed to dem, "Grab teh proffetz uv Baal uv Twine! Doan let any uv dem escaep!" So dey caut dem; an Elikhat tuk dem down to teh Brook Kishon an pwnzord dem dere. Srsly.

Den Elikhat sed to Ahab, "Go up, eat an drink, fer dere iz teh sound uv abundanec uv rain."

So Ahab wen to go get sum fud and drink. An Elikhat wen up to teh top uv Carmel; den him bowd down to teh ground, an put him faec between him kneez,

and sed to him servant, "Go nao, luk toward teh sea." So teh d00d wen up an lukd, an sed, "Dere iz nothin." An seven tiems him sed, "Go again."

Den it caem to pass teh seventh tiem, dat him sed, "Iz a cloud, as small as a dood's hand, risin out uv teh sea!" So him sed, "Go up, sez to Ahab, 'Prepair yur taxi, an go down befor teh rain stops yu.'"

Nao it happend in teh meantiem dat teh sky becaem black wif cloudz an wind, an dere wuz a hevvy rain. So Ahab droev off an wen to Jezreel.

undefined

An Ahab can telled Jezebel wut Elikhat had dun, an how him pwnd all teh proffetz wif him machine gun.

Den Jezebel sen a txt to Elikhat an it sed, "Iz goan to pwnz yu dis tiem tomorrow, kthnxbai."

An wen him gotz dat txt, him ran fer him lief, an wen to Beersheba, which belongz to Judah, an left him servunt dere.

But him wen on a dai'z jurneh bai himself into teh wildness, an caem an sat undr a brum tree. An him prayed fer deth an sed, "Iz enuff! Ceiling Cat, getz meh outz uv here, Iz no bettah dan meh daddehs!"

Den as him sleepd unda a brum tree, suddenlee an angel-kitteh tuchd him, an sed, "Oh hai. Getz up an eats."

Den him lukd, an der by him hed wuz a caek baekd on coalz, an a jar uv waetr. So him eated an drinked, an wen bak to sleep.

An teh angel-kitteh uv Ceiling Cat caem bak a secunt tiem, an tuchd him, an sed, "Getz up an eats, fer teh jurneh iz too great fer yu."

So him gotz up an eated an drinked, an him wen in teh strenght uv dat fud ferteh dais and ferteh nites as far as Horeb, teh muntan uv Ceiling Cat.

An der him wen into a caev, an spent teh nite in dat plaec; teh word uv Ceiling Cat caem to him, an sed, "Oh hai. Y yu here, d00d?"

So him sed, "Iz has bustd mai tailz off fer Ceiling Cat; fer teh Kiddehz uv Israel has forsaekn Yur promiz, teared down Yur altarz, an pwnd Yur proffetz wif der machine gunz. Iz onleh survivah; an dey wantz meh ded."

Den Ceiling Cat sed, "Go out, an stand on teh muntan befoer Meh." An behuld, Ceiling Cat passd bai, an a graet an strong wind toer into teh muntanz an breaked teh rokz in pieces befor Ceiling Cat, but Ceiling Cat wuz no in teh wind; an afetr teh wind teh urth shuk,

but Ceiling Cat wuz no dere either; an afetr teh urth shuk dere wuz a fier, but Ceiling Cat wuz no dere either; an afetr teh fier dere wuz a small voiec.

Wen Elikhat herd dis, him wrapped him faec in him mantel an wen out an stud in teh entranec uv teh caev. Suddenlee a voiec caem to him, an sed, "Y yu here, Elikhat?"

An him sed, "Iz has bustd mai tailz off fer Ceiling Cat; fer teh Kiddehz uv Israel has forsaekn Yur promiz, teared down Yur altarz, an pwnd Yur proffetz wif der machine gunz. Iz onleh survivah; an dey wantz meh ded."

Den Ceiling Cat sed to him: "Go bak to teh Wildurnez uv Damascus; wen yu get dere, anoint Hazael as king ovah Syria.

Also yu shall anoint Jehu teh son uv Nimshi as king ovah Israel. An Elisha teh son uv Shapat uv Abel Meholah yu shall anoint as proffet in yur plaec.

An it can beez dat whoevah escaepz frum teh gunz uv Hazael, Jehu will pwn; an whoevah escaepz teh gunz uv Jehu, Elisha will pwn.

Yet Ai can has reservd seven tousan in Israel, all whoes nees no can has bowd to Baal uv Twine, an evereh mouth dat no can has kissd him."

So him departd frum dere, an foun Elisha teh son uv Shaphat, who wuz plowing wif twelv yoak uv oxen befor him, an him was wif teh twelf. Den Elikhat passd bai him an threw him mantel on him.

An him lef him oxen an runnd afetr Elikhat, an sed, "Let meh kiss meh daddeh an mommeh, an den I can has folloz yu." An him sed to him, "Go bak, fer wut has I dun to yu?"

undefined

Nao Ben-Hadad teh king uv Syria gahterd all him forecs togetha; tirty-two kings wuz wif him, wif tanks an Humvees. An he wen an beseegd Samaria, an maed war aganst it.

Den him sen messengarz into teh citeh to Ahab teh king uv Israel, an sed to him, "Thus sez Ben-Hadad:

'Yur moneez iz mien; yur hawtest wievs an dauwterz iz mien.'"

An teh king uv Israel sed, "Yu can has wut yuz wantz. Jsut doan hurt meh, plz."

Den teh messengarz caem bak an sed, "Thus sez Ben-Hadad, 'Indeed I has sen to yu an sez, "Yur moneez, yur wievz, an yur kiddehz iz mein";

but dis I will sen mai servuntz to yu tomorro at abut dis tiem, an dey will surch yur houes an teh houesz uv yur servuntz. An dey will taek all dat dey see dat dey liek.'"

An so Ahab wuz all liek, "OH NOEZ!!1!" an calld up all teh eldahs uv teh land an sed, "HALP!!! Dis man is a bullee, fer him wantz mai wievz, mai kiddehz, an mai moneez, an I no sez noez to him."

An all teh eldahz an the ppl sed to him, "LOL yu stoopid n00b. Tell him noez, an no lissen to him. Duh."

Derefur him sed to teh messengarz uv Ben-Hadad, "Tell mai lord teh king, 'All dat yu sen fer yur servunt teh first tiem ai will do, but I no can doez dis.'" An teh messangerz departd an brot bak werd to him.

Den Ben-Hadad sen to him an sed, "Teh gods do so to meh, an moer also, if enuf dust iz left uv Samaria fer a hadnful fer each uv teh ppl who follo meh."

So teh king uv Israel sed, "Tell him, 'Let not teh one who puts on him aromr bowst liek teh one who taekz it off.'"

An wen Ben-Hadad herd dis messuge, as him an teh kingz wer drikning at der HQ, dat him sed to him servunts, "Git redy." An dey gotz redy to attak teh citeh.

Suddenlee a proffet approachd Ahab king uv Israel an sed, "Thus sez Ceiling Cat: 'Oh hai. Yu can has seen teh big armee outsied? Behold, Ai will put it in yur hadn, an yu will knowz dat Iz Ceiling Cat.'"

So Ahab sed, "Bai whom?" An him sed, "Ceiling Cat sez, 'Bai teh yung leedurs uv teh provincz.'" Den him sed, "Who will preparez fer battel?" An him answurd, "Yu. Duh."

Den him mustard teh yung leedurs uv teh provincz, an dere were two hundred an tirty-two; an aeftr dem him mustard all teh ppl of Israel--seven tousand.

So dey wen out at noon. Meanwhilz Ben-Hadad an teh tirty-two kingz halping him were gettin dronk at der HQ.

Teh yung leedurz uv teh provincz wen out furst. An Ben-Hadad sen out a patrol, an dey telled him, "Men iz coeming out uv Samaria!"

So him sed, "If dey can has coem out fer peece or fer war, taek dem aliev."

Den deez yung leedurz uv teh provincz wen out uv teh citeh wif teh armeh dat folowed dem.

An eech one pwnd him man; so teh Syrians ran, an Israel ran afetr dem; an Ben-Hadad teh king uv Syria grabbeded a Humvee an tuk off wif teh otha Humvees an tankz.

Den teh king uv Israel wen out an pwnd teh tankz an Humvees, an killd teh Syrians wif a grate slawtr.

An teh proffet caem to teh king uv Israel an sed to him, "Go to teh gym an be strongend up; an prepair yurselvz, fer coem spring teh king uv Syria will be bak fer moar trubl."

Den teh servunts uv teh king uv Syria sed, "Der godz iz teh godz uv teh hillz. Derfur dey wuz strongr dan us; but if we fite dem in teh plainz, den we can pwnz dem.

So tell dem kingz to GTFO, an put capitanz in der plaecz;

an maek a nu armeh liek teh one yu lost, tank fer tank, Humvee fer Humvee. Den we can fite dem in teh plinz; shurily we can pwnz dem." An teh king uv Syria wuz all liek, "Kthnx," an did so.

So, in teh spring uv teh yar, Ben-Hadad gotz his armeh uv Syrians an wen to Aphek to fite aganst Israel.

An teh childrun uv Israel were mustard an gived fud an waetr an stuf, an dey wen off aganst dem.  Nao teh childrun uv Israel in frunt uv where teh Syrians were wuz liek two littel kittenz, whiel teh Syrians were liek 23-inch-waist-cat.

Den a d00d uv Ceiling Cat caem an sed to teh king uv Israel, "Thus sez Ceiling Cat: 'Becaues teh Syrians sed, "Ceiling Cat iz teh Cat uv teh hills, but not teh Cat uv teh vallies," derefoer Ai will halp yu pwn deez peeps, an yu will knowed Iz Ceiling Cat.'"

An dey sat der an staerd at eech otha fer sevn dais. On teh sevnth dai, teh battel wuz joynd; an teh children uv Israel pwnd one hundrd tousand Syrians in oen dai.

But teh rest runned to Aphek, into teh citeh; den a wall fell on twenty-sevn tousand uv teh d00dz who wuz left. Srsly. An Ben-Hadad runned awai an wen into teh citeh, an hideded undah a couch.

Den him servuntz sed to him, "Oh hai. We can has herd dat teh kingz uv teh houes uv Israel iz niec kingz. Plz let us wearz sackclothz around our waistz (to covr our hrbls) an ropez around our heads, an goez to teh king uv Israel; maibe him can has no pwn us, kthnx."

So dey woerz der sackclothz an roepz, an goed to teh king uv Israel an sed, "Oh hai. Yur servunt Ben-Hadad sez, 'Plz let me liev, kthnx.'" An him sed, "Him no can has ben pwnd? Him is mai bruthr, kthnx."

Nao teh d00dz were watching cloeslee to see if Ahab wud pwnz dem; an dey kwiklee graspd at dis werd, an sed, "Yur bruthr Ben-Hadad." So him sed, "Go bring him. Duh." Den Ben-Hadad caem to him, an gotz in Ahab's car wif him.

So Ben-Hadad sed to him, "Teh citehz dat mai daddeh stealed frum yur daddeh I will giev bak; an yu mai set up Wal-Marts fer yurself in Damascus, as mai daddeh did in Samaria." Den Ahab sed, "We can has a deal." So dey shuk handz an sen him awai.

Nao a certin d00d uv teh sonz uv teh proffetz sed to him naybur bai teh werd uv Ceiling Cat, "Pwn me, plz. Kthnx" An teh d00d was all liek "No wai."

Den him sed to teh d00d, "Becaues yu no obey teh werd uv Ceiling Cat, as soon as yu is goen, yu can has be pwnd by a lion." An so it happnd as Ceiling Cat sed it wud.

An so him found anuthr d00d, an sed, "Pwn me, plz. Kthnx" So teh d00d pwnd him, inflikting a woond.

Den teh proffet left an waited fer teh king bai teh road, an put a banduge ovah him eye to be incogneeto.

Nao as teh king droev bai, him maed teh king's car stop an wuz all liek, "Yur servunt wen out into teh middel uv teh battel; an dere, a d00d caem ovah an brot a d00d to meh an wuz all liek, 'Gaurd dis d00d; if him goez invisible d00d, yur lief will be fer him lief, or yu will giev meh a monees.'

Whiel yur servunt wuz busy here an dere, him wuz goen." Den teh king uv Israel sed to him, "Stoopid d00d. Yu brot yur judgement on yurself."

An him kwiklee tuk him banduge off uv him eyez; an teh king uv Israel recogneyezd him as oen uv teh proffetz.

Den him sed to him, "Thus sez Ceiling Cat: 'WTF? Why yu no lissen? Yu st00pid d00d! Becaues yu no pwnd teh d00d Ai wantzd yuz to pwn, yur lief shall goez fer him lief, an yur ppl fer him ppl.'"

undefined

An it caem to pass after dese tings dat Naboth teh Jezreelite can has a vinyerd dat wuz in Jezreel, next to Ahab teh king uv Samaria's palaec.

So Ahab sed to Naboth, "Oh hai. Ai can has yur vinyerd, so ai can has a vegetabul gardun rite by mai plaec? Yu can has bettah vinyerd fer dis one. Or ai can gifs yu munnies fer it kthnx."

But Naboth sed to Ahab, "STFU! Ceiling Cat sez yu no can has mai inheritunce frum mai daddehs!"

So Ahab wen hoem all pissed off becaues Naboth sed to him "Yu no can has mai inheritunce frum mai daddehs." An he got in him bed an wuz all emo, an wudn't eated any fud.

But Jezebel him wife caem to him, and sed, "Oh hai, y yu act so emo dat yu no eated yur fud?"

Him sed to her, "Iz emo becaues I sed to Naboth, 'I can has yur vinyerd? Ai can gifs yu anuther one or yu can has a money fer it.' An him sed, "STFU. Yu no can has mai vinyerd.'"

Den Jezebel sed to him, "You can has tellz peeps wat to do! Stop bein emo an eated som fud--nom nom--and I can has Naboth teh Jezreelite's vinyerd fer yu."

An her rote emailz in Ahab's naem, an sent dem to teh eldahs an teh nobels who were in teh citeh wif Naboth.

Teh email sed,
"Call fer teh kittehs to no eated, an gif Naboth hi spot among teh kittehs;

and can has two skankeh d00ds befer him and dey can has sez, "OMG yu talk bad abot Ceiling Cat an teh king! GTFO!!1" Den taek him out, and thrwo stoens at him until him iz ded. Srsly."

So teh d00ds (teh nobels an teh eldahs) of Naboth's citah did liek Jezebel tolded dem to do in teh emailz.

Dey calleded fer teh kittehs to no eated, and gif Naboth hi spot among teh kittehs.

An two skankeh d00ds caem out and talked bad abot him to in front uv teh othurs; dey sez, "Hay! Naboth iz no peeps wif Ceiling Cat or teh king!" An teh kittehs were liek, "OH NOEZ DO NOT WANT" an taeked Naboth outsied teh citeh an trew stoens at him, until him was ded frum teh stoens. Srsly.

Den dey sents email to Jezebel wich sez, "We can has stoeneded Naboth an him is ded. Srsly."

An so wen Jezebel gotz teh email an red dat Naboth wuz ded, her sed to Ahab, "Oh hai. Yu no act emo nao; yu can has dat vinyerd becaues Naboth iz ded nao. Yu no haev to worree abot him sez to yu to STFU an no taek yur monees. Srsly."

So Ahab sed, "O rlly?" an wuz happee dat Naboth wuz ded, an wen to stealeded teh vinyerd ovah teh ded bodee uv Naboth teh Jezreelite.

Den teh word uv Ceiling Cat caem to Elikhat teh Tishkite and sed,

"Yu can has taek a taxicab to see Ahab king uv Israel. Him liev in Samaria. Der him iz, in teh vinyerd uv Naboth, where him has stealeded it.

You can sez to him, 'Thus sez Ceiling Cat: "Yu can has killed mai peep fer him vinyerd?"' An yu can sez to him, "Where teh loldogs lickd teh blud uv Naboth, teh loldogs can has likc yur blud, tew."'"

So Ahab sed to Elikhat, "Yu can has foudn meh, mai enemeh?" An he sed, "Ai can has foudn yu, becaues you can has solded yursef to do ebil in teh site uv Ceiling Cat:

Behold, ai can has brign teh pwnage on yu. I willz taekz yur monees, an willz cutz off frum yus every mael in Israel, free an slaev.

I willz maek yur houes liek teh houesz uv Jeroboam an Baasha, becaues yur actchuns can has pissed Meh off! an maek Israel eated sin cookiez.

An abot Jezebel Ceiling Cat also sed, "Teh loldogs can eatz Jezebel by teh wall uv Jezreel.

Teh loldogs can eatz all yur ppls livin an ded in teh citeh, an teh lolbirds uv teh air can eatz all yur ppls dat iz ded in teh feild."

But der wuz no one liek Ahab who maed monees uv himsefl to do ebil in teh site uv Ceiling Cat, becaues Jezebel liek to be instuhgatur.

An him behaevd ver ebil in follwoin iduls, liek teh Amorites can has did befur Ceiling Cat can told dem to GTFO wif teh halp uv teh kittehs of Israel.

So wen Ahab herd dis, him toer him cloths an put on sakcluth on him bodee (to hid him harbl), an no eated an actd all emo. Srsly.

An teh word of teh Ceiling Cat caem to Elikhat teh Tishkite and sed,

undefined

Nao tree yars passeded an no war wif Syria an Israel. Srsly.

Den it caem to pass, in teh dird yar, dat Jehoshaphat teh king uv Judah goed to see his peep teh king of Israel, and be like "Oh hai".

An teh king uv Israel sez to him servantz, "Oh hai. Does yuz knows dat Ramoth in Gilead iz ourz, but  we can has hesitaet to stealeded it from teh king of Syria?"

So him sez to Jehoshapkat, "You can has fite wit me at Ramoth Gilead?" Jehoshaphat sez to teh king of Israel, "Iz as yu is, mai ppl is ur ppl, mai fiter jets is ur fiter jets."

An Jehosphaphat also sez to teh king uv Israel, "Plz axe Ceiling Cat for cheezburger, kthnx."

Den teh king of Israel can has calleded up all teh prophetz, abot 400 tomcatz, and can sez to dem, "I can fite againts Ramoth Gilead, or I can has not fite?"

So dey sez, "Yu can has fite, 4 Ceiling Cat can does give teh king victory. Srsly."
An Jehosphaphat sez, "DO NOT WANT! Deez tomcats not peeps wit Ceiling Cat. Do wants peep uv Ceiling Cat."

Den teh king uv Israel sez to Jehosphaphat, "Der iz still Micaiah, teh son uv Imlah, who can has be peeps wit Ceiling Cat; but ai no lieks him, he sez ebil tings abot meh."
"An Jehosphaphat sez, "Yu no can sez maen tings abot peep of Ceiling Cat!"

Den teh king of Israel calleded an officer an sed, "Oh hai. You can has coem bak wif Micaiah teh son uv Imlah kwykly, kthnxbai."

Teh king uv Israel and Jehoshaphat teh king uv Judah, can has put on der Caturday robes, sat each on him litter box, at a cheezburger place at the entranec uv teh gate uv Samaria; an all teh prophetz prophezieded befur dem.

Nao Zedekiah teh son uv Chenaanah can had maed horns uv iron fur hisself; an him sed, "Thus sez teh Ceiling Cat: 'Wif des horns yu shall goer teh Syrians til dey is ded and stuff.'"

An all teh prophetz prophezied so, and sez, "You can has goez to Ramoth Gilead, fur Ceiling Cat can has give teh king victory der. Srsly."

Den teh d00d who can has sent by teh king to coem bak wif Micaiah sez to Micaiah, "Nao lissen, dees d00ds can has agree wif each uther and sez teh king can has victory. Plz agree wif dem, kthnx."

An Micaiah sez, "As teh Ceiling Cat lives, I can sez wut teh Ceiling Cat sez to meh. Srsly."

Den him can has coem to teh king; and teh king sez to him, "Micaiah, I can fite againts Ramoth Gilead, or I can has not fite?"
An him can has answer, "You can has goez to Ramoth Gilead, fur Ceiling Cat can has give teh king victory der. Srsly."

So teh king sed to him, "Ai can has maek yu swear how many tiems dat you can has tell nuthin but truf in teh name uv teh Ceiling Cat?"

Den he sed, "Ai saw all Israel scattereded on teh mountains, as baasheep wif no shepherd-hooman. An teh Ceiling Cat can has sez, 'Des can has no mastur. Dey can has go hoem in peace, kthnx.'"

An teh king of Israel can has sez to Jehoshaphat, "Ai can has toldz yu dat him would only sez ebil tings abot meh? Srsly. Him not mai BFF."

Den Micaiah sed, "Derfore hear teh wurd uv teh Ceiling Cat: ai saw teh Ceiling Cat sitting on Him litter box, and all Him peeps standin by, on both sieds uv Him.

An teh Ceiling Cat can has sez, "Who can has tells Ahab to goed up, dat he becum ded and stuff at Ramoth Gilead, kthnx?' So one d00d can has sez dat, an anuthr d00d sed same ting.

Den a spirit kitteh caem befur Ceiling Cat and sed, "I can has maek st00pid kitteh (Ahab) do eet."

An Ceiling Cat sed, 'You can does that how?' So spirit kitteh sed, "I can has maek him prophetz lie thru mai spectral kitteh powahs.' An Ceiling Cat sed, Oh kewl, kthnx. Yu can has success, and yu can has cheezburgr wen yu coem bak.'

Derfur luk! Ur prophets be lying to yu; teh spectral kitteh can has urnd him cheezburger; Ceiling Cat does wants yu ded. Srsly."

Nao Zedekiah teh son uv Chenaanah wen naer an pwnd Micaiah on teh cheek, an sed, "Where did teh Ceiling Cat's spectral kitteh goed to frum meh to sez dat to yu?"

An Micaiah sed, "Yu can has sees on dat dai when you can has hide under ur couch!"

So teh king of Israel sed, "Taek Micaiah, an taek him bak to Amon teh guvenur uv teh citah an to Joash teh king's son;

an sez, 'Thus sez teh king: "Put dis kitteh in teh pound, an feed him tofu of afflictchun an water of afflictchun--no cheezburgrs fur dis one as him is ebil kitteh--until ai can has coem bak in peace."' Kthnxbai."

But Micaiah sed, "If you can has coems bak in peace, den Ceiling Cat not my BFF an no can has talk wif meh anymoar." An he sed, "Taek heed, all yus kittehs! Srsly."

So teh king of Israel an Jehoshaphat teh king of Judah hoppeded in der cars an droev up to Ramoth Gilead.

An teh king of Israel sed to Jehoshaphat, "Oh hai. I can has disguizez so dat I can goed to battel; but yu can has ur Caturday roebs on, kthnx." So teh king uv Israel put him glassez an faek mustache on an wen to battel.

Nao teh king uv Syria sed to him tirty-two tank drivahs, "You no can has fite wif any big kitteh or littel kitteh, only teh King uv Israel. Srsly."

So wen teh tank drivahs sees Jehoshaphat, they sed, "We can sees teh king of Israel?" So dey turneded der tanks to pwn him, an Jehoshaphat screamed liek littel kitteh.

An den teh tank drivahs sees dat dey can no has teh king of Israel, and sed, "Oh sorree d00d, kbai," and dey turneded der tanks around.

Nao a certin triggah-happah kitteh fired him gunz off at random, and him bullet can has pwnd teh king uv Israel rite in teh chest. So him sed to him drivah uv him car, "I can has maek liek tree an leaf frum battel? I has been pwnd."

Teh battel gots biggur dat dai; an teh king was proppd up in him car, lookin at teh Syrians, and was ded by evuning. Srsly. Teh blud ran out uv teh hole in Ahab where he got pwnd by dat bullet on teh floor uv teh car.

Den, as teh sun wuz goan hoem, a shout wen thru teh armeh an dey sed, "Every kitteh to him citah, an every kitteh to him own countrah!"

So teh king wuz ded (srsly), an wuz brot to Samaria. An dey bureed him dere.

Den some kitteh washeded teh car at a pool in Samaria, an teh loldogs lickd up teh blud while teh skankah kittehs lickd demselves nearby, jsut liek Ceiling Cat sed wud happen.

dis enragd teh king ov aram. He summond his officers an demandd ov them, "will u not tell me which ov us iz on teh side ov teh king ov israel?"

when teh servant ov teh man ov ceilin cat got up an went out early teh next mornin, an army wif horsez an chariots had surroundd teh city. "oh, mah lord, wut shall we do?" teh servant askd.

"doan be afraid," teh profet anzwerd. "dose hoo r wif us r moar than dose hoo r wif them."

an elisha prayd, "o lord, open his eyez so he cud c." den teh lord opend teh servants eyez, an he lookd an saw teh hills full ov horsez an chariots ov fire all around elisha.

as teh enemy came down toward him, elisha prayd 2 teh lord, "strike thees peeps wif blindnes." so he struck them wif blindnes, as elisha had askd.

elisha told them, "dis ar teh not teh road an dis ar teh not teh city. Follow me, an im gonna lead u 2 teh man u r lookin 4." an he led them 2 samaria.

aftr they enterd teh city, elisha sed, "lord, open teh eyez ov thees doodz so they can c." den teh lord opend their eyez an they lookd, an thar they wuz, inside samaria.

when teh king ov israel saw them, he askd elisha, "shall i kill them, mah fathr? Shall i kill them?"

"do not kill them," he anzwerd. "wud u kill doodz u has capturd wif ur own lightsaber or blaster? Set fud an watr before them so dat they cud eat an drink an den go bak 2 their mastah."

so he prepard great feast 4 them, an aftr they had finishd eatin an drinkin, he sent them away, an they returnd 2 their mastah. So teh bandz frum aram stoppd raidin israels territory.

sum tiem latr, ben-hadad king ov aram mobilizd his entire army an marchd up an laid siege 2 samaria.

thar wuz great famine in da city; teh siege lastd so long dat donkeys head sold 4 eighty shekels [a] ov silvr, an quartr ov cab [b] ov sed podz [c] 4 5 shekels. [d]

as teh king ov israel wuz pasin by on teh wall, woman crid 2 him, "halp me, mah lord teh king!"

teh king replid, "if teh lord doez not halp u, wer i can git halp 4 u? Frum teh threshin floor? Frum teh winepres?"

den he askd her, "wuts teh mattr?" 
She anzwerd, "dis woman sed 2 me, giv up ur son so we cud eat him todai, an 2morrow well eat mah son.

so we cookd mah son an eatd him. Teh next dai i sed 2 her, giv up ur son so we cud eat him, but she had hidden him."

when teh king herd teh womanz werdz, he tore his robez. As he went along teh wall, teh peeps lookd, an thar, underneath, he had sackcloth on his body.

he sed, "cud ceilin cat deal wif me, be it evr so severely, if teh head ov elisha son ov shafat remains on his shoulders todai!"

Elisha meowz too hoo-evr will lissen "Ceiling Cat letz me knoez taht tomorroe kitti fuud will sel 4 cheep.  Cum too Samaria gayt 4 low, low pricxes on all Meow Mix an cookies."

Teh kyng'z helperkat sayz "I no beleevs U.  Howe kan this happin?".  Elisha sez to him "Iz tru!  Butt U wont eetz ani uv it."

Iff we goez into citi wee dy uv starvashun.  So letz goez 2 teh enemi Arameans.  Mebbi tehy killz uss, mebbe tehyz doan killz us.  Dis sutuashun sux"

Wen teh sun collapsd B-lo teh horizin an it getz darx owt, teh 4 lepard kittehz goez 2 Arameanz kamp. Butt OMGWTF no enemiz wuz ther!

Teh foar lepperr kittehs wen ina tent an foun cookies an odder fuud.  Nom nom nom!  Tehy foun goald an silber bling an tuuk it awai an hidd it. Tehy also found closths an hid tehm 2.

Tehn dey meowd "Oh noes! Tihs iz guud nyooz 4 teh odder kittehs. We muss goan tel teh odder kittehs taht ther iz no armi heer.  Letz go bak 2 taown an telem."

So tehy wen back an tolled tewh gatekeepr kittehz taht teh Aramean kamp had gawn Bermuda Triangle on em: No Aramean soljah kittehs, jus ther horsees, odder animables, tentzes, bling an odder stuf.

Teh gatekeepr kittehz tolled teh Pallas kats in teh palace.

Teh kynge getz up att niet-tyme and sez to teh armee bosskats "I gesses teh Arameans R plottin.  Tehy haz a brayn thot that we R so hungary wee wil cum owt uv teh citi, an go 2 her kamp 4 fuud.  Tahts wen we getz kapchurd and tehy getz in2 teh citee."

A bosskat givs ordur "Taek chust 5 horsies an go 2 teh Aramean kamp.  Fine owt wot appins wiht teh Arameans."

Teh kynge sez tahts guud thinkin.  "Go an fine owt. kthxbai."

Teh kittehs foun taht teh Arameans can had frone awai theyr armore an odder suppleyes as tehy left.  Tehy repotd bak 2 teh kynge.

Hooray! All teh kittehs leff teh citi, and brot bak frum teh Aramean kamp all teh fuud tehy cuud carri.  Lo lo prixes on all katfuud, cookies an catsnip.  Hooray!  Chust liek Ceiling Cat sayed.

Teh saym hekperkat 2 teh kynge hoo meowed taht Elisha wld B rong abt lo lo prixes wuz put in charj uv teh gate wear teh katfuud waz 2B souled.  An hee wuz crushd 2 deth wif al teh kittehs stompin on him.

Just liek Elisha sayd wen he predictd lo prixes fur fuud.

At dis taim, Elisha sayed to da ladee (da 1 whose sons he'd made live 'gain) "Get up and wok arown, cuz Ceiling Cat has sed thar will be no cheezburgers foar 7 years." An teh ladee axt, "Why iz it alwaiz 7 of tings wit Ceiling Cat?" an Elisha wuz liek, "Iz His lucky number."

So da ladee did what da hooman of Ceiling Cat sed to do. She gotted all her familee up and walked to the Phillipines!

After seven yeerz (and thar wur Cheezburgers again, thank Ceiling Cat), she caim bak and went to da king to get her house back (becaws apparently sum squatters had started shackin' up in hur absinse),

an it jes so happens dat de king was talkin wit Gehazi, who was Elisha's survant, abowt all da neat tings Elisha was doin',

an it jes so happens dat Gehazi was tellin teh vary story abowt dis ladee an how Elish had maid people come bak liev 'gain. WOW! An he was liek, "OMG! Dis ladee rite here is da won i wuz talkin' bout! Das her son, hoo wuz ded, an look how big he iz! I remember when he wuz dis big..." an da boy rolled his eyes becuz he got dis all da time.

Teh king told Gehazi too hush so dat teh ladee culd tell teh story herself, an she did. Then teh king called a policeman an said "go run dem low liefs outta her house so dat iz just liek it wuz when she left, before da cheezburger famine."

elisha went 2 damascus, an ben-hadad king ov aram wuz ill. When teh king wuz told, "teh man ov ceilin cat has come all teh wai up her,"

he sed 2 hazael, "taek gift wif u an go 2 meet teh man ov ceilin cat. Consult teh lord thru him; ask him, will i recovr frum dis illnes? "

hazael went 2 meet elisha, takin wif him as gift forty camel-loadz ov all teh finest warez ov damascus. He went in an stood before him, an sed, "ur son ben-hadad king ov aram has sent me 2 ask, will i recovr frum dis illnes? "

elisha anzwerd, "go an say 2 him, u will certainly recovr; but [a] teh lord has reveald 2 me dat he will in fact dye."

he stard at him wif fixd gaze til hazael felt ashamd. Den teh man ov ceilin cat began 2 weep.

"y iz mah lord weepin?" askd hazael. 
"cuz i knoe teh harm u will do 2 teh israelitez," he anzwerd. "u will set fire 2 their fortifid placez, kill their young doodz wif teh sword, dash their lil children 2 teh ground, an rip open their pregnant women."

hazael sed, "how cud ur servant, mere dawg, accomplish such feat?" 
"teh lord has shown me dat u will become king ov aram," anzwerd elisha.

den hazael left elisha an returnd 2 his mastah. When ben-hadad askd, "wut did elisha say 2 u?" hazael replid, "he told me dat u wud certainly recovr." 15 but teh next dai he took thick cloth, soakd it in watr an spread it ovar teh kings face, so dat he did. Den hazael succeedd him as king.

in da fifth yer ov joram son ov ahab king ov israel, when jehoshafat wuz king ov judah, jehoram son ov jehoshafat began his reign as king ov judah.

he wuz thirty-2 yeers old when he became king, an he reignd in jerusalem 8 yeers.

he walkd in da ways ov teh kings ov israel, as teh houz ov ahab had dun, 4 he marrid daughtr ov ahab. He did evil in da eyez ov teh lord.

nevertheles, 4 da saek ov his servant david, teh lord wuz not willin 2 destroy judah. He had promisd 2 maintain lamp 4 david an his descendants forevr.

in da tiem ov jehoram, edom rebelld against judah an set up itz own king.

so jehoram [b] went 2 zair wif all his chariots. Teh edomitez surroundd him an his chariot commanders, but he rose up an broke thru by nite; his army, howevr, fld bak home.

2 dis dai edom has been in rebellion against judah. Libnah revoltd at teh same tiem.

as 4 da othr events ov jehorams reign, an all he did, r they not written in da book ov teh annals ov teh kings ov judah?

jehoram restd wif his fathers an wuz burid wif them in da city ov david. An ahaziah his son succeedd him as king.

in da twelfth yer ov joram son ov ahab king ov israel, ahaziah son ov jehoram king ov judah began 2 reign.

ahaziah wuz twenty-2 yeers old when he became king, an he reignd in jerusalem wan yer. His mommys naym wuz athaliah, granddaughtr ov omri king ov israel.

he walkd in da ways ov teh houz ov ahab an did evil in da eyez ov teh lord, as teh houz ov ahab had dun, 4 he wuz relatd by marriage 2 ahabs pplz.

when teh lookout standin on teh towr in jezreel saw jehus troops approachin, he calld out, "i c sum troops comin." "git invisible bike kitteh," joram orderd. "send him 2 meet them an ask, do u has a peace? "

teh invisible bike kitteh rode off 2 meet jehu an sed, "dis ar teh wut teh king sez: do u has a peace? " "why for you would has a peace?" jehu replid. "you come wif me nao." Teh lookout reportd, "teh kitteh has reachd them, he no com bak."

so teh king sent out second invisible bike kitteh. When he came 2 them he sed, "dis ar teh wut teh king sez: do u has a peace? " Jehu replid, "why for you would has a peace? You also come wif me nao."

teh lookout siad, "he has reachd them, but he no come bak neithr. Teh invisible biking iz liek jehu son ov nimshi, cuz he drivez liek crazy person!"

"ready mai invisible bike," joram sed. An when it wuz redy, joram king ov israel an also ahaziah king ov judah rode out, each in his own invisible bike, 2 meet jehu. They met him at teh plot ov ground dat had belongd 2 naboth teh jezreelite (nao remember, ahab facestabbed that guy.)

when joram saw jehu he askd, "u has a peace, jehu?" "how can anyone has a peace," jehu replid, "as long as all teh idolatry an witchcraft ov ur mommy jezebel abound?"

joram turnd bout an run, callin out 2 ahaziah, "HE GONNA STAB US ALL!"

den jehu drew his invisible bow an shot joram tween teh shoulders. Teh arrow piercd his hart an he slumpd down in his invisible bike.

jehu sed 2 bidkar, his chariot officr, "pick him up an throw him on teh field dat belongd 2 naboth teh jezreelite. Remembr how u an i wuz ridin togethr in chariots behind ahab his fathr when teh lord made dis profecy bout him:

yesturdai i saw teh blood ov naboth an teh blood ov his sons, declarez teh lord, an im gonna surely mak u pai 4 it on dis plot ov ground, declarez teh lord. [b] nao den, pick him up an throw him on dat plot, in accordance wif teh werd ov teh lord."

when ahaziah king ov judah saw wut had happend, he fld up teh road 2 beth haggan. [c] jehu chasd him, shoutin, "kill him 2!" they woundd him in his chariot on teh wai up 2 gur near ibleam, but he escapd 2 megiddo an did thar.

his servants took him by chariot 2 jerusalem an burid him wif his fathers in his tomb in da city ov david. 29 (in da eleventh yer ov joram son ov ahab, ahaziah had become king ov judah.)

den jehu go 2 jezreel. When jezebel herd bout it, she put on pretty fase an peepd out window.

as jehu go through gate, she askd, "has u come in peace, zimri teh facestabbr ov master?" [d]

he lookd at teh window an calld out, "wher all mai peeps in the hizzous!" and some gaurdkitties lookd down at him.

"throw her down!" jehu sed. So they threw her down, an she maed messi roadkill wen she get run over by car an ew.

jehu went in an eatd an drank. "taek care ov dat cursd woman," he sed, "an get shoebox, 4 she wuz top catz daughtr."

but when dey went out for 2 bury her, they findz nothin except her skull an her feet an her hanz an more ew.

Ahab has sebenty kittehs en Somarea. Jehu meks letrs, he sendz dem to da rulrz of da citehs, n to da old kittehs, n da cats dat protekt ahab's kittehs en Somarea.

He ritze: "Sinz yo mstrs kittehs r wit u, n you do has chariots, horsies, and u has a fortified citeh, oh and all does wepons, den wen u get dis lettr

u chooz da best mstr kitteh. Puts him on hiz daddies thrown, and u fights for ur mstrs howse.. real hardz, srsly.

But dey wuz scaredy catz, an dey sed: if dem to kings can no defeet dem, how weez gunna do it?

So duh rulr of da citeh, along wit da old kittehs, n da protekt cats, dey sez back to Jehu: "Hey, we serv u. U tell us do tings, we do dem. But we not gunna say any cat iz king. U do wat u wants, k."

So, now Jehu writz uh seknd letr (he gettin' real tired of writn, srsly). He sez: "If u on mah sidz, n do wats I sez, den u cownt da hedz of ur mstrs kittehs n cum to Jezreel so we can talks, dis tyme nxt day, k?" [btw, da cats in da town wit lotz of cheezbrgrz, dem care for da sebenty prinzcatz - dey was raisin dem.]

Wen dey get letr fom Jehu, dey kilz all sebenty kittehs, dey put der hedz in bukkits, and dey sendz the bukkits to Jehu in Jezreel (zomgwtfbbq!)

A cat goz n tellz Jehu, dey brot da hedz of the kittehs! Jehu meks dem putz da hedz in 2 pilez at da door of da citeh, until da sun comz up.

Den Jehu go out in da mornin, n he stopt, and he sez to all da cats: "U no did dis. Ya, I knows I attakd mi lord n kild him, but who kild all deez kittehs?

I telz u, n u beta here me, all dat bad stuf Ceiling Cat sed bout howse a Ahab, it gun happn. Ceiling Cat - he did all dat stuf he sed he gunna do. He do it thru Elikhat."

All Ahab famly in Jezreel, Jehu kil dem. Jehu kil all Ahab frenz dat has tunz cheezbrgrz, all catz clos to Ahab, and all da prestz, he kil dem all.. it was lolacaust. Ahab hav no one leff.

Jehu, he den go to Somarea. Beth-neked-haroin, he stopt der,

an he see frenz of Ahaziah. Ahazia, he rul Judah. Jehu sed, "hoo r u?" N dey sed, "wese frendz wit Ahaziah. We go see da prinzcats an kween mom famly."

Jehu sed, "tayk dem, but no kil dem". Dey wuz taykn, all foarty-too ub dem. Den dey were kild by da pit of Beth-neked. Dey kild ebry one.

Jehu leff, den on road he see Jehonadab, da kitteh of Rechab. He sez "oh hai! do u feelz abowt me likz I feelz abowt u?" Jheonadab, he sez yah buddie. Jehu sez, "if u be mah frend, gib me ur paw." Jheonadab, he dun dis, an Jehu into hez chariot he pulz him.

"u go wit me" he sed, "I luv Celing Cat super moar bunch, yule see." Jehu brengs Jehonadab wit him.

Jehu get to Somarea. Ebery cat in Ahab famly, he kil dem. He kil dem all. He do wut Ceiling Cat sed wud happn. Ceiling Cat, he told Elikhat it wud happn. iz tru.

Jehu mek ebry one in one playce. He sez to dem: "U knows Ahab serv Baal, but Jehu wil serv him bettah.

Calz all da Balls prafets, n all dat prey to him, n all hiz prestz, dem to. Mek sur ebrybudy here, I gots big cheezburgr... but I no eats it, I burn it fur Baal. If u no cum see me do dis, u gunna dai." But he no serios, dis big trik. Wen dey cum, Jehu gunna kill all dem dat prey to Ball.

Jehu den sed "get ebry one here, we say gud tings bout Baal now, k?". Dey did dis.

Jehu spred wurd of meet evry wear in Isreal. Ebry Baal preyer, dey cum to Baal tempul. All a dem. No mor can fitz in tempul.

Den Jehu sez to yarn cat, "brink out da yarn fir all dah baal preyers." Wen dey did dis

Jehu an Jheonadab go to da tempul, an sed to ebry one: "Mek sur no one here likz Ceiling Cat. Dis vry emportant. Dis for Baalcats only plz, thx.

Den dey made sackruf ices an lolacausts. But Jehu, he put aytee cats outsid da tempul. He tel dem "if u lets a baalcat ehscape, I kil won of u. If u miz too, I kil too. If tree, I kil tree.. "

Wen dey dun wit sackruf ices and lolacausts, Jehu sey to cats outsid tempul "Go enside now an kil all da baalcats. Mek sur no baalcat git out. Kil dem all, k?" So da cats stab dem all.

Den dey burn ther shrine

an da pictur of Baal med of rok dey smash it. Dey deestoy da tempul, and mek it lttrbox. It stil lttrbox todai, srsly, I no kid. I poop der.

So, dat how Jehu mek Isreal no hav baalcats.

But he remembr Jeroboam, kitteh of Nebat, an da sinz he mek Isreal do. Da sinz bout goldcows at Bethel n Dan.

Ceiling Cat teld Jehu "u did wut I tink iz rite, n sence u kill all Ahab's cats, ur kittehs, dey wil rulz Isreal. N dere kittehs wil rulz to, n dere kittehs wil rulz sum mor.

But Jehu no folow al da lawz of Ceiling Cat wit all hiz hert. He no stop frm da sinz Jeroboam med Isreal do.

Now Ceiling Cat tek apart Isreal. Hazaelcats defeet Isrealcats ebrywere

I mean lik, ebrywhere, srsly. Ceiling Cat not happi.

All uter stuf Jehu did, dat iz writn en Isreal kings book.

Jehu slept wit fishies an his catsestors. In Somarea he buryed. Hiz kitteh Jehoahaz wuz rulr afftur he wuz.

An wen Athaliah (Ahazhiaz m0m) fownd owt her son wuz ded, she went an pwned a hole bunch of royal kittehs.


Cept Jehosheba, teh dotter uv teh king Joram and Ahazhiaz sissy, taked Joash (Ahazhiaz kitteh), an hided him so he didn't get pwned like teh kings uver kittehs, cuz him an his nurse wuz in teh bedroom, so Athaliah cudn't find him an pwn him.


So he hided wif Jehosheba in Jehovahs place for six yeers. An Athaliah was teh top kitteh.


An then, in teh next yeer, Jehoiada bringed teh hed kittehs dat had hundrids of Carites and guards dat followed dem, an dey had to pinky sware in teh house uv Jehovah, and den he showed dem teh king's boy-kitteh.


Den he wuz all, dis is wut u gotta do: out of three kittehs dat goes in on Caturday, one gots to watch teh king's howse.


An one gots to be at teh Sur gate, and one gots to be at teh gate behind teh gard.  An pownce on inibodee dat comes neer, so dey don't break teh house.
