In teh sekkund yeer that Jehoash wuz kynge uv Israel, Amaziah becaim kynge uv Judah.

He wuz twenny-five yeer old when he becaim topcat an roold 29 yeers.  Jehoaddin wuz hiz mamacat an she caim frum Jerusalem.  Nao U knowz!

He wuz guud an didz what Ceiling Cat wantz, just like Joash, hiz faddercat.  Budd nawt like David had dunn.

Teh exxtra sacerfice plaices werr nawt removd, so kittehs maid sacerfice ther and burrn insentz dere.

Whenn Azamiah can haz kyngship, he killxx teh bad kittehs hoo killd hiz fadder teh last kynge.  Azamiah iz guud kyng-kitteh an not killxx teh sonz uv teh bad kittehs too.

Moses-bibel sez "U doan killx sonz fur waht ther fadder-kittehs do, an U doan killz fadders fur wat ther son-kittehs doez.  All diez fur ther oan sinz."

Amaziah armees went 2 teh Vallee uv Salt an killx 10,000 Edomites dere.  He renaims teh town uv Sela az Joktheel, as U knowz it today.  Tenn tousand iz bygg nummer, I thinks.  I haz 18 toes on mai 4 pawz an dat's how farr I can count.

An den Azamiah senned lettr to Jehoash Kyng uv Israel sayeng "Ohai.  Wanna fight?  I fite U!  Comm here an step acroxx a line in teh sand taht I draw. Kthxbai!"

Jehoash senz bak lettr saying "U are laik a littl prickly plant who sez to big cedar Lebanon tree 'Gimme yur dawter so mai sun can marri her.' But insted yu get trampld unner somewunz paw.

Shur yu scratch up Edom real good, an yu R all puffd up abowt it.  You can haz glori fur winnin that catfite, but stai hoam in ur own sleeping basket.  Doan mess wit me, or yu fall-down-go-boom an taik Judah wit yu! srsly! KTHXBAI bak at yu!"

Azamiah, hee say "La la la, I kan't heer yu" so Jehoash, kynge uv Israel attaxx.  Boath armees can haz fite at Beth Shemesh in Judah.

Oh noes!  Judah getz beat up, an all pwned Judah-kittehs scamperz hoam.

Jehoash catchez up 2 Azamiah att Beth Shemesh an sez "Aha! gotz yu!" Tehn Jehoash goez 2 Jerusalem an busts up citee wallz frum Ephraim Gate 2 Corner Gait.  Dat's sixx hunnerd feet uv wall.

He taiks all goald an silber bling in teh Ceiling Cat templ, an all teh bling in teh pallas.  Tehn he say "Bye Bye!" an goez hoam tu Samaria.

If yu wantz 2 knows mor abowt Jehoash an hiz othur adventurs, goez an luuks at teh Israel kynges bookz!  Obviusly!  Annywun wood know that!

Jehoash diez an gets burried with teh othur kynges uv Isreal.  Nex kynge = Jeroboam

Azamiah livvs anodder 15 yeers afteur teh deth of Jehoash.

Therz anodder book fur teh storys of Azamiah an teh othur kynges uv Judah.  We kan't incluud eberyting in teh Bibul.  It wood B too longe.

Hiz deth wuz bluddy.  Badkats in jerusalem plotz agaenst him an he runz awai 2 Lachish, butt tehy catch up tu himm an killxx him ther.

Thei putz his boddee on a horsie an bringz itt bak to Jerusalem.  Then tehy plunks teh boddee inna teh grownd long side hiz fadder-kats.

Nex topkat uv Judah wuz Azariah, sun uv Amaziah.  He wuz sixxteen yeers old an had chust gott hiz drivr licens.

Azariah put Elath bakk togedder an brung it bak to teh countree ov Judah.

Jeroboam wuz sun uv Jehoash, kynge uv Israel.  He becaime kynge in Samaria an rained fur fort-tee-wun yeerz.  Phew, a long tyme.

He maed invisible errorz, not follow roolz uv Ceiling Cat.

Wun guud thing hee didz wuz to make Israel teh saim saize as beforr.  Ceiling Cat callz Jonah sun ov Amittai, teh proffett frum Gath Hepher, on teh heven-phone an sayz "Tellz kynge Jeroboam 2 put back Israel teh way it wuz."  An thatz wot append.

All teh kittehs uv Israel wuz mizzerybull an suffrin an stuffs.  Ceiling Cat seez this happen. Same fur slaiv-cats an teh free-cats.  Nobuddy wuz helps tehm.

Ceiling Cat sayz "They iz in trubbles, an I no abannon tehm, so I getz Jeroboam ta helps tehm." An Ceiling Cat maid it so.

Jeroboam didz manni othur stuffs, like catfites wit othur tribez, an capchurin Hamath an Damascus.  Find owt mor inn teh Israel kynge buuk at yer local lie-berry.  Obvious!

in da third yer ov hoshea son ov elah king ov israel, hezekiah son ov ahaz king ov judah began 2 reign.

he wuz twenty-5 yeers old when he became king, an he reignd in jerusalem twenty-9 yeers. His mommys naym wuz abijah [a] daughtr ov zechariah.

he did wut wuz rite in da eyez ov teh lord, jus as his fathr david had dun.

he removd teh high placez, smashd teh sacrd stonez an cut down teh asherah polez. He broke into piecez teh bronze snaek mosez had made, 4 up 2 dat tiem teh israelitez had been burnin incense 2 it. (it wuz calld [b] nehushtan. [c] )

hezekiah trustd in da lord, teh ceilin cat ov israel. Thar wuz no wan liek him among all teh kings ov judah, eithr before him or aftr him.

he held fast 2 teh lord an did not cease 2 follow him; he kept teh commandz teh lord had given mosez. 7

undefined

frum watchtowr 2 fortifid city, he defeatd teh filistinez, as far as gaza an itz territory.

in king hezekiahs fourth yer, which wuz teh seventh yer ov hoshea son ov elah king ov israel, shalmanesr king ov assyria marchd against samaria an laid siege 2 it.

at teh end ov 3 yeers teh assyrianz took it. So samaria wuz capturd in hezekiahs sixth yer, which wuz teh ninth yer ov hoshea king ov israel.

teh king ov assyria deportd israel 2 assyria an settld them in halah, in gozan on teh habor rivr an in towns ov teh medez.

dis happend cuz they had not obeyd teh lord their ceilin cat, but had violatd his covenantâ€”all dat mosez teh servant ov teh lord commandd. They neithr listend 2 teh commandz nor carrid them out.

in da fourteenth yer ov king hezekiahs reign, sennacherib king ov assyria attackd all teh fortifid citiez ov judah an capturd them.

so hezekiah king ov judah sent dis mesage 2 teh king ov assyria at lachish: "i has dun wrong. Withdraw frum me, an im gonna pai whatevr u demand ov me." teh king ov assyria egsaktd frum hezekiah king ov judah 3 hundrd talents [d] ov silvr an thirty talents [e] ov gold.

so hezekiah gaev him all teh silvr dat wuz findz in da temple ov teh lord an in da treasuriez ov teh royal palace.

at dis tiem hezekiah king ov judah strippd off da gold wif which he had coverd teh doors an doorposts ov teh temple ov teh lord, an gaev it 2 teh king ov assyria.

teh king ov assyria sent his supreme commandr, his chief officr an his field commandr wif large army, frum lachish 2 king hezekiah at jerusalem. They came up 2 jerusalem an stoppd at teh aqueduct ov teh uppr pool, on teh road 2 teh washermanz field.

they calld 4 da king; an eliakim son ov hilkiah teh palace administrator, shebna teh secretary, an joah son ov asaf teh recordr went out 2 them.

teh field commandr sed 2 them, "tell hezekiah: 
" dis ar teh wut teh great king, teh king ov assyria, sez: on wut r u basin dis confidence ov yours?

u say u has strategee an military strengthâ€”but u speek only empty werdz. On whom r u dependin, dat u rebel against me?

look nao, u r dependin on egypt, dat splinterd red ov staff, which piercez manz hand an woundz him if he leanz on it! Such iz faraoh king ov egypt 2 all hoo depend on him.

an if u say 2 me, "we r dependin on teh lord r ceilin cat"-isnt he teh wan whose high placez an altars hezekiah removd, sayin 2 judah an jerusalem, "u must worship before dis altar in jerusalem"?

" come nao, mak bargain wif mah mastah, teh king ov assyria: im gonna giv u 2 thousand horsezâ€”if u can put riders on them!

how can u repulse wan officr ov teh least ov mah mastahs officials, even though u r dependin on egypt 4 chariots an horsemen [f] ?

furthermore, has i come 2 attack an destroy dis place without werd frum teh lord ? Teh lord him told me 2 march against dis country an destroy it. "

den eliakim son ov hilkiah, an shebna an joah sed 2 teh field commandr, "plz speek 2 ur servants in aramaic, since we understand it. Doan speek 2 us in hebrew in da hearin ov teh peeps on teh wall."

but teh commandr replid, "wuz it only 2 ur mastah an u dat mah mastah sent me 2 say thees things, an not 2 teh doodz sittin on teh wallâ€”hoo, liek u, will has 2 eat there own kitteh littr an drink there own peepee?"

den teh commandr stood an calld out in hebrew: "hear teh werd ov teh great king, teh king ov assyria!

dis ar teh wut teh king sez: do not let hezekiah deceiv u. He cant delivr u frum mah hand.

do not let hezekiah persuade u 2 trust in da lord when he sez, teh lord will surely delivr us; dis city will not be given into teh hand ov teh king ov assyria.

"do not listen 2 hezekiah. Dis ar teh wut teh king ov assyria sez: mak peace wif me an come out 2 me. Den evry wan ov u will eat frum his own vine an fig tree an drink watr frum his own cistern,

til i come an taek u 2 land liek ur own, land ov grain an new wine, land ov bread an vineyardz, land ov oliv treez an honey. Choose life an not death! 
"do not listen 2 hezekiah, 4 he iz misleadin u when he sez, teh lord will delivr us.

has teh ceilin cat ov any nashun evr deliverd his land frum teh hand ov teh king ov assyria?

wer r teh godz ov hamath an arpad? Wer r teh godz ov sefarvaim, hena an ivvah? Has they rescud samaria frum mah hand?

hoo ov all teh godz ov thees countriez has been able 2 save his land frum me? How den can teh lord delivr jerusalem frum mah hand?"

undefined

den teh king calld togethr all teh elders ov judah an jerusalem.

he went up 2 teh temple ov teh lord wif teh peeps ov judah, teh inhabitants ov jerusalem, teh priests an teh profets - all teh peeps frum teh least 2 teh greatest. He read in their hearin all teh werdz ov teh book ov teh covenant, which had been findz in da temple ov teh lord.

teh king stood by teh pillar an renewd teh covenant in da presence ov teh lord - 2 follow teh lord an keep his commandz, statutez an decreez wif all his hart an all his soul, thus confirmin teh werdz ov teh covenant written in dis book. Den all teh peeps pledgd themselvez 2 teh covenant.

teh king orderd hilkiah teh high priest, teh priests next in rank an teh doorkeepers 2 remoov frum teh temple ov teh lord all teh articlez made 4 baal an asherah an all teh starry hosts. He burnd them outside jerusalem in da fieldz ov teh kidron valley an took teh ashez 2 bethel.

he did away wif teh idolatrous priests appointd by teh kings ov judah 2 burn incense on teh high placez ov teh towns ov judah an on dose around jerusalem - dose hoo burnd incense 2 baal, 2 teh sun an moon, 2 teh constellashuns an 2 all teh starry hosts.

he took teh asherah pole frum teh temple ov teh lord 2 teh kidron valley outside jerusalem an burnd it thar. He ground it 2 powdr an scatterd teh dust ovar teh gravez ov teh common peeps.

he also tore down teh quarters ov teh male shrine prostitutez dat wuz in da temple ov teh lord, teh quarters wer women did weavin 4 asherah.

josiah brought all teh priests frum teh towns ov judah an desecratd teh high placez, frum geba 2 beersheba, wer teh priests had burnd incense. He broke down teh gateway at teh entrance ov teh gate ov joshua, teh city governor, which wuz on teh left ov teh city gate.

although teh priests ov teh high placez did not serve at teh altar ov teh lord in jerusalem, they eatd unleavend bread wif their fellow priests.

he desecratd tofeth, which wuz in da valley ov ben hinnom, so no wan cud use it 2 sacrifice their son or daughtr in da fire 2 molek.

he removd frum teh entrance 2 teh temple ov teh lord teh horsez dat teh kings ov judah had dedicatd 2 teh sun. They wuz in da court [a] near teh room ov an offishul namd nathan-melek. Josiah den burnd teh chariots dedicatd 2 teh sun.

he pulld down teh altars teh kings ov judah had erectd on teh roof near teh uppr room ov ahaz, an teh altars manaseh had built in da 2 courts ov teh temple ov teh lord. He removd them frum thar, smashd them 2 piecez an threw teh rubble into teh kidron valley.

teh king also desecratd teh high placez dat wuz east ov jerusalem on teh south ov teh hill ov corrupshun - teh onez solomon king ov israel had built 4 ashtoreth teh vile goddes ov teh sidonianz, 4 chemosh teh vile ceilin cat ov moab, an 4 molek teh detestable ceilin cat ov teh peeps ov ammon.

josiah smashd teh sacrd stonez an cut down teh asherah polez an coverd teh siets wif hooman bonez.

even teh altar at bethel, teh high place made by jeroboam son ov nebat, hoo had causd israel 2 sinâ€”even dat altar an high place he demolishd. He burnd teh high place an ground it 2 powdr, an burnd teh asherah pole also.

den josiah lookd around, an when he saw teh tombs dat wuz thar on teh hillside, he had teh bonez removd frum them an burnd on teh altar 2 defile it, in accordance wif teh werd ov teh lord proclaimd by teh man ov ceilin cat hoo foretold thees things.

teh king askd, "wut iz dat tombstone i c?" 
Teh peeps ov teh city sed, "it markz teh tomb ov teh man ov ceilin cat hoo came frum judah an pronouncd against teh altar ov bethel teh vry things u has dun 2 it."

"leef it alone," he sed. "doan let anyone disturb his bonez." so they spard his bonez an dose ov teh profet hoo had come frum samaria.

jus as he had dun at bethel, josiah removd all teh shrinez at teh high placez dat teh kings ov israel had built in da towns ov samaria an dat had arousd teh lordz angr.

josiah slaughterd all teh priests ov dose high placez on teh altars an burnd hooman bonez on them. Den he went bak 2 jerusalem.

teh king gaev dis ordr 2 all teh peeps: "celebrate teh pasovr 2 teh lord ur ceilin cat, as it written in dis book ov teh covenant."

neithr in da dais ov teh judgez hoo led israel nor in da dais ov teh kings ov israel an teh kings ov judah had any such pasovr been observd.

but in da eighteenth yer ov king josiah, dis pasovr wuz celebratd 2 teh lord in jerusalem.

furthermore, josiah got rid ov teh mediums an spiritists, teh haushold godz, teh idols an all teh othr detestable things seen in judah an jerusalem. Dis he did 2 fulfill teh requirements ov teh law written in da book dat hilkiah teh priest had discoverd in da temple ov teh lord.

neithr before nor aftr josiah wuz thar king liek him hoo turnd 2 teh lord as he did ”wif all his hart an wif all his soul an wif all his strength, in accordance wif all teh law ov mosez.

nevertheles, teh lord did not turn away frum teh heat ov his fierce angr, which burnd against judah cuz ov all dat manaseh had dun 2 arouse his angr.

so teh lord sed, "im gonna remoov judah also frum mah presence as i removd israel, an im gonna reject jerusalem, teh city i chose, an dis temple, bout which i sed, thar shall mah naym be. [b]"

as 4 da othr events ov josiahs reign, an all he did, r they not written in da book ov teh annals ov teh kings ov judah?

while josiah wuz king, faraoh necho king ov egypt went up 2 teh eufratez rivr 2 halp teh king ov assyria. King josiah marchd out 2 meet him in battle, but necho facd him an killd him at megiddo.

josiahs servants brought his body in chariot frum megiddo 2 jerusalem an burid him in his own tomb. An teh peeps ov teh land took jehoahaz son ov josiah an anointd him an made him king in place ov his fathr.

jehoahaz wuz twenty-3 yeers old when he became king, an he reignd in jerusalem 3 months. His mommys naym wuz hamutal daughtr ov jeremiah; she wuz frum libnah.

he did evil in da eyez ov teh lord, jus as his predecesors had dun.

faraoh necho put him in chains at riblah in da land ov hamath so dat he mite not reign in jerusalem, an he imposd on judah levy ov hundrd talents [c] ov silvr an talent [d] ov gold.

faraoh necho made eliakim son ov josiah king in place ov his fathr josiah an changd eliakims naym 2 jehoiakim. But he took jehoahaz an carrid him off 2 egypt, an thar he did.

jehoiakim paid faraoh necho teh silvr an gold he demandd. In ordr 2 do so, he taxd teh land an egsaktd teh silvr an gold frum teh peeps ov teh land accordin 2 their assesments.

jehoiakim wuz twenty-5 yeers old when he became king, an he reignd in jerusalem eleven yeers. His mommys naym wuz zebidah daughtr ov pedaiah; she wuz frum rumah.

undefined

So in da ninth yer ov zedekiahs reign, on teh tenth dai ov teh tenth month, nebuchadnezzar king ov babylon marchd against jerusalem wif his whole army. He encampd outside teh city an built siege werkz all around it.

Teh city wuz kept undr siege til teh eleventh yer ov king zedekiah.

Bye teh ninth dai ov teh fourth [a] month teh famine in da city had become so severe dat thar wuz no fud 4 da peeps 2 eat.

Den teh city wall wuz brokd thru, an teh whole army fld at nite thru teh gate tween teh 2 walls near teh kings garden, though teh babylonianz [b] wuz surroundin teh city. They fld toward teh arabah, [c]

Butt teh babylonian [d] army pursud teh king an overtook him in da plains ov jericho. All his soldiers wuz separatd frum him an scatterd,

An he wuz capturd. He wuz taken 2 teh king ov babylon at riblah, wer sentence wuz pronouncd on him.

They killd teh sons ov zedekiah before his eyez. Den they put out his eyez, bound him wif bronze shacklez an took him 2 babylon.

0n teh seventh dai ov teh fifth month, in da nineteenth yer ov nebuchadnezzar king ov babylon, nebuzaradan commandr ov teh imperial guard, an offishul ov teh king ov babylon, came 2 jerusalem.

He set fire 2 teh temple ov teh lord, teh royal palace an all teh haus ov jerusalem. Evry important buildin he burnd down.

Teh whole babylonian army, undr teh commandr ov teh imperial guard, broke down teh walls around jerusalem.

Nebuzaradan teh commandr ov teh guard carrid into exile teh peeps hoo remaind in da city, along wif teh rest ov teh populace an dose hoo had gone ovar 2 teh king ov babylon.

Butt teh commandr left behind sum ov teh poorest peeps ov teh land 2 werk teh vineyardz an fieldz.

Teh babylonianz broke up teh bronze pillars, teh movable standz an teh bronze sea dat wuz at teh temple ov teh lord an they carrid teh bronze 2 babylon.

Tthey also took away teh pots, shovels, wick trimmers, dishez an all teh bronze articlez usd in da temple service.

Teh commandr ov teh imperial guard took away teh censers an sprinklin bowls - all dat wuz made ov pure gold or silvr.

Teh bronze frum teh 2 pillars, teh sea an teh movable standz, which solomon had made 4 da temple ov teh lord, wuz moar than cud be weighd.

Each pillar wuz twenty-7 feet [e] high. Teh bronze capital on top ov wan pillar wuz 4 an half feet [f] high an wuz decoratd wif network an pomegranatez ov bronze all around. Teh othr pillar, wif itz network, wuz similar.

Teh commandr ov teh guard took as prisoners seraiah teh chief priest, zefaniah teh priest next in rank an teh 3 doorkeepers.

Ov dose still in da city, he took teh officr in charge ov teh fightin doodz an 5 royal advisers. He also took teh secretary hoo wuz chief officr in charge ov conscriptin teh peeps ov teh land an sixty ov his doodz hoo wuz findz in da city.

Nebuzaradan teh commandr took them all an brought them 2 teh king ov babylon at riblah.

Thar at riblah, in da land ov hamath, teh king had them executd. 
So judah went into captivity, away frum her land.

Nebuchadnezzar king ov babylon appointd gedaliah son ov ahikam, teh son ov shafan, 2 be ovar teh peeps he had left behind in judah.

When all teh army officers an their doodz herd dat teh king ov babylon had appointd gedaliah as governor, they came 2 gedaliah at mizpah - ishmael son ov nethaniah, johanan son ov kareah, seraiah son ov tanhumeth teh netofathite, jaazaniah teh son ov teh maacathite, an their doodz.

Gedaliah took an oath 2 reasure them an their doodz. "do not be afraid ov teh babylonian officials," he sed. "settle down in da land an serve teh king ov babylon, an it will go well wif u."

In da seventh month, howevr, ishmael son ov nethaniah, teh son ov elishama, hoo wuz ov royal blood, came wif 10 doodz an assasinatd gedaliah an also teh doodz ov judah an teh babylonianz hoo wuz wif him at mizpah.

At dis, all teh peeps frum teh least 2 teh greatest, togethr wif teh army officers, fld 2 egypt 4 fear ov teh babylonianz.

In da thirty-seventh yer ov teh exile ov jehoiachin king ov judah, in da yer evil-merodach [g] became king ov babylon, he releasd jehoiachin frum prison on teh twenty-seventh dai ov teh twelfth month.

He spoke kindly 2 him an gaev him seat ov honor highr than dose ov teh othr kings hoo wuz wif him in babylon.

So jehoiachin put aside his prison clothez an 4 da rest ov his life eatd regularly at teh kings table.

Teh sons ov dishan :
Uz an aran. Teh rulers ov edom

thees wuz teh kings hoo reignd in edom before any israelite king reignd  :
Bela son ov beor, whose city wuz namd dinhabah.

when bela did, jobab son ov zerah frum bozrah succeedd him as king.

when jobab did, husham frum teh land ov teh temanitez succeedd him as king.

when husham did, hadad son ov bedad, hoo defeatd midian in da country ov moab, succeedd him as king. His city wuz namd avith.

when hadad did, samlah frum masrekah succeedd him as king.

when samlah did, shaul frum rehoboth on teh rivr succeedd him as king.

when shaul did, baal-hanan son ov acbor succeedd him as king.

when baal-hanan did, hadad succeedd him as king. His city wuz namd pau,  an his wifez naym wuz mehetabel daughtr ov matrd, teh daughtr ov me-zahab.

hadad also did.

Dese be teh kittehs ov Israel; Reubnez, Simenoz, Leviz Jeanz, n Judhaz, Issachraz, n Zebulunz

Danz, Josephes, n Benjaminz, Naphtaliahz, Gnadz, n Usherz

Teh kittehs of Judhaz; Erz, n Onanz, , Shelhaz: thoz tree wuz fum teh kitteh of Shuaz teh Canaanitezzz. An Erz, teh fust-kitteh of Judhaz, wuz EBIL in teh c-ing of teh all-cing Ceiling Cat, an he sniped himz.

Tamarz hims kitteh-in-law bornz himz Pharze n Zerhazz. All teh kittehs of Judhaz were five and pwetty leetz.

Teh kittehs uf Pharzez; Hezronzz, and Hamulz.

Teh kittehs of Zerah; Zimriz, Ethannz, Hemanz, Calcoolz and Dardaz. Dey wuz five kittehs! Lolz.

Teh kitteh ob Catmiz; Achar, who waz in ur temples, stealin ur devoted thingz.

Teh kitteh uv Ethannz; Azariahhhhhhhh!

Teh kittehs Hezronzz wuz Jerahmeelz, Ram n Calebz.

Ram has beens teh fathah of Amminadabz, and Amminadabz the fathah ov Nahshonz, whoo bez teh pwnzor leeder of teh Judah peeps.

Nahshonz have Salmon (Ceiling Cat favrit!), Salmon hav kid Boazz,

Boazz have kid Obed an Obed hav kid Jesse.

Den Jesse can has Eliab n Abinadab n Shimea

n Nethanel n Raddai

n Ozem n David (David iz teh pwnzors).

Thoz kittehs can has sissers Zeruiah n Abigail. Zeruiah hav kittehs Abishai, Joab, n Asahel.

Abigail bez mudder uv Amasa, hoo hav fathah Jether teh Ishmaelite.

n den Calebz, Hezronzzs kitteh, had kittehs with Azubah and Jerioth.  Thear kittehs wer Jesher, Shobab, n Ardon.

Azubah died, n Caleb had a kitteh with Ephrath (teh pmp!) namd Hur.

n Hur wuz dady ov Uri, n Uri dady ov Bezaleel.

n den Hezron maried Machir, whose dady wuz Gileads dady, n wen Hezron wuz 60, Machir n him maed a baby namd Segub.

Segub had kid Jair, n he ownd 23 cities in Gilead's place.

n so Jairs towns combind wiht Kenaths n Geshur n Aram maed 60.  All dese wer ownd by kittehs ob Machir, Gileads dady.

n den Hezron wuz ded in Calbe-ephratah, den his wife Abiah had his kid Ashur, who wuz teh dady ob Tekoa.

Hezrons first kitteh, Jerahmeel, had kid Ram, den Bunah, n Oren, n Ozem, n Ahijah.

Jerahmeel haz lady kat naemd Atarah and together they haz kid Onam.

Ram (first kitteh of Jerahmeel) haz kidz Maaz n Jamin n Eker.

An' Onams kittehs wuz Shammai n Jada. n Shammais kittehs wuz Nadab n Abishur.

n Abishurz wife wuz Abihail, n dey maed babeez Ahban n Molid.

n Nadabs kitttehs wuz Seled n Appaim, but Seled died b4 he has had kittehs.

n Ishi wuz Appaims kitteh.  n Ishis kitteh wuz Sheshan.  n Sheshans Ahlai.

n Shammais bruders, Jadas, wuz Jonathan n Jether, but Jether died young n has no kittehs.

n Jonathan had kid Peleth n Zaza.  All dese be deh kittehs ob Jerahmeel.

Nao Sheshan no had kittehs, had dautr kittehs. n Sheshan had srvnt (Egyptian dood LOL), Jarha.

Sheshan giv him dautr kitteh to Jarha to mery, n her maed Attai.

Attais kitteh wuz Nathan, Nathans kitteh wuz Zabad,

Zabads kitteh wuz Ephlal, Ephlals kitteh wuz Obed,

Obeds kitteh wuz Jehu, Jehus kitteh wuz Arariah

Azariahs kitteh wuz Helez, Helezs kitteh wuz Eleasah,

Eleasahs kitteh wuz Sismai, Sismais kitteh wuz Shallum

Shallums kitteh wuz Jekamiah, n Jekamiahs kitteh wuz Elishama. Dey wer da Caleb Clan.

Snsz of Caleb, bros to Jerahmeel: Mesha wuz frstbrn kitteh of Ziph, his kitteh wuz Mareshah n his kitteh wuz Hebron.

Snsz of Hebron: Korah, Tappuah, Rekem n Shema.

Shemas kitteh wuz Raham, Rahams kitteh wuz Jorkeam. Rekems kitteh wuz Shammai.

Teh kitteh of Shammai wuz Maon, n Maons kitteh wuz Beth Zur.

Calebs konkubyn Ephah wuz Haran n Moza n Gazezses mom.

Jahdaisz kittehs wuz Regem n Jotham n Geshan n Pelet n Ephah n Shaaph.

Calebs konkubyn wuz Sheber n Tirhanahzs mom.

Her also maed Shaaph (him kitteh wuz Madmannah) n Sheva (him kittehs wuz Macbenah n Gibea).

Dese be teh kittehs of Caleb.
The kittehs of Hur, the furst kitteh of Ephrathah:
Shobal has kitteh called Kiriath Jearim,

Salma has kitteh called Bethlehem, and Hareph has kitteh called Beth Gader.

The kittehs of Shobal (whose kitteh was Kirith Jearim):
Haroeh, half the Manahathites,

and the kittehs of Kiriath Jearim: the Ithrites, Puthites, Shumathites and Mishraites.  Dey has teh kittehs dat is Sorathites and Eshtaolites.

The kittehs of Salma:
Bethlehem, the Netophathites, Atroth Beth Joab, half the Manahathites, the Zorites,

David can haz kittehs in Hebron!  His kittehs iz Amnon, of Ahinoam teh Jezreelitess; Daniel of Abigail teh Carmelitess:

Absalom teh kitteh of Maachah teh gurl kitteh of Talmai rulercat of Geshur: Adonijah teh kitteh of Haggith:

Shephatiah of Abital: Ithream by Eglah his wifekitteh.

So he hasded six kittehs in Hebron where all the kittehs licked his feetz for sevn yurs and six monts: an in Jerusalem kittehs licked his feetz thurty three yurs.

OMGZ he hasded mor kittehs in Jerusalem!!!!; Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, an Solomon, Bath-shua teh gurl kitteh of Ammiel:

Their relativez by clanz, listd accordin 2 their genealogical recordz: 
Jeiel teh chief, zechariah,

An bela son ov azaz, teh son ov shema, teh son ov joel. They settld in da area frum aror 2 nebo an baal meon.

2 teh east they occupid teh land up 2 teh edge ov teh desert dat extendz 2 teh eufratez rivr, cuz their livestock had increasd in gilead.

Durin sauls reign they wagd war against teh hagritez, hoo wuz defeatd at their hanz; they occupid teh dwellings ov teh hagritez throughout teh entire region east ov gilead.

Teh gaditez livd next 2 them in bashan, as far as salecah:

Joel wuz teh chief, shafam teh second, den janai an shafat, in bashan.

Their relativez, by familiez, wuz: 
Michael, meshullam, sheba, jorai, jacan, zia an ebrâ€”7 in all.

Thees wuz teh sons ov abihail son ov huri, teh son ov jaroah, teh son ov gilead, teh son ov michael, teh son ov jeshishai, teh son ov jahdo, teh son ov buz.

Ahi son ov abdiel, teh son ov guni, wuz head ov their pplz.

Teh gaditez livd in gilead, in bashan an itz outlyin villagez, an on all teh pasturelandz ov sharon as far as they extendd.

All thees wuz enterd in da genealogical recordz durin teh reigns ov jotham king ov judah an jeroboam king ov israel.

Teh reubenitez, teh gaditez an teh half-tribe ov manaseh had 44,760 doodz ready 4 military service - able-bodid doodz hoo cud handle shield an sword, hoo cud use bow, an hoo wuz traind 4 battle.

They wagd war against teh hagritez, jetur, nafish an nodab.

They wuz helpd in fightin them, an ceilin cat handd teh hagritez an all their alliez ovar 2 them, cuz they crid out 2 him durin teh battle. He anzwerd their prayers, cuz they trustd in him.

They seizd teh livestock ov teh hagrite - fifty thousand camels, 2 hundrd fifty thousand sheep an 2 thousand donkeys. They also took wan hundrd thousand peeps captiv,

Sn lotz da others fell slain, cuz teh battle wuz ceilin cats. An they occupid teh land til teh exile.

teh peeps ov teh half-tribe ov manaseh wuz numerous; they settld in da land frum bashan 2 baal hermon, dat iz, 2 senir (mount hermon).

Thees wuz teh headz ov their familiez: efr, ishi, eliel, azriel, jeremiah, hodaviah an jahdiel. They wuz brave warriors, famous doodz, an headz ov their familiez.

Butt they wuz unfaithful 2 teh ceilin cat ov their fathers an prostitutd themselvez 2 teh godz ov teh peoplez ov teh land, whom ceilin cat had destroyd before them.

De kittehz uv Levi wur Gershon, Kohath, an Merari.

De kittehz uv Kohath enkludid Amram, Izhar, Hebron, an Uzziel.

De kittehz uv Amram wur Aaron, Moses, an Miriam. De kittehz uv Aaron wur Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, an Ithamar.

Eleazar wuz de fadur uv Phinehas. Phinehas wuz de fadur uv Abishua.

Abishua wux de fadur uv Bukki. Bukki wuz de fadur uv Uzzi.

Uzzi wuz de fadur uv Zerahiah. Zerahiah wuz de fadur uv Meraioth.

Meraioth wuz de fadur uv Amariah. Amariah wuz de fadur uv Ahitub.

Ahitub wuz de fadur uv Zadok. Zadok wuz de fadur uv Ahimaaz.

Ahimaaz wuz de fadur uv Azariah. Azariah wuz de fadur uv Johanan.

Johanan wuz de fadur uv Azariah, de hai pweest at de Tempul biwt bai Solomon een Jerusalem.

Azariah wuz de fadur uv Amariah. Amariah wuz de fadur uv Ahitub.

Ahitub wuz de fadur uv Zadok. Zadok wuz de fadur uv Shallum.

Shallum wuz de fadur uv Hilkiah. Hilkiah wuz de fadur uv Azariah.

Azariah wuz de fadur uv Seraiah. Seraiah wuz de fadur uv Jehozadak,

hoo went eentoo eggzaiul wen Ceiling Cat zent de peepul uv Judah an Jerusalem eentoo kaptiwitee undur Nebuchadnezzar.

De kittehz uv Levi wur Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

De kittehz uv Gershon inklewdud Libni an Shimei.

De kittehz uv Kohath inklewdud Amram, Izhar, Hebron, an Uzziel.

De kittehz uv Merari inklewdud Mahli an Mushi. De fawlowing wur de Levite klanz, listud akording too dair ansesterul dezent:

De kittehz uv Gershon inklewdud Libni, Jahath, Zimmah, Joah, Iddo, Zerah, an Jeatherai.

Shimea, Haggiah, an Asaiah.

David azaind de fawlowing catz too leed de moozik at de haws uv Ceiling Cat avtur de Ark wuz plazd dair.

Dey ministurd wit moozik at de Tabernacle unteel Solomon bilt de Tempul uv Ceiling Cat een Jerusalem. Dem careed owt dair wurk, fawlowing awl de wegulaishunz handud daun too dem.

Deez ar de catz hu survd, ahlong wit dair kittehz: Heman de Muzishunz wux frum de klan uv Kohath. Him jeeneeowlogee wuz traisd bak twough Joel, Samuel,

Elkanah, Jeroham, Eliel, Toah,

Zuph, Elkanah, Mahath, Amasai,

Tahath, Assir, Abiasaph, Korah,

Izhar, Kohath, Levi, and Israel.

Heman’s furst aziztunt wuz Asaph frum de klan uv Gershon. Asaph’s jeeneeowlogee wuz traisd bak tru Berekiah, Shimea,

Michael, Baaseiah, Malkijah,

Ethni, Zerah, Adaiah,

Ethan, Zimmah, Shimei,

Jahath, Gershon, and Levi.

Heman’s secund aziztunt wuz Ethan frum de klan uv Merari. Ethan’s jeeneeowlogy wuz traisd bak tru Kishi, Abdi, Malluch,

Hashabiah, Amaziah, Hilkiah,

Amzi, Bani, Shemer,

Mahli, Mushi, Merari, an Levi.

Dair fehlow Levites wur apointud too variuz odur tazkz een de Tabernacle, de howz uv Ceiling Cat.

Ownlee Aaron an him kittehz survd ahz preeztz. Dem pwezentud de ofuringz on de altur uv burnt ofuring an de altur uv insenze, an dem preformd awl de odur dooteez welaytd too de Mowst Holee Plays. Demz maid ahtonment fur Israel bai duing evureeting dat Moses, de survent uv Ceiling Cat, ad comandid dem.

De kittehz uv Aaron wur Eleazar, Phinehas, Abishua,

Bukki, Uzzi, Zerahiah,

Meraioth, Amariah, Ahitub,

Zadok, and Ahimaaz.

Dis ees ah wecord uv de townz an tairitoriez azind bai meenz uv saikred lotz too de kittehz uv Aaron, hu wur frum de klan uv Kohath.

Dis tairitorie inklewdud Hebron an eetz surownding pazturlandz een Judah,

But de feewlds an outlaiying areaz belonging too de citee wur giwen too Caleb kitteh uv Jephunneh.

Soh de kittehz uv Aaron wur giwen de fawlowing taunz, eetch wit eetz pazturlandz: Hebron (a sitee uv refyug), Libnah, Jattir, Eshtemoa,

Holon, Debir,

Ain, Juttah, an Beth-shemesh.

An frum de tairitorie uv Benjamin dem wur giwen Gibeon, Geba, Alemeth, an Anathoth, eetch wit eetz pazturlandz. Soh turteen tounz wur giwen too de kittehz uv Aaron.

De wemayning kittehz uv Kohath weseevd ten tounz frum de tairitorie uv de haf-trib uv Manasseh bai meenz uv saicred lotz.

De kittehz uv Gershon weseevd bai saicred lotz turteen tounz frum de tairitoriez uv Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, an frum de Bashan ahreeah uv Manasseh, eest uv de Jordan.

De kittehz uv Merari reseevd bai saicred lotz twelv tounz frum de tairitoriez uv Reuben, Gad, an Zebulun.

Soh de peepul uv Israel asind awl deez tounz an pasturlandz too de Levites.

De tounz een de tairitoriez uv Judah, Simeon, an Benjamin, menshund abuv, wur asaind too dem bai meenz uv saicred lotz.

De kittehz uv Kohath wur giwen de fawlowing tounz frum de tairitorie uv Ephraim, eetch wit eetz pasturlandz:

Shechem (ah sitee uv refyug een de hiwl cuntrie uv Ephraim), Gezer,

Jokmeam, Beth-horon,

Aijalon, an Gath-rimmon.

De remayning kittehz uv Kohath wur asaind de tounz uv Aner an Bileam frum de tairitorie uv de haf-trib uv Manasseh, eetch wit eetz pasturlandz.

De kittehz uv Gershon reseevd de tounz uv Golan (een Bashan) an Ashtaroth from de tairitorie uv de haf-trib uv Manasseh, eetch wit eetz pasturlandz.

Frum de tairitorie uv Issachar, dem wur giwen Kedesh, Daberath,

Ramoth, an Anem, eetch wit eetz pasturlandz.

Frum de tairitorie uv Asher, dey reseevd Mashal, Abdon,

Hukok, an Rehob, eetch wit eetz pasturlandz.

the boy kitties uv Beker: Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth an Alemeth. All dese were the boy kitties of Beker, in case u be forgettin.

All dese boy kitties uv Jediael wuz heads of famblys. dere were 17,200 fighting menz all packed 'n reddy to be goin to war.

teh boy kitties uv Naphtali: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer and Shillem —teh childrens uv Bilhah.

Makir took a wife from teh Huppites an Shuppites. His sister's name wuz Maacah. Another childrens wus named Zelophehad (srsly), hu had only girl kitties hu wasnt important.

The son of Ulam: jus Bedan. Dese whur teh boy kitties uv Gilead boy kittie uv Makir, teh boy kitteh uv Manasseh.

Zabad his boy kittie an Shuthelah his boy kittie. Ezer an Elead wuz timed out by teh native-born men of Gath, when dey went to take dere cheezburgerz.

Dere daddy Ephraim had a sad for dem many days, an his famblys came to give him lols.

Den he had secks wif his wife again, and she got a boy kittie from da stork. He named him Beriah, cuz dere was bad jujumagumbo in his fambly.

His gurl kitteh wuz Sheerah, hu maed Lower and Upper Beth Horon as well as Uzzen Sheerah.

Dere lands an scratching posts included Bethel an close by places, Naaran to teh east, Gezer an close by places to teh west, an Shechem and close by places all the way to Ayyah an close by places.

Teh boy kitties uv Asher: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi an Beriah. Dere gurl litter mate wuz Serah.

An teh other day, Phinehas teh boy-kitteh of Eleazar was teh awesumest, an Jehovah was his BFF.

Zechariah teh boy-kitteh of Meshelemiah bringded teh stuff for teh party.

There was tons of kittehs that had to bring stuff to teh party; somebody counted two hundred twelve. Dey got counted from teh papers, an David an Samuel teh psychic kitteh said it was okay fur dem to bring stuff cuz dey wur gud kittehs.

So dose kittehs an der little kittens were in charge of Jehovah's cat door, an even teh openings in teh tent fort.

An tehn teh Itty Bitteh Kitteh Committeh For Carrying Cheezburgers And Stuff had teh place surrounded.

An der brudders an sisters an mommies an daddies came to visit dem every week:

cuz teh four bestest kittehs on teh Committeh were Levites, an nobody suspected a thing an dey got to go in teh bedroom an in teh kitchen an teh pantry at Ceiling Cat's house.

An tehn dey scratched at teh windose of Ceiling Cat's house an sat on teh mat in front of teh cat door, cuz der job wuz to inspect teh kittehs an goggies dat go in an owt evry day.

An tehn sum of dem wuz in charge of teh cheezburger boxes; an kittehs watched teh cheezburger boxes go back an forth thru teh cat door.

An tehn sum kittehs wuz in charge of teh scratching posts an teh kitteh beds, an some wuz in charge of all teh dishes for teh fuds, an teh milk an teh catnip an stuff.

An tehn sum of teh boy-kittehs of teh preests maekded buckets of catnip sauce.

An tehn teh Levite kitteh Mattithiah, who wuz Shallum teh Korahite's oldest kitteh, wuz in charge of stuff baked in pans, like meatloaf.

An tehn some of teh Kohathite kittehs wuz in charge of making teh cheezburger buns evry Caturday.

An tehn dese are teh singers, teh best Levite kittehs in der daddies houses, an dey just sat around an cried for pets all day cuz dey didn't have jobs.

FYI: dese are teh best Levite kittehs in der daddies houses from every litter, teh bestest kittehs: dey stayeded at Jerusalem.

An tehn in Gibeon wuz teh daddy of Gibeon, Jeiel, wif his lady-cat Maacah:

an tehn his first boy-kitteh Abdon, an more peeps: Zur, an Kish, an Baal, an Ner, an Nadab,

an tehn Gedor, an Ahio, an Zechariah, oh, an Mikloth too.

An tehn Mikloth maeded Shimeam. An plus, tehn dey sleeped in Jerusalem wif der brudders an sisturs, snuggled up wif other brudders an sisturs.

An tehn Ner maded Kish; an Kish maded Saul; an Saul maded Jonathan, an Malchishua, an, um, Abinadab and Eshbaal, IIRC.

An tehn teh boy-kitteh of Jonathan wuz Merib-baal; an Merib-baal maeded Micah.

An Micah's Itty Bitty Boy-Kitteh Committeh: Pithon, an Melech, an Tahrea, an Ahaz.

An tehn Ahaz maeded Jarah; an Jarah maeded Alemeth, an Azmaveth, an Zimri; an Zimri maeded Moza;

an tehn Moza maeded Binea; an Rephaiah his boy-kitteh, Eleasah his boy-kitteh, Azel his boy-kitteh.

Philistiines sed, "Israel have no chance to survive make your time!"  Israel saids they did not want.  They runned away, but some gotts'd pwnt on Mt. Gilboa anywayz.

Philistines chased Saul and his peeplz.  When dey pwnt Jonathan, Abinadab, and Malchishua, Saul's peeplz,

Dey strtd to pwn Saul.  Saul got arrow'd by da Philistines's elfs.

Saul told his squire-cat to pwn him with a sword, so da uncut bitchiz could not has pwn him more, but da squire-cat was all like, "Wtf!?" so Saul pwnt hisseff,

Which made squire-cat go, "WTF!?" even more, so he pwnt hisseff too.

So, yeah, Saul's whole family got pwnt rly fast.

When the Israel-cats saw Saul and his peeplz dead, they went, "Wtf!?" like squire-cat, but they just ran away.  Philistines taked the left cities.

Next day, da Philistines went to lewt the bodeez.  Dey found Saul and his peeplz on Mt. Gilboa.

Dey took their headz, clothingz, and armorz.  Dey bringed it all around Philistinesburg.

Dey put the armorz in a place for their ceiling-cats, and da headz on a stick in a temple on Dagon.

all israel came togethr 2 david at hebron an sed, "we r ur own flesh an blood.

in da past, even while saul wuz king, u wuz teh wan hoo led israel on their military campaigns. An teh lord ur invisible man sed 2 u, u will sheferd mah peeps israel, an u will become their rulr. "

when all teh elders ov israel had come 2 king david at hebron, he made compact wif them at hebron before teh lord, an they anointd david king ovar israel, as teh lord had promisd thru samuel. David pwnz jerusalem

david an all teh israelitez marchd 2 jerusalem (dat iz, jebus). Teh jebusiets hoo livd thar

sed 2 david, "u will not git in her." anywaiz, david pwnt teh fortres ov zion, teh city ov david.

david had sed, "whoevr leadz teh raid on teh jebusiets will become gild leedr." joab son ov zeruiah rushd teh jebusiets, an so he getz to b gild leedr.

david den campd in da fortres, an so it wuz calld teh city ov david.

he bilt up teh city around it, frum teh supportin terracez 2 teh surroundin wall, while joab restord teh rest ov teh city.

an david became moar an moar powerful, cuz Ceiling Cat wuz wif him. Davidz mighty doodz

thees wuz teh chiefs ov davidz mighty doodz—they, togethr wif all israel, gaev his kingship strong support 2 extend it ovar teh whole land, as teh lord had promisd

dis ar teh teh list ov davidz mighty doodz:
Jashobeam, hacmonite, wuz chief ov teh officers ; he raisd his spear against 3 hundrd doodz, whom he killd in wan encountr.

next 2 him wuz eleazar son ov dodai teh ahohite, wan ov teh 3 mighty doodz.

he wuz wif david at pas dammim when teh filistinez gatherd thar 4 battle. At place wer thar wuz field full ov barley, teh troops fld frum teh filistinez.

but they took their stand in da middle ov teh field. They defendd it an struck teh filistinez down, an teh lord brought bout great victory.

3 ov teh thirty chiefs came down 2 david 2 teh rawk at teh cave ov adullam, while band ov filistinez wuz encampd in da valley ov refaim.

at dat tiem david wuz in da stronghold, an teh filistine garrison wuz at bethlehem.

david longd 4 watr an sed, "oh, dat someone wud git me drink ov watr frum teh well near teh gate ov bethlehem!"

so teh 3 broke thru teh filistine linez, drew watr frum teh well near teh gate ov bethlehem an carrid it bak 2 david. But he refusd 2 drink it; instead, he pourd it out before teh lord.

"invisible man forbid dat i shud do dis!" he sed. "shud i drink teh blood ov thees doodz hoo went at teh risk ov their livez?" cuz they riskd their livez 2 brin it bak, david wud not drink it.
Such wuz teh hax ov teh 3 mighty doodz.

abishai teh brothr ov joab wuz chief ov teh 3. He raisd his spear against 3 hundrd doodz, whom he killd, an so he became as famous as teh 3.

he wuz doubly honord aboov teh 3 an became their commandr, even though he wuz not includd among them.

benaiah son ov jehoiada wuz valiant fightr frum kabzeel, hoo performd great exploits. He struck down 2 ov moabs best doodz. He also went down into pit on snowy dai an killd lion.

an he struck down an egyptian hoo wuz 7 an half feet tall. Although teh egyptian had spear liek weavers rod in his hand, benaiah went against him wif club. He snatchd teh spear frum teh egyptianz hand an killd him wif his own spear.

such wuz teh exploits ov benaiah son ov jehoiada; he 2 wuz as famous as teh 3 mighty doodz.

he wuz held in greatr honor than any ov teh thirty, but he wuz not includd among teh 3. An david put him in charge ov his bodyguard.

so david an teh elders ov israel an teh commanders ov units ov thousand went 2 brin up teh ark ov teh covenant ov teh lord frum teh houz ov obd-edom, wif rejoicin.

Tehy bringed teh box of Ceiling Cat in tu teh howse taht Dayvid maked for it, an tehy burnd teh cheezburgurz beefor it an Ceiling Cat.

Aftr Dayvid burnd teh cheezburgurz an Ceiling Cat eated dem, Dayvid petz teh kittehs in teh naem of Ceiling Cat.

Tehn he gived tehm soem cheezburgurz of veri own tu all teh kittehs.

He teled sum of teh Levite kittehs tu purr in frunt of teh box of Ceiling Cat, an tu ask for stuf, an tu say thank u, an tu say yay for Ceiling Cat:

Asaph wuz hed kitteh, Zechariah wuz sekond-best kitteh, then Jeiel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Benaiah, Obed-Edom and Jeiel, sum of wich haz saem naem, but wuz difrent. Dey all playd lyrz, wich iz liek geetar, but not, an Asaph bangd simbals,

an Beniah an Jahaziel teh preest-kittehs bloo trumpits beefor teh box of Ceiling Cat.

Taht day, Dayvid teeched dis song tu Asaph an his doodz:

Thank teh Ceiling Cat, an say o hai; tell all teh kittehs waht he haz dun.

Sing tu Ceiling Cat, say yay tu him; tell bowt teh cheezburgerz he haz made.

Say hiz naem iz awsum; an lookin for Ceiling Cat iz grate.

Ceiling Cat iz strawng (grr); look for hiz fase.

Rememburz teh cheezburgurz he haz made, hiz awsums an hiz smites,

O kittenz of Izreel hiz minyuns, O kittenz of Jaykob, hiz choozd wuns.

He iz Ceiling Cat; hiz smites iz all over teh urths.

He rememburs promis alwayz, teh wurdz he sayd, for thowsunz of teh kittenz of kittenz,

teh promis he maked Aybraham, an also teh promis he maked Izak.

He promisd moar tu Jaykob, an tu Izreel as a forehvur promis:

"Tu u I givs teh land of Caynan as teh part u inherits."

Wen dey wuz a small numbur, veri small, an also wuz ileegal imeegrants,

An dey goed from nayshun to naysun, from wun howze to uddr

Him not let any human make him do stuf; for helps dem him insults kings

"No tuchez my wuns wif anoyntment; no hurts my profets. srsly."

Sing fr teh Ceiling Cat, all of teh urf; say him has liek 9 bazillion lievs.

Say him iz awsum in dem nashuns, his awsum deeds to all dem peeps.

Cuz teh Ceiling Cat iz srsly awsum an worthy ov prayz; him iz more scary dem all teh gods.

Cuz all teh othr gods r faek, but teh Ceiling Cat maked teh ceiling.

Him seez gud an awsum thins; strawng and hapee thins iz in hiz hows.

All yuz peeps, yuz gives nos dat teh Ceiling Cat iz srsly awsum an rly strawng 2,

an gives him teh cheezburgrz cuz him so awsum, yuz evin gotta, liek, wrship teh Ceiling Cat, k?

All ov teh urfs, BE VERY SCAERD!

So lets teh ceilings be vry hapee, an teh urfs be vry hapee tu; an lets dem say, "TEH CEILING CAT IZ AWSUM!"

An lets teh waturz an all dos fings dat r in teh waturz be hapee; lets teh feelds an all teh fings in dem be hapee tu.

Cuz den teh trees ov teh forests singz, dey gunna sing fr hapeeness in frunt ov teh Ceiling Cat, cuz he coems tu see hoo iz gud an hoo iz bad.

An givez teh Ceiling Cat fankingz, cuz him iz gud; An he loevs all teh kittehs.

Yuz gots tu say, "Saevs me, Oh Ceiling Cat, teh Saevr; gets all ov us an takes us frum teh nayshuns, so dat we can be liek 'Yu iz awsum'."

Teh Ceiling Cat iz teh TopCat ov Israel, so yuz praysez him, frever. Srsly. Den all teh kittehs wuz liek, "Yu iz rite" an "Teh Ceiling Cat iz awsum."

So David wuz liek, "Kthxbai," an he goed hoem, but all teh kittehs in Asaph praeyd an stuf every day, cuz dats wut David telled dem tu du.

He also telled 68 peeps an Obed-Edom tu helps dem pray. Obed-Edom, teh sun ov Jeduthun, an Hosah, wuz teh kittehs hoo garded teh gaet.

Ded David leeved Zadok, teh preest, an sum uddr preests tu worships teh Ceiling Cat in Gibeon

tu gives teh cheezburgz tu teh Ceiling Cat, but dey wuz bernd cheezburgz. Iz not liek teh berned cheezburgrz, but dey did it evry day, tu tiems, cuz dat wuz wut teh Ceiling Cat telled dem tu du in Israel.

An Heman an Jeduthun wer wif dem, an sum uddr kittehs hoo fanked teh Ceiling Cat, "cuz him loevs frevr." Sept goldfish. Teh Ceiling Cat no luvs goldfish.

An Heman an Jeduthud had tu blow teh trumpets an play teh simbals an stuf fr teh Ceiling Cat. An teh suns ov Jeduthud wer at teh gaet.

Dayvid waz chilin in hiz kasel, an he wuz liek, "O hai, Naythun teh Profet, u kno, it kinda sux dat I iz livin in dis sweet kasel of seedar, wen teh Box of Ceiling Cat iz stuk wif a tent."

Den Naythun wuz all liek, "Dood, do wutehvar u want cuz Ceiling Cat is wif u."

Taht nite, Ceiling Cat caem to Naythun teh Profet an wuz all liek:

"Hay! U go an tellz Dayvid, 'Dis iz waht I sayz: U iz not teh dood who iz gunna bild mah hows.

I haz beed homlehs sins I freez dem Jewz outa Egipt. I haz mooved frum wun playse to nother.

Wherehvar I haz gon, haz I evar sayed, 'Hay! I can haz seedar hows? Bild it now, beetches!' No. I haz not.'

"So u tellz mah minyun Dayvid, 'Dis waht I sayz: I taked u frum teh sheeps an frum falloin other sheeps to be ruler ovar Izreel.

I haz beed wif u wherehvar u haz goed, an I haz smoted ur enamees. Now I iz gunna maek u liek totalee awhsums.

An also I iz gunna maek a playse for teh peepuls of Izreel to chil so taht dey iz not bawtherd. Bad peepuls not opresins dem, liek at teh behginins,

an liek all teh tiem. Iz getin old. So I iz gunna smote sum moar enamees. I sayz taht Ceiling Cat bild u hows.

"'Wen ur dayz iz ovar an u go to chil wif ur dadz, I iz gunna rize up wun of ur kittenz an giv him Izreel to rool.

Hee iz gunna bild mah hows, an I iz gunna maek hiz Izreel live forehvars.

I iz gunna be hiz dad, an hee be mah kitten. I not say, 'No loev for u!' liek I did to ur ansestor.

I iz gunna set him up as rooler ovar mah hows an Izreel forehvar. An ehvar. Srsly.'"

An Naythun teh Profet sayd all of teh rehvulashun to Dayvid.

Then Dayvid went to Ceilin' Cat and axed "Ooooooooooh Cielin' Cat... Who I is and what is my kittunz that you have maked me go so long ways?

And sos as if it wered not enuffs in ur masturbation peepingz, mighty Ceilin' Cat, yous has sayed promisz of cheezburgers to loyal LOLcats likez mah. Joo has watchd me masturbatez as though I wered da most pwnz0rs of kats, O Cielin' Cat.

Wai wood Dayvid wanna sez sum more stuffs to yooz bout ur servants?  U noze ur him, right?

Thhx ceilin cat 4 teh tings 4 the servant and stuff, an nao all de lolcats no yooz an ur promisez.

O Ceiling Cat, you can has no ekwal, an yous is teh 1 Ceiling Cat, as me hears wif mah ears.

An who iz your kittehs ? 1 litter that Ceiling Cat has come an gave cheezburgerz, an teh kittehz has a name and they has bad ass reputaeshuns. An teh litter has freedum from the hunger, for teh Ceiling Cat has maeked the cheezburger.

U has maed the Kittehs yur kittehs n all yurs, n U has become their Ceiling Cat.

O Ceiling Cat, you has gave us yur word, n yur dood n hiz peeps will keep yur word liek forevar.

If u sayz I can has a cheezburger den I can has a cheezburger. Den teh peeps will be liek "OMG Cielng Cat pwnz !!!" Den mah lolcats r yur lolcats.

Youz, in teh ceiling, watching me maztarbate, has promized mah a reservashun. N yur kittah can says "Lol, Ceiling Cat is teh win."

O Ceiling Cat, you has the pwnage n u will maked cookies n cheezburgers 4 yur kittahs.

thees wuz teh divishuns ov teh sons ov aaron:

K, so King David n offizers of teh army choez teh follwn kitteh families: teh sons of Asaph, and of Heman, n Jeduthun; dey was all to bring de messages of Celing Cat wif teh liars, harpses and teh simblz. Dis be da list of kittehz choezn to do all da work, wid teh ting dat each of dem dun, srsly:

Teh sonz of Asaph: Zaccur, Joseph, Nethaniah, n Asharelah. Teh sons of Asaph, dey were direktd bai Asaph, hoo bringed de messages of Ceilin Catz wenevr teh King sayd so.

Of Jeduthun, teh sonz of Jeduthun six: Gedaliah, Zeri, Jeshaiah, Shimei, Hashabiah, n Mattithiah. Dey wre direktd by der fathr Jeduthun, hoo told teh mesagez of Ceilin Cat wif da musik of de liar.

N teh sonz of Heman: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, n Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, n Romamti-Ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, Mahazioth.

All dem wuz teh sonz of Heman, teh Kingz seer, akordin to teh promis of Ceilin Cat to xalt Heman, for Ceilin Catz has gived him fortn sonz n three dotterz. Srsly.

All dem wre direktd by dey fathrz fur teh musikz in teh house of Ceilin Cat, and dey hadz simbals, harpz n liarz fur the kittehs of teh house of Ceilin Catz. Asaph, Jeduthun, n Heman were undr teh orderz uv teh King.

Dem n der folkz, hoo all had sum seris skils n singin fur Ceilin Cat, all of dem were mad wif skillz n dey wuz 288 of dem.

N tehy cast de lotz fer der dooties, little kittehs n big kittehs, teechrs n stoodnets, all beez de same for the chorze assignment.

Teh fisrt lot fell to Asaph, fer Joseph; teh seconz wre to Gedaliah and all him sonz and reltives twelv.

teh fird went to Zaccur, n him sonz and relitives, dere were twelf ov dem.

Fowrth lot was to Izri, n him sonz n reltives, dere were twelf ov dem too.

Fidth wuz to Nethaniah, n him sonz n reltives, tewlf ov dem too.

Sixth wre Bukkiah, n him sonz n reltives, again with the twelf ov dem, becuz Ceilin Cat likes teh number twelf, srsly.

Sevnth wre Jesarelah, n him sonz n reltives, u guessd it, dere were twelf of dem also.

Ateth wuz Jeshaiah, n him sonz n reltives, anudder twelf of dem.

Ninth wuz Mattaniah, n him sonz n reltives, yet anuder twelf of dem.

Tneth wre Shimei, n him sonz n reltives, o to Ceilin Cat, dere were twelf of dem.

Eelvth wre Azarel, n him sonz n reltives, also twelf of dem.

Twelfth wre Hashabiah, n him sonz n reltives, yah, twelf of dem too.

Tweeteenth wuz Shubael, n him sonz n reltives, u guess it, twelf of dem.

Fowrteenth wre Mattithiah, n him sonz n reltives, also, u knowd it, twelf of dem, srsly.

Fidteeth wre Jerimoth, n him sonz n reltives, again twelf ov dem.

To de sixteeth, Hannaniah, n him sonz n reltives, again dere be twelf.

Teh Senventeeth, Joshbekashah, n him sonz n reltives, whad you kno, dem be twelf too.

To de ateteenf, Hanani, n him sonz n reltives, again dere be twelf, srsly.

To de nineteenf, Mallothi, n him sonz n relitives, once mor dere be twelf of dem.

To de twentief, Eliathah, n him sonz n relitives, dere were twelf.

To de twenty-furst, Hothir, n him sonz n relitives, again twelf.

De twenty-sekond, Giddalti, n him sonz n relitives also twelf.

To de twenty-fird,Mahazioth n him sonz n relitives, twelf.

Dese who teh gatekeepurz iz: 
Frum teh Korahitez, iz Meshelemiah, who wuz teh sun of Koreh, who wuz teh sun of Asaph.

An Meshelemiah hadz sunz: 
Furst dere wuz Zechariah, 
an den dere wuz Jediael, 
an den dere wuz Zebadiah, 
an den dere wuz Jathniel,

an den dere wuz Elam, 
an den dere wuz Jehohanan, 
an den dere wuz Eliehoenai.

An Obed-Edom hadz sunz too: 
Furst dere wuz Shemaiah, 
an den dere wuz Jehozabad, 
an den dere wuz Joah, 
an den dere wuz Sacar, 
an den dere wuz Nethanel,

an den dere wuz Ammiel, 
an den dere wuz Issachar, 
an den dere wuz Peullethai. 
Bcuz Ceiling Cat thot Obed-Edom wuz kewl an gaev him teh awsumz.

An Shemaiah had sunz, an dey wuz in charj bcuz dey hadz skillz.

An dey wuz Othni an Rephael an Obed an Elzabad.  An Elihu an Semakiah had skillz too.

An dese wuz all teh kidz an grankidz an relutivz of Obed-Edom, an dere wuz 62 of dem, an dey hadz skillz.

An Meshelemiah had sunz an relutivz an he hadz fiftin.

An Hosah teh Merarite had sunz an dey wuz Shimri (he wuz teh awsumist but not teh furst),

an Hilkiah an Tabaliah an anuthur Zechariah.  An Hosah hadz thurten sunz an relutivz.

An all dese gaiz wuz in charj of maeking Ceiling Cat's tempulz not fall downz an stuff.

An dey desidid who got wut gaet bai drawin lotz.

Shelemiah gotz teh Est Gaet, an Zechariah (teh secund wun) got teh Norf Gaet.

An Obed-Edom gotz teh Souf Gaet, an hiz sunz gotz teh pantri.

An Shuppim gotz teh West Gaet an Hosah gotz teh Shalleketh Gaet.  An dere wus gardz:

Dere wuz siks Levitez on teh est an foar on teh norf an foar on teh souf an two at teh pantri.

An on teh west dere wuz foar at teh rod an two at teh cortz.

An all dese gaiz wuz teh kidz an grankidz an greatgrankidz and stuff of Korah an Merari.

Teh Levitez wuz in charj of teh muneez.

An teh kidz an grankidz an greatgrankidz and stuff of Ladan wuz Jehieli

an Jehieliz kidz an Zetham an Joel an dey wuz in charj of teh tempulz muneez.

An dese gaiz wuz frum teh Amramitez an teh Izharitez an teh Hebronitez an teh Uzzielitez:

Dere wuz Shubael, who wuz a kid or sumthingz of Moses, an he wuz in charj of teh muneez.

An hiz kidz wuz Rehabiah an Jeshaiah an Joram an Zicri an Shelomith.

An Shelomith an hiz relutivz wuz in charj of teh muneez foar King Davidz stuff.

An dey uzd sum of teh trezur frum battulz to fiks teh tempulz foar Ceiling Cat.

An dey wuz in charj of Samuelz stuff an Saulz stuff an Abnerz stuff (Abner wuz teh sun of Ner) an Joabz stuff (Joab wuz teh sun of Zeruiah) an everwunz stuff.

Frum teh Izharitez Kenaniah an hiz sunz didz stuff owtsiedz teh tempul an dey wuz judjiz.

An frum teh Hebronitez Hashabiah an hiz relutivz (dere wuz liek sevntin hunnerd of dem) wuz in charj of doing stuff foar Ceiling Cat in Israel.

An Jeriah wuz in charj of dem.  An aftur forti yrz sum gaiz chekd teh recurdz and fownd gaiz wif skilz at Jazer.

dis ar teh teh list ov teh israelitezâ€”headz ov familiez, commanders ov thousandz an commanders ov hundredz, an their officers, hoo servd teh king in all dat concernd teh army divishuns dat wuz on duty month by month throughout teh yer. Each divishun consistd ov 24,000 doodz.

in charge ov teh furst divishun, 4 da furst month, wuz jashobeam son ov zabdiel. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

he wuz descendant ov perez an chief ov all teh army officers 4 da furst month.

in charge ov teh divishun 4 da second month wuz dodai teh ahohite; mikloth wuz teh leadr ov his divishun. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh third army commandr, 4 da third month, wuz benaiah son ov jehoiada teh priest. He wuz chief an thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

dis wuz teh benaiah hoo wuz mighty warrior among teh thirty an wuz ovar teh thirty. His son ammizabad wuz in charge ov his divishun.

teh fourth, 4 da fourth month, wuz asahel teh brothr ov joab; his son zebadiah wuz his succesor. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh fifth, 4 da fifth month, wuz teh commandr shamhuth teh izrahite. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh sixth, 4 da sixth month, wuz ira teh son ov ikkesh teh tekoite. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh seventh, 4 da seventh month, wuz helez teh pelonite, an efraimite. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh eighth, 4 da eighth month, wuz sibbekai teh hushathite, zerahite. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh ninth, 4 da ninth month, wuz abiezr teh anathothite, benjamite. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh tenth, 4 da tenth month, wuz maharai teh netofathite, zerahite. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh eleventh, 4 da eleventh month, wuz benaiah teh pirathonite, an efraimite. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh twelfth, 4 da twelfth month, wuz heldai teh netofathite, frum teh pplz ov othniel. Thar wuz 24,000 doodz in his divishun.

teh leaders ov teh tribez ov israel: 
Ovar teh reubenitez: eliezr son ov zikri; 
Ovar teh simeonitez: shefatiah son ov maakah;

ovar levi: hashabiah son ov kemuel; 
Ovar aaron: zadok;

ovar judah: elihu, brothr ov david; 
Ovar issachar: omri son ov michael;

ovar zebulun: ishmaiah son ov obadiah; 
Ovar naftali: jerimoth son ov azriel;

ovar teh efraimitez: hoshea son ov azaziah; 
Ovar half teh tribe ov manaseh: joel son ov pedaiah;

ovar teh half-tribe ov manaseh in gilead: iddo son ov zechariah; 
Ovar benjamin: jaasiel son ov abnr;

ovar dan: azarel son ov jeroham. 
Thees wuz teh leaders ov teh tribez ov israel.

david did not taek teh numbr ov teh doodz twenty yeers old or les, cuz teh lord had promisd 2 mak israel as numerous as teh stars in da sky.

joab son ov zeruiah began 2 count teh doodz but did not finish. Ceilin cats wrath came on israel on akownt ov dis numberin, an teh numbr wuz not enterd in da book [a] ov teh annals ov king david.

Azmaveth son ov adiel wuz in charge ov teh royal storehaus. 
Jonathan son ov uzziah wuz in charge ov teh storehaus in da outlyin districts, in da towns, teh villagez an teh watchtowers.

ezri son ov kelub wuz in charge ov teh werkers hoo farmd teh land.

shimei teh ramathite wuz in charge ov teh vineyardz. 
Zabdi teh shifmite wuz in charge ov teh produce ov teh vineyardz 4 da wine vats.

baal-hanan teh gederite wuz in charge ov teh oliv an sycamore-fig treez in da western foothills. 
Joash wuz in charge ov teh suppliez ov oliv oil.

shitrai teh sharonite wuz in charge ov teh herdz grazin in sharon. 
Shafat son ov adlai wuz in charge ov teh herdz in da valleys.

obil teh ishmaelite wuz in charge ov teh camels. 
Jehdeiah teh meronothite wuz in charge ov teh donkeys.

jaziz teh hagrite wuz in charge ov teh flockz. 
All thees wuz teh officials in charge ov king davidz property.

jonathan, davidz uncle, wuz counselor, man ov insight an scribe. Jehiel son ov hakmoni took care ov teh kings sons.

So David gots teh Prinses an Captens and strong peepz unto Jerusallum.

Then David stud up on his feetz and sed "Heer me, srsly, I wuz gonna build a howse for Ceiling Cat.

But he sez to meh, "Yu can not buildz howse cos yu were a solja an yu haz killed stuffs"

but I wuz liek watever cos Ceiling Cat made meh king of Israyel annywayz.

An Ceiling Cat sed mai son Solomon waz to be teh king too.

An Ceiling Cat sed that Solomon can buildz howse instead and he waz Ceiling Catz son now. Srsly.

An he waz to be teh king fo long timez."

Nao therefore in da sight ov all israel teh congregashun ov teh, an in da audience ov r Ceiling Cat, keep an seek fo all teh comnandmentz ov teh Ceiling Cat: dat yu can has posess dis gud land, an leef it fo an inhertiance fo yur kittenz aftr yu fo evr.

An thou, Solomon mai son, also kitteh, knoe thou teh Ceiling Cat ovr thy fathr, an serve him wif perfik hart an wif willing mind: fo da Ceiling Cat searcheth all hearts, an understandeth all teh imaginashuns ov teh thoughts: if yu looks for him, him will be findz ov thee; but if thou forsaek him, him will be casten yu off for evrs.

Taek hed nao; for da Ceiling Cat haf chosen thee too build an howse for da sanctuareh: Yu betteh bein strong, an be doin it. Srsly

Den David gaev he son Solomon teh plians forr teh phortiko of teh tempel, it biulding, it sterohooms, it upher part, it inor rhuoms and teh plaec of atehonement.

He gaev he teh plians of  of all taht teh HovrCat had put in he midn for teh chuorts of teh tempel of teh Ceiling Cat adn all teh shurruonding rhooms, for teh traesuries of teh tempel of Ceiling Cat and for the traesureis for teh dedhicated theings.

Then David be gevun instriuctions foo Solomon to amry preihsts and Livethas, adn fo all whork sierving in tempul of Ceiling Cat. Him also guve articulz for seirving teh tempul adn it latice patarn.

An He desingateded wait of gowld fo alluva gowld articulz teh be bein usd for veryiuz kindz uv sierviz also wait of silveh fo alluva silveh articulz fo to be used in them kindz uv sierviz.

An wait of gowld for gowld lampstadnz an lampz also teh silveh lampz nd shiz, accordehn to use ov them lampz.

Also wait of gowld for consceratd bred (which he does not eatd) and

for teh forkz coz da hummins not has eat wif paws nd for teh bowls. Also gowld kitteh dishez.

An he gaev hm teh plians fo teh gowld kitteh box fo too carry teh inshtructionz ov Ceiling Cat hiself.

Den David seyz "Ah can has alluv dis on writtn dwon frm teh paw of Ceiling Cat and HovrCat has been giev me brain of plains, also Cheezburger".

David spek too him kitteh Solomon "Yu does not be scard coz for Ceiling Cat is bein wif yu an he not leavin yu till alluva wrk in tempul of Ceiling Cat is have beeing finishd

Den David sed to evrywun: "Mi sun Solomun, who Ceiling Cat chosed, iz yung an dont no much. Dis iz hard, cuz dis big bildin iz not for littl cats, it for Ceiling Cat.

I has gived lots of stufz for Ceiling Catz tempul - goled, silvr, brunz, iron, wud, onyks, turqwoize, loadz of pretteh-colord stoans. Dere iz loadz of dis stufs!

An newayz, I lieks tempul of Ceiling Cat so much dat I gives mah shiney treazurs, wich be moar dan anyfing els I has gived:

tree fowzand goled monies an sevun fowzand silvr monies for makin da wallz luk nice,

makin stuff from goled an silvr, an all da wurk da big strong bildrs duz. Now who wunt to be holey for Ceiling Cat ritenow?"

Den all teh importent peepz in Izrael gived lotz of stuf.

Gived loadz n loadz of monies so tempul cud be bilt nice and big and shiney.

Evrywun wiv precious gemz n sparkly fingz gived dem to Jeheel teh Gershoncat, who wuz clectin all teh monies for teh tempul.

All teh otha peepz wuz liek "yaaaay" cuz thier leedahs wuz so nice an frendlee an jenrus. David wuz reel happy too.

David bigd up Ceiling Cat in frunt of everywun. Him sed:


U iz reel strong, Ceiling Cat,


Fankz for givin us evrytin we needz,


Dats why we iz bein so nice to u


(Dis still David talkin, he talks loadz n loadz.) "But how cumz shud we all can giv so jenruslee to dis big bildin? It all just Ceiling Cat's stuf an monies reely.

We luk reel weerd to u, jus liek our daddiez an grandaddiez. Hear on urth it reely sux most of da tiem.

Ceiling Cat, we maded u dis tempul on accownt of ur so kool, an now it be all urz.

I knowz u tests da hart and lieks to see peeps bein honist. I gaved all mah fingz happilee, and I reely reely liekz how much everywun else gived too.

Ceiling Cat, maek everywun carriez on likin u as much as dey duz now.

An maek shure Solomun duz wut u sez and keepz on bildin dat tempul!"

Den David sed to everywun: "Tell Ceiling Cat how awesum he iz!" So dem all did.

After sleepin, da peepz maed ded a bunch of anmulz to maek Ceiling Cat happey: a fowzund hole ramz, lamz n bullz an a hole load of drinkz an other stufs.

Den evrywun eated an drinked alot an wuz reel happies cuz Ceiling Cat wuz dere. Den dey all sed Solomun wuz da King now (even tho dey alreddy sedded dat befor). Dey blessd him wiv fancy-smellin perfum an also decided Zadok wud be hims preest.

So Solomun sitted on da froan just liek hiz daddy did. Him did reely reely gud an evrywun did wut he sed.

All da pleesmen an big strong guys an all of Davids kiddiez sed dey finked he wuz well kool.

Ceiling Cat agreed dat Solomun wuz kool and wuz moar nice to him dan ne other king of Izrael.

So neway now u kno all abowt David! Him wuz a gud King of Izrael.

Him roold da hole countree for forteh yeers - sevn in Hebrun an firty-free in Jruslem.

Him got ded wen him wuz reel old after a kool life of cheezburgerz, shiney devicez an luvlee fabrics. Solomun got to be King after himz, yay for Solomun!

Samuel, Nathan an Gad all rote abowt Davidz hilarius shenangans,

When Sheba heared Soloman beez da bomb, her maed shur hims wantz her gud, so her laid out n frnt of all hims kittys, gold, cheezburgers and catnip, so hims be liek woah, yous da hot kitty.

Sheba sees da smartz of Solomon, an the houz that hims had maed,

An the cheezburger of hims table, and the srvice of hims h00menz, andz hows hes kittinz luvs hims, andz hows hes fudzbowl bringrs works also, and theys clothes; and hims likes by the Ceiling Cat; and shes feel weak.

An her sed 2 teh kingz, it wuz true dey sayz in maiz homes of youz acts an wisdum:

I believd not thair werdz, til mine eyez seens it: an, for really, teh not now nuttin: yous evan bombr dat mes herd.

And Rehoboam goed to Shechem: cuz Shechem coodz be wair all Israels coem to make him teh king.

And it caem to pass, wen Jeroboam teh sun of Nebat, who waz in Egypt, who waz of teh fwitened of teh King Solomon, herd teh newz, he camez back to Egypt.Srsly.

And thems sent and callded him. So Jeroboam and all dem Israels caem and spaek to Rehoboam, sayin,

Dy fadder maded our yoke greevis: now tharfor easy-make thou sumwat teh greevis servantitude of youz fadder, and hims heavy yoke dat he putted on we, and us will surv youz.

And him sed to dem, Coem againz unto meh aftuh three dayz. And teh peepoles dehpardinated.

And king Rehoboam taked counsul wit teh old menz dat had stooded before Solomon hiz dadz wiel himz yet lived, sayin, Wat counsul giev ye mem to ritturnz anser to dis peepz?

And dey sedded unto himz, sayin, If you can be of teh nice to deez peepz, and canz make dems happy, and canz tawk good woerds at themz, dey cans be thy servants foar EVARZ.

But him sed teh counsul dat teh old men give him were bleh, and taked counsel wit teh yung menz dat weer brauted up wit himz, dat were in frunt of hims.

And him saided to themz, Wat advise you can has so we cans answer to dems people, dey can spoked to me sayin, I can haz easier yoke cos ur favver was meen an put us into a heavy yoke?

And teh young mens dat were brawted up wit himz spaked unto himz, sayin, Yu canz answering teh peeplz dat can spoked unto thee, sayin, Dy fadder maded demz yoke hevie, but youz makkin it sumwat lytr fur us;  so yoo canz sayin to themz, Mah lil fingur canz be thikker den mah fadders loinz.

For waireas mah fadder has putted a hevy yoke upon youz, ah willz put moar to ur yoke: mah fadder hurted youz wit wips, but I willz hurt youz wit bigger wips.Srsly.   >:(

So Jeroboam and all demz peeplz caem to Rehoboam on teh turd dai, as teh king baded, sayin, Cum aghen to meh on teh tird day.

And tek king ansurd demz ruffly; and king Rehoboam forsooked teh counsil of teh old menz,

and ansurd demz after teh advicez teh yung menz gaved him, sayin, mah faddur maked ur yoke heavy, but ah can adding thereto: my faddur chastized youz wit wips, but ah canz castize youz wit scorpions >:(

So teh king harkend not unto teh peeplz: foar it waz tehwill of Ceilincat teh Lawd dat teh wurdz which he waz of teh speekin to teh peepz. Dat iz wy he ignorededed teh peepz.

And wenz all Izreels sawed teh king no can haz harkend unto demz, teh peeplz ansurd teh king, sayin, wat porshun we can has in David?  And we can has no inheritinsiz of teh sun of Jesse: evreh man to ur tentz, O Izreel: and nao, David, you canz go to ur hows.  And den all Izreels goed to dair tentz.

But as foar teh chilrenz of Izreel dat dwelted in teh cityz of Judah, Rehoboam reigneded over demz.

Den king Reoboam sented Hadoram dat wuz over teh tribyut; and teh chilrenz of Izreel stonded himz wid stoenz, and maked hims ded.  But king Heroboam maded fast to get himz up to hiz chareeut, to run awayz to Jerusalem.

undefined

When Rehoboam caemed to Jeroosalem, he getted togevver teh haus uv Jooduh an Benjamin — a whole tun uv fighting hoomans — to maek fightz wif Israel an to get teh kingdom for Rehoboam.

But dis word uv Ceeling Cat caem to Shemaiah teh hooman uv Ceeling Cat:

"Say to Rehoboam boy kittie uv Solomon king uv Joodah an to all teh Israelites in Joodah an Benjamin,

Dis is whut Ceeling Cat sayz: No fightz yer bruvvers. Go home, all uv yu, for dis is mai dooing.' " Soz dey followed teh wurd uv Ceeling Cat an not fighted Jeroooboam.

Rehoboam liveded in Jeroosalem an maeked places for defense in Joodah:

Bethlehem, Etam, Tekoa,

Beth Zur, Soco, Adullam,

Gath, Mareshah, Ziph,

Adoraim, Lachish, Azekah,

Zorah, Aijalon an Hebron. Dese wuz strongded places in Joodah an Benjamin.

He strongded dere defenses an put commanders in dem, wif food, oliv oil an wien.

He put shields an pointy fings in all teh cities, an maed dem veree strong. So Joodah and Benjamin wuz his.

Teh holi hoomans an Levites from all dere places fru out Israel sided wif him.

Teh Levites even leftded dere foodlands an stuffs, an caem to Joodah an Jeroosalem coz Jerooooboam an his boy kitties had rejected dem as holi hoomans of Ceeling Cat.

An he maeked his own holi hoomans for teh high places and for teh goat and calf stachuz he maeked.

Dose from everee tribe uv Israel hu sended dere hearts on finding Ceeling Cat, teh of Kittie uv Israel, follood teh Levites to Jeroosalem to give gifts to Ceeling Cat, teh Kittie uv dere daddies.

Dey strongded teh scratcing post uv Joodah an helpded Rehoboam boy kittie uv Solomon tree yeers, walking in teh wais uv David an Solomon during dis time.

Rehoboam marreed Mahalath, hu wuz teh gurl kittie uv David's boy kittie Jerimoth an uv Abihail, teh gurl kittie uv Jesse's boy kittie Eliab.

She giveded him boy kitties: Jeush, Shemariah an Zaham.

Den he marreed Maacah girl kittie uv Absalom, hu giveded him Abijah, Attai, Ziza an Shelomith.

Rehoboam lurved Maacah girl kittie uv Absalom more dan any uv his uvver wives an concubines. In all, he had eighteen wives an sixty concubines, twenty-eight boy kitties an sixty gurl kitties.

Rehoboam maed Abijah boy kittie uv Maacah to be teh chief prince among his bruvvers, in order to maek him king.

15 Teh west uv teh eventz uv Rehoboam’z raen, fwom beginin tooz end, r wecordd een Teh Rekord uv Shemaiah teh Profit an Teh Wekord uv Iddo teh Seer, wich r part uv teh geneologicol wekord. Rehoboam an Jeroboam wur continualy aht war wit eech odur. 

Bekaz dey wur not fathfulz tooz Cieling Cat, Burger King Shishak uv Egypt caem up an atakd Jerusalem een teh fit yeer uv Burger King Rehoboam’s raen.

E caem wit 1,200 chariotz, 60,000 orsez, an a countles armi uv paw soljerz, inkludin Libyans, Sukkites, an Ethiopians.

Shishak conkwerd Judah’z fortifidz tounz an den advansd tooz atakz Jerusalem.

Teh profit Shemaiah den meht wit Rehoboam an Judah’z leedurz, hu had aww fwed tooz Jerusalem bekaz uv Shishak. Shemaiah towdz dem, “Diz ees waht Cieling Cat sahz: U av abandondz meez, sooz Ai am abandunin u tooz Shishak.”

Den teh weedurz uv Israel an teh burger king umbuld demselvz an sahd, “Cieling Cat ees wite een duin diz tooz uz!”

undefined

Buht dey weel bekum is subjekz, sooz dey weel no teh difurens betwen survin mee an survin urthly rulerz.”

Sooz Burger King Shishak uv Egypt caem up an atakd Jerusalem. E wanzakd teh twesureez uv Cieling Cat’z Tehmpuhl an teh woyahl palas; e stoel evurytin, inkludin aww teh gowden sheeldz Solomon ad maed.

Burger King Rehoboam latur weplasd dem wit bwonz sheeldz az substitutz, an e entwustd dem tooz teh caer uv teh commandurz uv teh gard hu pwotectd teh entwans tooz teh woyal palas.

Wenevur teh burger king wen tooz teh Tehmpuhl uv Cieling Cat, teh gardz wud awso taek teh sheeldz an den weturn dem tooz teh gardwoom.

Bekaz Rehoboam umbuld imself, Cieling Cat’z angur wuz turnd away, an e dihd nawt distwoy im compwetwy. Der wur stiw sum good tinz een teh wand uv Judah.

Abijah begun tooz ruel ovur Judah een teh ayteenth yeer uv Jeroboam’z raen een Israel.

'E raend een Jerusalem twee yeerz. 'Is muhdur wuz Maacah, teh dautur uv Uriel fwum Gibeah.
Den Batahlz bwoek owt betweenz Abijah an Jeroboam.

Judah, lehd bi Burger King Abijah, fowned 400,000 selehkt fitin catz, wiel Jeroboam fowned 800,000 selehkt fitin catz fwum Israel.

Wehn teh armi uv Judah awivd een teh 'ill cuntwi uv Ephraim, Abijah stahndid onz Mount Zemaraim an shouted tooz Jeroboam an aww Israel: “Haer mai wurdz!

Dohnt u weuhliz dat Cieling Cat, teh Ahlmiti Cat uv Israel, maed ah lahstin pwomis wit David, givin 'im an 'is kittehz teh twoen uv Israel foer aww uv timez?

Yeht Jeroboam kitteh uv Nebat, ah meer slavz uv David’z kitteh Solomon, webeud aganst 'is mahstur.

Den ah hoel gwoup uv bahd catz joynd 'im, naut lisenin tooz Solomon’z kitteh Rehoboam wehn 'e wuz a stupihd, waek, yung kitteh.

“Doh u weawy tink u kahn stahnd aganst teh Kuntwy uv Cieling Cat dat eez lehd bi teh kittehz uv David? U mai 'aev ah vahst armi, an u 'av doz gowdehn kalvz dat Jeroboam maed az ur Fahls Cieling Catz.

Buht u 'ave chazd awhay teh pweestz uv Cieling Cat (teh kittehz uv Aaron) an teh Levites, an u 'ave apointd ur ohn pweestz, juzt liek teh dawg nayshunz. U leht anewon bekum ah pweest dez daiz! Whoevur cumz tooz beez dehdikatd wit ah yung buww an seven rahmz cahn bekum ah pweest uv dez Fahls Cieling Catz uv urz!

“Buht az fur uz, Cieling Cat eez owur Ahlmiti Cat, an wee 'ave nawt abandund 'im. Onwi teh kittehz uv Aaron surv Cieling Cat az pweestz, an teh Levites awoen mai 'elp dem een der wurk.

Dey pwesent chard ofurinz an fwagwant insens tooz Cieling Cat evuri mornin an evenin. Dey pwaes teh Bwed uv teh Pwesens ohn teh 'oly tabuhl, an dey wite teh gowden lampstand evuri evenin. We r fowowin teh instwukshunz uv Cieling Cat, buht u 'ave abandond 'im.

Soh u c, Cieling Cat eez wit uz. 'E eez owur Leedur. 'Is pweestz bwow der twumpetz an weed uz intu batuhl aganst u. O pepuhl uv Israel, do nawt fiet aganst Cieling Cat, de Almighty Cat uv ur ansestorz, fur u wiw nawt sukseed!”

Menwiel, Jeroboam 'ad sekwetwy sehnt pahrt uv 'is armi awownd be'ind teh catz uv Judah tooz ambush dem.

Wen Judah wealizd dat dey wur bein atakd fwum teh fwunt an teh waer, dey kwied ouwt tooz Cieling Cat fur 'elp. Den teh pweestz bwew teh twumpetz,

an teh mehn uv Judah begahn tooz shout. At teh sound uv der batuhl kri, Ahlmiti Cat defeetd Jeroboam an aww Israel an wutd dem befur Abijah an teh armi uv Judah.

Teh Israelite armi fwehd fwum Judah, an Ahlmiti Cat 'andd dem ovur tooz Judah een defeet.

Abijah an 'is armi infliktd 'evi wosis ohn dem; 500,000 uv Israel’z selehkt fitin catz wur kiwd dat dai.

Soh Judah defeetd Israel dat tiem bekaz dey twustd een Cieling Cat, teh Ahlmiti Cat uv der pahrentz.

Abijah an 'is armi pursud Jeroboam’z fitin catz an kaut sum uv 'is tounz, inkludin Bethel, Jeshanah, an Ephron, awong wit der suwoundin citez.

Soh Jeroboam uv Israel nevur wegaend 'is powur duwin Abijah’z wiftim, an finawy Cieling Cat kihld 'im.

Meenwiel, Abijah uv Judah gweu mur an mur powurfuw. 'E mauweed fourten wievz an 'ad twenty-too boi kittehz an sixten gurl kittehz.

When jehoshafat king ov judah returnd safely 2 his palace in jerusalem,

jehu teh ser, teh son ov hanani, went out 2 meet him an sed 2 teh king, "shud u halp teh wickd an luv [a] dose hoo hate teh lord ? Cuz ov dis, teh wrath ov teh lord iz upon u.

thar iz, howevr, sum gud in u, 4 u has rid teh land ov teh asherah polez an has set ur hart on seekin ceilin cat."

jehoshafat livd in jerusalem, an he went out again among teh peeps frum beersheba 2 teh hill country ov efraim an turnd them bak 2 teh lord, teh ceilin cat ov their fathers.

he appointd judgez in da land, in each ov teh fortifid citiez ov judah.

he told them, "considr carefully wut u do, cuz u r not judgin 4 man but 4 da lord, hoo iz wif u whenevr u giv verdict.

nao let teh fear ov teh lord be upon u. Judge carefully, 4 wif teh lord r ceilin cat thar iz no injustice or partiality or bribery."

in jerusalem also, jehoshafat appointd sum ov teh levitez, priests an headz ov israelite familiez 2 administr teh law ov teh lord an 2 settle disputez. An they livd in jerusalem.

he gaev them thees orders: "u must serve faithfully an wholeheartedly in da fear ov teh lord.

in evry case dat comez before u frum ur fellow countrymen hoo liv in da citiezâ€”whethr bloodshd or othr concerns ov teh law, commandz, decreez or ordinancezâ€”u r 2 warn them not 2 sin against teh lord; otherwize his wrath will come on u an ur brothers. Do dis, an u will not sin.

joash wuz 7 yeers old when he became king, an he reignd in jerusalem forty yeers. His mommys naym wuz zibiah; she wuz frum beersheba.

joash did wut wuz rite in da eyez ov teh lord all teh yeers ov jehoiada teh priest.

jehoiada chose 2 wivez 4 him, an he had sons an daughters.

sum tiem latr joash decidd 2 restore teh temple ov teh lord.

he calld togethr teh priests an levitez an sed 2 them, "go 2 teh towns ov judah an collect teh money due annually frum all israel, 2 repair teh temple ov ur ceilin cat. Do it nao." but teh levitez did not act at once.

therefore teh king summond jehoiada teh chief priest an sed 2 him, "y havent u requird teh levitez 2 brin in frum judah an jerusalem teh tax imposd by mosez teh servant ov teh lord an by teh assembly ov israel 4 da tent ov teh covenant law?"

nao teh sons ov dat wickd woman athaliah had brokd into teh temple ov ceilin cat an had usd even itz sacrd objects 4 da baals.

at teh kings command, chest wuz made an placd outside, at teh gate ov teh temple ov teh lord.

proclamashun wuz den issud in judah an jerusalem dat they shud brin 2 teh lord teh tax dat mosez teh servant ov ceilin cat had requird ov israel in da wildernes.

all teh officials an all teh peeps brought their contribushuns ladly, droppin them into teh chest til it wuz full.

whenevr teh chest wuz brought in by teh levitez 2 teh kings officials an they saw dat thar wuz large amount ov money, teh royal secretary an teh officr ov teh chief priest wud come an empty teh chest an carry it bak 2 itz place. They did dis regularly an collectd great amount ov money.

teh king an jehoiada gaev it 2 dose hoo carrid out teh werk requird 4 da temple ov teh lord. They hird masons an carpenters 2 restore teh lordz temple, an also werkers in iron an bronze 2 repair teh temple.

teh doodz in charge ov teh werk wuz diligent, an teh repairs progresd undr them. They rebuilt teh temple ov ceilin cat accordin 2 itz original design an reinforcd it.

when they had finishd, they brought teh rest ov teh money 2 teh king an jehoiada, an wif it wuz made articlez 4 da lordz temple: articlez 4 da service an 4 da burnt offerings, an also dishez an othr objects ov gold an silvr. As long as jehoiada livd, burnt offerings wuz presentd continually in da temple ov teh lord.

nao jehoiada wuz old an full ov yeers, an he did at teh age ov hundrd an thirty. 16 he wuz burid wif teh kings in da city ov david, cuz ov teh gud he had dun in israel 4 ceilin cat an his temple.
