Den all IRS d00dz an bad kittehs coem to hear Jebus.

An Fariseez sez "LOL Jebus etz wit bad kittehs!  Him sux!'

Jebus sez, "WTF?

If lolcat had hundrd sheeps an won gits losted, doan him leev naintee nain sheeps an go luk fr losted won?

Den him find it an iz liek 'w00t!'

An dem him coem hoem, trow partee cuz him finded losted sheep.  Srsly!

Ceiling Cat moar happi wen a bad kitteh being maed lolcat den bowt naintee nain gud kittehs."

"Or if lolcat haz ten muneez an losted won, doan her luk all ovr an up on hai shalf an undr sofa and evrywher til her finded it?

Den she trow partee wit all her frndz and sez 'w00t!  I finded mai losted muneez!'

Ceiling Cat liek dat wen won bad kitteh being maed lolcat."

Jebus telled them: "Dis naiz hooman had two kittehs, big kitteh and little kitteh.

Little kitteh says "i can haz cheezeburger?". So da hooman gives little kitteh cheezburgr.

Little kitteh goes out and lookz for gal kittehs and does lots of buttsecks.

But den therez no foodz anywheres and little kitteh want foodz.

So little kitteh goed to fish shop and sayed "i can haz fishes?"

But no hooman luvd little kitteh.

But little kitteh thinked "mai hooman haz foodz and luvs kittehs.

I goes home and getz foodz and warm bed.

I can getz cheezburgr."

So little kitteh goed home and his hooman hugged little kitteh.

Little kitteh sayed "can i haz cheezburger nao?"

His hooman sayed to his Mexican maidz "get naiz warm bed redi for little kitteh nao.

Get cheezburgr too.

My kitteh goed away and needz foodz and bedz.

Big kitteh was playing outside and smells cheezbugr.

Big kitteh askd maidz why smell cheezbugr nao.

Maidz sayd little kitteh comes home nao and eatz foodz.

Big kitteh sitted looking away from hooman and wagged tail. Kitteh don't want talk to hooman nao.

But Big kitteh sayd "i cant haz cheezburgr and i cant haz buttsecks, i hatez yu.

But you luv little kitteh and he can haz cheezburgr."

"Big kitteh", the hooman said, "yu iz old.

Jebus told his lolcats, "There was a rich kitteh whose manager was said to have wasted his cheezburgerz.

So he went to teh manager and wuz lyke, "WTF? Give account of management cuz u FIRED lolz.

The manager sayd to himself, "Oh noez! Wut I do now? Me is weak so can't dig hole, and me no dog so me can't beg...

..O wait I can do stuff so peepl still lyke meh."

So teh manager called the one of peepz who owed the rich kitteh cheezburgerz. He was lyke. "How many cheezburgerz u owe teh rich kitteh?"

Kitteh numbah one said, "Eight-hundred cheezburgerz." Teh manager was lyke, "OMG that's too many! I say u owe him 400 cheezburgers k?" And kitteh numbah one couldn't argue bcuz if he did he would get h4x0rd LOL.

Den he ask kitteh numbah 2 da same queshtun. He are said, "The numbah of cheezburgerz I owe him is OVER 9000!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" And the manager was lyke, "ORLY?" And kitteh numbah 2 was lyke "YARLY!" So teh manager said, "Well now you only owe him 800 cheezburgerz k?"

Teh manager pwn3d teh rich kitteh cuz teh rich kitteh was meen. Teh kittehs of da wurld are meen to others of da wurld and not teh holy kittehs. "I wuldn't be meen to holy kettehs either, dey might smite meh!)

So lyke, use ur cheezburgerz to getz u sum frendz, so when ur cheezburgerz get eated, you still gotz teh friends, k?

If you be trusted with kid-sized cheezburger, you be trusted with supahsized cheezburger. But if you no trusted with kid-sized cheezburger, you no trusted with nuttin LOL.

So if you can't be trusted with ur suff, you can't be trusted with other stuff.

And vice versa.

No cat can be in 2 ceilings. Either he hate one and luff teh other, or vice versa. You can't serve both Ceiling Cat and teh cheezburgerz. It one or other, not both, k?

Teh Faraseez luvs cheezburgerz, so dey hissed at Jebus when he sayd dis.

Jebus was lyke, "STFU n00bs! Teh other kittehs think u good, but Ceiling Cat knows the true ingreediants of ur cheezburgers. If erth kittehs lyke it, Ceiling cat don't.

Der used 2 b lots of roolz abowt wut ur not suppozd 2b doin. Now dat i be heer, we don’t be focussin on dat stuff so much.

Eben so, dey r still bein gud roolz. Dey came frum de Ceiling Cat for a reezun, srsly.

Here b 1 exampul: if u have a ladee kitteh bak at home, u btr not b leevin her for sum other kitteh, u no? So not kewl.

I will tell u a storee. Wonz upon a taim der wuz a rich kitteh hoo had minee cheezburgrs.

But anudder kitteh hoo livd neer him (udder kitteh wuz calld Lazarus) had itcheez all ovr,

n he wuz hungree 2 and had no kibbulz of his own; and nastee doggeez were alwayz comin and licken him. Srsly.

But den Lazarus kitteh dyd and went to kitteh hevun wit de anjel kittehs and Abraham kitteh! Srsly! Oh, n rich kitteh dyd 2.

Ded rich kitteh did not go with anjels, tho, he went to de bad plase insted. He cud see Abraham kitteh and Lazarus kitteh far awaee, laffin n lookin happee n stuff.

Ded rich kitteh yelld, “Hey, uz guyz, srsly, cud Lazarus come bring me sum nip and kibbulz 2? I be sad kitteh down heer in dis heet.”

But Abraham kitteh say, “Excuz me, WTF? U spent ur erth time havin gud thingz and not sharin wid Lazarus. Tings sure b diffrent now, huh? Don’t liek it so much now, huh?

Anywayz, even if i wantd 2 i cudnt hep u. Duznt work dat way, sry!"

Den ded rich kitteh sed, “Mayb u go visit my erth famalee den, and give dem warningz?

I got 5 bruders hoo still b on erth. Dey don’t want 2 burn, srsly."

But Abraham kitteh say, "Dey got a copee of de rulz from Moses kitteh and Ceiling Cat alrdy, just liek evrybdy else!”

Ded rich kitteh thot a warning from a gost kitteh mite do da trik, tho.

undefined

And Jebus sed to his lolcats, “U will have lots of temtashuns to be nottee n make invisibul errors, but u shudnt b taken uther kittehs down wit u.

If ur a bad influenz on deh littul kittnz hoo dont b noin bettur, u will b n big, BIG trubul, mistur! Srsly.

If u no a nottee kitteh hoo sayz he be sorree, u shud b giffin him kisses n makin up.

Even if de nottee kitteh steelz ur nip seven timz in wun day but keepz giffin it bak and sayin sorree, u shud still be giffin him kisses."

Den de lolcats sed, “Jebus, we r still confyusd! sho us how ta git mor fayth, k?” 


Jebus sed, “If u kittehs be havin even a tinee kibbul of fayth, u can be growin a hole kibbul tree and tellin it wher ta stand!

Haipothetikal kwestshun: if u had a hyred kitteh hooz job it wuz to be doin ur workingz, u expect him to b doin the workinz he wuz hyred for, rite?

Hyred kitteh getz deh kibbulz after he is dun working, not before.

In udder wurdz, if he duz ur workingz, then hez just duin what hez suppozd ta do, not anyfing supurr speshul.

U kittehs r like Ceiling Cat’s hyred workingz kittehs. He expeks u ta b doin workz for him, becuz thatz what u wuz hyred to do!”

Jebus wuz walkin to Jeroosalum wit his lolcats, and dey were sumwhere round Samareea and Galilee.

As deh Jebus and deh lolcats wuz walkin, 10 itchee grose kittehs came. (Dey was calld lepurrs becuz dey had lepurrsee.) But dey didn’t get 2 close to deh lolcats bc dey noo dey were sik.

Deh lepurr kittehs said, “Jebus, hep r itcheez pleez?”

Jebus saw dem, and sed “Hai! I maded u all bettur now! Go show da vet, k?” And deh lepurr kittehs felt bettur!

Wun of deh was-lepurr-now-bettur kittehs did not go strate to deh vet, but insted went 2 Jebus.

Dat kitteh rold over and showd Jebus his tummeh, and sed “Tank u!” Dis kitteh was a Samaritun kitteh.

Den Jebus sed to hem, “I thot I heeld ten of u lepurr kittehs. Ten minus wun is nien, no?

So how come der only b dis Sarmaritun kitteh tankin me?”

And 2 da tankful kitteh, Jebus sed, “Go play wid ur toyz now, and ly in da sun. Ur fayth made u bettur!”

Farisee kittehs alwayz be tryin 2 trik Jebus wid hard kwestshuns. Dey askd Jebus when Ceiling Cat will come and set up his kitteh kingdum? Jebus sed, “U farisee kittehs r tinkin 2 hard bout dis.

U shld be tinkin bout how to surv Ceiling Cat now, not all dis stuff in da fyutchur.”

N Jebus told his lolcats, “Sometime n da fyutchur u will be hopin itz Ceiling Cat Kingdom Tiem, but it wont b yet.

Udder kittehs will say, “Look! Over dere! Ceiling Cat Kingdom!” But don’t let dem get ur tayl all fluffee. Srsly.

Wen itz Ceiling Cat Kingdom Tiem, u will no for shur, srsly. It will b big and brite, like when humanz tern da lite on in da middul of de niet.

But bfor all dat comz, I have 2 go tru sum bad stuffz ferst. :(

Lolcats, remembur Noah kitteh? (He bilded the ark and ‘scaped the flud, k?)

undefined

Remembur Lot kitteh 2? (He scaped Sodum and Gemoruh’s destrukshun, k?) Deh kittehs he noo wuznt payin attenshun to Ceiling Cat eethur.

N then wun day WHOOSH! FIER BALL! N all the stoopid kittehs wer liek, 'WTF!' n dide. Srsly.

Wen it b Ceiling Cat Kingdom Tiem, it will b kinda like dat 2.

Wen it b Ceiling Cat Kingdom Tiem, don’t b tryin 2 pak up all ur toyz and stuff. Dat b silleeness.

Remembur Lot’s ladee kitteh? (She lookd bak at da burning sittees and turnd 2 salt, k?) When Ceiling Cat Kingdom Tiem cumz, its tiem 4 movin forward, not bak. Srsly.

Deh kittehs hoo tri to gane life will loos it, but deh kittehs hoo loos der liefs will preserv it. Ironik, u see?

Wen it b Ceiling Cat Kingdom Tiem, 2 kittehs will b sleepin in deh kitteh condo; wun wiil go wit Ceiling Cat and wun will not.

2 kittehs will b skratchin on deh skratchin post; wun will go wit Ceiling Cat and wun will be left.

Wen Jebus wuz alone wit his Lolcats, he sed, “We r headin to Jeroosalem, Lolcats, and deh tings dat deh profet kittehs rote will be comin troo.

Remembur, dey sed dat I will b giffin over to deh bad guyz, and dey will teez me n hurt me n even kill me.

And n dat same town der wuz a wihdo kitteh (her huzbun-kitteh wuz ded n she wuz alown). Wihdo kitteh kep askin deh offishul for hep, meown, meown, meown.

Offishul kitteh wuz meen n wud not hep wihdo kitteh, even tho it wuz his job! Not kewl. But finaleee he sed, 'I duznt care bout Ceiling Cat or deh udder kittehs, srsly,

but dis wihdo kitteh will not stop meown until I hep her, so I will hep her 2 make her shut up.'

And Ceiling Cat sed, 'U kittehs heer wat dis meen offishul kitteh sed?

Do u tink Ceiling Cat will not also heer his kittehs hoo prayz to him all deh timez? Ceiling Cat will not ignore deh meowz of his kittehs. Srsly.

Ceiling Cat will hep dem, n rite away 2. He wunderz, wen it be Ceiling Cat Kingdom Time, tho, will his kittehs b fatheful 2 him?'"

Jebus told dis storee speshulee 2 de kittehs dat tink theyr bettur dan deh udder kittehs.

2 kittehs went 2 deh plase where theh do deh best prayinz. One wuz a farisee kitteh and deh udder wuz a taks kitteh, for deh IRS or sumpin.

Farisee kitteh wuz prayin all stuk-up and arrogant, purrin bout hisself. “Tank Ceiling Cat dat I am a betteh kitteh dan all deh udders—-theevin kittehs, sinnin kittehs, cheatin kittehs—-or lyk dis taks kitteh heer.

I catch micez twys a week and giv my xtra kibbulz 2 deh chrch, srsly, kthx.

But deh taks kitteh, he wuz off bai himself. Hiz tayl wuz down, n he wuz not purrin. “Ceiling Cat, forgiv mai nottees, plz?” he sed.

Jebus sed 2 deh lolcats, ‘dis taks kitteh, not the farisee kitteh, made Ceiling Cat purr. Prowd kittehs will get lokd in deh closet, but humbul kittehs will get 2 lai in deh sun.”

All deh kittehs wer carryin der kittnz 2 Jebus, so he cuhd be kissin on dem n stufz. Wen deh Lolcats seed it, dey wuz all angree n grumpee.

But Jebus wuznt angree. He sed, "Let the lolkittnz come 2 me, cuz dey r close 2 Ceiling Cat’s hart.

Srsly, Lolcats, u shld be meown to Ceiling Cat wid deh hart of a lolkittn."

A fansee pyoorbred kitteh askd Jebus, “Gud teechr kitteh, how can I b livin wid Ceiling Cat when I die?”

Jebus sed, “Wai r u callin me gud?” (Trik kwestshun?) “Onlee Ceiling Cat iz trulee gud.

U no the rulz, anyhow. ‘Dont be cheatin, dont be killin, dont be steelin, dont be lyin, n do be lovin ur mommeh and daddeh.’”

Pyoorbred kitteh wuz all, “I do all thoz tings, all deh time! Srsly!”

Jebus sed, “Wun more ting den. Give all ur toyz n ur blankeez  n ur nip n ur kibbulz 2 deh allee kittehs. Den u come be wun of my Lolcats.”

Dis ansur did not make Pyroorbred kitten purr, becuz he luvd all his fansee stufz and wanted it for hisself. Srsly.

Jebus sed, "Sai. Itz so hard for deh Pyoorbred kittehs to get 2 Ceiling Cat Kingdom.

I tink it be eezier for a Germun Shepurd doggeh to fit thru deh kitteh dore.”

Den all deh kittehs arownd sed, “How can a kitteh possiblee get in 2 Ceiling Cat Kingdom, den?”

Jebus sed, “No wurreez, kittehs cant do it, but Ceiling Cat can do anyting. Srsly.”

Deh Lolcat Peetur sed, “We left owr wifies n owr humanz n owr howzes 2 follo u!”

N Jebus tode him, “Srsly. For troo. All deh kittehs hoo left der wifies or der humanz or der howzes for Ceiling Cat, he will be takun gud care of dem on erth n in kitteh hevun 2. No wurreez.”

But after 3 dayz I will be comin bak, k? Srsly.”

Deh Lolcatz were still confoozd, tho. Dey wuznt 2 kwik sumtimz. :(

Jebus n his Lolcats wuz neer Jeriko n a blind allee kitteh wuz diggin’ in de trash 4 sum foodz.

He cudnt see what wuz goin on, but he herd a lot of noyz. He askd de seein kittehs, “Wtf?”

Dey sed, “Itz Jebus walkn by, kthx!”

Den blind allee kitteh den meowd, “Jebus, plz hep me!”

Sum kitteez hoo wuz in deh Jebus parade tode allee kitteh to shut up. But allee kitteh onlee meowd lowder, “Jebus, have mersee!!!1!”

Jebus goed to Jericho.

An der wuz dis rich IRS d00d Zaccheus who want see Jebus

but him too short to see cuz of all da crowdz!  LOL

Him smrt d00d an clim up tree.

Den Jebus luk up in tree an sez "Oh hai!  Git down, cuz I crash at ur plaes toniet."

An Zaccheus wuz happi.

But ppl sez "WTF? Him bad kitteh!  Wai Jebus stay wit him?"

But Zaccheus sez "I be gud kitteh frm now on an gif bak all teh cheezburgrs I stealded.  Timz foar!"

An Jebus sez "Yay! U be savd now!

Datz wut I heer to do!"

When ppl herd dis all dey thot Ceiling Cat wuz come dere nao, but Jebus told dem a story:

Jebus sed "a Fancy Cat goez to a far place to get a kingdom and go back.

Fancy cat calls ten of hiz kittehs and givez dem ten noms. He saiz "use dez noms until I iz back."

But some of the kittehs waz haterz and said "we don't wantz Fancy Cat to be kingz".

Whenz Fancy Cat got back, he called for hiz kittehs with his noms and asked how many more noms they had gotz.

Teh first kitteh came and sayz "you givez me one nom but now i gotz ten."

Fancy cat says "awesome job kitteh. since youz got so many noms now you getz ten cities."

The second kitteh comes and sayz "you gives me one nom and now i gotz 5"

Fancy cat says "you getz five cities then."

Another kitteh comez and says "here is your nomz, i is scared of youz

so i hidez the nom to keep it safes. You iz taking the noms what is not yourz."

So Fancy Cat says "you iz a baaaad kitteh. You knowz i iz a scary cat coz i take the noms which is not mine.

Whyz did you not put the noms in a bank so when i returnz i getz more noms?

Fancy cat says "give this baaaad kitteh's noms to the kitteh with ten noms."

But theyz is confused sand sayz "but he haz ten noms already!

Fancy cat says "I sayz that all the kittehs what haz noms will get more noms but dem kittehs who haz no noms will have all his noms taken away."

"As for the haterz who don't wantz me as king kitteh, bringz dem here and letz me see dem killed."

When Happy Cat haz finished talkingz, he goez on to Jerusalem.

When Happy Cat getz close to Bethphage and Bethany, which arez close to the place which the kittehs call the Mount of Olivez, he sayz to two of his kittehs:

"go youz to dat village and youz will find a colt and bringz it here."

"if any kittehs askz why youz must be telling them "the Master Cat iz needing it."

the kittehs went to dat village and findz da colt just like Happy Cat is telling dem.

but the kitteh who is owning the colt says "why iz you taking it?"

so the kittehs say "cos da Master Cat iz needing it."

They iz taking the colt to Happy Cat and iz helping him on to it.

As theyz is moving on, the kittehs iz coming out and puding themz cloaks on da ground.

As Happy Cat and his kittehs get near the Mount of Olivez, all the kittehs woz happy and woz giving da praise to Ceiling Cat for all the awesomeness their eyez had beholded.

Theyz iz saying: 
"Many noms to da King who comez
In da name of Ceiling Cat.
Happiness in the Ceiling
And much noms in the highest ceilings."

Temple d00dz sez "Happy Cat, taek theyz cheezburgers srsly."

Happy Cat sez "If they duznt tak, rokz will. Srsly."

Happy Cat seez Jerusalem, an he cryz.

and sez "you knowd pease, but you loozed it.

Bad pplz com an bild big wal.

An kil yu to. An youz kittehs. Al bcuz you no seed Ceiling Cat showed up.

Den he goed to tempul an bieted the peepul sellin stuffs, maekn dem leev.

"Is ritten," he sez, "'Iz pwnd yoos in Buk of Matthew, Iz pwnd yoos in Buk of Mark, an if yoos do it n Buk of John Iz pwn u agin, bad kittehs!'"

All kineds of peeplz wuz dere insultin him.

Is lyke wind, it doz its own stufs an u dunno how it werks, but is all ok, amirite? Is like that!"

coz if u beleeves ur not gon be ded! Eternal lifes, u can has it!

Good kitteh no skeered of lyte, cuz himz not messin up."

Afturwurdz, Jesus cross'd teh See of Gallilee.

lotza kittehs went too cuz dey see's teh mirikls He dun.

Jesus went up on teh mountn n sat dwn wit hiz homiez.

Teh jooz cheezberger feest wuz cominz up

Jesus saw lotza kittehs comin n sez to Philip, "We gonna need mor cheezbergerz!"

but Jesus sez dis iz test cuz he no'd wut waz comin.

Phillip sed, "200 daze of cheezberger makin wudn't be enuf to feed all teh kittehs even a lil bit."

One of teh homiez, Andrew, the brudduh o Simon Peter, sez,

"There iz tom-kitteh wit five cheezbergerz n two tuna; but wut good dis do?"

Jesus sez, "Tell them to chilax." N all teh kittehs chill'd on teh grassiez.

Jesus took teh cheezbergerz, sed thx to ceiling cat, and handed teh chzbrgrz to teh chillin' kittehs, also teh tuna.

When teh kittehs were purrin', he ses to His homiez, "Get teh leftover cheezbergerz so nuthin be waestid. kthx."

So Jesus' homies got teh leftovers, and fill'd twelv baskets wit leftovers dat came from teh five chzbrgrz dat wuz more din dey cud eetz.

When teh kittehs see teh mirikle he dun, they sez, "Dat must b teh Profit hoo come into teh wrld."

nite came and teh hommiez went dwn to teh sea,

thay left in a boat, goed cross teh sea to Capernaum. It wuz dark, n Jesus wuz still gonz.

Teh sea wuz dancin n shakin cuz teh wind wuz goin craziez!

Teh homiez see'd Jesus walkin on teh water! OMGWTF? Teh homiez wuz skeered!

Jesus sez to hiz homiez, "Don't be skeered! srsly!"

Teh homies told Jesus to git in teh boat, but teh boat wuz at teh shor alredy.

Teh next day, der wuz lotza kittehs still over the sea dat see'd dat there wuz only one boat, but Jesus didn't go wit his homiez in teh boat, only teh homiez wuz gone.

Sum boats come from Tiberias ware dey ate teh chzbrgrz wen Jesus sed thx to ceiling cat.

Teh kittehz see'd dat Jesus n hiz homiez wuzzint there, dey demselves got into boats n came to Capernaum lookin for Jesus.

And when teh kittehz see'd him 'cross teh sea dey sez to Him, "Dude, how'd u do dat?"

Jesus sed, "Kittehz!  U r not lookin for meh cuz you see'd teh mrklz, but cuz u want teh chzbrgrz!

Don't purr for teh chzburgrz, but for teh cookies dat offer mor din 9 livez, dat teh Son of Catz givz to u. Ceiling cat sez Him goodz stuffz."

So dey sez to Him, "Wut we kin do dat make ceiling cat purrz?"

Jesus sed, "Dis b it, beleev in teh one He sent."

So din dey sed, "Wut mrkl u do, dat we cud beleev in u? Wut kin u do?

Teh momcatz n tomcatz eated cookiez in teh desert, as teh skrptur sez: 'He givz dem cookiez from teh ceiling.'"

So Jebus sed, "Kittehs! dat wuzn't Moses!  Dat wuz ceiling cat dat givz u cookiez from teh ceiling!"

Teh cookiez from teh ceiling cat r dose dat comez from teh ceiling n gives even more din 9lives to teh kittehs."

So dey sed Him, "D00d, givz us deez cookiez! srsly!"

Jebus sed, "I iz deez cookiez, dose dat beleevs will neverz b witout chzbrgrz n creamz in ur saucerz.

But I toldz u dat even tho u see'd meh, u don't beleev.

Everytin dat ceiling cat givz meh I gotz, n I won't reject dose dat comz to me,

For Iz comz down from teh Ceiling, not for mah own flavrs, but for ceiling cat's flavrs.

N dis iz teh will of ceiling cat hoo sent me, dat I shudn't luze anytin dat he givz meh, but dat I shud raiz it in teh end.

For dis is wut teh ceiling cat wantz, that everywun hoo seez teh Son and beleevz in Him getz even more din 9lives, and I will raiz Him in teh end.

Teh Joo kittehs hissed at Him cuz He sez, "I iz deez cookiez from teh ceiling."

N dey sed "Iz dis not Jesus, teh son of Joseph? I no hiz mommacat and tomcat! Din how he sez, 'I comz from teh ceiling?'"

Jebus sed, "Stop hissing at meh!

No wun kin comz to meh lest Ceiling cat hoo sint meh sez so, n I b raizin him in teh end.

It b dare in teh profits: 'Ceiling cat wud teech dem' dose dat hear ceiling cat n lurnz from Him comz to meh.

Kittehs can't seez ceiling cat, tho.  Only teh one who is from teh ceiling can seez ceiling cat.

Kittehs! dose dat beleevs haz even more din 9lives!

I am teh cookiez dat offer even more din 9lives.

Momcatz n Tomcatz eatz chzbrgrz in teh desert n died.

Dis is teh cookiez from teh ceiling so dat kittehs cud eat it and haz even more din 9lives.

I iz teh cookiez from teh ceiling; dose dat eat dis cooki haz even more din 9lives. N teh cookiez I givz iz mai flesh for teh litez of teh wrld.

Teh jooz hissed at eech other n sed, "How kin dis kitteh givz us hiz flesh to eatz?!? WTF?"

Jebus sed to dem, "Kittehs!  Dis is wut u needz to do! U must eatz my flesh n drinkz mai bloodz or u haz less din 9lives, you haz no lives!

Dose dat eat mai flesh n drinkz mai bloodz haz even mor din 9lives, n I wud raiz him in teh end.

Mai flesh iz true cookiez n mai bloodz iz true cream.

Dose dat eat mai flesh n drinkz mai bloodz staiz wit meh n meh wit him.

Just as teh Ceiling Cat sint meh n I haz lifz becuz of ceiling cat, so duz dose hoo feedz on meh wud haz lifz becuz of meh.

Dis is teh cookiez dat comz down from teh ceiling. Not like momcat and tomcat hoo eatz n dize, dose hoo eatz dis cooki livz forever.

Dis was all sed at teh synagogue at Capernaum.

Teh homiez wuz dare and sed, "WTF? Dis iz diffrnt! Hoo kin hang?"

Jebus noo his homiez wuz hissing 'bout dis.  He sez, "Homiez! Dis ain't new!

Wut if u see'd teh Son of Catz rize up to teh ceiling?

It iz teh ghostcat givz lifz, teh flesh don't mattrz! Teh wrds I sed iz sprit n lifz.

But dare r kittehz dat don't beleev."  Jesus noo dat the kittiez dat didn't beleev wud betryz him.

He sez, "Dis b wy I sez nun kin comz to me lest ceiling cat sez so."

but if u can goez in thru shepfold door, u is teh shepperd.

cuz that means shepfold dorman seez u and all ur sheepz hearz u. cuz u give shepz names and takez them from shepfold

and so the shepz hearz name and folowz cuz teh man iz teh shepperd gai.

but if man no iz shepperd gai, sheepz no folow cos is no shepperd gai and no sowndz like teh shepperd guy so shepz are all like: wtf run awai! is no shepperd gai!"

Jebus sed all dis, but teh gaiz wer liek "WAT?! Wat u talkin bout sheepz 4? We is has NO KLU wat u meanz!!"

Jebus sez agn "k, lsn srsly gais, i iz shep door.

Erleer peepz was r0bberz, n sheepz was like: i no lisn 2 u!

I iz door.  (I iz opn door, so u no need 2 compln, k?) U goes thru me, u iz ok, n u go in n u com out n u getz nice gras n noms.

teh wrkr, who iz not sheprd n no ownz teh shep, sees teh wulf n is all liek "O NOES! OMG a wulf! DO NOT WANT!!! run awai!!" n wulf can has his shep n eated them too, n teh rest runz awai.

becos wrkr iz liek "iz not mai sheep", he runz awai.

liek Ceiling Cat noes me n i noes him - n i wud diez for teh shep.

i gotz othr shepz in othr shepfold. i go getz them 2, n they will b liek, "o hai, i kno ur vois", n all teh shepz wil b togethr n i wil b teh 1 sheprd.

teh Ceiling Cat luvs me coz i wud diez... nly to RESPON!!

no d00dz pwns me, i dos it maislf.  i has teh powr 2 do it n i has teh powr to respon agn. teh Ceiling Cat sed so. SRSLY!"

Teh Jewish catz waz confyuzd bai this.

sum waz like, "OMG dats a deemun rite der!! wai u lisn 2 crazi deemun gai!?!?"

n othrz waz like, "no st00pid!! he no can be deemun!! deemunz no can mak blind gais see, rite!?"

Mai shepz heerz me; i knoz dem, and they comez wit me

Ceiling Cat gavez them to mez, and he pwnz you all!!  No one can takez them from Ceiling Cat. NOT WUNCE!!

TEHN SRSLY!!! YOR SAYIN EVN CEILING CATS BEBBEH THAT HE SENTED TO TEH URF NO CAN BE GOD, EVN THO THOZE GAIZ ARE?!?! LOL Why r u accuin' me of blasphumeh cuz I sayz, 'I b Ceiling Cat's Son'?!

An the doods sisters went to find Happy Cat, an were liek "Dis is kewl dood yu wuv, and hes all sickn stuff."

Happy Cat lieked teh dood n hiz sistars.

He ttly took his sweet time getting ready, liek 2 hole daze.

cuz i said all dis stuff, u wanna cryz.

but srsly, iz good for u guys that i go, srsly. if i no leaves, teh HovrCat wont come and you alls be sad, but if i goes, i send him ur wayz, kai.

when teh HovrCat comez, he wantz to convict teh urfs bout ur invisible errorz, what ur thinks riteness, an teh judgement.

bout ur invisible errorz, cuz noone beliefs me.

bout ur thinks riteness, cuz im going to teh ceiling where u cant sees me (LOL).

and also bout teh judgment cuz teh devvil of dese urfs iz condemned nao.

i haz lots to say, lotz moar than u can hear rite nao.

but teh HovrCat iz coming, an he iz going to show u all troofs. he only speakz what he heerz frum ceiling cat, and mite even tell u teh futurez!!

he bringz teh glory to me cuz he takez my stuffz and showz it to u.

all teh stuffz teh Ceiling Cat haz iz mine and  dat iz why i said teh HovrCat iz going to take my stuffz to show u.

in a little bit u no seez me cuz i be INVISIBLE JEBUS!!!LOL! but den u seez me again laters, kthx.

so den teh disipulz where confoozled an sais "WUT DOES HE MEEN?! WE NO CAN HAS JEBUS NO MOAR? An den laters wee can, and 'cuz I go to see ceiling cat some'??

WUT DOEZ HE MEAN BAI DIS? EXPLN PLZ KTHX."

Jebus sees dat deyr awl liek WTF??? so he saided "so uz noe unnerstan whut ai meen 'u no seez me, but den u seez me laters'?

well k, srsly, uz wil be all liek OH NOES!!!1! but teh worled wil be hip hip hooray. an uz wil be sad, boohoo, but den u wil be happee agen.

u see, itz laik laydykat havin bebekittehs: furst itz awl like ow ow halp it hertz! but den, wen dem bebekittehs r bawn, she no dink abaut teh pein, but her dinks 'mai kittehs! good kittehs! prettieh kittehs!'

So, dats y yuz is sad, but iz sees u laters! den yuz is happee liek kittehs wif lotslots cheezburgers dat u can has forevur!

so den in teh futurz, uz woent hav ta be asking meh to can have cheezburgers. SRSLY GUEYS! if uz say to ceiling cat 'i can haz cheezburger coz i friendz wit happy cat?' he sais you can haz, srsly.

all dose tiems befoer uz not been asking becaues weer frends; but now uz can and uz gona bees so happeh.

I ben sayin dees things in riddels liek a wise kat but sooner i can tell uz bout ceiling cat so uz can udderstands me right.

Den you can say 'i can haz cuz ai friens wit happy kat'. wait, see ai not gonna say i can haz for u,

cuz teh ceiling cat luvs uz sooow muech cuz uz luvs meh and uz belieev iz ceiling cats kittehs.

no srsly, iz ceiling cats kitteh an i caem to teh urfs, but now iz gonna goes back cuz to see ceiling cat soem moar, kthxbai.

Den happy catz frends dey sai "finnaly happy cat can has conversayshun liek normal cats an not liek him usuwal riddel kat self, srsly.

now we noes uz noes alot and we dont can need to ask you wai all teh times.  and so now we noes ur dad is ceiling cat."

Happy cat asks, "you can noes now? SRSLY??"

well sooneer, no srsly, soonest, ur all gona run for it under teh diferent beds and hied and iz be in livin room by myslef. But iz not being by myslef cuz ceiling cat lieks to hang out with meh.

So den Pilate tookded Jebus and hittd him many timez wid a wip.

An teh soldjers wuz makinz fun of him. Dey tookded alot of veree painfl thorns, an twisted dem to mak a crown, n dey puttd teh crown on hiz poor hed. An dey also puttd a purpl cloke on him.

Den dey teezed him, callinz him "King" and dey wuz all liek "King of teh Joos! King of teh Joos! May u liv long n prospr... NOT!" an dey slappd poor Jebus liek he wuz a bad kitteh. 

Den Pilate went owt n sed "Joos, I r bingin Jebus owt to u, cuz I dont see dat he wuz such a bad kitteh."

So Jebus caym owt, wearing teh painfl thorny crown n purpl cloke n Pilate sed, "Dis is teh kitteh, see?"

Wen all teh hi preests n gards seed him, dey was all liek "Nail him up! Nail him up!" So Pilate sed "U can haz do it urselvs, den, cuz I dunt see wut dis kitteh has didded rong."

Teh Joos sed, "He r saying dat he r sun of Ceiling Cat, and dis is agenst our law, an teh law sayz dat he shood be maded ded."

Wen Pilate hearded dem say dis, he wuz eben more scareded den bfore.

He wented back into teh Hall of Jujmint, an askded Jebus "War u is frum? WTF wid dis stuff u say bout comin from teh Ceiling Cat?" But Jebus was all silent-cat.

So Pilate wuz all liek "Y u r not speak to me? U r in my power, waitins for my jujmint."

Jebus replyd, "U iz only havin dis powr becuz u wuz givin dis pwr frum above. Becuz of dat, teh giult n invisibl erer of teh kitteh dat btrayd me is more worse."

Wen Pilate hearded dis, he was all liek "Awwwww!" an he reely wanted to let Jebus go free. But all teh time, teh Joos wuz shoutins, "OMG, If u r let dis kitteh go, u r in big trubble wid Ceesar! Jebus r sayin he r a King, an dat is treesin agenst Ceesar!!1!"

So insted Pilate led Jebus owt n maded him sit on teh seat of Jujmint, callded teh Pavmint (only dey callded it Gabbatha in Hebrew but we call it teh Pavmint cuz Gabbatha iz hard 2 say).

It wuz Passovr, an about lunch timez. Pilate sed "Joos, here r ur King!"

But dey all was liek "No wants! No wants! Croosify him!" Pilate sed to dem "U r want I croosify ur King?" an de hed preests all sed dat dey hadded no knig xept fur Ceesar, adn tat ohtr knigs not Cessar r rlly, rlly suck. Srsly. 


So Pilate givd Jebus up to dem, so he coud be croosified.

So dey tookded Jebus away. Dey maded him carree hiz own cross, an it wuz all heavy n stuff. Dey maded him take it to a place dey calld Golgotha in Hebrew, but we r callin it teh Place of Teh Skull, cuz it soundz scarier an iz maded of shorter werds.

Dere, in dat place, dey croosified him. An dere wuz two other peoples dat dey croosified wit him, eech on his own cross on eether side of Jebus, who wuz naild to teh middel cross.

An Pilate hungd a sine on Jebus's cross. An teh sine sed


lots of Joos saw dis sine, cuz dis place wuz neer teh city, an also Pilate had wroted it in Hebrew n Greek n Latin, so lots of kittehs cood understandz it.

Dat's y teh hi preests sed to Pilate "Y u iz writinz Knig of teh Joos? He r not Knig! U shood rite dat he SED he wuz king, but reely wuz lyinz."

Pilate just answrd, "I rote wat I rote."(and he did, srsly)

After dey had croosified Jebus, teh soldjers tookded his clothes an each soldjer gotted a part of dem. But Jebus's tunik wuz verry nice, n maded all of wun pees of cloth.

So teh soldjers sed dey wood play eenie meenie minie mo for teh tunik, to see who wood b gettin it. An so teh psalm 22 wuz rite, wen it sed


Standinz by teh cross, watchins Jebus die, wuz Jebus's mudder, n his mudder's sister, n Mary Magdalene.

An wen Jebus lookded down, n saw his most favoritest dissypel dat he luvd mostest standinz neer hiz mudder, he sed to his mudder, "Woman, behold teh Kittums!"

An he sed to his dissypel, "Look, der is ur new mudder. Srsly." And from den on, dose too peoples livded togedders.

Naow dat Jebus knowd dat his werk wuz done, so dat teh scripchers wood turn owt rite, he sed "I r so thirsty... I can haz milk plz?"

Der wuz a bottel of sowr milk dere, n teh meen peoplez dippded a spunge into it, an dey held teh spunge to Jebus's mout.

Wen Jebus tasted dat sowr milk, he sed "it r finished" an he hung hiz hed, and he givded up hiz spirit.

Teh Joos wuz wantinz Pilate to to mak teh soldjers brake teh legs of teh peoplez on teh cross, so dat dey wood die fasters. Dis wuz becuz it wuz almost der sabbith, an it wood be bad for teh bodies to be all hanginz up on teh cross on teh sabbith.

So teh soljers camed an brokded teh legs of teh other two peoplez on teh crosses, so dey wood be dyinz faster.

But wen dey saw dat Jebus wuz alreddy ded, dey wuz all liek "OMG!" an dey did not brakded his legs.

But wun of teh soldjers did stab his side wit a speer, an all dis blood n stuff camed owt of Jebus.

An u can beleev dat dis wuz tru, cuz a kitteh dat wuz der says so.

Dese tings dat happened wuz just liek teh scripchers say, wen dey say


undefined

Wen all dis wuz ovr, Joseph of Arimathea (who wuz a homie of Jebus but was scarded of teh other Joos) secretly went to Pilate all stelthy-liek an sed "I can haz Jebus's body?" and Pilate sed yes. So he tookded away teh body of Jebus.

An Nicodemus (who first camed to Jebus at nite) camed too an broughted, liek, a hunderd pownds of spices.

Den dey tookded teh body of Jebus n dey rapped it in teh spices an nise papr towles (cuz dis is wut teh Joos lieked to do to deyr ded kittehs).

Aftr dez stuff, teh dscpls sez happy cat at Tiberiases Sea, and he duz it liek ths.

Simon Petercat and Thomcat whoz naemd Didcatymus and Nathaniel frm Cana in Galilee, Zebedeez sonz, and two othuh dscpls wuz tgthr.

And Simon Peter sez to thm: "Ize goan out fssshng."  And they sez: "Weez goin too."  So out goez them and getz into the baot, but they din catchin nuthn.  All nght.  Srsly.

Happy Cat, sez dem, but dey did not dink it was Happy Cat.

He mewd, "Haf u any fish?".  Dey zed "Nu".

He zed, "Drop ur fish net de other wayz". Dey did dis an loz of yumy fish fild teh net an dey couldnt pick it al up.

Den teh dscpl woh Happy Cat luvz, zed "it is Ceiling Catz kitty", an petercat herd dis he put on his top and jumd in teh nasty watrz to get to Happy Cat.

Teh othrz came in with the boat and al teh fish.

Dey sez him cooking fish burgerz.

Happy Cat sez to dem, "Bring some fish to cook".

Petercat got teh 153 vry big fish an dropd dem at Happy Cat, an teh net had nu hols in it.

Happy Cat sez "ymm, eat", an nu dscpls sez "who r u?", dey all knoz he was Ceiling Catz kitty.

Happy Cat dropd dem teh fishburgers.

An dat waz twee tiems Happy Cat waz with dscpls after hm liev again.

Aftr tehy haz teh fishburgrz, Jesus sez to Petercat, "Simon Johnson, doz u luvz me moar thn tihs?" and he sez "lol, yah, I liek u moer than ear rub." and Jesus sez "Mah miec can haz burgrz."

And Happy Cat sez gen "Hay Simon Johnson, doz u loves me moar dan tilapia fish?" and he sez "um yah, I liek you moar dan belly rub." and Happy cat sez "U keep mah miec saef."

An Happy Cat sez one moar tiem "Hay Simon Johnson, doz u liek me moer dan chin rub? Srsly?" and Petercat iz liek WTF? becuz Happy Cat sezd "Does u liek me" gen and he sez "u knoz evrything, srsly u knoz, I Luvs u." and Happy Cat sez "Moar burgrs for mah miec"

"Srsly, srsly, when u waz teh kittehns, u haz teh fur and u goes placez u want; u will haz teh olds and sumone elsz haz teh fur fore u and tehy sez 'U goes here naow, k?' and u sez 'Do not want!' but u goes tehre neways."

And he sayed teh stuffs becuz tahts haow he diez becuz teh Ceiling Cat pwns. And aftr he sayed teh stuffs he sez "Hy, chase me, k?"

'N Peter seez Jebuz' favrit personz

'n when he seez him hez liek "Whatboutz dis gai?"

an Jezus iz liek "If ai wantz him to livez until I returnz, tehn WTF?"

An al teh pepolez sedz that he wuold nevah diez cuz o dis.  But Jesus dun sez he wuold nevah diez, he juz sez, "If ai wantz him to livez until I returnz, tehn WTF?".

Dis iz teh dscpl who sez diz who writez dem.  We srsly nowz heez sayin it rght!

Den dey got boreded and tireded cuz lookin at teh ceilin a long time hurt der neckz. Dey has got to Jerusalem frum the Mount ov Olives, wich r icky green plantz and stufs.

He useted to b wun ov uz! Rly! We shareded cookiez wit him.

Dis persun has be wit Jebus frum teh strt, k? All teh way to wen he get beeted n put on teh cross. Srsly. An he had to see Jebus go to teh ceiling. u got all dat?"

Peter an John are in ur templez, prayin at three in teh daytiem.

Nao der wuz dis kitteh who wuz all ickeh an deefowmed an him sit at teh gaet dat wuz calleded Bootifool an him wud beg to teh oder kittehs.

Den him sawded Peter an John an him wuz all, "Awms for teh poow?"

Den Peter lewk at him an John did too. Den Peter wuz all, "Hey joo, luuk!"

Lamz0r kitteh gets all happeh cuz him fowt him wud get sum awms.

An Peter halpded teh ex-lamez0r kitteh git up an him pawz werkded nao!

An ex-lamez0r kitteh danse! Him wiggle to teh lef, an to deh rite, an him wiggle fwont an bak. Luuk! Nao him be in teh templez, dancin on teh tabelz!

Den Peter gose in anoder long speech cuz him lik talkin, an him sed: "Hey jookittehs! Yu are suwpwised? LOL, ur stoopid. Wai yu lukin at us lik we madeded him walk lik diz all on ouwah own? LOL, stoopid!

Dood, Jebus wuz all lik teh maker of cat macrows, srsly! Dun wry, Ceiling Cat makeded him com back to teh lif!

Jebus is 'teh stown ya bilderz rejec, wich becum teh cownerstone'

Nobodie els can has giv yu cheezburger. Srsly.

Dey wer impwesed cuz Peter and John wer st00pid kittehs wif no schoolin an dey wer suwpwised dey nu Jebus.

An becuz teh ex-lamez0r kitteh wuz rite der dey cud do nuttin.

So dey sen dem awai an INVISIBLE MICROPHONE:

"D00ds! Wut we gunna do! Everywun saw dis, even witout Teevee bein inventeded yet! We can has fail!

Oh. I know. We gunna tell dem not to speek in dis naim anymoar!

Den dey cawlded dem bak an sed, "J00 newbs dun tawk abut Jebus anymoar."

But Peter an John hawmoneeusly sed bak, "LOL, who we gunna lissen to, Ceiling Cat or joo? lol!

We gunna keep tawkin, so yu gunna keep lissenin!"

Den duh impowtan kittehs hiss an spit but den dey let em go. An dey cud not think of how to poonish dem becuz dey mad lots ov kittehs happeh! Dey be dansin now! WAI!

Duh ex-lamez0r kitteh was lik fowty yeers owd! lol

Den Peter an John go bak an tattel on teh cheef preests an stuffz.

Den dey all had invisble tawk to Ceiling Cat togedder an dey sed, "Kewl Ceiling Cat, yu so awsum! Yu make everthin, srsly! Yu mak cheezburgers for us and stuff. Rly.

Yu in David's mouf, makin him sing,
		'Wai do nashuns be angree an mak bad plans

An odder kings an leeders an stuff all try to be meen to Ceiling Cat
		an be meen to his annowtainted wun!'

Yu see, Herod and Pontius Pilate an odder peepl, both joocat and notjoocat made bad plans aganst Jebus who yu annowtainted.

Yu wer in der boddehs, fulfillin profisie.

An even doh dey mak meen wowds, yu gunna mak yu sewvants wis and stuff k?

Oh! An yeh, sum kewl twicks can has help too! lol"

An aftah dey had invisible tawk teh HoverCat wuz in all of dem, srsly.

Dood, teh kittehs shaird, srsly. All ov it.

An teh apawsals kept tawkin bout Jebus all teh time an it wuz so good

dat all teh kittehs had plenti of cheezburgers an cookiez, rly. An sumtiems teh kittehs sowd all dey ownd

an dey put it at teh apawsals paws an dey took it an gav it to kittehs witout stuff. It wuz so awsum, lol.

An dis wun awesum kitteh naimd Joseph, him wuz a Levite frum Cyprus, an fo sum reesown dey call him Barnabas, an

Okai, lissen up. Der wuz dis kitteh naimd Ananias an him has a wif naim Sapphira. An dey also sowd sum land, rly.

OMG! Sapphira nu dis, an Ananias kep sum monee frum teh chawch. Him can has profitz. Him tak teh res ov teh monee an put it at teh paws of teh apawsals. lol.

An Peter wuz so smrt, him sed, "Yo Ananias, dood, Basement Cat so has yu. Basement Cat is in ur hart, makin yu keep teh profits.

Wai yu do dis. Yu ownd teh land befor an yu stil do dis? Wow, j00 stoopid. Cuz yu lie to not onlee kittehs, but to Ceiling Cat. Do not want!

Den Ananias mak ded. lol.

An oder kittehs com an put him in shoobocks an buree him.

An tree howahs latr Sapphias com in.

An Peter sezm "Oh hai! Teh monee yu giv, is dat wut yu can has frum teh land sowd?" An Sapphira sez bak, "Yep!"

An Peter sed bak, "LOL, dum! Yu lie to Ceiling Cat! Yu see teh pawpwints. Dey buree ur husban, an gess wha? Yu nex, lol. kthnxbai!

Den Sapphira mak ded. lol. An oder kittehs com an put her in shoobocks an buree her.

An teh chawch wuz scairdy kittehs nao!

Teh apawsals do lotz of twickz an dey heel kittehs, lol. An dey met in Solomon's Colonnade.

An dey wer veree pawpoolar, but dey had INVISIBLE FRENS cuz dey wer scairdy kittehs.

But stil kittehs beleev an dey can has faif an dey addeded to teh chawch. Srsly!

An teh sick kittehs, dey wer put in teh streetz on kitteh beds cuz dey wan shadow ov Peter to go on dem.

Der wer lotz of kittehs der, all teh way frum not Joorusalem. Dey even browt kittehs wif DarkKittehs in dem. Eep!

Teh Sadooshies git mad an dey git jelus. lol, stoopid.

Dey go bak an sed, "We can has empty jale, sry, lol. We open teh jale an everythin, not der!"

An teh capn go "Nuuuuuuuuuu!" An everywun wundah wat com nex. INVISIBLE FUTURE, lol

Den sumwun cam an sed, "Oh hai. Dood, dey in teh tempel cowts preechin. Luk!"

Dey bring teh apawsals but dey dint hurt em cuz dey dint want teh oder kittehs to throw teh kitteh littr at dem.

An luk, we can has HoverCat, an we see dis stuff. Srsly."

An teh impowtan kittehs hiss an spit. Dey wan to claw teh apawsals ded.

But a Phairysee naim Gamaliel, wuz a teecha, an sed "No. Wait. Put dem owtsied."

Den him tawk, "Dood, be carful, rly.

Membah dat kitteh naim Theudas who had forhundred kittehs? Dood, him wuz mad ded, an him kittehs jus go awai.

An yu membah Judas an Galilean. Dey be goin to teh sensus, makin a reevowt. But him wuz mad ded an his kittehs jus go awai.

Jus let deez kittehs go. If dey jus doin dis for demselfs dey gunna jus go awai.

Dey may be wif Ceiling Cat, rly! An den yu be makin fite wif teh big wun an yu jus gunna los. Rly."

An his speech mak dem agwee, an den dey cawl teh apawsals in an dey scrach em bad! Den dey sed, "Dun tawk bowt Jebus."

An teh apawsals lef an dey danse! Dey danse to teh lef an to teh rite. Dey wer happeh cuz dey got hurteded for Baby Jesus.

During time wen deesipels wer gettin moar deesipels, teh Greasin Joos wer complaynin.  Dey sed Heebrayk Joos wer gettin moar fud for der windows.

Teh Twelv got awl deesipels togethr an sed, "dis stoopid.  We wurship Ceiling Cat, knot bring cookies.

Bros.  Chooz seven guys full uf spearamint and wizdum.  We maek dem maek cookies

wile we pray n stuf."

Dis pleezes dem.  Dey chooz Steevn, Filip, Prorororos, Nikanur, Tymin, Pancreas, and Nikolas.

Dey show dem to Apossulz, who preyd and laid on dem.

So dey spred Ceiling Cat wurdz.  An dey gets bunches moar deesipels in Joosalem, an teh preests do wut dey told.

Steevn wuz full uf Ceiling Cat power.  He mayd majix for teh ppl.

But teh Joos of Styrene an Alekzanderia an Silly-see-ya an Ayja getted pissd.  Dey argoo wif Steevn

but dey wuz all pwned bi Steevn's wizdum and spearamint.

Dey say to uthr mans, "Shhhh, dis sekrit!  Steevn hates Ceiling Cat.  Oh, an Mozus.  kthnks."

So ppl gets pissd at Steevn.  Dey taked him to da Salmonheedrin.

And dey brung liarz who sed, "Dis dude sez he hates laws an holes.

He sez Jebus of Nazbatazz will pwn dis playce an take away da stuffs we gots frum Mozus."

undefined

Den teh high preest axed him, "Iz true?"  (How cum PREEST kan gets HIGH?)

An Steevn sayded:  "Yo bros and papas, peep dis.  Teh Ceiling Cat appearded to owr old man Abrahamsammich wen he wuz in teh Messed-up Tamia, befor he mooved to Haran.

'Leaf yur contry an pplz an stufs,' Ceiling Cat sed, 'an go over heer.'

"So he hopped teh nex trane to Haran.  Afta hiz pops wer made ded, Ceiling Cat sended him to dis plase we at rite now.

He didnt gave Abrahamsammich ne munneys or lands.  But Ceiling Cat swored dat his baybeez wud pwn teh hole shebang, evin tho Abrahamsammich had no baybeez. (Lolwut?)

Ceiling Cat sed:  'Yur baybeez will bee teh NOT WANT uf teh contry, an dey will bee slavs an treeted in NOT GOOD wayz.  Oh, an dats how it gonna bee for forty yeers times ten!

But I wills pwn teh nayshun taht maks dem slavs, so no biggie.  An afta dat, dey will leev dat nashun an come wurship Me in dis playce rite heer.'

Den teh Ceiling Cat gived Abrahamsammich teh convent uf circlestishun.  An Abrahamsammich had a baybee an circlestized him eight daze ltr.  Teh baybee was Izack, an Izack had a baybee namd Jaycub, an Jaycub had twelv baybeez hoo became teh paytreearks.

"An cuz teh paytreearks wuz jellus uf Joesef, dey selled him too Ejipped for teh slaving.  But Ceiling Cat had Joesef's back

an saveded him frum his trubbles.  He gived Joesef wizdum (but NO SPEARAMINT!) so teh Ejippeds king Fairoh wud be liek: 'Rule my Ejippeds an my stufs.'

"An den teh hungree-time came to teh Ejipped an Caynan, wif teh suffring and teh no fud.

Wen Jaycub herd dat der wuz fuds in Ejipped, he told owr papas teh paytreearks 'DO WANT!'  Dey vizit Ejipped.

Den dey vizits agen an Joesef sez 'I iz yur bro-hemes,' an he telled Fairoh 'bout hiz famleez.

An Joesef say 'Breeng Jaycub an hole famleez heer!' an all seventee plus five show up.

Den Jaycub an owr papas livd in Ejipped until dey wer made ded.

Ther deded boddees wer put in a toomb taht Abrahamsammich had bawted frum teh Hamor baybeez
at teh Shechem.

"So wile it getting clos to time fer Ceiling Cat to keep bargin wif Abrahamsammich, der wuz getting moar an moar uf owr peeps in Ejipped.

Den teh Fairoh wents away an Ejipped gots anuthr king hoo did knot no Joesef.

He wuz a meenie an made owr forepapas throw owt der baybeez to make dem ded.

An Mozus wuz baybee at dat time an he waznt liek teh rest of teh childs.  He livd wif his papa for three munths

befor he wuz put outside to make ded, but teh new Fairoh's dawter fownd him an razed him as her own baybee.

Mozus wuz learnded by the Ejipped ppl an wuz gud at teh speeching an doing.

"Wen Mozus was four timez ten yeerz old, he went too vizit hiz peeps.

He sawded one uf dem beeng pwnd by an Ejippedshun, so he maed teh Ejipped man ded.

Mozus thawt dat hiz fello Izreelites wud see dat Ceiling Cat wuz uzing him to be helping dem, but it not happn.

Teh nex day, he sees two Izreelites throwin down.  He tryed to maek dem NOT WANT bi saying: 'U two r bro-hemes.  Y do u want to pwn eech othur?  Hugz time now?'

"But teh one guy sez to Mozus: 'Yur knot teh boss uf me!

Do u wanna pwn me liek u pwnd taht Ejipped dood yesturday?'

Wen Mozus hearded dis, he DID NOT WANT an mooved to Mideean an had two boi baybeez.

"Afta for timez ten yeers passded, Mozus wuz in teh dessert neer Mownt Sinus an sawed a baybee tree on teh firez!  Wif ainjel in it!

'ZOMG!' seded Mozus.  He lukd kloser an hurd teh voys uf teh Ceiling Cat:

'I iz teh Ceiling Cat uf yur daddiez, teh Ceiling Cat of Abrahamsammich, Izak, an Jaycub.'  Mozus wuz ascared and atremblin.  He no look.

"Teh Ceiling Cat sed to him, 'Taek off yur skandals!  Yur standin on mah hole ground!

I haz seen teh pwning uf mah ppl in teh Ejipped.  I haz hurd thur DO NOT WANT and haz cum down to sets dem free.  Go bak to Ejipped now.  kthnksbai.'

"Dis be teh same Mozus hoo dey rejektud wif da werdz:  'You knot boss uf me!'  Ceiling Cat sent him to bee thur roolur throo teh ainjel in teh baybee tree on teh firez.

He leeded dem owt of Ejipped an did teh majix in teh Ejipped an maed teh red watter moov thing happn, an for for timez ten yeers in teh dessert.

"Dis is teh Mozus hoo told teh Izreelites:  'Ceiling Cat wil sended u a profit liek me frum yur own ppls.'

Him wuz in teh assembleez in teh dessert, wif teh ainjel taht tawk too hims on teh Mownt Sinus, an wif r papas;  An he sended us wurds dat wer alive!  (EW!)

"But ourz faver kittehs dontz lisenz. Dey dis him an go Egypt. (Bad peeplez)

Dey telled Aaron, 'Maked uz Ceiling Cats whoz goez baforez uz. srsly Az forez Mozus whoz leadedz uz fromz Egyptz weez dontz knowz whatz happeded too himz.' srsly

Dayz maded baybeh moocowz idolz. Dey taked sacrificez too baybeh moocowz idol and holded celebrashun in honerz of moocowz idol. srsly

Ceiling Cat turneded wayz and giveded dems to deh Ceilingly bodeez. srsly Dis agreez wif writed stuffz in deh bookz of deh profets:

"Arez fourfaverz (taugt Iz luckyz wif one!!!) had tabernackle tingyz ofz tesfomonyz wif dem in desert. It waf madez likez ceiling cat orderezded Mozus 'cordin to teh patternez he sawed!

Having gotted the tabernackle (twy sayingz dat wif a traigt facez!) arez favers undered Joshua brinded itz wif dem wen deyz takeded da landz fwom da natinz Ceiling cat drived awayz b4 dem. It stayded in da land untilz Davidz,

whoez enjoyededz ceiling catz favorz and askeded dat he getz too maked a hoaze forz Jacobz.

Butz Solmenanz makeded da hoaze fored Jacobz.

Butz most high (dats da cat wif catnipz...nom nom nom...) don lived in haozez maded by guyz. Az profetz sehs:

"'Da ceiling is miez trone, and da urfz my footpadz. Whatz haoze u maked forz meh? Says Ceiling cat. Oar wherez will miez westing pwace beez?

Haz meh paw not makeded all tings?

Yuz fermz-fifted peepz, wif unholeez hartz an eerz! Yuz likez yur faverz: You alwaz dis da Ceiling cat!

Wav derez ever a profet yur faverz no dis? Dey eved maked ded dose onez who toldz of da richous one coming! Noaz you maked ded him

yuz who gettedz da rulez dat was maded so by da BirdKats but you noes lisens!

Whenz dey heerded dis dey were pissed an makeded evilz faecez at da peep.

Butz Stevan, filleded wif da Ceiling Cat lookeded upz tooz da ceiling anz seed da gloreez of Ceiling Cat and Jebus standing paw to paw wif Ceiling Cat.

"Seez," he sayeded, "Iz seez da ceiling opin ans da sonz of da Ceiling Cat standin paw to paw wif Ceiling Cat."

At dis dey covereded derez eerz and yelleigz atz da topz of dere voicez dey all runneded really fast atz himz,

an draggeding himz outz da cityz and stoneded himz. While da peepz watchin all putted dere clovez at do footeez of a d00d nameded Saulz.

undefined

An' Sawl wuz der, givin' uproovl to hiz deth.

Sum nais catz madeded a berrial foar 5tephen, an' dey wer sadz, sayin' stiuffz liek "WAI DID YEW HAV TWO GOEZ?!?"

But dose kitties, dey wer distracteded becawz Sawl stardeded two kyl da church! He putteded all da church-goen kitties in jael.

Dose catz who got scaterd toald evrybodee dey met 'bout T3h Word. So Filip, he went two Sammyra and preechd der too.

undefined

Win da udder kittehs frum Sammy sawd Filip doin CEILIN' CAT MAGIC! (but wuz not majik, wuz merukel, silee!) Dey pade atenshun two him.

And dose catz wit EBUL! spearits in der heart, dey wer frede, but not befoar EBUL! spearits maded laod noies. And also, da cripplz and da parliddikz wer heeld.

So der wuz graet joi in dat sidee.

So dis cat naimd Simon, he livd in Sammyra foar long time. He wuz teh MAGIC!cat, but also wuz cawld Soarcer, bekuz is shorter den MAGIC!cat. But ineewais, he makeded da kitties uv Sammyra liek hiz trix, an' he cawld hizzelf Cool Cat,

an' bofe rich an' pore kittehs gaev all der atenshun two him. Dey sed, "Dis gai iz liek Ceiling Cat!"

An' dey folloed him bekuz he makeded shainee majikz.

But win Filip got der, an' he spakeded about Ceilin' Cat an' Happy Cat, an' all da catz gots likd-cleen, even t3h gurl-catz!

Even Soarcer Simon beleevd an' wuz kleend in t3h watrz. An' he folloed Filip evrywer, an' he wuz amazd and razldazld bai all da merukels and sains he sawd.

When da Possles in Jerryslam herd dat Sammyra axeptd T3h Word, dey send Peter an John over dere.

Dey praid two Ceiling Cat for da peepl two get HoverCat'd,

bkuz dey wer naut HoverCat'd yet (dey wur only licked-kleen in da naim uv t3h Ceiling Cat).

So Peter an John maded da Sammyra-catz get HoverCat'd.

An' Simon da Soarcer saw dat da kittiez got HoverCat'd when Peter an' John pokeded dem, and he had munee, so

he sed, "If I givz u munee, wil u givz me dis power so I cn givz peepl t3h HoverCat two?"

An' Peter rplied, "U shudd dai wif ur money, bkuz u tinkz u can bai t3h Ceiling Cat's POWER!

U ar naut a prt uv dis bkuz ur heart iz not right wiff t3h Ceiling Cat.

Maybee u can unhurt Ceiling Cat's feelngz if yew pray an' say sry. Dat shudd make ur heart right.

I can see insaid u, an' ur heart iz very biddr an' a priznr two S!N.

T3h Soarcer sed, "Plz pray foar me bkuz DO NOT WANT die wiff munee."

Wen Peter an' John wer dun in Sammyra, dey wint two Smaritan places two tell 'bout Ceiling Cat.

Den a WingCat sed to Filip, "Go south tru da dezrt an' go two Gaza."

So Filip, he meeted a nootrd Abyssinian kitteh, an da nootrd Abyssianin kitteh wuz in charj uv t3h muneez uv t3h Ethyopyun queen Candy. Da nootrd kitteh wuz goin' two Jerryslam two wurship t3h Ceiling Cat,

an' on hiz wai hoem in hiz charryut he wuz raedin t3h bukk uv Isaiah da Profffit.

Dat saem WingCat told Filip, "Go an' stai by dat charryut."

So Filip went two da charryut an' herd da gai reedin' Isaiah out loud (WTF?! hoo reeds outloud in charryuts?). An' Filip sed two da unuk, "Do yew get what yewr reeding?"

Da unuk sed, "Naut reely bkuz nobodee asplaynd it two me." Da nootrd kitteh letted Filip ried wif him in da charryut.

Da unuk wuz reedin' dis part:
An he wuz leeded liek a shepe two da slodder,
an' kinda like lamz doan't yell win gedding a haircut,
he wuz quiet liek dat.

He wuz slodderd wiffout dignity,
so nobudee tokks bout his kidz,
bkuz iz not heer to heer it.

Da unuk wuz liek, "Iz he tokking bout hizzelf? Or summbudee elsz?

An' Filip yewzd hiz skillz two start wiff dat part an den go on two asplayn all bout Happy Cat.

Den laydr dey caem two sum wadder. Da unuk sed, "DO NOT WANT wadder, but wai naut get likd-cleen nao?

Filip sed "If yew beleev bout Ceiling Cat, yew can do it." Da nootrd kitteh rplyed, "I buleev Happy Cat iz t3h son of Ceiling Cat."

Da nootrd kitteh tolded da charryut two stop.  Den boaf Filip an da nootrd kitteh wented daon in da wadder and Filip likded-cleen da nootrd kitteh.

undefined

At sametimez Saul still wuz sayin bad stufs aganst Ceiling Cat's 'sciples. He goed to high preest

He askd high preest for ledderz to teh sinamagogz in Damascus, so if he foundz ne menz or womenz who followed Ceiling Cat, he could taek dem be puts in Jerusalem jale.

As he wuz on teh way to Damascus, all of suddens lite appear! Lite frum Ceiling, zomg!

Saul gotz skeerd so he fells to ground and Ceiling Cat speekz. "Saul, wtf, why u hurtz me?"

"Who is u?", Saul asks."

Ceiling Cat sez, "I iz Jebus, ftw! And u iz hurting me an my peeps. u must go to teh city, u will getz instrukshunz der."

Teh othur guiz Saul waz travlins wit were like, "Um k, wtf?", cuz they hurd Ceiling Cat but din't see Him.

Saul got up from teh gwound but he reelize that he culdn't see nuthing cuz crazie lite mades him blind. So teh othur guiz helped Saul gets rest of wai to Damascus.

Saul blind for free days, and during dese days he not drink or eats foodz. Not even cheezburger!

In Damascus ther waz 'sciple by naem of Ananias. Ceiling Cat spoke to him in vishun. Ananias anserd an sed, "Oh hai! What up?"

Ceiling Cat sed, "There is howse of Judas on Straight Street. U mus goes cuz ther man from Tarsus naemd Saul, and he iz praeyin.

I shoewd him vishun, and in vishun you putted your hans on him and gived him back his site."

Ananias anserd. "But I has heards stuff bout this gui. Isn't he dat guy who was pwning your saintz an stuff?

And he haz comes here with cheef preestz 'thority to putz your peeps in jale! Iz I not rite?"

Ceiling cat says "Yes, he waz but he differn now. I has maded him to followz me an speak in my naem to teh Gentiles, ther kingz and Israel peeps.

I shoewz him how much he mus suffur for mah name. No worriez, kk?"

So Ananias wented to howse. He foundz Saul and dids wut Ceiling Cat say. He place hans on Saul. Ananias sed, "Hai Saul, Ceiling Cat, who pwnded your eyez with crazie lite, sented me to u so you cans be filld with teh Hover Cat. kk? You can has site bak."

Then weerd scaly thingz fell frum Saul's eyes. Saul seez again, ftw!!! Furst thing he do: he getz baptisd.

Saul spend lotz dayz with teh 'sciples in Damascus.

Whiel he waz der he speaks about Ceiling Cat n' stuf in teh sinamagogs.

All teh peepz who wer lisnin' were like "wtf is dis?! I thot dis iz teh guy who waz pwning Ceiling Cat peepz in Jerusalem? Why he speek good thingz n' stuff about Ceiling Cat now?"

Even tho peepz were like "wtf", he getted more wizdumb in Ceiling Cat stuff, and kepd preechin' stuff to Jews in Damascus.

Moar dayz go by, and Jews got 'spishus and plotted to kill Saul.

But Saul figurded out ther plan! For a few dayz, Jews watchded city gaets in case Saul tryd to 'scape.

But der wer peepz who lieked Saul. They put him in baskit an lowerd him outsied city. Saul 'scape!

Saul wented bak to Jerusalem, an he tryd to join teh 'sciples there, cept they were like "omg" cuz they din't beleeve he camez to be Ceiling Cat's 'sciple.

But Barnabas talkd with the 'sciples an tolded them all 'bout how Saul camez to be Ceiling Cat's 'sciple too cuz of teh crazie lite on teh wai to Damascus.

So the 'sciples beleeved Barnabas, and tehy let Saul stai wit dem. Togedder tehy preeched teh Gospel in Jerusalem, in teh name of Ceiling Cat!

Tehn Saul preeched to Grecian Jews. They were like "diz guy needs a good pwning. He iz not of Ceiling Cat!"

Teh other 'sciples herd this, so tehy taeks Saul to Caesarea and sended him to Tarsus, away from crazi ppl.

Tehn all of churches, Judea, Galilee, Samaria, tehy all getz tiem of peace! Hover Cat Kitteh strengthinz churches; moar Ceiling Cat pplz cames to be. Yay!

As Peter travld arown teh countree, he goed to visit teh saints in Lydda.

In Lydda man naemd Aeneas. He crippel; he cans not move, n' he been crippel for ate yeerz. ATE YEERZ!

Peter talkted to dat gui. "Hay gui, Ceiling Cat maeks you has movement. u nots be crippel nemore, lol, u mus now get up, you unnastanz?" Aeneas tryd to get up. And wht u noes!!!!! He canz! He no moar crippel!

All teh pplz who lievd in Lydda and Sharon saw wut happen; they wer liek, "Praiez teh Lowrd!".

In Joppa, tehre waz a laydee. Hir name Tabitha. She waz a good ppl! She helpd poor ppl.

'Cept she getted sick and dide! Oh noes! Hur corpz waz plaecd in a room in the uppur flor.

Lyyda, o'courz iz neer Joppa, so it waz not long 'till wurd got aroun to Peter.

So Peter wented to Joppa an went to teh houws whaer Tabitha was ded. Tehr waz widowz. tehy all crowdud 'roun Peter, and craid. Tehy also shoewd Peter closthez n' stuf tat Tabitha maded wen she wuz not ded.

Peter told teh widows to scram. So tehy did. Tehn Peter neelded down an praed. He lookd at teh corpz an waz liek, "Hay, Ceiling Cat makez u unpwned. u getz up kkthx!" Tabitha stopd beein ded and Peter help'd hir get up. Tehn he sed to teh beleevirz and widowz to come inz and see wut Ceiling Cat had helpd him do.

Noos of Tabitha's rezurrecktshun spred throo Joppa. Lotz of ppl starded beeleeving in Ceiling Cat.

undefined

At Cezarea der wuz a d00d naemd Catnelius n he wuz da "big cat" in da Regimans.

He n hiz famileh luvd Ceiling Cat n talkd 2 him daileh n gave cookiez to kittehs who wuz liek "I has be in need."

One dai durin kitteh litter time he sees sum craezy-azz vishuns.

Catnelius wuz liek "oh shaet LOL"

Teh anjul sed "Ur praers n cookiez has be a memorial offerin 2 da Ceiling Cat.

Now send sum peeps 2 git Simon (most catz call em Peter, idk y).

Ya git hiz azz ova hear."

Wen teh anjul lef Catnelius got 2 d00ds n a Gawd-freain soulja. H gaev em teh dirt on Ceiling Cat n send em 2 Joppa.

Teh nex dai Peter wuz talkn 2 Ceiling Cat on teh roof.

Den he sez "I has hunger n I want sumtin 2 eatz."

He saw a big sheet like peepz hav on deir bedz.

It has animulz on its wit teh 4 feetz.

Den a voice (Ceiling Catz I think) sez 2 Pete, "Git up, Peter. Can has cheezburger."

Peter sez, "uh-uh, Loard, I dont eatz teh unclaen."

Den God wuz piszed n hes liek, "Do not call teh cheezburger unclaen dat I has made claen."

Repeat step 13-15 three tiemz.

While Petey wuz wunderin bout teh vishunz, sum d00ds is stopped at teh gaet.

"Haysup," dey sez, "Were iz Simon (most catz call em Peter but idk why)?"

Whiel Pete wuz still thinkin, Ceiling Cat sez "Hay, 3 d00ds r lookin 4 u.

Git yo azz up n go downstaers."

Peter went downstaers n sed "Wut do u want."

Dey sez, "We has come from Catnelius da "big cat" from teh Regimans. He iz teh right-ness God-freain d00d. Da Ceilin Cat made uz come get u."

undefined

Teh gud kittehs in Judea hurd bowt Gentiles getin cheezburgerz from Ceiling Cat.

So wen Peter wuz off to Jerusalem, teh kittehs wit cut pen13 gotz mad

an sez, "BAD KITTEH! Yu eated cheezburgerz with catz can haz no cut pen13."

Peter iz all:

"I wuz preyin in Joppa an seed pikshurez in mai hed. Liek Ceiling cat wuz maekin teh bed aroun me.

I seed lotz of aminalz an moocowz and burds on teh blankt.

Then some1 sez, 'O hai, Peter. Pwn and eatz.'

"I sez, 'WTF Ceiling Cat! I no can haz eat bad foodsez.'

"Invisibul voice iz all, 'Don diss foodsez I maked. N00b.'

An it kep happenin.

"K and then BFz form Caesarea cameded to teh house.

Invisibul voice sez go with tehm. An there littermaytz too, an we goed to a manz place.

Him seed an anjul wut telled him, 'Git Simon from Joppa but naem iz reelly Peter lol.

Him gotz a msg will bring cheezburgrs to ur bukkit.'

"So I wuz sayen, but then Invisibul Cat pwned tehm liek me.

An ai membered Ceiling Cat sayed: 'John washt yu with watr, an yu wuz all WTF! I DUN LIEK WET ON FURZ!, NP, you can haz washt with Invisibul Cat tihs tiem.'

So Invisibul Cat gived tehm saem cheezburgerz az us, I must be sum kind of n00b LOL!!!1"

An tehy ar all srry and liek, "Ceiling Cat can gievs cheezburgerz evn to Gentile catzes."

Catzes who roamded cuz of Stephen getting pwned gotz far as Phoenicia, Cyprus and Antioch LOL! Tehy were only haz talks wit Jewz.

But not all. Sum catz form Greek were kewl with can talks to Greek d00dz.

Ceiling Catz paw wuz on tehm, and tehy maed lots ppl frenz wit Ceiling Cat.

PPl in Jerusalem heared, an maed Barnabas go to Antioch.

He seed abowt teh cheezburgerz of ceiling Cat, an he wuz all catnip.

Gud cat. GUD CAT!

Barnabas stalkt Saul in Tarsus,

an pounced, an pwnt him an browt him to Antioch. So tehy chillt for a yeer wit teh ppl there. Tehy were liek, "Letz call us Christshunz", so tehy did.

Moer ppls came to Antioch LOL!

Invisibul Cat maked Agabus sed that ther can haz no eatz in Rome for a whiel.

Gud catz sent stuff to Judea.

Nowz teh FatzCat Herod arrested dem kittenz in teh Ceiling Cat'z church, meaning to bei liek "Im in ur churchz, perzecutin ur pplz.

Church praiz 2 Ceiling Cat for Peter. ZOMG, Peterz in jail.

Peterz sleepin' tied up between 2 burly men cuz he likes it like that.

Angelcat suddenly appearz an sez: Wake up! An cuz burly men didn't tie Peter up well teh chains fell off him. Oh an ceiling cat appears, defying ur gravity.

Den he sat on his thr0ne and spoke to teh l33ts

And Ceiling Cat'z church had proffits and teachers and ninjas and stuff, like Barnabas and that Simeon guy, Lucius (not frum Harry Potter, nother guy), and Manean (wuz bff wif Herod when they wuz kidz). O ya, and Saul, cuz he rox.

Wun tiem, dey wuz singing meows 2 teh Ceiling Cat and not eating cheezburgrz  and Ceiling Cat sez, "I get dibbs on Barnabas and Saul to do mah chores, kthx".

Den all teh church kittehs sez 2 Barnabas and Saul, "Yus heard him. Hav funs. An hey Ceiling Cat, plz keep dem sayf, kthxbye."

So Barnabas and Saul rode invisible bikes alls around n followd direckshuns HovrCat gav dem. Dey went ta some place whut start wif S an den Cyprus.

Den dey went to Salamis (wtf, leik at teh deli mebbe?) an dey talk about Jezus 2 da J00s. And John wuz der halper, srsly.

and him werk 4 mr. proconsul mans. Proconsul wuz smrt an wuz liek "I can has word of Ceiling Cat frum Saul an Barnabas?"

Den Saul (hiz othr nam wuz Paul) got teh power-up frum HovrCat an sez,

And, no duh! Teh sorcerah wuz blinded. Him tried to find sumone to halp him, but nobuddy wud.

Teh procunsol sez "Dis is Ceiling Cat, srsly. Whut Paul sez bout him is tru."

Meanwhiels, Paul and da otter d00dz gotted in boats n went 2 Perga. John sed bai an went hoem.

But everoen els wuz liek "j/k Perga" and goes to Pisidian Antioch 2 goes to j00-church for Caturday servis.

Da rabbis wuz liek "Iz open mic tiem for Paul an his frends".

So Paul waved at dem an sez "Hey d00dz, lissen!

Ceiling Cat pickeded our dads for hiz favs. Him tak dem outta Egypt all saf,

and even puts up wit dem when deys did stoopid stuffs fer 40 yeerz in da desert,

and den him taeks teh land frum 7 cuntries and givez it 2 us.

It took for-evah. Srlsy.

And when de d00ds asked for a king, him gaevs dem wun.

Den Ceiling Cat maed teh king die cuz he wuz fail. Ceilin Cat maed David king, an sez  'David an me, we is bffs.'

"An from teh babiez David wuz makin comed baby Jezus, an hez teh kitten dat Ceiling Cat sed he wud giv us for teh savin frum Invisable Errors.

Jonh teh Baptst cam furst and talkded to all teh J00s bout washin der soulz an turnin round der lifes.

Wen he wuz almos dun, he sed, 'Who yu think I be? I iz not teh kitten of Ceiling Cat yu want find. Hez cumin later an he bes so leet i no can tuch hiz shoos wifout bein ded if he no sez okayz.'

"D00dz an gurlz, ppl frum Izreal an udder ppl who follow teh Ceiling Cat, we iz teh wuns Ceiling Cat pickeded to get msg of savin!! Iz so cool i almost splode sumtiems thinkin bout it!

D00dz in Jerusalem no saw who Jezus be, but when dey pwnd him, dey did whut proffits sed loooong teim ago! Yu kno whut dem wurds is, cuz yu reed dem evry Caturday!

Jeruselam d00dz no saw Jezus do bad stuffs, but tehy hads Pilate pwn hims just cuz dey wuz mad bout whut Jezus sed.

Aftur pwn him jus leik proffits sed, dey put hims in teh ground.

An Ceiling Cat maed hims respawn

an lotsa d00dz saw hims and talked wif hims, and dey was all leik 'wtf?!', an dey is still talk bout him to ppl.

he did fer us kidz wen he gaves us Jezus. Leik sez in Psalm 2,

"An sumwhar els David teh king sed,

but teh respawnd kitteh nevar had tiem to get nasty cuz Ceiling Cat wuz liek, "Tree daz ded is a kewl symbul ov stuff so no moar."

D00dz an gurlz, all dose thins iz tellin yu Jezus iz teh way tu get furgivn fur Invisable Errors!

Him iz erase all yur errors so Ceiling Cat no see dem! (even tho Ceilin Cat seez evryfin, Jezus be like, "iz cool. i got dat," an Ceilin Cat be like, "lol, okies, i ignor.")

B watchin yurself so yu not liek dis:

"Ceilin Cat sez, 'Luk, n00bz,
watch meh pwn yu wif my god-powarz ov awsum!
I'ma do maor awsum stuffs then yu cn think uv,
an if sumbuddy sed whut i'ma do, yu wud laugh cuz yu iz stoopid.'

Wen Paul n Barnabas goed owt, ppl wur leik, "Hey d00dz, cum bak nex Caturday! Want MOAR wurdz bout Ceilin Cat an Jezus!!"

Wen teh groop ov ppl leeved, teh Jews goed wif Paul an Barnabas, an dey gived dem moar wurdz bout teh Ceiling Cat, an telled dem tu wrship him.

Teh nex Caturday, all teh kittehs caem tu heer bout Ceiling Cat an Jezus.

But wen teh Jews saw dis, dey wuz liek, "WTF! WAI DEY LISSEN TU DEM! HE NOT SAY GUD TINGZ!

Den Paul an Barnabus wuz liek: "We telled yuz furst, but yuz wuz liek, "No, itz not tru.", so now we tellz teh Gentiles. Dey gunna get, liek nine bazillion lievs, but yuz only gets wun.

Cuz dis iz wut teh Ceiling Cat telled us:
 " 'I maked yuz a lite fr teh Gentiles,
 so dat yuz give cheezburgrz to all teh urfs.' "

So den teh Gentiles wuz liek, "WEZ TEH BEST, N00BS!", an dey lissen tu teh Ceiling Cat; an dey all got teh nine bazillion liefs.

So teh wurdz ov teh Ceiling Cat goed all ovr.

But teh Jews no liek dees tingz, so dey got all teh TopCats tu make Paul an Barnabas leev.

So dey just goed tu Iconium insted. But dey wuz not hapee fr leeving.

kk, so teh saem ting happun in Iconium. Paul an Barnabas went to teh tempul an preechded so gud dat lots ov kittehs becaem Kittetians.

Sum ov teh bad kittehs changeded Ceiling Cat's messuj an liek poisond teh mindz of teh kittehs against Paul and Barnabas.

But dey wer der long tiem in teh town, preachin teh grace of Ceiling Cat. An Paul an Barnabas got liek powrs to do meericles an stuf, srsly.

But soem peeps sited wif teh Jewcats, an soem wif teh apawsles.

Den a lots ov kittehs deesided to be ghey an thro rocks at dem.

Wen teh apawsles fownd owt, dey ran away to Lycaonia to teh towns ov Lystra an Derbe in stuf so dat teh badkitties wudnt pwn dem.

An dey preechded teh gud news der.

So when they wuz at Lystra, tehy fownd a kittie wif broken paws. An liek, he had always ben dat way, so he nevr evr walkd b4. Srsly. He wuz sittin

an listnn wilz Paul waz preechin. So he liek stard at Paul an Paul sawz dat he has faith 2 be heald.

So liek Paul say, "LOL, STAND UP!" an teh kittie wif broken paws jumped up an started walkin.

Wem teh crowd see wut Paul did, tehy were liek, OMFG thees doodz r liek teh gawdz!

The decided dat Barnabas wuz teh Ceiling Cat Zues an Paul wuz Hermez, cuz he wuz teh chief speekurcat.

Teh tempul ov Zeus wuz jus owtsied town. So teh priestcat ov teh tempul an teh mob brot moocows an big sexy colers madd owt of flowrs 2 teh gate so they cud liek set teh moocows on feir so dat Paul an Barnabas cud smel it an liek it sinss teh godz liek teh smel ov ded moocows lol.

But wen teh apawssles fownd owt, they wuz liek, "Oh noes! Dey be wurshipin teh rong Ceiling Cat!1!!!1" an tehy  tor up their cloths in stuf in dismay. Tehy ran out to teh peeps, shoutin,

"Frenz, why you be doin dis? We wuz jus kitties liek u! We has come to brin u teh gud news dat you shud, liek, stop bowin at these ghey statues (lol, tehyd be beter as scrachin posts haha) an turn 2 teh REAL Ceiling Cat, cuz he liek maded teh Ceiling an teh Floor, teh bafftub, an al teh fishies so cud eats dem!

"In da past, he let al teh nashuns 2 go tehir own ways,

But he nevr left dem witout givn em clooes ov Ceiling Cat's cheezburgers!K, heeres a gud egsampl- he sendz u rane an people to feed you an lots of cookies an cheezburgers, so you cud be lots happy."

But evn wif dees werds, Paul an Barnabas cud barely restrane teh peeps frum burning teh moocows for them.

den sum Jewush cats arivd frum Antioh an Iconium an won teh crowdz faver. Tehy throd rocks at Paul an liek dragged him out ov town, cuz they thot he wuz ded.

But when teh Christians gatherd arown him, he got up an went bak into teh town. Teh next dai he left wif Barnabas 2 go 2 Derbe.

kk, so aftr dat, Paul an Barnabas wuz liek, "Im in ur Derbe, makin lotz da dissiplz...w00t!" Then th3y reterned 2 Lystra, Iconium, an Antioch of Pisidia,

wer they maded teh beleevrs strongr in stuf. Tehy encouraged them 2 keep it in da faith y'all, remindin them dat lotsa peeps wud steal ther cheezburgers, but dat waz okay cuz u haf to hav hardships to get 2 teh kingdon of Ceiling Cat.

They even put eldercats in evry chrch. wif preyr an fastin, they turnd teh eldars ovar 2 teh ceyre of teh Ceiling Cat.

Den they traveld bak thru Pisidia 2 Pamfylia. They preechd teh werd in Perga, den went down 2 Attalia.

Finnaly, they reternd by ship 2 Antioch ov Syria, wer their journy had startd. Teh believrs thar had entrusd tem 2 teh cheezburgers of Ceiling Cat 2 do teh werk they had jus noa finished.

undefined

Sum peepelz camed down frum Judea to Antioch an wer teachin teh brudahz "Unlez teh skinz ons teh vry tip of yur penes iz cutted, accordin to teh custum tot by Moses, Ceiling Cat wont waach u and U cant be savd."

Dis brot Paul and Barnabas, in to argament an dispoot an' dabate wif dem. So Paul an Barnabaz wer maded, along wif sum othr guyz to go up to Jerusalem to see the apossalz and elderz bout dis kweztshun and fo sum aice kreme.

Teh cherch sentz dem on deir waie, an az dey maded waie thru Foneeshia an' Samarea, dey tuld how teh Jentailes had been maded into not-Jentailes. Dis nooz maded all teh brudahz vry Happiez!

Wen dey camed to Jerusalem, dey wer welcumed bai teh cherch an teh apossalz and elderz cuz dey brot bak cheezeburgerz, and dey tulded whol storie and everythin Cieling Cat had dun thru dem.

But den sum ov teh new Christianz hoo wuz liek sort of liek teh Fariseez stood up an sayed, "Teh Jentilz needz hav there penes tips skinz cut an dat they need to foloa teh law ov Mosez." srsly!

So teh apawssles an elders liek met togethr to tlak it ovr in stuf.

at teh meetn teh apawssles wuz laik "OMFG! Cut mah penes skinz! No wai!! No Srsly!" an dey wuz not happee an Petr stud an adresd tehm liek dis "Bros, u all knoes dat Ceiling cat choos me owt of u guyz a long tiem ago to preech to teh gentilez so dat they cud heer teh gud news an bleev in stuf, rite?

Ceiling Cat noes peep's harts, an he telld us he eksepts Jentilz by givn them teh howly sprite, jus liek he did to us kitties.

he said we were teh saem peeps, cuz he clensed their harts thru fathe.

so y r u noa goin, "Im in ur faiths, challengn Ceiling Cat n burdenn teh Jentilz wif leesh dat we dosnt hav to bare."

We bleev dat we ar all savd teh same wai, lol. cmon, peeps!

Den teh peepz wer kwaiyet fur Brnabbas n Pawl tu tell dem uf teh mirakles dat Ceiling Cat has shewed teh Jentailes. Liek when Ceiling Cat had Brnabaz ridin teh invisble bisicle ur wen Pawl wuz all pwned but teh Ceiling Cat maed hiz fur all shinee n soft.

Den un ufda kittehz wuz liek "Srsly..."

teh dood Saimun telled aws uf how teh Ceiling Cat taeked frum teh jentailes n maed teh lolcats.

Teh smrt catz new dis tu, cuz dey was all like:

Oh hai, Ai iz gonna b rite back, n Ai gonna maek an udder cookie. Evan tho Ai eated it Iz gonna maekded an udder.

Sew dat teh kittehs n teh lolcatz but not teh jentailes... (Ok, mebbe teh jentailes dat r naemed affer mai) sez it b teh Ceiling Cat dat iz teh pwner.

Dis b knowed fur evar.

Ratherz, us kittenz shuld be makin da letters to dem. Tlkinz bout how to not eated foods polluted bis idols, n how to not get frisky and downzz, n to not eated the meats of animalz tht have been strangleded, and frum bloodz! Lyk srsly dats badzz .

Insted wez rait two dem, and sayed "no nom nomz with dem idle pollooshon, no seckshool baddehz, no strangled nom nomz or bluddys!".

Sins da Urfs was createded by Ceiling Cat Moses can has be preeched in all de sittys and on Caturdayz we can has reed in sinnagogs!!!11

Den de apawsslz n eldrs, wif all dem, pik sum der pwn kittehs an send dem to Anteeyock wif Pawl an Brnabbas. Dem pik Judas (hoo dey call Brsabbas) an Silus, who haz lotz xperyuns.  Srsly.

Wif dem, send dis lettr: De apawsslz an eldrs, ur bruvers, To da Jentilz bleverz in Anteeyock, Srsly, an Susillyah: Grtngs.

We herd sumz bad kittehs pownsd on u wifout owr sayin yes an dey bothr u, trublng ur maindz by wut dey sai.

So we allz sai, "letz pik sum gud kittehs an send dem wif Brnabbas an Pawl—

kittehs hoo risk all der cheezburgers an evrefing fur Ceiling Cat.

So we r to be sendin Judas an Silus.  Dey noze wut we talkin about - dey can has ur rspekt.

Ceiling Cat fink dat givin u too many rulez maek u feel pwned, an we fink so too.
 Is good enuf do dis:

No eetz foodz sacrficet to idlz.  Staez awai frum blud, frum de meat uv animls pwnd by strangln, an frum sekshool imaralty. You staez awai frum all dat, u be gud kitteh. kthxbai.

Faur kitteh went bai to Antioch, where they haz big mietin of Jebuz believn kittehs and giv lettah.

N lotz of happynez wuz in church, n they wur all leik "LOL!"

Kittehs stay long tiem, n tehn Judaz n Silaz kittehs say bai and go to Jureusulum n sayz hai to those who said bai.

Paul n Barnbus kittehs don't sai bai to Aintioch so them can helpz other preachah kittehs.
