So den Paul and Silas goed thru da townz Amfiypolis and Apollonia til dey gotz to Thessalonica (wich iznt lyk teh saloon car cuz tehy werent nventd yet) and there wuz a Jooish senogawg.

so cuz Paul alwyz did it, he goed to servcs fer lik tree wks and telled it to da ppl wut the bibul mean.

he wuz splainin bout da profizzies bout jebus all bout wif him and the dying and all den Paul wuz like "dis Jebus he iz messiyuh! lik he wuz da littel kitteh of Ceiling Cat!"

sum ppl were lik yeah ok i blv u and lotz of dem were da Greeks who usually blvd in da lotz of da godz.  sum important ladiez also blvd.

so da Joos who dint convert wuz jealuz.  dey get dem sum gangstas and thugs and r up to no good.  bad kittehs.  dey attack Jasun's howse cuz dey wuz lookin fur Paul and Silas prob to beat dem up.

good fur dem, dey wuz not there but Jason wuz since it wuz his howse and all. da jewz r all like bringin da christians to da mayor and stuff and r like "dese guys are nfringin on chuck norris coppyrite by turning world upside down!

and dis guy Jasun let dez foolz in hiz howse and lettin dem eat hiz meow mixy!  dey r treazoning Cezzar cuz dey have da jebus king."

and dey made crowd frown and de rulers loos it.

so dey made dem pay bail, cuz de rulers wuntd a hay bail for to playz in, and dey let dem go (for now).

and so Paul and Silas fledd to Berea liek scorlded kittehs, cuz the crystians in Thessalonica noo twuznt saif. n P&S went to de sinogog soonas dey got dere.

n de kittehs in de senogawg wuz moar opun-mihnded n lisend to wut Paul Silas had to say n checkt it agenst de scripchas evry dai.

so luts beeleevt n so did de Greax, famus ladi kittehs and men kittehs.

but de Jooz who Did not want Paul an Silas camz to Berea n wuz in the crowd, baleeting ur support.

so de crystians maded Pawl go to teh sea for sneek excaep cuz even bein wetz iz beta dan bein mobbd. but Silas n Timothy staid in Berea.

den de kittehs hu halpd Paul excape tuk him to Athenz n tol Siliz n Timoty to ketchup.

an Paul sawded to many idols wen him wuz waytin an it maed him reel cross an hiz tayl puffded up.

an so he goed to de senogawg (cuz he reali lieked to goed to da senagawg) an argud (nislee) wit de Jooz an de Jentiels. an he goed to market (but not to bi fat pig cuz he wuz Joo) evri day an argud thar to (cuz he wuz gud at converting dat way).

an e even met sum Epicureans (hu lieked plezhur) an Stoics (hu shoded no emoshun an reali wuz antiemos) an sum insulted him but uthaz wuz intrested an sez "himz meowin bowt godz from forren lans!" cuz he wuz talkin bout Jebus an how he cam bak to life.

Den dey tookz Paul to teh meetsins of teh Aeropagus an dey wuz all liek "Wtf is yu teachinz!!?? Wai yu teach itz heer?

We dunno wats it meens yu shouldz tellz or goez homez!!!"

(al teh peeps in teh citeez no do notings but tawlkz an litsin. dey no even has job!! dey dadz r al leik "Yu needz job!" butz dey al liek "Stfu dad!! Do not want!!")

Den Paul gotz ups en frunt ov teh meetings an sedz "Oh hai peeps! Yuz al reel riligus. Yuz be prayin to al kidns ov stufz

Yuz evn prayin to sum unnown Ceiling Cat. Buts litsens ups Iz learns yu teh trufs! Srsly!!!"

"Ceiling Cat made teh hows an evryting ins itz! Him is teh Lords ov teh Ceiling an teh Urth. Teh Ceiling Cat no liv in templ buildz bai cats.

Ceiling Cat no needz us servings Him wit r pawz. Dats cuz teh Ceiling Cat givid us lif, teh cheezburger an teh cookie to eated an evryting els in the Urth!!

Him maked al teh catz frum one cat. Al teh Minxez an teh Tabbyz an teh Saimez. An teh Ceiling Cat sez teh whenz an teh werz we iz liv.

Teh Ceiling Cat donez so we iz looked for himz!! An is trai to fainds hims!!

Sum ov teh rymin peeps sedz we is Hims Kittehs."

"Cuz wez teh Ceiling Cats kittehs He no looks leik goldz, silbur, or evens cheezburger! Teh Ceiling Cat iz lookz leik kittehs!!! (Dats wai dey calls him Ceiling CAT!)

Ceiling Cat used no car wut us tink. Buts now Ceiling Cat do not want!!!!

Teh Ceiling Cat sedz himz gona judge we sum dai. An Judge mai sownd leik fudge but iz nt az fun r delishus. Ceiling Cat is giv us proof bai bringin teh ded kittehs bak to liv!"

An when teh peeps herd ov teh ded kittehs commin bak to liv most wuz liek "No wai!! No bileev!!" But sum wuz liek "Plz learns us bout teh judgins!!"

undefined

Den teh Pauls left teh Athenz n wentz to teh Cornth.

He metted teh joo Aquila dat wuz nativ frm Pwntus taht comed frm Itly wit wifz Prizilla cuz Claudius sedz "O Hai joos... get outs ov Romes!!!!!"

Paul wented to seez tem cuz he maked teh tentz, but did not eated tehm cuz he wuz workinz wit demz.

Evry Sabuth he wented to teh senagawg to tryz to perswades teh joos and teh greekz.

Silaz and Timothy comes and Paul waz liek "I be preechin teh Jebus to teh joos now! kthnxbai!"

But teh joos no liek Paul and dey beated himz. Paul sez to demz "Yuz haz blodz on yer hedz. Iz gon to genteels cuz yu srsly sux, srsly."

Paul leftz teh senagawg an wentz to howz ovs Titius Justus (ya, dat be realz naime, kthnxbai), cuz Titius be warshippingz teh Ceiling Cat.

Crispus and lotz ov peeplez dere liek teh Ceiling Cat. Lotz ov teh Corentheunz be bapitized.

One nite, teh Ceiling Cat sez to Paul in a vishun "I no eated yu, keepz talkinz, no be quietz.

I be heer wit yu an no onez will be eated yew. Cuz I gotz lotz ov peeps in teh citeez."

Den Paul stayd fo one yearz an teh haf preechin teh Ceiling Cat.

Joos no lieked Paul an dey be attacked hiem an dragged hiem to tehir coort.

Den dey sez "He waz be in teh senagawg preechin teh Jebus an dat be ilegul."

Paul waz bout to speekz but Gallio sez "Yo jooz, dis no be crime so I no be lisenin,

kthnxbai."

Den dey throz hiem out ov teh coort.

Den dey eated Sosthenes in teh frontz ov teh coorts. And Gallio waz watevez.

Den teh Paul steyd in teh Corinthz for leik a mont or sumthin. Den he sedz "Oh hai bruthurs gudby! kthnxbai." Paul den sayld wit teh Priscilla an teh Aquila 2 Syria, praiyin to teh Jebus no get wet. Cuz Paul haet water. but bfor he sayld he gotted his hairs cuts cuz he sedded a ohth.

When dey gots to Ephesus Paul sedz "Kthnxbai." to teh Priscilla an teh Aquila.

Den dey wuz leik "Wtf!!? Wai yew no talkz to uz? Wai!!?"

An Paul wuz leik "I com bakz if teh Ceiling Cst wantzes mi to!!!!!"

Den he gotz to teh Caesarea an sedz "Oh hai!" to teh cherch, den he wentz to teh Antiochz.

Afta Paul wuz in teh Antiochz he walkeded rown teh Galatia an teh Phrygia preechin teh Jebus to teh desypulz.

Den teh joo Apolloz frum Alexandreya wentz to teh Ephesus. Teh Apolloz wuz smartz an he knoo teh biybulz.

He wuz tawted teh way ov teh Ceiling Cat, an he spoked wit a furvir an he tawt teh Jebus akuritlays, but he ownley knoo wenz John wuz baptizded.

Den he talkded reel lowds in teh senagawg. He wuz al leik "Yo, jooz! teh Jebus is teh awsomz an yu needz litsen him!!" Den teh Priscilla an teh Aquila sedz "Oh hai! comz wit us an wees teeched yu teh Jebus!!!!!!" An Apolloz wuz liek "Yu learns me teh Jebus!?" an dey wentz to der hows.

Den Apolloz wuz leik "Iz wanna go to teh Achia." an teh bruthurs wus leik "Den go, itz kewl." Den teh bruthurs wrot to teh oter desypulz dat Apolloz wuz kewl.

undefined

So Leik wen teh Apolloz wuz in teh Corinth preechin to ur doodz, Paul wuz wahlkin roun teh insaidz ov teh holay landz till he sedz "I hazent hads a cheezburger in liek fvtein menuts. Oh wait Iz in teh Ephesus! Kewl." Den Paul wuz tawlkin to teh desypuls he founded.

Paul wuz leik "Oh hai, yu guyz." an dey waz leik "Sup." Paul wuz liek "Srsly, yu guyz. Did yu feyl teh HovrCat wenz yu is bileev? Srsly." An teh desypulz sedz "No wai!!! Yu iz teh liyin!!! HovrCat no is!!!!"

Paul wuz liek "Who baptizm yu has?" an teh desypulz sedz "Him naym be John. Hez kewl."

An Paul sedz "Him wuz jsut siayin srry wen him dones dat. Den him wuz sedz teh Jebus wuz cummin an dat yu shuld litsen to teh Jebus.

Cuz Jebus be teh awsomez son ov teh Ceiling Cat!!" an teh desypulz wuz liek "Can yu learn us teh Jebus!!?" an Paul wuz liek "ya ai cans learn yu teh Jebus!"

Den Paul tuched teh desypulz an teh HovrCat gots insaids dem. Den teh desypulz startid shaykings an baykings an dey tawlked reel funni, liek they bited teh toastr cords.

An der wuz liek twelvs ov dem so wuz noizy buht wuz stil funni.

Paul wentz insto teh senagawg an tawlkd reel lowdz for leik tree munthz. Paul wuz al liek "Oh hai peeps!! Yu needz bileev ins teh Jebus an teh Ceiling Cat!!! Ifs we al bileevs in teh Ceiling Cat an teh Jebus we can has a cheezburger!! Dats cuz teh Jebus an teh Ceiling Cat iz maykd us dem!!!!!" an Paul wuz doin reelz gud too.

Buts sum ov teh peepz wuz gettin leik "Do not want!!!" an dey wentz outs in teh puhblicks an wuz liek "Paul iz teh stoopid!!! Him keepz tawlkins bout teh Jebus n stufs buts teh Jebus no is!!!!!! We can no has a cheezburger frum Jebus!!" an Paul wuz liek "WTF!? kthnxbai. yu no needz eny way!!" Paul tookz teh desypulz wif him an den dey tawlkd eech dai in teh hal ov Tyrannus.

dey ketp doinz its for leik a yeer so al teh joos an teh greeks in Asia herd ov teh Ceiling Cat.

Ceiling Cat hlpd Paul wif teh heelng.

leik peepz tuk hankiz an aiprnz he tutjd to sik, dai getz betteh an looz teh deeminz.

Leik dese jooz sez Jebus to teh peepz wif deeminz.  Leik al: "Cawlng Jebuz dood, leik Paul sez, do not want u!"

Boz joosh preist Sceva had sevn sunz do dis.

But den demin ansir!  Sez: "Saw Jebus, saw Paul, u, WTF?"

Dood wif demin jumpd an beet tem gud.  Dem doodz beet so bad dey nekkid an bludy.

So teh jooz an grikz in Ephesus ar al WTF!  Jebus iz awsum!

Doze peepz say dey no gud.

Teh majk peepz leik bernd teh paipurz, wirf leik fifteh fowsind drakmaz!

Dat showd teh word uv Ceiling Cat an more beleevd!

Den Paul wuz al leik I am in Jerusalem den Macedonia den Achaia an den I vizet Roem.

He senz hiz doodz Timothy an Erastus to Macedonia an he staiz in Asia wile dey goze.

So leik wuz trubbl.

Demetrius maikz shynie stufz, kool statchooz uv Diana. Him reel gud getz moer wrk.

Him wantz meetng uv leik al statchooz pipplz, an doodz in saim bizniz.  Sez: "Doodz we gotz grait deel.  Dis dood Paul iz teh suck, iz al leik taikz ar custmrz to him, in Ephesus an in hole Asia to, do not want!

He telz dem no cheezburgerz if u maik ur own Ceiling Kitteh!

We looz ar stuf!  An ar kewl tempel to our awsum Ceiling Kitteh Diana will be teh epik fale!"

Teh doodz wer al leik "No Wei. Diana roolz, Paul droolz!  Rlly."

Soon hole siti chantz teh saim, srsly.  Peepz taik Gaius an Aristarchus, Paulz doodz frm Macedonia, maik dem go teh feeteh.

Paul wantz teh preetj but doodz say stfu, do not want!

Also mane doodz an Paulz frenz sed No Wai.

Peepz in teh feeteh al noizy, sum ar al wtf?

Teh jooz tel Alexander speek, dood, but him sez to mch noiz, stfu alrdy.

Den teh oteh doodz say, him joosh, no wai! Woa! Awsum Ceiling Kitteh Diana!

Den teh ofishul dood sez: "Leik stfu alredy.  Doodz, Ephesus haz teh xcelnt tempel to Ceiling Kitteh Diana.  Pls kewl statchooz, frm ceiling!

Evrion noze dis, so stfu an stai cawm.

Dem doodz dint steel frm u or diss teh Ceiling Kitteh.

U silveh doodz leik Demetrius cn taik it to judj joodi.  An u cans pres charjiz.

If u gotz complianz, tel judgiz.

Leik we get roitng charjiz fer wat u doodz duz.  An it wuz teh stupid.

undefined

Wen teh ZOMG wuz ovr, Paul gots teh dissaipulls an aftah givin dem majr propz wuz liek, "kthxbai" an wen 2 Macedonia.

Him wen froo daer givin propz to all teh ppls and den gots to Grease.

Teh Joos on teh whey wuz liek "We killz yoo!" so Paul wen back 2 Macedonia.

Him brot lotz of d00ds wit him

and dey wayded for us ad Troas.

Buh we wen from Phillypai aftr teh big Kitteh Food Feast an joyned dem fiev dayz latr.

On teh furst day of teh week us caim togethas to eate cheezburgerz. Paul sez thinks to teh kittehs and cuz he was gonna kthxbai evrione tmorroz, he sez more to the kittehs till no moer day cheezburgerz.

There wuz liek many big shiny candles in teh uprooms wheres we wo eatin ur cheez.

Doin his business on da neighbourz window was dis yung kitteh calld Eutychus who waz tryin to do his business on 
teh window but fell to teh Urf cuz Paul speaked wai too much and then Eutychus was died.
1

But then Paul hugz the kitteh and was all like tis ok, he not died, he respawnd.

Afta that Paul goed to teh uprooms and ated sum cheezburgerz and eated. Then he spoked to tha ppl and was like kthxbai.

Teh ppl taked respawnd Eutychus hoems and they lol'd.

Us goed wif ship to Assos, wheare us wo gonna let Paul in teh ship. He maed this so cuz he walk thear.

When we sawed he, us taked he an' goed to Mitylene.

Then us goed to Miletos thru Kios an' Samos. W00T!

See guyse, Paul didnt want to be in Asia so he goed past Epheus cuz him wantd to be in Jerusalem befo Pentecost day to hav cookies.

Paul msgd teh eldrers from Ephesos to come fo sum cookies.

Wen they comed, Paul sed to em: "O hai, yu kno from ai first comed to Asia, ai waz hvring with u guyse all the time.

Ai srvd teh ceelin cat wif lack of digniteh an' wetness tho teh Jews wo cheeters big time. srsly.

Ai havnt bin hidin ma mad skillz dat cud be hlpfl laters but sharing an' teechin dem to u guyse in pm and public chat.

Ai hav maed it clears to boaf Jews and Greeks dat their gonna hav to turn to teh Ceelin cat wif puppydog face an' hav fateh in Jebus, k?

An' noe teh hovrcat be takin me to Jerusalem, dunno wats gonna hpn there.

Ai only kno that teh hovrcat is givin errorz dat iz goin to teh catcage an' therez wetness.

Anyways, am goin to finish teh race an' maek teh task ceelin cat gaiv meh - tellin ppl bout respawn of Jebus an' teh ceelin cats cookies. brb.

Dunt thinks youz gonna see meh no moer.

So iz tellin u, ai didnt doed it. Iznt ma bad if summone has to goe to teh basement, k?

Cuz ai told yu guyse teh ceelin cats plans.

Aight den. Take caer of urselfs an others cuz teh hovrcat telld u so. Be shephurds of teh church ceelin cat respawnd for.

Ai kno dat afta me goes, puppies will come. Their not gonna be niec. srsly.

Even yurz own kittehs be in ur church failin ur teechin an' maekin bad cheezburgrz.

Stay frosty, kittehs! Rememba ai never faild warning yu all day an' nite wif wetness.

Noe ai leav u wif teh ceelin cat an' teh cheezburgrz, that can maek u big kittehs an' share it wif all teh sanctifieded kittehs.

Dunt want ur cookies or bukkets or hoomins, k?

Yu kno dat wif ma pawes ai got enuf cheezburgrz for me an' ma pals.

Liek dat, ai showd yu dat yu maek cookies (an' no eate em) so dat evrione lols. Just liek Jebus sed: "An WTF is wid kittehs bogarten all teh cheezburgers?!! Dat sheetz gotta stop, srsl. U shud hunt and bringz back noms for de lil kitz or de sick kittehs."

Afta dat, he sat wif evri kitteh an' praid

They wo all wewee wet an' wo givin he hugz.

undefined

We left, den went to plaices wif funny naemz.

Den we maed boat trip.

We saw Cyprus an' den we goed to Syria.

Teh disiplz was dere. We visted dem. HovrCat maed dem say "Paul, u not goes to Jerusalem, k?"

But we kthxbaid anywai.  Everwun sed bai an' sat on teh beache to prae.

Den us sed bai an' goed to teh boat. Teh othars goed hoem. (to eat cookies i think?)

We wentz to moar plaices wif funny naemz.  An we seed teh bruvvers an sed "Hai, bruvvers!"

Den we wentz to Philipz hows.

Philip hadz foar ladykittehs! An dey telled teh futur! W00T!

Afta bein at Philipzs fo sum tiem. Anothar futurrellerer, Agabus comed hear from Judea.

Him stoled Pauls belt an' got caught in it liek a littel mooh. He sed: "Teh HvrCat sez: 'Jeews aer gonna come an' do dis wif Pauls belt an' giv he to teh bad kittehs.', k?"

Wen we heared dat we wo like O.o an' sed dat Paul cant goe to Jerusalem.

Ten Paul sez: "stfu, iz ok wif jeews taekin me. Iz not only one who dies in Jerusalem fo Jebus."

We cudz not stopz him so we sez "Wateva Ceiling Cat wontz."

Den we goez to Jerusalem.

Sum disiplz from Caesarea caem wif uz. Dey taeks us to Mnason's hows, were we wuz stayin. He wuz erli disipl from Cyprus.

Wen we getz to Jerusalem teh bruvvers sez hai.

Teh day afta uz an Paul wentz to see James. All teh wize kittehs wuz dere.

Paul sez hai an 'splains wut Ceilingcat dun to Gentiles froo him.

Wen dey heerz dis dey sez Ceiling Cat srsly cool. Dey sez to Paul: "Yu knoez loadza Jooz haz bleevd. Deyz all crazy bout teh lawz.

Dey bin tole yu teech teh Jooz, hoo livz wif Gentilz to fogetz Moses. Yu tellz dem not to circa... circum... cutz dem kidz or lives liek teh tradishuns sayz.

Wut we gun do?!!1! Deyz defo gonna heer yuz caem.

So yu do wut we sez. Dere's 4 guyz hooz maed promis.

Goe wif dem. Yu joins deyr purficashun an' payz fo dem to haz hed shayvd. Den all da peeps gon knoe wut dey heerz not troo. Reely yu 'beyz teh law.

Teh Gentile bleevas, wez rited to dem. We sez not to nom teh fud sacrifisd to idolz or blud or meet from strangld crittahs. Also dey use dem harbls nicely.

Teh next day, Paul an' teh men got purified an' went to teh temple. He gave word of teh end of teh purificaion an' when an offerin were to b made.

When teh days had alost gone, some Jooz seed Paul at teh temple, pissed off teh crown an' grabbed him sayin,

"Cats of Izrail, help us! This dood tells evryone against us an' wot we do. He also bring Greeks here an' made it dirty."(

Cos they sawd Trophimus an' Ephesian in teh city wit Paul.)

Teh hole city ran at them. Seizin Paul, they picked him up out of the temple, an' shut teh gatez.

While they was tryin' to kill him, the Roman troop guy heard they was an uproar.

He den sent officers and soldiers wit him to teh crowd. When dey seeded him an his soldiers,they stopped beatin Paul.

Teh commander nicked him, and bound him wit two chains. Den he asked who he were an' y he was beaten up.

Sum shouted one ting, others another ting, he couldn't understand it an' sent Paul to teh barracks.

When Paul reached teh steps, teh mob got so violent, like in GTA, he were carried by teh soldiers.

Teh followin' crowd shouted, "Away wit him!"

As teh soldiers were gonna thro Paul into teh barracks, he asked teh commander, "Can i sez sommat to u?". "Do u sez Greek?" he replied.

"Ain't u teh guy from Egypt who led four thousand terrorists into teh sand, long time bak?"

Paul sed, "i'm a Joo, from Tarsus in Cilicia, innit. i is lyk a citizen of no usual city. Let me talk to teh peeps."

undefined

"Catz, listenz to wot i got to sez bout me.

(When dey hears him talk Hebreu, dey wos quiet an listen'd. an' he sed,)

i is Jooish cat, born in Tarsus, but i wos tought by teh paws of Gamaliel bout teh laws an stuff bout Ceiling Cat.

i persucooted teh cristan kittehs, puttin bof moma catz and dada catz in jailz.

as teh high dood is witness wit teh elders, i gotz letterz an went to Damascus. i took dese cristan catz and bringd dem bound to Jerusalem, to b punished.

travlin to Damascus was i, and suddenleh celing cat showed a lihgt on meh!.

so i's fell to teh grounnd fearful. and ceiling cat sez paul cat paul cat why yoo persecuits me?.

whos spaeks meh sez i. and he sez it is meh, Happy Cat , whoo yo be persecuit.

the catz wit me saw teh bright lightz an don't understand.

so i saiz what do i do ceiling cat?.

i cud not see. i were taken in teh basket to Damascus

a cat called Ananias live dere.

he made me see again.

Ceiling cat have choose u to do stuff.

u has to tell catz wot he sez.

Y is u goin'? Has a wash.

So, when i went to Jerusalem next. i prayed n got high.

He den sez, Run away from 'ere. dey no believe ur sayin bout me.

i sed, Dey no wot i did.

i made ur guy Stephen dead.

He sed, i is gonna sent u to teh Gentiles.

dey listened, den lifted him with dere meaows. dey sed, Take him away to die.

dey cried n threw dust around.

teh captain sent him to teh castle. den he asked questions.

dey tied him up, n Paul sed he was Roman.

teh centurion told teh commander Paul wos Roman.

teh captain asked if he were Roman. he sed yes.

teh captain sed i paid lots to b free. Paul sed i wos born a free cat.

dey left him.

undefined

Paul lookd straight at teh sanhedrin an sed, "mah brothers, i has fulfilld mah duty 2 ceilin cat in all gud conscience 2 dis dai."

At dis teh high priest (priests can be high???) Ananias orderd dose standin near paul 2 strike him on teh mouth.

Then paul sed 2 him, "ceilin cat will strike u, u whitewashd wall! U sit thar 2 judge me accordin 2 teh law, yet u yourself violate teh law by commandin dat i be struck!"

it written: do not speek evil bout teh rulr ov ur peeps.[a]"

Paul replid, "Oh... brothers, i did not realize dat he wuz teh high priest;

Then paul, knowin dat sum ov them wuz sadduceez an teh others fariseez, calld out in da sanhedrin, "mah brothers, im farisee, teh son ov farisee. I stand on trial cuz ov mah hope in da resurrecshun ov teh ded."

When he sed dis, dispute broke out tween teh fariseez an teh sadduceez, an teh assembly wuz dividd.

(teh sadduceez say dat thar iz no resurrecshun, an dat thar r neithr angels nor spirits, but teh fariseez acknowledge them all.)

There wuz great uproar, an sum ov teh teachers ov teh law hoo wuz fariseez stood up an argud vigorously. "we find nothin wrong wif dis man," they sed. "wut if spirit or an angel has spoken 2 him?"

The dispute became so violent dat teh commandr wuz afraid paul wud be torn 2 piecez by them. He orderd teh troops 2 go down an taek him away frum them by force an brin him into teh barrackz.

The followin nite teh lord stood near paul an sed, "taek courage! As u has testifid bout me in jerusalem, so u must also testify in rome."

the next mornin teh jews formd conspiracy an bound themselvez wif an oath not 2 eat or drink til they had killd paul.

More than forty doodz wuz involvd in dis plot.

They went 2 teh chief priests an elders an sed, "we has taken solemn oath not 2 eat anythin til we has killd paul (baaad idea....)

Now den, u an teh sanhedrin petishun teh commandr 2 brin him before u on teh pretext ov wantin moar accurate informashun bout his case. We r ready 2 kill him before he gets her."

But when teh son ov pauls sistr herd ov dis plot, he went into teh barrackz an told paul.

Then paul calld wan ov teh senturions an sed, "taek dis young man 2 teh commandr; he has somethin 2 tell him."

So he took him 2 teh commandr. 
Teh senturion sed, "paul, teh prisonr, sent 4 me an askd me 2 brin dis young man 2 u cuz he has somethin 2 tell u."

The commandr took teh young man by teh hand, drew him aside an askd, "wut iz u wants 2 tell me?"

He sed: "teh jews has agred 2 ask u 2 brin paul before teh sanhedrin 2morrow on teh pretext ov wantin moar accurate informashun bout him.

Dont giv in 2 them, cuz moar than forty ov them r waitin in ambush 4 him. They has taken an oath not 2 eat or drink til they has killd him. They r ready nao, waitin 4 ur consent 2 their request."

The commandr dismisd teh young man an caushund him, "doan tell anyone dat u has reportd dis 2 me."

Then he calld 2 ov his senturions an orderd them, "git ready detachment ov 2 hundrd soldiers, seventy horsemen an 2 hundrd spearmen[b] 2 go 2 caesarea at 9 tonite.

Provide mounts 4 paul so dat he cud be taken safely 2 governor felix."

He wrote lettr as follows:

Claudius lysias, 2 his excellency, governor felix: greetings.

This man wuz seizd by teh jews an they wuz bout 2 kill him, but i came wif mah troops an rescud him, 4 i had lernd dat he iz roman citizen.

i wantd 2 knoe y they wuz accusin him, so i brought him 2 their sanhedrin.

i findz dat teh accusashun had 2 do wif queshuns bout their law, but thar wuz no charge against him dat deservd death or imprisonment.  When i wuz informd ov plot 2 be carrid out against teh man, i sent him 2 u at once.

i also orderd his accusers 2 present 2 u their case against him.

So teh soldiers, carryin out their orders, took paul wif them durin teh nite an brought him as far as antipatris.

The next dai they let teh cavalry go on wif him, while they returnd 2 teh barrackz.

When teh cavalry arrivd in caesarea, they deliverd teh lettr 2 teh governor an handd paul ovar 2 him.

The governor read teh lettr an askd wut province he wuz frum. Lernin dat he wuz frum cilicia,

undefined

after five days, Ananias, his mates, n Tertullus sed to teh gov bout Paul.

Tertullus sed bout Paul u is quiet and u do good stuffz.

we likez dis all ovr. thnx.

u ask questionz, u learn of wat we r accusin' him of.

den sum Joos from Asia washed me, without water.

when we knew we wos goin to Italy, we was sent to Julius.

Wee wer gon to eest cost of Aseea, accomponeed by Aristarchus.

From dare Wii saled under teh proteckshun of Cyprus n latar arrived @ Myra in Lycia.

Den darr centureeun found eh Alexandrian sheep saling for Italee, and dey let uz and mah guyz on board. Srsly.

Den dey warr saling slowlee and all wer kalm. Der wind wer meen to shep and not let shep go forwerd sometimes.

Aftar loooong tiem dey wer come to Fair Havens near teh citee ob Lasea.

Teh wind wer blowing very speedy an took ship with. Dey com neer island calld Clauda.

Tree days passd.

Dis r a letr frum Paul cuz Ceiling Cat askt me tells about teh Gud Nuuz.

R teh same Gud Nuuz dat Ceiling Cat sed a long tiem ago in teh holi skripchurs.

Teh Gud Nuuz r about teh Baybeh Jebus, who huz grate grate grate grate grate grandson uf King David,

an we can knows he r teh son uf Ceiling Cat cuz he wuz ded, then zomg, he r alive.

So Ceiling Cat ses we haf to tell evrbdy wat he did, an then they can obeh.

An Jebus, he r callsing all uf u.

I is writing to evrybdy in Rome who Ceiling Cat luvs. An may Ceiling Cat gives u cheezbrgrs an u can has cookiez.

Furst, I thx to Ceiling Cat for u. Evrbody ses u has gud faith.

An I prays to go see u all

So I wants to go 2 Rome an tells teh Gud Nuuz.

An then if we has fayth then Ceiling Cat ses we r gud. An that r like teh skripchurs sed, "Gud ppl haf life thru fayth."

If u has teh invisible errors, an u hides truth, u maek Ceiling Cat mad, k?

Ceiling Cat shows us wut is tru.

Wen Ceiling Cat maed teh urths, ppls cud see he has invisible powers, an so they has no excus.

They dun thx Ceiling Cat. An they wuz confusd.

Ebil wikkid stuff liek killsing an fites an lies an gosip.

They iz prowd an meen an they hates Ceiling Cat.

They dun keep promis, if they ses u can has cookie, an then eets it, an they stolend teh Lolrus's bukkit.

So iz dere enni point in bein a Jew enniwai?

Yes!  For wun thing Ceiling Cat givded dem hiz wordz.

Suppose sum peeplz duzint beleev an trust Ceiling Cat, does dat cauz Ceiling Cat enni problimz?

No!  Ceiling Cat is riet an if u disagreez u iz rong.  Liek teh book sez:
 "So u can say 'haha i tolded u so'
  an win."

But spose we iz so bad dat Ceiling Cat proovz how good he iz bai punishin us.  Iz dat unfair?

Well DUH no.  Ceiling Cat getz to juj teh whoal wrld.

Sumwun miet sai "Wel if i iz bad dat maekz Ceiling Cat look good, shudnt i get a cheezburgr for dat?"

Datz teh saem az sayin "Letz do bad thingz bcz we'll get good rezultz."  Sum peeplz saiz we sai dat enniwai but dey iz lyin.

So OK letz sum up.  Iz we enni bettr?  No!!! We haz areddi sed dat Jews an Gentiles iz both ful of sin.

Liek teh book sez:
 "Dere iz no good peeplz, not evn wun;

  nobodi undrstandz (dis part is kind of emo LOL)
 nobodi triez to find Ceiling Cat.

 Evribodi iz lookin teh othr wai,
  dey iz all worfless;
 nobodi duz enni good,
  not a singl d00d."

 "Dere moufz iz liek graevz;
  an dere tungz tellz liez."
 Dey haz snaek poizn on dere lipz."

 "Dere moufz iz full of bad wurdz."

 "Dere clawz iz alwaiz reddi to draw blood;

  dere iz trubl whaerevr dey goez,

 an dey duzint evn know ennithin about peece."

 "Dey iznt afraed of Ceiling Cat neethr, foolz."

So if teh law sez ennithin, it sez it to peepl who iz under teh law, so STFU.

So no wun becomz good by followin teh law.  Teh law iz to help us understand about Invisible Errors k.

But nao we knowz about goodness comin from Ceiling Cat.  Teh Law an teh profettz tellded us about it.

We get dis goodness thru beleevin in Jebus.

Evribodi haz maded Invisible Errors an iznint as good as Ceiling Cat,

but we can go to teh ceilin enniwai bcz Jebus died to taek awai our Invisible Errors.

Ceiling Cat did thingz dis wai on purpus,

to show how niec he iz.

So u shudnt be braggin about followin teh law.

Teh law iznt importnt, beleevin in Jebus iz.

Ceiling Cat is not just for Joos.  He iz for Gentiles too.

Dere iz onli wun Ceiling Cat, an he wil taek caer of evribodi, Joos an Gentiles both.

So what did Abraham finded out about dis?

If he had gotted rid of hiz Invisible Errors by sumthin he did, dat wuz sumthin to brag about.  Not to Ceiling Cat tho.

What duz teh Bible say? "Abraham beleevdid Ceiling Cat, an Ceiling Cat gived him credit for it."

When u work, u getz paid.  Datz not a gift, itz what u iz owed.

But if sum d00d duzint work but jus trustz Ceiling Cat, he getz credit for beleevin.

Liek David says:

"U getz cheezburgr
 if Ceiling Cat forgivz u for doin rong,
 if ur Invisible Errorz iz taekn caer of.

U getz cheezburgr
 if Ceiling Cat desiedz to ingor ur Invisible Errorz."

Duz uncircmsiezded peeplz get cheezburgr, or just circumsieded peeplz? We sed dat Ceiling Cat gived Abraham credit for beleevin.

But when did dat happn?  Wuz it aftr hiz forskin wuz cuttid off, or bfor?  Bfor LOL!

Havin hiz forskin cuttid off wuz a simbl of hiz faith.  Dat meenz he iz teh daddi of evribodi who bleevz an stil haz a forskin.

An also teh daddi of teh peepl who duzint haz a forskin an bleev what he bleevd whiel he stil had hiz.  k?

Ceiling Cat tolded Abrahm an hiz kittnz dat dey wud run teh wrld bcz beleevn maeded dem good.

Bcz if teh popo on ur side jus bcz thay liek ur parintz, den beleevn equalz zeero cookies, so Ceiling Cat's resipe iz jus dum,

cuz teh lawz iz cookie taek awai. N whre theyre iz no popo, they iz no cookie taek away.

K so resipe iz in inbox if u beleev adn all Abrahmz kittenz gets it 4 free, evn if you popo or Abraham kat. Bcz Abraham iz evry1z dad kat.

It wuz wroted: "I haz maed you dad kat of mani breedz." He iz owr dad kat, adn teh Ceiling Cat iz lookin bcz Abruham beleevd in Ceiling Cat—teh kat thet raizes ded kats frm kat cmetery adn sayz "Thatz a dog!" whne itz rly a kat.

So it wuz a logn shot, but Abhram beleevd, adn so he wuz dad kat of mani breedz, jus liek soem1 saed 2 him, "Ur kittenz gonna be leik that."

Adn he stil beleevd, evne tho hiz boddy culdnt scampr ne more—bcz he wuz 21 yrs old (thatz leik 100 human yrs!)—plus bcz Sarahz kitty-maeker didnt scamper too.

Y, he ddnt stop beleevn, he jus bleevd moer, adn he siad good thignz abuot teh Ceiling Cat,

bcz he thouhgt teh Ceiling Cat haz big pawz adn culd do whut he saed.

Adn thatz y "he got tripll wrd score in hiz inbox."

Teh wrds "in hiz inbox" was wroted not jus fr him,

dey wuz rittn for us too.  Ceiling Cat wil giv us credit for bleevin in him.  He maeded Jebus com bak from teh dead.

We sez judge judy iz sayn Sky werdz: but Ai wantz to be PUTTIN TEH PENIS INSIDE, datz Invisible Error.

Ai duznt knoes teh stuffs Ai does. Ai lieks sum stuffs, but Ai duznt does taht stuffs! Ai does teh stuffs Ai duznt lieks.

And wen Ai does teh stuffz Ai duznt lieks, Ai sez, "Hay, Ai lieks teh goode stuffs."

Hay, iz not me dat does teh badd doo doo stuffs--iz Invisible Error!

Ai duznt has teh goode stuffs (liek, mah sins duznt has teh goode stuffs). Ai lieks teh goode stuffz, but Ai cannut does teh goode stuffs.

Teh stuffs Ai does iz not teh goode stuffs Ai lieks; IAi only does teh badd doo do0 stuffs sum moar.  Srsly.

If u iz prayin in church in anothr tung, evribodi who duznt undrstand u iz lefted out.

I speakz in tungz moar dan eni of u.

Gro up alredi.

Ceiling Cat sez "I wil talk to u  thru peepl talkin all weerd an thru forinerz,  but itz not laik eniwunz goin to lissn."

Teh whoal point of gettin togethr in church iz to do teh church sum good.

4 they sayz, "Hiz letterz are rilly gud, but his body iz weak like lil kitteh, an he is teh suckz at speeking.

Not dat we darez 2 compare us with sum of those peepz dat think dey so big. When dey measurez demselves by one another and comparez to each other, dey doant understand anything.

But doant boast if u no has limits, only boast with regardz 2 teh influence dat u got frum teh Ceiling Cat.

4 we doant stretch ourselves 2 much, cuz we didnt reach u. we are coming as far as we canz to preech teh gospels of Jebus.

we doant brag bout tings dat other peepz has done, but we can has hope when we has moar faith, and then u will likez us better.

This is for preeching teh gospels in dose other reejuns, but not to brag about what other peeps has done.

so dey kin halp de new kittehs

But of da timez n sezons, bruhterz, ya'll has no need fo me to be written.

For yerselvez no prfctly dat thee day o' tha Ceiling Cat comez as a puppi in tha nightness.

Yu all are kittehs of de lites, an' kittehs of de daitimez. We noes belongs to the nites an' noes to de darknesses, k?.

So den, we noes be liek otherz, who be sleepins, but we be, liek, alert an' has controwls of ourselvez.

'Coz de peeps who be sleepin', dey sleepin' at nites, an' de peeps who be gettin' drunk, an fallin' oveh, an' noes in control of demselvez, deys doin' dis at nites too.

Cats who wantz too many cheezburgerz faw intu timptashun an a trap an into miny fewlish an hawmfewl desiwes dat pwunj cats intu ruin an distructshun.

Fur de wub uf cheezburgerz is teh rewt uf awl keyndz uf evul. Sum cats, eegr fur cheezburgerz, hav wanderd frum teh faith and peerced demselvs wif many greefs.

But u fawlo Ceiling Cat so runz away! Dey hidez, but findz teh rite, godlines, faith, luv, enderens, and gentwlenes.

Fihwt da g00d fihwt of teh faith. U sayz you getz eeternal liwf n we allz here u, so holdz on or it getz away.

Rmembr Ceiling Cat who madez all tingz and watchz u, n Christ Jebus who pwnd Ponchus Pilot, cuz 4 dem I sez

do what Ceiling Cat seyz all time until Christ Jebus cumz back

cuz he'll do that when Ceiling Cat feelz lik it. Ceiling Cat who pwnz n haz teh most cheezburgerz,

who livz 4eva in teh brite lite no one seez n can't seez evn if haz cheezburger. We givez him cookies all time. Ahmen.

Charge dem dat r rich in dis wurld, dat dem be not high mindd, trust in da living Ceiling Cat, hoo giveth us richly things 2 enjoy;

Dat dem do gud, and be rich in gud werkz, ready 2 distribute, willing 2 speek;

Lay up in store 4 demselvez gud foundashun, dat dem cud lay hold on eternal life.

O Timothy, keep dat which iz committd 2 thy trust, avoiding profane an vain babblings

So, he iz haz bettr n all teh anjulz liek his nayem iz haz bettr n all teh anjulz. He haz teh reputashun iz 999 exaltd in teh Ceilingz.

Cuz teh Ceiling Cat sez, "UR mah kitteh! srsly!"  Celeing Cat never telld dis to teh anjuls.  He only sez dis to his king kitteh on teh earthz, fer realz.

N wen Ceiling Cat takz bowt teh anjulz, he sez, "He maeks da anjulz speeritz n maeks da preests flaems of fier."

Dey will dai, but u wil not, an dey will gets old lyk a clothes.

Yu will fold dem up lyk a clothes n chaeng dem, but u will bee teh saem."

Wee kittehs mus pai atenshun tah wat wee has hurdz so wee no dwiftz awai.

Fur if dah mesige sed by dem birdcats was bindin, an evawee invisible error reseeved its jus punishment,

how canz wee escaep if we no lisen tah dis gwate salvashun? Dis salvashun wich was firs anownced by dah Ceiling Cat, was cunfirmd tah us kittehs by dose kittehs hoo hurd him.

Ceiling Cat allso testifyed tah it by syns, wundrs and varius meerakles, and cheezburgahs of dah Hover Cat givn acordin tah himz will.

No iz tah birdcats dat Jebus haz maid da Urf tah come, bowt witch wee bee speeking of.

Butt der iz ah playce wear sumone haz testifeyed: "Watz da man dat yu bee minefull of, dee sun oh man dat yu caer fur himz?

Yu madz hims ah fiew furbaws lowah dan dem birdcats; yu cround himz wit da gloary an honah

an puh evewifin undah himz feet." Inn puhin evahwefin undah hims, dah Ceiling Cat lef nofing dat iz not lyeible tah himz. Yets aht da pwesent wee do nots see dat evahwefin iz lyeible tah himz.

Butt wee seez Jebus, hoo waz maid ah fiew furbaws lowah dan dem birdcats, naoh izd crouned wif da gloary an honah kaz him haz sufahed def, so dat by dah cheezburgahs of dah Ceiling Cat himz mites tastd def fuh al us kittehs!

Inn bwingen manee kittehs tah gloary, its watz fitin dat Ceiling Cat, who haz maids evahweefi, shuld purrfekt salfaeshun bie sufahwen.

Dee kittehs dat maek dem kittehs holey an dah kittehs dat arr maid holey  arr inz dah saem famawee. Soo Jebus no iz ashaimd tah call dem bwoatas.

Him sayzes, "Ai willz say my naim tah mi kittehs; en dah pwescense of dah kittehs ai wilz sing yuz prayzes."

An agan, "Ai willz puts my twast en hims." An agan himz says, "Hee am ai, an dah kittehs Ceiling Cat haz given tah mee."

Sinz dah kittehs haf furr n taylz, dey mae awso shware en beein kittehs so dat bi der defs dey mae destwoy dah Basement Cat hoo howdz dah powah of def

an fwee dah kittehs hoo arr en caiges bi der feerz of def.

Foe hims no hewps dah birdcats, buh Abraham's kittehs.

Caz of dis himz hads tah bee maid liek us kittehs en evahwee way, so dats hims may bee ah faiful kitteh tah Ceiling Cat, an dat himz mite atoan fur dee invisible errors of dah kittehs.

therefore, since teh promize ov enterin his rest still standz, let us be careful dat none ov u be findz 2 has fallen short ov it.

or we also has had teh gospel preachd 2 us, jus as they did; but teh mesage they herd wuz ov no value 2 them, cuz dose hoo herd did not combine it wif faith.[a]

Now we hoo has believd entr dat rest, jus as ceilin cat has sed, "so i declard on oath in mah angr, They shall nevr entr mah rest. "[b] an yet his werk has been finishd since teh creashun ov teh wurld.

for somewhere he has spoken bout teh seventh dai in thees werdz: "an on teh seventh dai ceilin cat restd frum all his werk."[c]

and again in da pasage aboov he sez, "they shall nevr entr mah rest."

it still remains dat sum will entr dat rest, an dose hoo formerly had teh gospel preachd 2 them did not go in, cuz ov their disobedience.

therefore ceilin cat again set certain dai, callin it todai, when long tiem latr he spoke thru david, as wuz sed before: "todai, if u hear his voice, do not harden ur hearts."[d]

for if Joshua had given them rest, ceilin cat wud not has spoken latr bout anothr dai.

There remains, den, sabbath-rest 4 da peeps ov ceilin cat;

for anyone hoo enters ceilin cats rest also rests frum his own werk, jus as ceilin cat did frum his.

Let us, therefore, mak evry effort 2 entr dat rest, so dat no wan will fall by followin their example ov disobedience.

For teh word ov ceilin cat iz livin an activ. Sharpr than any double-edgd sword, it penetratez even 2 dividin soul an spirit, joints an marrow; it judgez teh thoughts an attitudez ov teh hart.

Nothin in all creashun iz hidden frum ceilin cats sight. Evrythin iz uncoverd an laid bare before teh eyez ov him 2 whom we must giv akownt.

Therefore, since we has great high priest hoo has gone thru teh heavens,[e] Jesus teh son ov ceilin cat, let us hold firmly 2 teh faith we profes.

for we do not has high priest hoo iz unable 2 sympathize wif r weaknesez, but we has wan hoo has been temptd in evry wai, jus as we r - yet wuz without sin!

undefined

Every high priest iz selectd frum among doodz an iz appointd 2 represent them in matters relatd 2 ceilin cat, 2 offr gifts an sacrificez 4 sins.

He iz able 2 deal gently wif dose hoo r ignorant an r goin astray, since he him iz subject 2 weaknes.

This iz y he has 2 offr sacrificez 4 his own sins, as well as 4 da sins ov teh peeps.

No wan takez dis honor upon him; he must be calld by ceilin cat, jus as aaron wuz.

So christ also did not taek upon him teh glory ov becomin high priest. But ceilin cat sed 2 him, 
"u r mah son; 
Todai i has become ur fathr.[a]"[b]

And he sez in anothr place, 
"u r priest forevr, 
In da ordr ov melchizedek."[c]

Durin teh dais ov jebus life on earth, he offerd up prayers an petishuns wif loud criez an tears 2 teh wan hoo cud save him frum death, an he wuz herd cuz ov his reverent submishun.

Although he wuz son, he lernd obedience frum wut he sufferd

And, once made perfik, he became teh source ov eternal salvashun 4 all hoo obey him

And wuz designatd by ceilin cat 2 be high priest in da ordr ov melchizedek.

We has mutch 2 say bout dis, but it hard 2 explain cuz u r slow 2 lern.

In fact, though by dis tiem u ought 2 be teachers, u ned someone 2 teach u teh elementary truths ov ceilin cats werd all ovar again. U ned milk, not solid fud!

undefined

Therefore let us leef teh elementary teachings bout christ an go on 2 maturity, not layin again teh foundashun ov repentance frum acts dat lead 2 death,[a] an ov faith in ceilin cat,

Instrucshun bout baptisms, teh layin on ov hanz, teh resurrecshun ov teh ded, an eternal judgment.

And ceilin cat permittin, we will do so.

It impozbl fur dose inlytended, dat haz NOM NOMNOMed teh hebenly prezint, dat can has sum HovrCat,

dat haz NOM NOM NOMMIED teh w00t uv Ceiling Cat's werd n teh ppwerups uv da commin tiem,

if dose kittehs don keep bleevin n be all "Jebus?  No wais! IS A TRAP!!!1" no forgibnez for dem, cos dey killin Jebus all over again an make him Teh Lose.

Land dat drinx in da rane often fallin on it an dat producez crop useful 2 dose 4 whom it farmd receivez teh blesin ov ceilin cat.

Butt land dat producez thorns an thistlez iz worthles an iz in dangr ov bean cursd. In da end it will be burnd.

Even though we speek liek dis, dear frenz, we r confident ov bettr things in ur case - things dat accompany salvashun.

God iz not unjust; he will not forget ur werk an teh luv u has shown him as u has helpd his peeps an continue 2 halp them.

We wants each ov u 2 show dis same diligence 2 teh vry end, in ordr 2 mak ur hope sure.

We do not wants u 2 become lazy, but 2 imitate dose hoo thru faith an patience inherit wut has been promisd.

When ceilin cat made his promize 2 abraham, since thar wuz no wan greatr 4 him 2 swear by, he swore by him,

Sayin, "im gonna surely bles u an giv u lotz da descendants."[c]

And so aftr waitin patiently, abraham receivd wut wuz promisd.

Wen swear by someone greatr than themselvez, an teh oath confirms wut iz sed an puts an end 2 all argument.

Because ceilin cat wantd 2 mak teh unchangin nachur ov his purpose vry clear 2 teh heirs ov wut wuz promisd, he confirmd it wif an oath.

God did dis so dat, by 2 unchangeable things in which it imposible 4 ceilin cat 2 lie, we hoo has fld 2 taek hold ov teh hope offerd 2 us cud be greatly encouragd.

We has dis hope as an anchor 4 da soul, firm an secure. It enters teh innr sanctuary behind teh curtain,

undefined

Dis melchizedek wuz da king ov salem an priist ov da ceiling cat. Him said to abraham: "Oh hai, yu pwns dem other kingz. Yu can has cheezburgerz."

Therfoer abraham giev him ten presents ov da loot. Him name be king ov justiz. Him be king ov peece too.

Him has no dad an mum an kittehs. Him has no birtdai an liev forewer. His liek teh Son of Ceiling Cat. Him is priest for everah.

He iz teh bestest!! Even teh funder abraham giveh him tax.

Dem kitteh ov levi baking cookies an stuff, must take tax ov teh pepol, even demz brothers ar kittehs ov abraham.

But melchizedek iznt one ov dem. Him take tax and giev cheeseburger to abraham as promissing.

Cheeseburger iz better tehn monny.

Taking monney and die iz stupid. But liev iz best a lot.

See! Becaus ov abraham iz paid tax, levi also iz taxed.

Him wuz in him dad when him meet melchizedek.

If teh perfects cud hav bin gotted froo teh levitical priist (iff teh rulez wuz gived to teh kittehz an stuffs), why need udder priist?—one of dem melchizedek, not teh stoopedz Aarons.

Wen der iz noo priist, we needz to chainj teh rulez. srsly.

Dis udder gai is frum udder trieb, an we dusnt liek dat trieb.

"Cuz Ceilin Cat caem frum sky. duh." moses dint say nofin bowt dem udder priists an triebs.

It maek moar cents wunce we gets anudder melchizedek.

Melchizedek r gud an not old, dem r good.

Iz sed:"Ur a priist forevur, a melchizedek."

Teh former rulez r gon cuz dem r stoopidz.

(cuz rulez is fur dummys, srsly) an a bettur hoep wuz heer, an we r closur to Ceilin Cat.

an it wuznt wifowt oaf! Sum wer priists wifowt oafs.

But him becaem priist wen Ceilin Cat sed: "I sed so an Iz not kiddin: 'Ur a priist forevur.' "

Becuz of dis oaf, Jebus iz gunna be gud.

Nao der r lotz of priists, cence dem r diein an dem get replaeced;

But Jebus is envincebul, him r priist forevur.

Derfor him can savez everywun forevurs, cuz he iz always helpin dem.

We needz a gud priist liek dat—wun hoo r good an stuffs.

The point ov wut we r sayin iz dis: we do has such high priest, hoo sat down at teh rite hand ov teh throne ov teh majesty in heaven,

And hoo servez in da sanctuary, teh true tabernacle set up by teh lord, not by man.

Every high priest iz appointd 2 offr both gifts an sacrificez, an so it wuz necesary 4 dis wan also 2 has somethin 2 offr.

If he wuz on earth, he wud not be priest, 4 thar r already doodz hoo offr teh gifts prescribd by teh law.

They serve at sanctuary dat iz copy an shadow ov wut iz in heaven. Dis ar teh y mosez wuz warnd when he wuz bout 2 build teh tabernacle: "c 2 it dat u mak evrythin accordin 2 teh pattern shown u on teh mountain."[a]

Butt teh ministry jebus has receivd iz as superior 2 theirs as teh covenant ov which he iz mediator iz superior 2 teh old wan, an it foundd on bettr promisez.

For if thar had been nothin wrong wid dat furst covenant, no place wud has been sought 4 anothr.

Butt ceilin cat findz fault wif teh peeps an sed[b]: 
"teh tiem iz comin, declarez teh lord, 
When im gonna mak new covenant 
Wif teh houz ov israel 
An wif teh houz ov judah.

It will not be liek teh covenant 
I made wif their forefathers 
When i took them by teh hand 
2 lead them out ov egypt, 
Cuz they did not remain faithful 2 mah covenant, 
An i turnd away frum them, declarez teh lord.

This iz teh covenant im gonna mak wif teh houz ov israel 
Aftr dat tiem, declarez teh lord. 
Im gonna put mah laws in their mindz 
An rite them on their hearts. 
Im gonna be their ceilin cat, 
An they will be mah peeps.

No longr will man teach his neighbor, 
Or man his brothr, sayin, knoe teh lord, 
Cuz they will all knoe me, 
Frum teh least ov them 2 teh greatest.

For im gonna forgiv their wickednes 
An will remembr their sins no moar."[c]

And there wuz a great wunder in teh Ceiling; a brite, shiny prettyz like teh sun, and teh nite sun shonez beneth this; and abuv tis  thingz wuz a crown of shinyz starz:

And tis evil puppeh wagged hiz tale and drew teh starz from teh Ceiling and did casted tem to teh erf. And teh evul puppeh stooded in front uf teh prehgnent kitteh wich wuz reddy to haf teh bebe kitteh, so he culd eated it.

And teh bebe kitteh wuz a male kitteh, who wuld rulez teh erf and all itz nationz wit an iron paw: and tis kitteh was caught up to teh Ceiling, next to teh Ceiling Cat.

And teh momma kitteh rided hur invisuble bicycle away, to some place only teh Ceiling Cat can watch.

And teh evul puppeh wuz casted out of teh Ceiling

That evul puppeh called teh devul, and Satun, which digz in teh backyard, and peez on teh rugz: he wuz casted out onto teh erf, along wif teh other puppehs.

And I can hearz shouting from teh Ceiling, it sayz, Now iz all safe, for teh evul puppeh haz been casted out, which peeded on teh rugz and digdid in teh backyard.
